T02TD3305E:81a-8: der yang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la ni nges par rin po che'i snying por bya'o //
T02TD3305E:81a-9: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la ni chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes la gnas pa'i zla ba 'am nyi ma la ji ltar rigs par bdag po'i mtshan ma'am sa bon /
T02TD3305E:81a-10: de las gzhan ba'i bum pa rnams la ni sna tshogs chu skyes la gnas pa'i zla ba'am nyi mar rang gi mtshan ma'am sa bon nam /
T02TD3305E:81a-11: lha rnams ji lta bar bri bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:81a-12: dkyil 'khor gang du lha ji snyed pa de srid de rnams kyi bum pa'o //
T02TD3305E:81a-13: yang na pho brang gi snying por gnas rnams kho na'i'o //
T02TD3305E:81a-14: de la rigs kyi yum rnams kyi ni bzhi'o //
T02TD3305E:81a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ni lnga'o //
T02TD3305E:81a-16: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kho na'i lnga'o //
T02TD3305E:81a-17: yang na bdag po'i gcig dang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i gcig dang /
T02TD3305E:81a-18: rigs kyi yum bzhi'i gcig dang /
T02TD3305E:81a-19: gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug gi gcig dang /
T02TD3305E:81a-20: khro bo bzhi'i gcig ste lnga'o //
T02TD3305E:81a-21: yang na gtso bo kho na'i gcig go //
T02TD3305E:81a-22: phyogs 'di rnams la ni las thams cad pa'i bum par lhag por bya ste slob ma la sogs pa bsang ba'i don du'o //
T02TD3305E:81a-23: kha cig ni 'di mi 'dod cing bum pa gnyis yang med na /
T02TD3305E:81b-0: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la gtso bo'i mchan ma'i g-yon du las thams cad pa'i @81b mtshan ma bri bar bya'o zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan te //
T02TD3305E:81b-1: de'i mtshan ma ni bgegs mthar byed kyi'o //
T02TD3305E:81b-2: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i yang mtshan ma bzhi phyogs bzhir bri'o zhes pa'i phyogs la ni gtso bo'i mtshan ma rnam par snang mdzad kyi mtshan ma'i steng du'o //
T02TD3305E:81b-3: kha cig tu ni der gnas pa nyid mchu'i steng du'o zhes bshad do //
T02TD3305E:81b-4: spyan ma la sogs pa rnams kyi'ang phyogs bral bzhin du'o zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan no //
T02TD3305E:81b-6: sangs rgyas lnga dang lha mo bzhi //
T02TD3305E:81b-7: khro bo bzhi yi bum pa rnams //
T02TD3305E:81b-8: so so'i 'khyil pa'i gcig dang ni //
T02TD3305E:81b-9: gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs drug la //
T02TD3305E:81b-10: gcig ste mtshan ma ldan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:81b-12: de ltar brjod pa'i phyogs rnams las phyogs gzhan du 'ga' zhig brjod pa de dag ni rig pa ma yin no //
T02TD3305E:81b-13: de ltar 'jam pa'i rdo rje la dkyil 'khor nyi shu dang /
T02TD3305E:81b-17: gcig dang bco lnga ste bum pa'i grangs rnam par gzhag pa'o //
T02TD3305E:81b-18: bsdus pa'i rim pa'i dkyil 'khor du lnga pa gnyis kyi phyogs la ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02TD3305E:81b-20: gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa bzhi'i gcig dang /
T02TD3305E:81b-21: byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi gcig dang /
T02TD3305E:81b-22: khro bo bcu'i gcig go zhes pa ni khyad par ro //
T02TD3305E:81b-24: rang phyogs sras gnyis dag gi gcig / khro drug btsun mo rnams kyi yang //
T02TD3305E:81b-25: snying por gnas dang sgo skyong dang //
T02TD3305E:81b-26: bgegs dgra'i re re nyi shu'o //
T02TD3305E:81b-28: kha sbyor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du phyogs gnyis pa'i lnga pa ni /
T02TD3305E:81b-29: pho brang gi snying por gnas pa rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02TD3305E:81b-30: pho brang gnyis par gnas pa rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02TD3305E:81b-31: phyogs brgyad kyi lha mo rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02TD3305E:81b-32: zur gyi lha mo rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02TD3305E:81b-33: sgo skyong rnams kyi gcig go zhes pa ni khyad par ro //
T02TD3305E:81b-34: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02TD3305E:81b-35: rigs kyi yum rnams dang sgo skyong rnams kyi bum pa re re dang /
T02TD3305E:81b-36: rim pa gnyis pa'i phyogs kyi lha mo rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02TD3305E:82a-0: phyogs bral gyi lha mo rnams @82a * //
T02TD3305E:82a-2: rim pa gsum pa'i phyogs kyi g-yon na gnas pa rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02TD3305E:82a-3: g-yas na gnas pa rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02TD3305E:82a-4: zur na gnas pa rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02TD3305E:82a-5: de'i phyi rol gyi zur na gnas pa rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02TD3305E:82a-6: las thams cad pa'i gcig ste /
T02TD3305E:82a-7: de ltar nyi shu'o zhes pa ni kha cig gi'o //
T02TD3305E:82a-8: dpal bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor la ni 'khor lo lnga la so sor re re ste lnga'o //
T02TD3305E:82a-9: yang na snying po'i pho brang du gnas pa kho na'i lnga'o //
T02TD3305E:82a-10: yang na 'di rnams kyi rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD3305E:82a-12: yang na dbus kyi pho brang dang dam tshig gi 'khor lo la gnas pa rnams kyi gcig ste bcu gsum mo //
T02TD3305E:82a-13: thugs kyi 'khor lo la phyogs su gnas pa rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02TD3305E:82a-14: phyogs bral du gnas pa rnams kyi gcig go //
T02TD3305E:82a-15: de bzhin du gsung gi 'khor lo dang sku'i 'khor lo la yang ste bcu dgu'o //
T02TD3305E:82a-16: phyogs 'di rnams su lha so so'i dgod pa yang las thams cad pa dum skyes ma'i lhag par dgod par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:82a-17: 'di'i rjes su 'brangs nas dkyil 'khor gzhan rnams la yang ji ltar rigs par bum pa'i grangs rigs par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:82a-18: de la gtso bo yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD3305E:82a-19: bya ba mang ba'i phyir rnam rgyal bum pa'i steng du /
T02TD3305E:82a-20: aom badzra aa mri ta au da ka h'um zhes pa 'di dang yi ge gsum gyis kyang lan bdun bsngags pas ye shes kyi bdud rtsir bya zhing /
T02TD3305E:82a-21: rdo rje'i rdul phra rab kyi rang bzhin dang /
T02TD3305E:82a-22: ji ltar rnyed pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang /
T02TD3305E:82a-23: dri bzang po'i chu dang ldan pa h'um gyis bsngags nas dud chos sam padma'i snod du me tog gi phreng ba bcings pa'i rdo rje dang bcas pa bzhag la nang du /
T02TD3305E:82a-24: aom ta pte ma h'a tapte sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:82a-25: zhes pas bkug pa'i gong gi lha'i chu'i ngo bo las lha'i 'khor lo gdan dang bcas pa skad cig gis rnam par bsams te rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi spyan drangs pa'i mdun du zhabs bsil dang /
T02TD3305E:82a-26: zhal bsil dang mchod yon rnams dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:82a-27: de nas dam tshig gi 'khor lo la rab tu bcug ste /
T02TD3305E:82a-28: chags pa chen pos zhu bar gyur nas sngar blugs pa'i chu dang byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bor ro gcig tu gyur par bsgom mo //
T02TD3305E:82b-0: mtshan ma yang dam tshig gi @82b lha ye shes kyi lha dang gcig tu gyur par bsam mo //
T02TD3305E:82b-1: de nas rdo rje dang 'brel ba'i me tog gi mthar g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung nas h'um gis bsngags te 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi snying po brgya rtsa brgyad dam /
T02TD3305E:82b-2: aom badzra au da ka h'um /
T02TD3305E:82b-3: zhes pa 'dis chu la mngon par bsngags la der 'khyil pas bsngags pa'i me tog dkar po gsum gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:82b-4: gzhan yang bum pa gang zhig lha gang gi yin pa de la ni /
T02TD3305E:82b-5: de'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam bdun gyis bsngags par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:82b-6: rdo rje'i me tog gi phreng ba'i mthar bzung nas so //
T02TD3305E:82b-7: de bzhin du me tog kyang gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:82b-8: de nas rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i bum pa rnams me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD3305E:82b-9: srung ba'i don du las thams cad pa'i chus de'i yal 'dab kyis bsangs te /
T02TD3305E:82b-10: 'dir ji srid dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba ma rdzogs pa de srid du bgegs rnams bzlog par mdzod cig ces brjod cing gtor ma phul nas nye bar reg la /
T02TD3305E:82b-11: mi bskyod rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'i bstod pa sngon du 'gro bas dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:82b-12: bum pa de rnams las chu nyung zad nyung zad blangs la dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i shar sgo'i byang gi char man 'ji la gnas pa'i dung chos la sogs pa gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:82b-13: bdag nyid dang slob ma rnams la bsang gtor bya ba'i don du'o //
T02TD3305E:82b-14: las thams cad pa'i bum pa nyid ku sha'i chun po dang ldan pa de'i don du der gzhag par bya'o zhes pa ni gzhan las so //
T02TD3305E:82b-15: bum pa rnams la mngon par bsngags pa dang mchod pa la sogs pa rnams ni nyi ma so sor thun gsum mam gcig tu bya'o //
T02TD3305E:82b-16: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la sogs pa'i sngags ni dkyil 'khor so so'i sgrub thabs la sogs pa rnams su blta bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:82b-17: mdor bsdus pa ni slar yang 'di nyid du 'chad par 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD3305E:82b-18: dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gzugs dang kha dog dang mtshan ma la sogs pa brjod pa'i dus su'o //
T02TD3305E:83a-0: 'di dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i las la nye bar mkho ba'i don du dang por rdul tshon dkar po la sogs pas padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris pa'i lte ba la rnam par @83a * //
T02TD3305E:83a-1: rgyal ba'i bum pa'am las thams cad pa'i bum pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:83a-2: shar gyi 'dab ma la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho gas lhag par gnas pa byas pa'i tshon sna lnga'i thig skud gser la sogs pa'i snod du gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:83a-4: byang du rdo rje'i dril bu'o //
T02TD3305E:83a-5: nub dang zur gyi 'dab ma rnams la ji ltar rigs par rdul tshon lnga'i snod rnams so //
T02TD3305E:83a-6: der 'khyil pa'i sngags bzlas te bum pa'i chus rdul tshon dang thig skud rnams bsang gtor bya'o zhes pa bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:83a-8: // / de nas dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi dri bzangs la sogs pas byugs shing me tog gcal du 'grems su bcug ste /
T02TD3305E:83a-9: der ji ltar 'byung ba'i bdag po lnga'i le tshe rnams su mandala gru bzhi pa bya zhing lha gzhan rnams la zlum po ste /
T02TD3305E:83a-10: bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i dri bzang po rnams kyis bya'o //
T02TD3305E:83a-11: nub tu phyogs pas mandala de rnams su rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis 'dri bar 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ji ltar rigs par chu skyes la gnas pa'i zla ba'am nyi ma la bzhugs su gsol la /
T02TD3305E:83a-12: zhabs bsil la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa dang /
T02TD3305E:83a-13: bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang ba byas te /
T02TD3305E:83a-14: bus mo g-yas pa sa la btsugs shing lce h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje rtse gcig par byas pa h'um bkod nas lag pa g-yas pas sbos phor thogs te /
T02TD3305E:83a-15: g-yon pas rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing /
T02TD3305E:83a-16: bcom ldan rdo rje che ge mchog / rig pa'i rgyal po khyod la 'dud //
T02TD3305E:83a-17: mgon po thugs rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD3305E:83a-19: slob ma rnams la brtse don dang //
T02TD3305E:83a-20: khyed rnams la yang mchod phyir dang //
T02TD3305E:83a-21: sems can bsod nams spel don dang //
T02TD3305E:83a-22: byang chub sems ni bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02TD3305E:83a-23: de pas bcom ldan bdag gus la //
T02TD3305E:83a-24: bka' drin gnang bar mdzad pa'i rigs //
T02TD3305E:83a-26: byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang //
T02TD3305E:83a-27: gzhan yang gang dag gsang sngags lha //
T02TD3305E:83a-28: lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang //
T02TD3305E:83a-29: 'byung po byang chub bstan gnas dang //
T02TD3305E:83a-30: sems can bstan la mngon dga' dang /
T02TD3305E:83b-0: @83b gang su rdo rje'i spyan ldan rnams //
T02TD3305E:83b-1: bdag la yang dag dgongs su gsol //
T02TD3305E:83b-2: bdag ni che ge rdo rje che //
T02TD3305E:83b-4: ji ltar nus par nyer spyod pas //
T02TD3305E:83b-5: 'gro ba sbyang phyir bri bar bya //
T02TD3305E:83b-6: zhes don mngon du byed cing lan gsum brjod pas gsol ba gdab par bya'o//
T02TD3305E:83b-7: zhes pa lha lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:83b-9: // / de'i rjes la ye shes kyi thig la sogs pa'i don du dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi'i steng gi nam mkhar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo blos bkod nas yang dag par mchod de shar du mngon par phyogs shing dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas gzhon nu ma ma nyams pas bkal ba'am dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i skud pa lnga pa lnga snod lngar gnas pa rnams dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i kha dog dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang nag po rnams dang yungs kar gyi phye ma dang bdud rtsi lnga bsres pa rnams kyis so sor kha bsgyur la lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil du sor mo'i rtse mo nas brtsams te mthe bong gi bar ji srid par rnam par bkod la /
T02TD3305E:83b-10: bhr'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um gi yi ge rnams las bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bor gyur par bsgoms te /
T02TD3305E:83b-11: nam mkha' la bzhugs su gsol ba'i rang rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa bsdus par gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i thugs kar bhr'um yig la sogs pa las grub pa'i ye shes kyi skud pa 'od zer dang bcas par blta zhing /
T02TD3305E:83b-12: aom a'a: sh'a shva ta badzra s'u tra mme pra ya tstsha ma h'a mandala s'u tra n'a ya h'um /
T02TD3305E:83b-13: zhes pa 'dis rnam par snang mdzad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:83b-14: ming yongs su bsgyur nas rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa la yod do //
T02TD3305E:83b-15: mig gnyis dza: yig las skyes pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma ser po'i rang bzhin du byas te /
T02TD3305E:83b-16: aom d'i pta drishti aam ku sha dza: zhes brjod cing rab tu myur bar g-yo ba'i mig gi rdzi ma 'degs shing 'gugs pa 'bar ba'i lta stangs lcags kyu lta bus rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bskul bas de rnams rang gi kha dog can gyi thig skud lag par gnas pa rnams la thim par bsgom mo //
T02TD3305E:84a-0: de nyid kyi phyir de rnams ni me long lta bu la @84a * //
T02TD3305E:84a-1: sogs pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin can no zhes /
T02TD3305E:84a-2: rnam pa brgya'i dbye bas phye bar gyur pa'i thig skud rnams so //
T02TD3305E:84a-3: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs sam bgegs mthar byed la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis slob ma thig skud 'dzin pa dang lhan cig dang por skud pa lnga lnga re re bsgril ba'i thig skud bya zhing /
T02TD3305E:84a-4: de'i rjes la de bzhin du lnga rnams gcig tu bsgril ba'i thig skud bya ste /
T02TD3305E:84a-5: aom a'a: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga t'a: sarba dharm'a: bar sp'a ra /
T02TD3305E:84a-6: aa nu pra bishta sarba dharma: aa di aanta aa nu pra bishta: sarba dharm'a: aom a'a: h'um zhes brjod cing bsgril ba'i thig skud slob dpon dang slob ma'i lag pa g-yon pa dag gi mdzub mo nas brtsams te sor mo bzhi'i nang du bcug cing rgyab nas dkris la slar yang bcug cing dkris nas rdo rje khu tshur byas pa'i mthe bong dang mdzub mo'i rgyab kyis sa la sbyar te /
T02TD3305E:84a-7: mnan pa'i bar gyi lhag ma ma gtogs pa ji lta bar srid du dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur dang sboms su nas nyi shu chas lhag pa'i slob dpon gyi nas kyi tshad du 'gyur ro //
T02TD3305E:84a-8: nas bdun gyis sor tshigs so zhes chos mngon pa las bshad pa'o //
T02TD3305E:84a-9: sboms su 'khor lo'i brgyad cha'i nyi shu char bshad pa ni sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid khru gang ba'i dkyil 'khor kho na'i yin te /
T02TD3305E:84a-10: khru gnyis la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad kyang des nye bar mtshon nas tshad dang ldan par rig par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:84a-11: de bzhin du khru drug pa'i tshad can gyi dkyil 'khor la ni thig skud sboms su mthe'u chung gi tshad du bya zhing gzhan du rjes su mthun pa bya'o zhes pa ni kun dga' snying po la sogs pa'i'o //
T02TD3305E:84a-12: thig skud bsgril ba'i mthar dkyil 'khor gyis gzhir dri'i chu dang bdud rtsi lnga dang tsandan la sogs pa'i dri bzangs kyis byugs la yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD3305E:84a-13: gser la sogs pa'i snod gtsang mar bzhag cing /
T02TD3305E:84a-14: me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas lag pas reg la las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:84a-15: g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi mig dag ma dang ta'i yi ge dag las nyi ma dang zla ba dag tu bltas te /
T02TD3305E:84b-0: sngar gsungs pa'i badzra drishti ma zhes pas brtan par @84b byas la /
T02TD3305E:84b-1: 'khyil pa bzlas pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu dang yungs kar dang dri'i chus gtor nas rdo rje dang bsam pa'i lag pa g-yas pas yang dag par reg cing /
T02TD3305E:84b-2: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes pa 'dis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te lhag par gnas pa bya'o zhes pa /
T02TD3305E:84b-3: thig skud lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:84b-5: // / slar yang dkyil 'khor gyis la aom sarba sam sho dha ni h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:84b-6: ces pa'i sngags kyis bum pa thams cad kyi chus bsang gtor byas pa'i gtsang mar dris byugs nas me tog gcal du bkram la /
T02TD3305E:84b-7: nam mkha'i mthil du gnas par yang 'dri bar 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par dmigs te mchod yon dbul ba sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par mchod cing bstod nas rang nyid de'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas bsgrub pa'i grogs po rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs su bsgom zhing /
T02TD3305E:84b-8: rang dang de'i g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi mig dag dzdza:yig las skyes pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma 'od zer ser po can du bsam mo //
T02TD3305E:84b-9: mnyam pa'i rkang stabs kyis thig skud de g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis gzung ba lte bar gzung zhing /
T02TD3305E:84b-10: bsgrub pa'i grogs po de de ltar thig skud gzung ba la dzdza: dzdza: dzdza: zhes pa'i dzdza: yig gsum gyis bskul te /
T02TD3305E:84b-11: sgrub pa'i grogs pos kyang dzdza: dzdza: dzdza: zhes pa'i dzdza: yig gsum gyis drangs nas de kho na bzhin du mngon du phyogs shing gnas pas nub phyogs su gnas te kha shar du blta ba dang lhor gnas te byang du kha blta bas tshangs thig gnyis lte ba dang mnyam pa'i par snang la brkyang ste /
T02TD3305E:84b-12: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe bong dang sor mo ngag gis thig skud gzung ba 'debs shing se gol gyi sgra bya'o //
T02TD3305E:84b-13: thig gdab pa thams cad du yang /
T02TD3305E:84b-14: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um h'um aom sv'a h'a a'a zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:84b-16: sems can don du khyed rnams kyi //
T02TD3305E:84b-17: dus yin de phyir 'dir byon cig / ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD3305E:84b-18: thig gi sgras spyan drangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam par byon nas thig rnams la thim par bsgom mo zhes pa'i brda don no //
T02TD3305E:85a-0: thams cad du yang slob dpon dang sgrub pa'i grogs po g-yas skor gyis 'gro zhing dpal @85a * //
T02TD3305E:85a-1: bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor dang dpal rdo rje phag mo'i dkyil 'khor la ni g-yon skor gyis te phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du lhag par mos par bya'o zhes pa nam mkha' la thig gdab pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:85a-3: // / de la dang po dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa bya ba brtsam pa'i dus su yongs su dag pa'i sa la tshangs pa'i thig gnyis po cho ga 'dis brtan par byas te btab la phyi nas zla ba'i gdan la mtshan ma bya zhing /
T02TD3305E:85a-4: mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brangs nas dkyil 'khor la tshangs pa'i thig gnyis gdab par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:85a-5: de la 'di ni rim pa ste /
T02TD3305E:85a-6: dang po phur bu mnyam par gzugs//
T02TD3305E:85a-7: mtho gang ba yi zlum po gcig / byas nas nyi ma'i rim pa yis //
T02TD3305E:85a-9: der ni thig le gnyis sbyin zhing //
T02TD3305E:85a-10: tshad de de bzhin gzhan du yang //
T02TD3305E:85a-11: thig ler bzung nas thig gdab ste //
T02TD3305E:85a-12: bya rog rjes der mtshan ma bya //
T02TD3305E:85a-13: dang por nub dang shar dag ste //
T02TD3305E:85a-14: slar yang lto dang byang dag tu //
T02TD3305E:85a-15: mkha' yi thig le bzhin du der //
T02TD3305E:85a-16: tshangs pa'i thig gnyis 'gro bar bya //
T02TD3305E:85a-17: de dag mnyam par smad pa yi //
T02TD3305E:85a-18: lag pa dag gis rab tu gdab //
T02TD3305E:85a-19: slar yang tshangs thig lag bzung nas //
T02TD3305E:85a-20: bya rog rjes der mtshan ma bya //
T02TD3305E:85a-21: der ni zur gyi thig gnyis te //
T02TD3305E:85a-22: rtsa ba'i thig kyang rim pas gdab //
T02TD3305E:85a-23: g-yon pa skyil krung phyed pa dang //
T02TD3305E:85a-24: rkang pa g-yas pa 'dus pas so //
T02TD3305E:85a-25: de las bzlog ste 'dug pa yi //
T02TD3305E:85a-26: slob ma lhan cig blo ldan gyis //
T02TD3305E:85a-27: dkyil 'khor thig gdab rdo rje can //
T02TD3305E:85a-28: nam mkha'i thig gi mos pa bya //
T02TD3305E:85a-29: de bzhin thig gdab gzhan rnams la yang ngo //
T02TD3305E:85a-31: thig skud chad na bla ma zad //
T02TD3305E:85a-32: dman dang lhag pa las ni nad //
T02TD3305E:85a-33: phyogs rmongs na ni slob ma 'khrul //
T02TD3305E:85a-34: zhes pa de ltar shes nas 'bad par bya zhing /
T02TD3305E:85a-35: gal te thig 'debs pa na 'ga' zhig tu 'byor pa med pa dang //
T02TD3305E:85a-36: grogs po med pa dang mi dga' bar gyur na de'i tshe phur bu la bcings nas rang nyid kyis thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:85a-37: der yang shin tu mnyam gzhag pa'i //
T02TD3305E:85a-38: slob dpon slob ma lhan cig tu //
T02TD3305E:85a-39: rim 'dis blo dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD3305E:85a-40: dkar po'i thig ni gdab par bya //
T02TD3305E:85b-0: chu @85b bdag gnas pa'i slob dpon dang //
T02TD3305E:85b-1: mngon par phyogs pa'i slob ma ni //
T02TD3305E:85b-2: dbang po'i phyogs su gnas pas kyang //
T02TD3305E:85b-3: 'dir ni tshangs pa'i thig gdab bya //
T02TD3305E:85b-4: gshin rje'i phyogs dang lus ngan por //
T02TD3305E:85b-5: gnas pa'i gsang sngags rig pa dang //
T02TD3305E:85b-6: lhan cig pa yi slob ma yis //
T02TD3305E:85b-7: yang dag tshangs thig gnyis pa gdab //
T02TD3305E:85b-8: me mtshams gnas pa'i slob dpon dang //
T02TD3305E:85b-9: rlung du gnas shing rang gi ni //
T02TD3305E:85b-10: lhag pa'i lha yi sbyor ldan pas //
T02TD3305E:85b-11: zur gyi thig ni gdab par bya //
T02TD3305E:85b-12: dbang ldan phyogs nas bla ma dang //
T02TD3305E:85b-13: bden bral song ba'i slob ma yis //
T02TD3305E:85b-14: zur gyi thig ni gnyis pa yang //
T02TD3305E:85b-15: yang dag pa ni gdab par bya //
T02TD3305E:85b-16: me mtshams gnas pa'i slob ma dang //
T02TD3305E:85b-17: nges par mngon phyogs slob ma ni //
T02TD3305E:85b-18: dbang lhan mtshams su gnas pa yis //
T02TD3305E:85b-19: rtsa ba'i thig gnyis gdab par bya //
T02TD3305E:85b-20: de nyid du ni rdo rje can //
T02TD3305E:85b-21: bden bral du ni gnas pa'i bu //
T02TD3305E:85b-22: mkhas pa thig rnams shes pa yis//
T02TD3305E:85b-23: lho yi thig ni gdab par bya //
T02TD3305E:85b-24: de nyid du gnas slob ma dang //
T02TD3305E:85b-25: rlung du gnas pa'i sngags pa dag //
T02TD3305E:85b-26: bden bral rlung du gnas pa yi //
T02TD3305E:85b-27: gsum pa'i thig ni gdab par bya //
T02TD3305E:85b-28: de nyid du gnas rdo rje can //
T02TD3305E:85b-29: zhi ba'i phyogs su gnas pa'i bu //
T02TD3305E:85b-30: las rnams shes pas phyin nas ni //
T02TD3305E:85b-31: rtsa thig bzhi pa gdab par bya //
T02TD3305E:85b-32: bcom ldan 'das kyis mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur las ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa /
T02TD3305E:85b-33: dang por tshangs pa'i thig yin te //
T02TD3305E:85b-34: gnyis pa zur gyi thig yin no //
T02TD3305E:85b-35: gsum pa la ni ngos bzhi ru //
T02TD3305E:85b-36: thig bzhi rab tu gdab par bya //
T02TD3305E:85b-38: de la 'dir rtsa ba'i thig gi brgyad cha ni sgo'o//
T02TD3305E:85b-39: sgo'i cha ni cha chung ste cha chung dang po dang kri sha dang cha shas zhes rnam grangs so //
T02TD3305E:85b-40: cha chung gnyis kyi bdag nyid ni cha ste cha chung bzhi ni cha chen no //
T02TD3305E:85b-41: zhi ba zhes pa ni cha chung phyed la rnam par blta bar bya'o zhes pa dkar pos thigs gdab pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD3305E:85b-42: da ni dkyil 'khor thams cad la thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig brjod par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:85b-43: cha gcig dang ni cha chung bdun //
T02TD3305E:85b-44: gsum pa'i mthar ni bzhi pa la //
T02TD3305E:85b-46: cha chung re re mnyam par bri //
T02TD3305E:85b-47: ra yi rtse mo'i mthar thug pa //
T02TD3305E:85b-48: de nas gser zlum po'i thig //
T02TD3305E:86a-2: rdo rje phreng ba'i cha chung gnyis //
T02TD3305E:86a-3: 'od zer phreng ba'i cha chung bzhi //
T02TD3305E:86a-4: thams cad kyang ni zlum por bya //
T02TD3305E:86a-5: de ltar brkyang ba'i thig bar cha //
T02TD3305E:86a-7: lha yi dbye ba cung zad kyis //
T02TD3305E:86a-8: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor nang du ni //
T02TD3305E:86a-9: thig gi dbye dang phyi rol du //
T02TD3305E:86a-10: dbyer med blo ldan gyis reg bya //
T02TD3305E:86a-11: nga ni rim pa ji lta bar //
T02TD3305E:86a-12: sgo sogs dbye ba brjod par bya //
T02TD3305E:86a-13: steng du bdun te gnyis ngos su //
T02TD3305E:86a-14: gnyis ni steng du ngos gnyis su'o //
T02TD3305E:86a-15: steng du gsum gsum stong pa la //
T02TD3305E:86a-16: bzhi ni steng du de bzhin slar //
T02TD3305E:86a-17: stegs bur drug kyang de bzhin dbyi //
T02TD3305E:86a-18: gos dang ka bar gsum gsum mo //
T02TD3305E:86a-19: tshangs pa'i gnyis su re kh'a bzhi //
T02TD3305E:86a-20: phyogs su yang ni gnyis gnyis dbyi //
T02TD3305E:86a-21: gos kyi mthar yang de bzhin dbyi //
T02TD3305E:86a-22: rin chen dra phyed dbus gnas dang //
T02TD3305E:86a-23: shar bu dang ni mda' yab dang //
T02TD3305E:86a-24: tshon dang stegs bu'i sar de bzhin //
T02TD3305E:86a-25: zur las lhag pa'i re kh'a yi //
T02TD3305E:86a-26: thig rnams thams cad kun nas dbyi //
T02TD3305E:86a-28: sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ste //
T02TD3305E:86a-29: stegs bu dang ni bral bar 'dod //
T02TD3305E:86a-30: sgo yi tshad kyis sgo khyud re //
T02TD3305E:86a-31: de bzhin lha yi snam bu'o //
T02TD3305E:86a-32: stegs bu kun nas sgo yi phyed //
T02TD3305E:86a-33: de bzhin 'gram dang logs dang ni //
T02TD3305E:86a-34: dra bar dra phyed nyi zla dang //
T02TD3305E:86a-35: me tog phreng ba'i snam bu'o //
T02TD3305E:86a-36: tshon gyi sa ni de phyed de //
T02TD3305E:86a-37: rtsa thig sa las phyi rol du'o //
T02TD3305E:86a-38: zhes pa 'di bshad pa yin no //
T02TD3305E:86a-39: lha'i snam bu ni rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du'o //
T02TD3305E:86a-40: stegs bu la ni gzungs kyi snam bu dang bar gyi snam bu zhes kyang brjod do //
T02TD3305E:86a-41: 'phags pa klu'i blo'i zhabs ni mig sman gyi snam bu bar gyi snam bu dang ya phubs kyi snam bu yang mi bzhed de /
T02TD3305E:86a-43: sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ste //
T02TD3305E:86a-44: lha yi snam bu de bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:86a-45: sgo yi tshad kyi sgo khyud de //
T02TD3305E:86a-46: 'gram dang logs kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:86a-48: 'dir ni sgo dang rta babs dag gi dbus su bar gyi sa la bar gyi snam bu dang mun pa'i snam bu dang stong pa zhes kyang brjod do //
T02TD3305E:86a-49: rta babs sgo las sum 'gyur te //
T02TD3305E:86a-50: de yang snam bu bcu gcig pa //
T02TD3305E:86a-51: bre phul shar bu rin chen dang //
T02TD3305E:86a-52: rmig pa rnams ni cha chung bzhi //
T02TD3305E:86a-53: mun pa'i cha chung phyed dang gnyis //
T02TD3305E:86b-0: ba ran la ni cha chung gcig / de @86b bzhin slar yang mun pa ste //
T02TD3305E:86b-1: shar bu de bzhin nor bu dang //
T02TD3305E:86b-2: rmig pa cha chung re rer 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:86b-3: mnga' yab kyang ni de bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:86b-4: 'di rnams dpangs kyi tshad du ni //
T02TD3305E:86b-5: bshad de rgyar yang brjod par bya //
T02TD3305E:86b-6: bcu drug bre phul tshad du 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:86b-7: shar bu la ni bco brgyad bshad //
T02TD3305E:86b-8: rin chen rmig pa de bzhin bya //
T02TD3305E:86b-9: mun pa la ni bcu bzhir 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:86b-10: ba ran la ni bcu drug yin //
T02TD3305E:86b-11: slar yang mun pa bcu gnyis yin //
T02TD3305E:86b-12: shar bu la ni bcu bzhi dang //
T02TD3305E:86b-13: nor bu rmig pa de bzhin nyid //
T02TD3305E:86b-14: mda' yab la ni bcur 'gyur te //
T02TD3305E:86b-15: chos kyi 'khor lo cha chung gnyis //
T02TD3305E:86b-16: ra la cha chung gnyis de rnams //
T02TD3305E:86b-18: cha chung phyed dang bzhi pa'i thig / tshangs pa la ni gzung byas nas //
T02TD3305E:86b-19: cha chung bdun pa'i zlum po der //
T02TD3305E:86b-20: 'khyog po'i don du rab mdzes bya //
T02TD3305E:86b-21: tshangs pa'i g-yas dang g-yon dag tu //
T02TD3305E:86b-22: slar yang cha chung gsum gyi bar //
T02TD3305E:86b-23: de bzhin nyid du zlum po bskor //
T02TD3305E:86b-24: zla phyed lta bur mdzes pa bya //
T02TD3305E:86b-25: de nyid nang du zlum po ni //
T02TD3305E:86b-26: slar yang cha chung phyed kyi bar //
T02TD3305E:86b-27: rin chen la sogs bri don du //
T02TD3305E:86b-28: blo bzang kyis [*gis] ni de bzhin bskor //
T02TD3305E:86b-29: nang du lhag pa'i re kh'a kun //
T02TD3305E:86b-30: kun nas rab tu dbyi bar bya //
T02TD3305E:86b-31: snam bu rnams kyi steng 'og tu //
T02TD3305E:86b-32: thig ni sbyin bya gnyis pa las //
T02TD3305E:86b-33: mdzes pa'i don du 'bad pas der //
T02TD3305E:86b-34: 'khyog po yi ni nang du yang //
T02TD3305E:86b-35: tshangs pa la ni cha chung bzhir //
T02TD3305E:86b-36: bzung nas slar yang sgo gsum bar //
T02TD3305E:86b-37: rva yi don du mdzes ba'i thig / zla ba phyed pa lta bur bskor //
T02TD3305E:86b-38: de nyid g-yas dang g-yon dag tu //
T02TD3305E:86b-39: cha chung gsum gyi bar du yang //
T02TD3305E:86b-40: de bzhin nyid du zlum po bskor //
T02TD3305E:86b-41: rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pas so //
T02TD3305E:86b-42: chu srin kha las thon pa'i rva //
T02TD3305E:86b-43: 'bar ba'i phreng bas brgyan par bya //
T02TD3305E:86b-44: rta babs steng du 'khor lo'i ngos //
T02TD3305E:86b-45: gnyis su ri dags ri dags mo //
T02TD3305E:86b-46: cha chung phyed las ring bar ni //
T02TD3305E:86b-47: mgrin pa gyen du 'greng ba bri //
T02TD3305E:86b-48: de dag gi ni mjug ma ru //
T02TD3305E:86b-49: mdzes pa'i gdugs gnyis bri bar bya //
T02TD3305E:86b-50: rta babs 'og tu bla re ni //
T02TD3305E:86b-51: dril bur bcas shing rnga yab ldan //
T02TD3305E:86b-53: snying por mkha' 'gro ma nyid gnyis //
T02TD3305E:86b-54: lag par mchod rdzas 'dzin pa dag / slar yang dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya //
T02TD3305E:87a-2: seng ge la sogs rab mdzes bya //
T02TD3305E:87a-3: snam bu rnams kyi mthar bri zhing //
T02TD3305E:87a-4: de bzhin ba dan phra mo rnams //
T02TD3305E:87a-5: rva yi g-yas dang g-yon du yang //
T02TD3305E:87a-6: bum par gnas pa'i dpag bsam shing //
T02TD3305E:87a-7: rin chen brgyad dang mnyam par ldan //
T02TD3305E:87a-8: 'khri shing rnams kyis yongs su gang //
T02TD3305E:87a-9: sna tshogs me tog 'bras bu dang //
T02TD3305E:87a-10: sna tshogs bya kun sgra sgrogs dang //
T02TD3305E:87a-11: grub pa rig pa 'dzin rnams kyis //
T02TD3305E:87a-12: kun nas yongs su bskor ba dang //
T02TD3305E:87a-13: sprin la nges par gnas pa'i gzugs //
T02TD3305E:87a-14: de rnams thams cad bri bya zhing //
T02TD3305E:87a-15: sgo rnams su ni rgyal mtshan bya //
T02TD3305E:87a-16: bum pa gnas pa'i g-yas g-yon du //
T02TD3305E:87a-17: seng ge dad pa rma bya dang //
T02TD3305E:87a-18: chu srin nya rnams kyis mtshan cing //
T02TD3305E:87a-19: ba dan sna tshogs g-yo ba can //
T02TD3305E:87a-20: dril bu sil sil sgrogs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:87a-21: zur rnams su ni gdugs bya zhing //
T02TD3305E:87a-22: gzhan yang ba dan phra mo rnams //
T02TD3305E:87a-23: mtshan ma sogs dang bral ba ste //
T02TD3305E:87a-24: sna tshogs mdog can kun nas bya //
T02TD3305E:87a-25: gzhan yang dur khrod rnams kyi ni //
T02TD3305E:87a-26: khyad par dkyil 'khor rnams la yang //
T02TD3305E:87a-27: 'od zer phreng ba cha chung gnyis //
T02TD3305E:87a-28: rdo rje phreng ba cha chung gcig / padma'i phreng ba de bzhin bya //
T02TD3305E:87a-29: dur khrod la ni cha chung bzhi //
T02TD3305E:87a-30: skal ldan mnyam par 'ongs pa na //
T02TD3305E:87a-31: rab tu 'bad pas bri bya ste //
T02TD3305E:87a-32: skal med yang dag 'ongs pa na //
T02TD3305E:87a-33: dam tshig bsrung bas mi bya nyid //
T02TD3305E:87a-34: de ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las kyang gsungs te //
T02TD3305E:87a-35: tshon gyi sa yi nyis 'gyur tshad //
T02TD3305E:87a-37: 'khor sa de yi phyi rol du //
T02TD3305E:87a-38: shing sogs dur khrod brgyad po'o //
T02TD3305E:87a-40: gzhan yang kun dga' snying po'i rta babs kyang brjod par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:87a-41: mi bdag nyes pa gsum nyi ma //
T02TD3305E:87a-42: mi bdag phyogs dang mi bdag gsum //
T02TD3305E:87a-43: phyogs te thad kar cha chung rnams //
T02TD3305E:87a-44: rta babs snam bu'i rim pa yin //
T02TD3305E:87a-45: zhes pa'ang kun du grol ba'o //
T02TD3305E:87a-46: gzhan yang phyogs gang la sgo 'khor lo'i bcu cha'am 'khor lo'i dgu char 'gyur ba la ni /
T02TD3305E:87a-47: dkyil 'khor la yang mda' yab kyi mthar thug pa la cha chung drug cu rtsa bzhi ste //
T02TD3305E:87a-48: phyogs de la ni rta babs kyi rgyar cha chung bcu gnyis dang /
T02TD3305E:87a-49: dpangs su cha chung bzhir 'gyur ro //
T02TD3305E:87b-0: 'on kyang snam bu ni bcu @87b gcig ste /
T02TD3305E:87b-2: shar bu rin chen gnas dang gser //
T02TD3305E:87b-3: chu srin de nas gser dang ni //
T02TD3305E:87b-4: gnas dang rin chen yang dag gnas //
T02TD3305E:87b-5: gser dang mda' yab de dag go //
T02TD3305E:87b-6: gnas zhes bya ba ni rmig pa'i rnam grangs so //
T02TD3305E:87b-7: cha chen cha yi dbye ba yis //
T02TD3305E:87b-8: dpangs kyi tshad rnams zhes bya ste//
T02TD3305E:87b-9: nor dang nor dad nyi ma dang //
T02TD3305E:87b-10: rgyal ba nor dang rgyal ba dang //
T02TD3305E:87b-11: nyi ma nor dang nyi ma dang //
T02TD3305E:87b-12: rgyal ba nor rnams rim pa bzhin //
T02TD3305E:87b-13: dpangs kyi tshad du bshad pa ste //
T02TD3305E:87b-14: rgyar ni 'di rnams brjod par bya //
T02TD3305E:87b-15: tshangs pa'i g-yas dang g-yon dag tu //
T02TD3305E:87b-16: cha chung phyed bcas chu gter mthar //
T02TD3305E:87b-17: cha chung phyed dang gnyis pa'i thig //
T02TD3305E:87b-18: de bzhin cha chung gnyis nas ni //
T02TD3305E:87b-19: snam bu gnyis pa gsum pa dag / cha chung gnyis dang cha chung bzhi //
T02TD3305E:87b-20: cha chung bzhi dang bzhi pa ni //
T02TD3305E:87b-21: cha chung gnyis te phyed dang ni //
T02TD3305E:87b-22: bzhi nas phyed dang gsum pa dang //
T02TD3305E:87b-23: gsum nas drug pa cha chung gsum //
T02TD3305E:87b-24: de nas cha chung brgyad pa gsum //
T02TD3305E:87b-25: bdun pa gcig dang mthar drug pa'o //
T02TD3305E:87b-26: de'i phyir cha chung rig byed mthar //
T02TD3305E:87b-27: zlum po cha chung gnyis de bzhin //
T02TD3305E:87b-28: cha chung gnyis pa zlum po'i thig / de ni cha chung bzhi pa'i mthar //
T02TD3305E:87b-29: zhes pa rgyar rta babs sgo las sum 'gyur gyi phyogs kyang ngo //
T02TD3305E:87b-30: de ltar phyogs gnyis ka yang bdag gis brjod do //
T02TD3305E:87b-31: phyogs gnyis pa la snying po'i dkyil 'khor las nyis 'gyur du phyi'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa ni //
T02TD3305E:87b-32: padma'i ge sar gyi zlum po'i thig tshun chad do //
T02TD3305E:87b-33: phyogs dang po las ni 'khor dang bcas pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor las 'od zer phreng ba'i bar ji srid pa'o //
T02TD3305E:87b-34: rta babs kyi ka ba las pha rol padma'i ge sar zlum po'i thig las tshu rol du cha chung bzhi pa'i rta babs so zhes pa ni phyogs gnyi ga dang yang mi mthun pas spangs so //
T02TD3305E:87b-35: 'dir sgo dang sgo khyud kyi mtshams su cha chung gcig la zla tshes la gnas pa'i rin po che dmar po 'am ser po 'am ljang gu 'am nag po yang rung ste //
T02TD3305E:87b-36: steng du rdo rje phyed pas mtshan pa 'am yongs su rdzogs pa'i rdo rjes mtshan pa bri'o //
T02TD3305E:87b-38: tshon gyi sa las phyi yi zur //
T02TD3305E:87b-39: sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su //
T02TD3305E:87b-40: zla ba rin chen rdo rjes mtshan //
T02TD3305E:87b-41: kun nas yongs su 'bar ba yin //
T02TD3305E:88a-1: rta babs kyi ka ba rnams ni stegs bu gru bzhi pa la gnas pa'i bum pa la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:88a-3: chu srin kha nas ra yi bar //
T02TD3305E:88a-4: rta babs sgo las sum 'gyur te //
T02TD3305E:88a-5: stegs bu bum pa las byung ba'i //
T02TD3305E:88a-6: rta babs ka ba nges par gnas //
T02TD3305E:88a-8: de rnams kyi rtsa ba dang rtse mo la nor bus spras pa'o //
T02TD3305E:88a-9: dbus su glang po che'i steng du dpung pas bteg pa'i seng ge'o //
T02TD3305E:88a-10: rta babs kyi gdung las 'phyang ba'i rin po che'i pa tra 'phro ba las ji ltar mdzes par dpyangs pa'i kha dog dmar po dang ser po la sogs pa'am /
T02TD3305E:88a-11: sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po che'i yu ba can gyi rnga yab rnams so //
T02TD3305E:88a-12: kha cig tu ni dar dpyangs kyi snam bu la glang po che'i steng du seng ge'i kha nas 'phyang ba'i do shal dang ka ba'i dbus su me long nyid do zhes gsungs so //
T02TD3305E:88a-13: rin po che'i snam bu la ni zur la gru gsum dang /
T02TD3305E:88a-16: zlum po rnams go rims bzhin du rin po ches spras pa ni ka ba so so'i gzhogs su'o //
T02TD3305E:88a-17: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i snam bu la ni gser gyi ska rags kyi phyi ngos su chu srin gyi kha nas byung ba'i mu tig gi do shal skud pa dmar pos brgyus shing ngos gnyis dang steng dang 'og tu gser gyis sbras pa'i nor bu dbus na yod pa dang /
T02TD3305E:88a-18: do shal gyi ngos dag tu cung zad 'phyang ba'i rin po che'i phreng ba 'phyang zhing rtse mo la gser gyis bcings pa'i nor bu sbom po dang ldan zhing mdzes pa'i dra ba phyed pa'o //
T02TD3305E:88a-19: kha cig tu ni rin po che'i yu ba can gyi rnga yab dang dril bu'i mthar rnga yab 'phyang ba'o //
T02TD3305E:88a-20: kha cig tu ni dra ba phyed pa'i dos dag tu yid du 'ong ba'i me tog gi phreng ba'i dra ba phyed pa 'phyang zhing /
T02TD3305E:88a-21: de'i ngos su sna tshogs pa'i gos kyi dra ba phyed pa'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD3305E:88a-22: gzhan ni zur rnams su yid du 'ong ba'i me tog gi phreng ba'i do shal phyed pa dang /
T02TD3305E:88a-23: dar gyi chun po'i do shal rnams so //
T02TD3305E:88a-24: kha cig tu ni do shal gyi nang du padma la zla tshes dang rdo rje phyed pas mtshan pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD3305E:88a-25: kha cig tu ni rin po che'o //
T02TD3305E:88a-26: kha cig tu ni padma la gnas pa'i rdo rje'o //
T02TD3305E:88a-27: de lta bu 'di ni rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor las phyi rol du thig gdab cing bri ba'i rim pa ste /
T02TD3305E:88a-28: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi thun mong ba'o //
T02TD3305E:88b-0: da ni @88b nang gi khyad par rnams brjod par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:88b-1: sngar gyi thig rnams rab brkyang la //
T02TD3305E:88b-2: tshangs las cha chung thub pa nas //
T02TD3305E:88b-3: zlum po cig ni sbyin bya ste //
T02TD3305E:88b-4: de nas cha chung nor mthar yang //
T02TD3305E:88b-5: der ni rdo rje'i phreng ba bya //
T02TD3305E:88b-6: 'od zer mthar ni cha chung nyid //
T02TD3305E:88b-7: tshangs pa'i g-yas dang g-yon dag tu //
T02TD3305E:88b-8: cha chung gnyis gnyis bar du slar //
T02TD3305E:88b-9: ka ba'i snam bu cha chung re //
T02TD3305E:88b-10: yang dag bsrungs nas gzhan rnams dbyi //
T02TD3305E:88b-11: re mig rnams kyi snying po ni //
T02TD3305E:88b-12: gru bzhi'o phyogs rnams de nyid ni //
T02TD3305E:88b-13: phyogs bral spyan ma la sogs pa'i //
T02TD3305E:88b-14: gru gsum du yang 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD3305E:88b-15: gang zhig mthar ni lha snam la //
T02TD3305E:88b-16: gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs //
T02TD3305E:88b-17: lhag pa'i re kh'a gang yin pa //
T02TD3305E:88b-18: de rnams thams cad kun nas dbyi //
T02TD3305E:88b-19: de lta bu yi rim pa yis //
T02TD3305E:88b-21: gtso bo gzhan du 'god pa'i thig kyang 'di'o //
T02TD3305E:88b-23: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD3305E:88b-24: rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa ste //
T02TD3305E:88b-25: thig bzhi dang ni mnyam par ldan //
T02TD3305E:88b-26: phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya //
T02TD3305E:88b-27: de yi nang du 'khor lo ni //
T02TD3305E:88b-28: dkyil 'khor brgyad pa lta bu yin //
T02TD3305E:88b-29: phyi yi 'khor lo'i phyed du ni //
T02TD3305E:88b-30: kun nas yongs su zlum po ste //
T02TD3305E:88b-31: 'khor lo'i ka ba sogs kyis brgyan //
T02TD3305E:88b-32: rdo rje phreng bas bskor zhing mdzes //
T02TD3305E:88b-33: 'khor lo'i ka sogs thig rnams kyi //
T02TD3305E:88b-34: sa ni tshon gyi sa dang mnyam //
T02TD3305E:88b-35: zhes pa'ang bshad pa yin no //
T02TD3305E:88b-36: bsdus pa'i rim par gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang thig gi tshul 'di nyid do //
T02TD3305E:88b-37: slar yang khyad par brjod par bya ste //
T02TD3305E:88b-38: snying por zlum po gnyis byin nas //
T02TD3305E:88b-39: tshangs dang zur gyi thig dag gi / bar du ka ba cha chung re //
T02TD3305E:88b-40: nam mkha'i thig gis brgyad du 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:88b-41: phyogs dang mtshams su gru gsum mo //
T02TD3305E:88b-42: bar gyi zlum po gnyis la yang //
T02TD3305E:88b-43: gzugs kyi rdo rje ma sogs dang //
T02TD3305E:88b-44: rin chen byang chub sems gnas rnams //
T02TD3305E:88b-45: nang na gnas pa'i re kh'a dang //
T02TD3305E:88b-46: snam bur gnas pa'i re kh'a dbyi //
T02TD3305E:88b-48: dpal ldan kha sbyor rgyud gsungs pa'i //
T02TD3305E:88b-49: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD3305E:88b-50: so bdun bdag nyid 'khor lo la //
T02TD3305E:88b-51: tshangs pa'i g-yas dang g-yon dag tu //
T02TD3305E:88b-52: phyed bcas cha chung bar dor nas //
T02TD3305E:88b-53: cha chung phyed pa'i thig gnyis gdab //
T02TD3305E:88b-54: cha chung gsum dor zlum po ni //
T02TD3305E:88b-55: cha chung phyed par rdo rje'i phreng //
T02TD3305E:89a-1: cha chung gsum gyi bar nas slar //
T02TD3305E:89a-2: cha chung phyed par zlum po de'i //
T02TD3305E:89a-3: dbus su padma'i phreng ba yang //
T02TD3305E:89a-4: cha chung gsum nas zlum po ste //
T02TD3305E:89a-5: slar yang cha chung phyed par de'i //
T02TD3305E:89a-7: gzhan gyi sa la cha chung gsum //
T02TD3305E:89a-8: dpal ldan ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i //
T02TD3305E:89a-9: 'khor lo bcu gsum bdag nyid mdzes //
T02TD3305E:89a-10: tshangs pa'i thig las cha chung ni //
T02TD3305E:89a-11: gsum las thig gnyis cha chung 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:89a-12: slar yang cha chung drug dor nas //
T02TD3305E:89a-13: zlum po gcig ni bskor bar bya //
T02TD3305E:89a-14: slar yang cha chung zlum po la //
T02TD3305E:89a-15: rdo rje'i phreng ba'i mtshan ma ste //
T02TD3305E:89a-16: 'od zer phreng ba'i don du gzhan //
T02TD3305E:89a-17: cha chung bar nas slar yang ngo //

T02TD3305E:91b-52: nang ma dang ni lhan cig tu //
T02TD3305E:92a-2: dkyil 'khor rnams kyi nang nyid du //
T02TD3305E:92a-3: lte ba'i don du cha chung gsum //
T02TD3305E:92a-4: de phyir 'dab ma'i don du yang //
T02TD3305E:92a-5: cha chung drug gis zlum po bya //
T02TD3305E:92a-6: phyi rol phyogs dang phyogs bral du //
T02TD3305E:92a-7: cha chung drug pa'i padma brgyad //
T02TD3305E:92a-8: de yi phyi nas zlum po gcig / cha chung bar nas slar de bzhin //
T02TD3305E:92a-9: rang rang dkyil 'khor tshad kyis ni //
T02TD3305E:92a-10: sgo sogs mtshan nyid shes par bya //
T02TD3305E:92a-11: gzhan pho brang bdun pa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i gzhan yas khang gi khyad par rnams kyang bshad ba'i rjes su 'brangs te dpags la mkhas pa rnams kyis thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:92a-12: slar yang dpal dus kyi 'khor lor gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni 'dir brjod pa'i rgyud gzhan mtha' dag tu gsungs pa'i cho ga rnams las nyi ma'i shing rta la sogs pa gdul bar bya ba'i don du bya pa mi 'dra bar gsungs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:92a-13: de'i phyir rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor ba rnams kyis ni bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang nyid sna tshogs ba'i skus dkyil 'khor ma lus pa'i dbang phyug yin pas mngon par 'dod ba thams cad bskyed cing 'byung ba'o zhes brtan par lhag par mos pa byas na rgyud gzhan gyi tshogs kyang rab tu gnas pa la sogs ba rjes su gnang zhing mi 'gal bas mngon par 'dod pa sgrub bar byed do //
T02TD3305E:92a-14: des na dus kyi 'khor lo'i bya ba rab tu spros pa rnams yongs su dor nas dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa tsam brjod par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:92a-15: rdul tshon dgye ba tsam yang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rdul tshon dgye ba'i skabs su brjod par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:92a-16: 'dir slob dpon gyi mtheb sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni khru ste khru bzhi ni dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD3305E:92a-17: de nyis 'gyur srid du khru brgyad pa'i tshangs thig gnyis gdab par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:92a-18: de'i rjes la de bzhin du zur thig gnyis so //
T02TD3305E:92a-19: thig skud kyi sboms su ni slob dpon gyi nas kyi tshad do //
T02TD3305E:92a-20: de la thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i drug cha ni mtheb sor phyed kyi tshad de cha chung du tha snyad gdags par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:92a-21: snying po nyid du thig gzung nas //
T02TD3305E:92a-22: lte ba'i don du cha chung gnyis //
T02TD3305E:92b-0: de nas @92b 'dab ma'i cha chung bzhir //
T02TD3305E:92b-1: rdo rje can gyis zlum po bya //
T02TD3305E:92b-2: de nas bar med par ni thig / kun nas gru bzhi pa yin te //
T02TD3305E:92b-3: cha chung bar nas slar yang sbyin //
T02TD3305E:92b-4: rdo rje phreng bas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:92b-5: cha chung bzhi yi bar spangs nas //
T02TD3305E:92b-6: zur gnyis dag la thug ba'i thig //
T02TD3305E:92b-7: slar yang cha chung bar dor nas //
T02TD3305E:92b-8: rdo rje phreng ba'i thig gdab po //
T02TD3305E:92b-10: rab mdzes cha chung bzhi ba ste //
T02TD3305E:92b-11: dos ni gnyis po dag tu yang //
T02TD3305E:92b-12: cha chung re re'i ka ba bya //
T02TD3305E:92b-13: de dag gi ni ngos su rgyar //
T02TD3305E:92b-14: cha chung gsum ba'i bum pa ste //
T02TD3305E:92b-15: slar yang ka ba cha chung nyid //
T02TD3305E:92b-16: srid du cha chung bzhi pa'o //
T02TD3305E:92b-17: phyi nas de yi mtha' ma yi //
T02TD3305E:92b-18: phyi rol tu ni thig gdab ste //
T02TD3305E:92b-19: cha chung thub pa yongs dor nas //
T02TD3305E:92b-20: zur thig gnyis kyi bar du'o //
T02TD3305E:92b-21: de yi phyi rol lha snam la //
T02TD3305E:92b-22: cha chung bzhi ni spangs par te //
T02TD3305E:92b-23: de nas cha chung bar spangs nas //
T02TD3305E:92b-24: rtsa thig rab tu gdab par bya //
T02TD3305E:92b-25: rtsa ba'i thig gi mthar thug pa //
T02TD3305E:92b-26: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog yin zhing //
T02TD3305E:92b-27: 'khor lo'i brgyad cha sgo yin te //
T02TD3305E:92b-28: de yi drug cha cha chung ngo //
T02TD3305E:92b-29: de la tha snyad byas pa ni //
T02TD3305E:92b-31: sgo yi tshad kyis sgo khyud de //
T02TD3305E:92b-32: 'gram dang logs kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:92b-33: de yi phyed kyis stegs bur 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:92b-34: stegs bu'i phyed kyis tshon gyis //
T02TD3305E:92b-35: dra ba stegs bu'i tshad du 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:92b-36: rin chen sa ni de yi phyed //
T02TD3305E:92b-37: shar bu dang ni mda' yab sa //
T02TD3305E:92b-38: tshon gyi sa dang mnyam pa ste //
T02TD3305E:92b-39: ka ba cha chung phyed dang gnyis //
T02TD3305E:92b-40: bar ni rin chen la sogs bdun //
T02TD3305E:92b-41: cha chung phyed dang brgyad pa yi //
T02TD3305E:92b-42: dpangs su yang dag gnas pa ste //
T02TD3305E:92b-43: de yi steng du gnas pa yi //
T02TD3305E:92b-44: rta babs brtsegs ma gsum par 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:92b-45: steng du sgo las sum 'gyur gyi //
T02TD3305E:92b-46: tshad ldan mdzes par gyur ba der //
T02TD3305E:92b-47: brtsegs ma dang bo cha chung drug //
T02TD3305E:92b-48: gnyis pa la ni phyed dang lnga //
T02TD3305E:92b-49: gsum pa cha chung phyed dang bzhi //
T02TD3305E:92b-50: rgya phubs cha chung gnyis par brjod //
T02TD3305E:92b-51: de nyid steng du gnas pa yi //
T02TD3305E:92b-52: bum pa cha chung gnyis par 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:92b-53: de la brtsegs ma dang por ni //
T02TD3305E:92b-54: snam bu dang po cha chung gcig / nyi shu rtsa bzhi ring ba'o //
T02TD3305E:93a-1: du cha chung gcig / myos pa bsrung ba'i snam bu ste //
T02TD3305E:93a-2: rings su cha chung bcu drug pa'o //
T02TD3305E:93a-3: de yi steng gi dbus su ni //
T02TD3305E:93a-4: mchod ba'i lha mo'i gnas nyid kyang //
T02TD3305E:93a-5: cha chung bzhi pa rab mdzes pa //
T02TD3305E:93a-6: rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pas bya //
T02TD3305E:93a-7: de yi yang ni ngos dag tu //
T02TD3305E:93a-8: cha chung re re'i ka ba bya //
T02TD3305E:93a-9: slar yang mchod pa'i lha mo'i gnas //
T02TD3305E:93a-10: ngos gnyis dag tu de bzhin te //
T02TD3305E:93a-11: phyir zhing cha chung ka ba dag / ngos dag tu yang de bzhin nyid //
T02TD3305E:93a-12: ngos gnyis dag tu so ldan gyi //
T02TD3305E:93a-13: dbang po gnan pa'i seng ge ste //
T02TD3305E:93a-14: seng ge'i mgo bo'i steng du 'degs //
T02TD3305E:93a-15: de dag spyi bor de bzhin slar //
T02TD3305E:93a-16: snam bu cha chung phyed par 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:93a-17: bco brgyad du yang ring ba'o //
T02TD3305E:93a-18: de steng snam bur gyur pa ni //
T02TD3305E:93a-19: myos pa bsrung ba zhes bya ba //
T02TD3305E:93a-20: par ni cha chung gcig par 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:93a-21: rings su cha chung bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02TD3305E:93a-22: de steng de bzhin ring ba yi //
T02TD3305E:93a-23: snam bu'i bar la cha chung gsum //
T02TD3305E:93a-24: der ni rkang pas dman pa yi //
T02TD3305E:93a-25: cha chung gis kyang ka bzhi bya //
T02TD3305E:93a-26: lha mo rnams kyi gnas rnams kyang //
T02TD3305E:93a-27: ka ba'i bar du yang dag gnas //
T02TD3305E:93a-28: cha chung gsum dang ldan pa yi //
T02TD3305E:93a-29: gnas gsum slar yang sngags pas bya //
T02TD3305E:93a-30: ka ba'i phyir rol ngos dag tu //
T02TD3305E:93a-31: gdung 'degs pa yi lha mo bya //
T02TD3305E:93a-32: de yi spyi bor slar yang dpangs //
T02TD3305E:93a-33: cha chung phyed pa'i snam bur 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:93a-34: de nyid cha chung bco lnga yi //
T02TD3305E:93a-35: rings su yang dag gnas pa yin //
T02TD3305E:93a-36: de steng myos pa bsrung ba yi //
T02TD3305E:93a-37: snam bu la ni cha chung ste //
T02TD3305E:93a-38: rings su cha cha chung brgyad par 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:93a-39: de steng cha chung gnyis pa ste //
T02TD3305E:93a-40: de yang rings su de bzhin nyid //
T02TD3305E:93a-41: 'di la yang ni ka ba bzhi //
T02TD3305E:93a-42: cha chung phyed pa'i tshad dang ldan //
T02TD3305E:93a-43: rings su cha chung gnyis par ldan //
T02TD3305E:93a-44: gnas gsum cha chung gnyis pa yang //
T02TD3305E:93a-45: ka ba'i bar du yang dag gnas //
T02TD3305E:93a-46: phyi rol ka ba'i ngos dag tu //
T02TD3305E:93a-48: de steng cha chung phyed pa yi //
T02TD3305E:93a-49: snam bu cha chung bcu gnyis su //
T02TD3305E:93a-50: de ni ring bar gyur ba yin //
T02TD3305E:93a-51: de steng rgya phubs yang dag gnas //
T02TD3305E:93a-52: cha chung brgyad du ring ba ste //
T02TD3305E:93a-53: de yi steng du bum pa'i gnas //
T02TD3305E:93a-54: de yi g-yas dang g-yas min du //
T02TD3305E:93a-55: rgyal mtshan dang ni pa dan bya //
T02TD3305E:93b-0: snam bu kun gyi @93b rtse mo la //
T02TD3305E:93b-1: dril bu me long rnga yab dang //
T02TD3305E:93b-2: rgyal mtshan la sogs khyad par gyis //
T02TD3305E:93b-3: der yang brgyad par bya ba yin //
T02TD3305E:93b-4: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du //
T02TD3305E:93b-5: gsung gi dkyil 'khor bya ba ste //
T02TD3305E:93b-6: thugs kyi nyis 'gyur tshad kyis ni //
T02TD3305E:93b-7: de yi tshad rnams rab tu brtag /
T02TD3305E:93b-8: so so'i phyogs kyi cha rnams su //
T02TD3305E:93b-9: de la cha chung bcu gnyis ni //
T02TD3305E:93b-10: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rtsig sogs dang //
T02TD3305E:93b-11: mda' yab rnams kyis bsgribs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:93b-12: de yi phyi rol thig gcig ni //
T02TD3305E:93b-13: cha chung bdun gyi bar du slar //
T02TD3305E:93b-14: cha chung dag ni bzhi rnams kyis //
T02TD3305E:93b-15: slar yang lha yi snam bu'o //
T02TD3305E:93b-17: de yi phyogs su gyur pa yang //
T02TD3305E:93b-18: thugs kyi rta babs 'og rnams su //
T02TD3305E:93b-19: shes par bya ste mdor bsdu na //
T02TD3305E:93b-20: myos pa bsrung ba'i snam bu sogs //
T02TD3305E:93b-21: brtsegs ma gnyis pa dag la yang //
T02TD3305E:93b-22: cha chung bzhi yi bar du ni //
T02TD3305E:93b-23: kun nas 'bad pas bri bar bya //
T02TD3305E:93b-24: ka ba gnyis kyi bar la yang //
T02TD3305E:93b-25: cha chung phyed dag bsnur nas so //
T02TD3305E:93b-26: lha yi snam bu'i thig las ni //
T02TD3305E:93b-27: phyi rol cha chung bar rnams su //
T02TD3305E:93b-28: rtsa thig rab tu sbyin bya ste //
T02TD3305E:93b-29: zur thig gnyis kyi bar du'o //
T02TD3305E:93b-30: sgo dang rta babs dag kyang der //
T02TD3305E:93b-31: sngar gyi rim pas bri bar bya //
T02TD3305E:93b-33: nyis 'gyur gyi ni tshad kyis so //
T02TD3305E:93b-34: gsung gi dkyil 'khor rtsa ba las //
T02TD3305E:93b-35: phyi rol sgra yi dkyil 'khor mchog / de la gnyis 'gyur tshad kyis ni //
T02TD3305E:93b-36: de yi tshad rnams rab gzhal bya //
T02TD3305E:93b-37: so so'i phyogs kyi cha rnams su //
T02TD3305E:93b-38: cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni //
T02TD3305E:93b-39: gsung gi dkyil 'khor thig sogs dang //
T02TD3305E:93b-40: mda' yab rnams kyis bsgribs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:93b-41: cha chung drag po der spangs nas //
T02TD3305E:93b-42: thig ni zur gnyis bar du ste //
T02TD3305E:93b-43: slar yang cha chung nyi ma ni //
T02TD3305E:93b-44: spangs nas lha rnams de bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:93b-45: snam bu 'di de nyid la ni //
T02TD3305E:93b-46: padma yang ni bcu gnyis te //
T02TD3305E:93b-47: de rnams cha chung bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02TD3305E:93b-48: de las yang ni cha chung gi / dbus kyi cha yi lte ba ste //
T02TD3305E:93b-49: de yi g-yas dang g-yas min du //
T02TD3305E:93b-50: 'dab ma rnams ni bzhi bya zhing //
T02TD3305E:93b-51: de yi g-yas dang g-yon dag tu //
T02TD3305E:93b-52: 'dab ma rnams ni brgyad du bya //
T02TD3305E:94a-3: de yang rim pa gsum pa ste //
T02TD3305E:94a-4: rim pa gsum du gyur pas kyang //
T02TD3305E:94a-5: 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
T02TD3305E:94a-6: lha yi snam bu'i thig las ni //
T02TD3305E:94a-7: phyi rol du yang rtsa ba'i thig / cha chung bar nas sbyin bya ste //
T02TD3305E:94a-8: zur gyi thig gi bar du'o //
T02TD3305E:94a-9: sgo dang rta babs dag gi tshad //
T02TD3305E:94a-10: sngar brjod ji bzhin 'dir yang ste //
T02TD3305E:94a-12: nyis 'gyur dag gis rab gzhal bya //
T02TD3305E:94a-13: chu yi khor yug phyed du yang //
T02TD3305E:94a-14: rta bab kyis kyang khyab pa'o //
T02TD3305E:94a-15: gsung gi dkyil 'khor rta babs las //
T02TD3305E:94a-16: phyi rol sku yi dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD3305E:94a-17: sgo yi dbus su shing rta ni //
T02TD3305E:94a-18: cha chung bcu gnyis pa rnams bya //
T02TD3305E:94a-19: sa yi khor yug la yang ni //
T02TD3305E:94a-20: cha chung dag ni bcu gnyis bya //
T02TD3305E:94a-21: de yi phyi nas chu yi ni //
T02TD3305E:94a-22: khor yug cha chung nyer bzhi ste //
T02TD3305E:94a-23: de phyir me yi khor yug la //
T02TD3305E:94a-26: de nas rlung gi khor yug la //
T02TD3305E:94a-27: cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:94a-28: de las phyi rol nam mkha' yi //
T02TD3305E:94a-29: khor yug cha chung bcu gnyis so //
T02TD3305E:94a-30: sa sogs khor yug drug po yi //
T02TD3305E:94a-31: dang por zlum po rab tu sbyin //
T02TD3305E:94a-32: 'od phreng mthar yang zlum po ste //
T02TD3305E:94a-33: zlum po bdun du 'gyur ba yin//
T02TD3305E:94a-34: thugs kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor te //
T02TD3305E:94a-35: dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid mchog /'di yi thig skud khru brgyad de //
T02TD3305E:94a-36: 'dzin ma'i zlum po ji srid du'o //
T02TD3305E:94a-37: zhes pa ni phyogs gcig go //
T02TD3305E:94a-38: gang gi tshe 'dir thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad dang gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad bsdoms nas sgo cha chung bco brgyad du yongs su brtags te de'i drug cha la cha chung gi tha snyad byed pha de'i tshe cha chung des gtso bo'i padma'i lte ba la sogs pa nas 'od kyi khor yug gi mthar thug par cha chung gi grangs bya'o //
T02TD3305E:94a-39: de'i tshe ni thugs rdo rje gtso bo ste dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor la khru bcu gnyis dang /
T02TD3305E:94a-40: de'i nyis 'gyur gyi thig skud khru nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni sa'i 'khor yug gi dang po ji srid du'o //
T02TD3305E:94a-42: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rje gsung rdo rje'i gnas su gyur na gsung rdo rje ni gtso bo ste /
T02TD3305E:94b-0: de las gzhan pa'i lha la sogs @94b pa dgod pa ni phyogs dang po bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:94b-1: gang gi tshe yang dbus kyi dkyil 'khor khru bzhi pa dang de'i nyis 'gyur gnyis pa dang /
T02TD3305E:94b-2: de'i nyis 'gyur gsum ba yin pa de'i tshe khru bcu drug gi dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD3305E:94b-3: de'i nyis 'gyur gyi thig skud khru sum cu so gnyis ni sa'i khor yug gi dang po ji srid du'o zhes pa phyogs gsum pa'o //
T02TD3305E:94b-4: gang gi tshe dang por brjod pa'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad dang por brjod ba'i sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad bsdoms nas sgo cha chung sum cur yongs su brtags te de'i drug cha la cha chung du tha snyad byed pa de'i tshe cha chung nges gtso po'i padma'i lte ba la sogs pa nas 'od kyi khor yug gi mthar thug par cha chung gi grangs bya zhing /
T02TD3305E:94b-5: bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rje yang sku rdo rje'i gnas su bya'o //
T02TD3305E:94b-6: sku rdo rje ni gtso bo ste de las gzhan pa'i lha la sogs pa dgod pa ni phyogs dang po bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:94b-7: de'i tshe sku rdo rje ni gtso po'i dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor la khru nyi shu dang de'i nyis 'gyur gyi thig skud khru bzhi bcu ni sa'i khor yug gi dang po ji srid du'o zhes pa phyogs bzhi pa'o //
T02TD3305E:94b-8: de ltar yang dri ma med pa'i 'od las thig skud khru brgyad pa zhes pa ni rtsa ba la khru brgyad ces bya ba ste /
T02TD3305E:94b-10: zhes rnam par bkral nas de la dang po'i sangs rgyas sus thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la khru bcu gnyis bya zhing /
T02TD3305E:94b-11: de nyis 'gyur gyi thig skud ni khru nyid shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02TD3305E:94b-12: de bzhin du gsung gi dkyil 'khor la khru bcu drug go //
T02TD3305E:94b-13: sku'i dkyil 'khor la khru nyi shu'o zhes pa ni des pa ste thig skud ni de'i nyis 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T02TD3305E:94b-14: dbang gi don du ni dbus kyi dkyil 'khor tsam yang bskor bar rjes su gnang ste /
T02TD3305E:94b-16: dbang gi don du dkyil 'khor ram ni rigs kyi dbang gis phyi yi 'khor los rab tu dman par 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:94b-18: gang yang khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD3305E:94b-20: dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i rgyud las /
T02TD3305E:94b-21: sgo 'khor lo'i bcu char gsungs pa de dag ni /
T02TD3305E:94b-22: slob dpon rnams da lta tha snyad mi mdzad mod /
T02TD3305E:94b-23: bdag gis ni yongs su byas so //
T02TD3305E:95a-1: 'khor gyi chad rnams kyang rab tu grags pa brjod kyi 'di tsam kho na ni ma yin no //
T02TD3305E:95a-2: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02TD3305E:95a-3: 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbang phyug gam //
T02TD3305E:95a-4: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yis //
T02TD3305E:95a-5: phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri bya ste //
T02TD3305E:95a-6: kun nas dpag tshad rab tu'o //
T02TD3305E:95a-7: gdul bya'i skye bo'i bsam pa la //
T02TD3305E:95a-8: mkhas pas mnyam par bltas nas ni //
T02TD3305E:95a-9: 'dod pas tshad ni byas pa la //
T02TD3305E:95a-10: nyes pa cung zad yod ma yin //
T02TD3305E:95a-12: lag pa'i mthil du bris byas nas //
T02TD3305E:95a-13: bstan bcos las gsungs don byed de //
T02TD3305E:95a-14: sa stengs sogs su smos ci dgos //
T02TD3305E:95a-16: dpag tu med pa'i dbye bas tha dad pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams 'ji tsam zhig mngon par brjod par bya bar nus /
T02TD3305E:95a-17: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD3305E:95a-18: dkyil 'khor ji lta de bzhin du //
T02TD3305E:95a-19: rab tu brtags pa su yis nus //
T02TD3305E:95a-20: rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD3305E:95a-22: zhes pa dkyil 'khor la thig gdab pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:95a-24: // / de nas gtor ma byin la /
T02TD3305E:95a-25: bam lam ram yam ham rnams kyis bon las grub pa'i dkar po dang ser po dang dmar bo dang ljang gu dang nag po'i tshon rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du zla ba chu shel dang /
T02TD3305E:95a-28: aindra n'i la las byung ba rnams sam yang na mu tig dang gser dang byi ru dang bsres pa mu men las byung ba rnams sam /
T02TD3305E:95a-29: bsres pa ni 'dir mu tig la sogs pa bzhi po rnams so //
T02TD3305E:95a-30: yang na khams las byung ba'am /
T02TD3305E:95a-33: ji ltar rigs par sol ba dang so phag dang rus ba'i phye ma la sogs pas kyang rung /
T02TD3305E:95a-34: legs par 'dus byas pa'i bzung bo rnams bhr'um aam hr'im kham h'um rnams las grub pa'i rnam bar snad mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bor bsams nas /
T02TD3305E:95b-0: nam mkha' la bkod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs kar bhr'um la sogs pa las grub pa'i ye shes kyi tshon rnams thig skud 'du bya bar brjod pa'i 'bar ba'i lta stangs kyis bkug ste bcugs bas ye shes kyi tshon dang lhan cig ro gcig tu gyur pa rnams la phr'um zhes pa la sogs pas @95b mngon par bsngags shing /
T02TD3305E:95b-1: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes ba'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags so //
T02TD3305E:95b-2: de bzhin du 'bar ba'i lta bas yang dag par gzi brjid bskyed cing /
T02TD3305E:95b-3: re re la h'i: yig bkod nas /
T02TD3305E:95b-4: bden pa gang gis sems can rnams rdul tshon mang zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi sems can rnams la chags pas rjes su chags par gyur pa'i bden ba des rdul tshon rnams 'bar bar gyur cig / ces bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sbar bar bya ste /
T02TD3305E:95b-5: lha sgom pa phul du byung ba la ni 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD3305E:95b-6: dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod nas snod gsar par gzhag par bya'o zhes pa rdul tshon gyi bzlas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:95b-8: // / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar gnas pa'i phur bu dkyil 'khor ji lta bar 'chad par 'gyur pa'i la / thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bton nas rang gi lag pa'i rdo rje la bstim ste phur bu'i khung bu rin po che lnga dang tshon sna lngas bkang bas mnyam por byas la /
T02TD3305E:95b-9: dril bu'i sgra dang rdo rje'i glus mtshan ma ngan pa bsal bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:95b-10: chos dbyings 'di ni dag pa ste //
T02TD3305E:95b-11: sems can khams ni rab grol mdzad //
T02TD3305E:95b-12: rang nyid rgyal po rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD3305E:95b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD3305E:95b-14: nyes pa kun las rnam grol ba'i //
T02TD3305E:95b-15: 'khor lo'i nang du yang dag zhugs //
T02TD3305E:95b-16: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD3305E:95b-17: dkyil 'khor bdag gis bri bar bya //
T02TD3305E:95b-18: zhes pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag par mos la /
T02TD3305E:95b-19: lag pa g-yas pa rdo rje mtshan zhing g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis aom badzra ram ga sa na ya /
T02TD3305E:95b-21: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor gyi nang du shar du phyogs par 'dug pas dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams te g-yas skor du tshon dgye bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:95b-22: phyi nas ji lta ba bzhin du sgo'i slob dpon la sogs pa gzhan gyis kyang ngo //
T02TD3305E:95b-23: sboms su sgo yi nyi shu cha'i //
T02TD3305E:95b-24: re kh'a yang dag drang bya ste //
T02TD3305E:95b-25: mnyam zhing drang po ma chad ba //
T02TD3305E:95b-26: ji ltar rigs pa'o phan tshun gyi //
T02TD3305E:95b-27: bar gyi tshad ni nas tsa la //
T02TD3305E:95b-28: 'og dang steng ni ci mdzes bya //
T02TD3305E:95b-29: sbom por bkye na nad 'byung ste //
T02TD3305E:95b-30: phra mo yi ni nor rnams nyams //
T02TD3305E:95b-31: yon po yis ni rnam par sdang //
T02TD3305E:96a-0: @96a * // chad na bla ma slob ma 'chi //
T02TD3305E:96a-1: g-yas skor min par bkye na ni //
T02TD3305E:96a-2: tshon rnams phur bus btab par 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:96a-3: phur bus btab pa ni dngos grub kyi rgyu ma yin pa ste /
T02TD3305E:96a-4: phan tshun 'dres pas ni rigs 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD3305E:96a-5: nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02TD3305E:96a-6: de nyid med pa'i bsam sbyor las //
T02TD3305E:96a-7: gang zhig tshon bkye'i nyes pa ste //
T02TD3305E:96a-8: bzang po de nyid bsam sbyor las //
T02TD3305E:96a-9: sus kyang bar chad bya mi nus //
T02TD3305E:96a-10: dkyil 'khor ji lta ba de bzhin //
T02TD3305E:96a-11: ji srid du ni de nyid brtag / ces so //
T02TD3305E:96a-12: tshon gyi re kh'a rnams kyang rin po che dkar po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi thur ma la sogs pa'i ngo bor lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:96a-13: 'jug pa dang 'byung ba la thig dang tshon la 'goms pa'i sdig pas 'jigs pa'i phyir rdo rje shugs kyi ye shes kyi tshon gyi re kh'a yid kyis nam mkha' la bteg la /
T02TD3305E:96a-14: aom badzra be g'a kra ma h'um zhes bzla zhing /
T02TD3305E:96a-15: rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir 'jug pa dang 'byung bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:96a-16: de la dang por lha thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor la phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi spyi'i kha dog gi rim pa brjod par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:96a-17: shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang dbus kyi gtso bo'i kha dog gi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyi'i re kh'a nas brtsams te /
T02TD3305E:96a-18: nang gi re kh'a'i bar du tshon sna nga'i rtsig pa'i re kh'a rnams kyi kha dog go //
T02TD3305E:96a-19: phyogs dang dbus su lha gzhan 'god pa na rgyas 'debs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog gi rim pa'o //
T02TD3305E:96a-20: bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor la rtsig pa lnga po 'di dag rin po che kha dog lnga las grub cing bar ni nas tsam mo zhes pa kha cig go //
T02TD3305E:96a-21: rtsig pa 'di ni gcig nyid rim gyis steng nas steng du kha dog lnga'i rin po che las byas pa'o zhes pa ni gzhan dag go //
T02TD3305E:96a-22: 'dir 'dod pa dang po la rin po che'i snam bu'i sa gzhi dmar po dang dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i sa gzhi nag po'o //
T02TD3305E:96a-23: 'dod pa gnyis pa la ni dang po'i kha dog gi rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi cha nyid rnam par bkra ba'i rin po che'i snam bu ste /
T02TD3305E:96a-24: yang na de la kha dog gzhan gyis rin po che las grub ba bkod pa ni rin po che'i snam bu'o //
T02TD3305E:96b-0: lnga pa'i kha dog gi @96b rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi cha nyid sna tshogs pa'i dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i snam bu'am yang na de la kha dog gzhan gyi rin po che las grub pa bkod pa ni dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i snam bu'o //
T02TD3305E:96b-1: phyogs gzhan brjod pa ni de'i steng du rin po che'i snam bu do shal gyi snam bu'o //
T02TD3305E:96b-2: 'dod pa gnyis ka la yang stegs bu ni shel lam gser gyi rang bzhin nam padma r'a g'a'i rang bzhin nam /
T02TD3305E:96b-3: rin po che gzhan yang rung ste ji ltar mdzes pa'o //
T02TD3305E:96b-4: rin po che'i shar bu dang mda' yab rnams ni dkar po'o //
T02TD3305E:96b-5: rin po che'i shar bu dang mnga' yab dang dar dpyangs kyi bar gyis gzhi ni sngon po ste /
T02TD3305E:96b-6: nam mkha'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD3305E:96b-7: de nyid kyi phyir bar gyi snam bu la mun pa'i snam bu zhes brjod do //
T02TD3305E:96b-8: gdung ni ji ltar mdzes pa'i rin po che las byas pa ste /
T02TD3305E:96b-9: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i pa tra 'phro ba la sogs pas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:96b-10: rta babs kyi ka ba rnams ni rang rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog go //
T02TD3305E:96b-11: kyog po'i nang gi bla re'i 'og gi yang de rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog gi 'od kyis spras pa'i nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:96b-12: rta rmig dang ba ran gyi kha dog ni ji ltar mdzes pa ste chu srin gyi snam bu yang ngo //
T02TD3305E:96b-13: 'khor lo rnams ni gser gyi kha dog ste rin po che gzhan las kyang byas pa'o zhes kha cig go //
T02TD3305E:96b-14: ri dags dang ri dags mo ni gser gyi rang bzhin la rin po che gzhan gyis spras pa'o //
T02TD3305E:96b-15: sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba ni nag po ste /
T02TD3305E:96b-16: kha cig tu ni gtso bo'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go //
T02TD3305E:96b-17: ra dbus ma rnams ni rang rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog ste de las gzhan pa rnams ni de dag gi ngos kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog go //
T02TD3305E:96b-18: ra lnga pa las ni de las gzhan pa'i phyogs dang dbus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog ste ji ltar rigs par ro //
T02TD3305E:96b-19: phyogs gcig gi ra thams cad kyang rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go zhes pa kha cig ste /
T02TD3305E:96b-20: 'khor lo'i dbang po zhal bzhi pa nyid la rang rang gi phyogs kyi zhal gyi mdog go zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan no //
T02TD3305E:96b-21: bum pa bzang po rnams ni gser las byas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:96b-22: dpag bsam gyi shing rnams ni de las gzhan pa'i shing lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:97a-0: padma'i lte ba ni ljang gu @97a * //
T02TD3305E:97a-1: ste ge sar ni ser po yin la 'dab ma rnams ni sna tshogs pa'i mdog go //
T02TD3305E:97a-2: de'i sa gzhi ni dmar po shas che ba'i dkar po ste chos 'byung gi cha'i re kh'a ni dkar po'o //
T02TD3305E:97a-3: khor yug gi phyogs la yang shel nyid yin na re kh'a dkar po'am gser gyi mdog yin na ser po'o //
T02TD3305E:97a-4: rdo rje rnams dang de'i re kh'a yang nag po ste gzhan du dkar po'am ser po zhes gsungs so //
T02TD3305E:97a-5: rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i mdog ni ji ltar mdzes pa ste /
T02TD3305E:97a-6: bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor la 'og rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' nas steng du yang 'og min gyi mtha' ji srid par rdo rje'i rab gnas pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD3305E:97a-7: rlung la sogs pa rnams kyang ji ltar rigs par kha dog sna tshogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD3305E:97a-8: 'od zer rnams ni kha dog lnga pa ste 'phro ba'i tshul lo //
T02TD3305E:97a-10: rdzogs sangs ye shes sku yin phyir //
T02TD3305E:97a-11: ngag dbang rdo rje'i rigs su brjod //
T02TD3305E:97a-12: chos sku'i bdag nyid legs dag pa //
T02TD3305E:97a-15: dkar po ser po de bzhin dmar //
T02TD3305E:97a-16: ljang gu dang ni nag po nyid //
T02TD3305E:97a-17: rtsig pa yi ni tshon yin no //
T02TD3305E:97a-20: chos rnams rang bzhin gyis ni dkar //
T02TD3305E:97a-21: des na ngag dbang 'di dkar nyid //
T02TD3305E:97a-23: gsung rdo rje dkar po gtso bor gyur pa de'i tshe ni /
T02TD3305E:97a-24: dkar po dang ser po dang nag po dang ljang gu dang dkar po'i tshon gyi re kh'a'o //
T02TD3305E:97a-25: kha sbyor du gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po yin na'ang mi bskyod pa dang lhan cig ro gcig pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir nang gi rtsig pa nag po nyid do //
T02TD3305E:97a-26: gzhan du ni dkar po kho na yin te /
T02TD3305E:97a-27: ji ltar gsung rdo rje gtso bor gyur pas kha cig tu dkar po nyid du 'gyur ro zhes so //
T02TD3305E:97a-28: rtsa ba'i thig gi nang gi dkyil 'khor du yang zur thig gnyis gnyis kyis yongs su bcad pa'i phyogs bzhi'i sa gzhi rnams rang rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog go //
T02TD3305E:97a-29: bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi'i thog rnams kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:97a-30: ka ba rnams kyang de bzhin te rang rang gi re mig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ma'i phreng bas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:97a-31: gtso bo'i sa gzhi ni gtso bo'i mdog go //
T02TD3305E:97b-0: bden bral ljang @97b gu dbang ldan gnag / me dang rlung ni ser po ste //
T02TD3305E:97b-1: phyogs rnams kyi ni dmar po'o //
T02TD3305E:97b-2: gtso bo'i snam bu la ni gtso bo'i mtshan ma'i phreng ba ste re kh'a gzhan gyi legs pa'i yon tan dang kha dog ni ji ltar mdzes pa'o //
T02TD3305E:97b-3: dpal ldan bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor la ni thugs kyi 'khor lo nag po'o //
T02TD3305E:97b-4: de'i rtsibs kyi bar rnams ni dmar po ste gsung gi 'khor lo'i lte ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD3305E:97b-5: gsung gi 'khor lo ni dmar po'o //
T02TD3305E:97b-6: de'i rtsibs kyi bar rnams ni dkar po ste /
T02TD3305E:97b-7: sku'i 'khor lo'i lte ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD3305E:97b-9: de'i rtsibs kyi bar rnams ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog go //
T02TD3305E:97b-10: mu khyud gsum ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje nag po dang /
T02TD3305E:97b-11: padma dmar po dang 'khor lo dkar po'i phreng ba rnams kyis bskor ba'o //
T02TD3305E:97b-12: de'i phyi rol nas brtsams te nang gi bar du ljang gu dang dkar po dang dmar po dang ser po dang nag po'i kha dig gi re kh'a lnga'o //
T02TD3305E:97b-13: shar dang byang dang nub dang lho dang dbus kyis gzhi dang thog rnams kyang dkar po dang ljang gu dang dmar po dang ser po dang nag po'i kha dog go //
T02TD3305E:97b-14: gzhan dag ni re kh'a ljang dang sa gzhi dang thog rnams nag po dang ljang gu dang dmar po dang ser po dang dkar po dang bsres pa'i sngon po'i mdog go zhes zer ro //
T02TD3305E:97b-15: de ltar snga ma dang phyi mar kha dog gi rim pa yongs su bsams nas rngul tshon dgye bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:97b-16: de la skal bar mi ldan pa 'dus pa na mtshan ma dang phyag rgya nyid ji ltar rigs par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:97b-17: skal ba dang ldan pa 'dus pa na ni lha'i sku bri bar bya zhing /
T02TD3305E:97b-18: bris sku'am lugs ma'am 'bur du btod pa'am legs par 'dus pa byas pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:97b-19: da ltar yang klu'i blo'i zhabs kyis /
T02TD3305E:97b-20: ji ltar nus pas dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD3305E:97b-21: sa bon dgod bya yang na ni //
T02TD3305E:97b-22: mtshan ma'am lha yi gzugs nyid de //
T02TD3305E:97b-23: lugs ma'am 'bur ma bzhag par bya //
T02TD3305E:97b-25: phyag rgya bri bar ni mngon par brjod pa bla ma'i rgyud las gsungs so //
T02TD3305E:97b-26: mi nus na ni bris pa'i phyag rgya'am mtshan ma gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:97b-27: tshon nam yang na pir rnams kyis //
T02TD3305E:97b-28: bris pa rnams kyis rnam par spras //
T02TD3305E:98a-1: phyir 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni lte bar zla ba la bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i ral gri sngo bsangs so //
T02TD3305E:98a-2: shar du zla ba la rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa'o //
T02TD3305E:98a-3: lhor nyi ma la rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rin po che ljang gu cha dgu pa'o //
T02TD3305E:98a-4: nub tu nyi ma la 'od dpag med kyi padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'o //
T02TD3305E:98a-5: byang du nyi ma la don yod grub pa'i ral gri ljang gu'o //
T02TD3305E:98a-6: mer zla ba la spyan ma'i mig 'bras nag po can gyi mig dkar po gnyis sprin la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:98a-7: bden bral du zla ba la m'a ma k'i'i rdo rje nag po rtse lnga pa ste rgyud du de ltar gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD3305E:98a-8: rlung du zla ba la gos dkar mo'i padma dmar po kha bye zhing yu ba rtsa ba dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:98a-9: dbang ldan du zla ba la sgrol ma'i autpala kha dog sngo ser ro //
T02TD3305E:98a-10: me la sogs pa'i zur bzhi dang shar sgo'i g-yon dang g-yas su cha chung gnyis spangs pa'i 'gram dag tu zla ba rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi me long dkar po dang dri za'i pi wang sngon po dang /
T02TD3305E:98a-11: dri ser po'i dud dang ro'i snod dmar po dang /
T02TD3305E:98a-12: sna tshogs pa'i gos dang chos 'byung dkar po rnams so //
T02TD3305E:98a-13: shar la sogs pa'i sgor nyi ma rnams la gshin rje mthar byed dang /
T02TD3305E:98a-16: bgegs mthar byed rnams kyi go rims ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje'i tho ba nag po dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang padma dmar po dang rdo rje khya gyes pa sngon po'o //
T02TD3305E:98a-17: 'dir zla ba dang nyi ma bcu dgu ni sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:98a-18: mtshan ma thams cad ni 'od zer dang bcas pa rang rang gi phyogs su mgo bstan nas gnas te /
T02TD3305E:98a-19: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi ni nub tu mgo bstan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:98a-20: de ltar phyi ma rnams su yang ngo //
T02TD3305E:98a-21: rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor lo'i dbang phyug nyid la ni /
T02TD3305E:98a-22: dbus su chu skyes dang zla ba la zhi ba'i rdo rje sngon po'o //
T02TD3305E:98a-23: kha cig ni sna tshogs rdo rje'o zhes so //
T02TD3305E:98a-24: dbus kyi 'od zer gyi thig zlum po la tshon gyi re kh'a mi bya'o zhes pa man ngag go //
T02TD3305E:98b-0: zlum po'i thig gi phyi rol du tshangs thig gi ngos so sor cha chung bzhi spangs nas bum pa cha chung bzhi pa ste bdud rtsis gang ba'i @98b gser gyi bum pa brgyad do zhes phyogs gcig gi ste /
T02TD3305E:98b-1: gzhan dag ni rin po che'i rang bzhin rang rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog go zhes pa'o //
T02TD3305E:98b-2: 'di dang phyi ma rnams la yang dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyi mtshan ma 'god nas de'i gnas su dbus kyi mtshan ma bri bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:98b-3: bsdus pa'i rim par gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su nyi ma la mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa kha gyes pa aindra n'i la lta bu dang /
T02TD3305E:98b-4: reg bya rdo rje ma'i sna tshogs pa'i gos so //
T02TD3305E:98b-5: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rim pa dang gnyis par gnas pa bcu gnyis po rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:98b-6: rim pa gsum par sgo'i 'gram gyi snam bu la tshangs pa'i thig las cha chung bzhi spangs par g-yon du byams pa'i klu shing me tog 'khor lo dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD3305E:98b-7: g-yas su sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa'o //
T02TD3305E:98b-8: lhor de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje dang nam mkha'i snying po'i rdo rje dang cha dgu pa'i rin po che mar ka ta'o //
T02TD3305E:98b-9: nub tu 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi padma dmar po dang ral gri'o //
T02TD3305E:98b-10: byad du de bzhin du sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang kun du bzang po'i ral gri dang rdo rje'o //
T02TD3305E:98b-11: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du gshin rje gshed la sogs pa rnams kyi rdo rje tho ba dang rdo rje mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang padma dmar po dang sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02TD3305E:98b-12: me la sogs pa'i zur rnams su mi g-yo ba dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang dbyug pa sngon po dang stobs po che rnams kyi ral gri dang rdo rje dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon po dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa nag po'o //
T02TD3305E:98b-13: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i rdo rje sngon po ni gshin rje gshed kyi mtshan ma'i phyi ngos su ste /
T02TD3305E:98b-14: gzhan dag ni 'khor lo ser po'o zhes so //
T02TD3305E:98b-15: gnod mdzes kyi rdo rje ni padma mthar byed kyi mtshan ma'i phyi ngos su'o //
T02TD3305E:98b-16: byams pa la sogs pa brgyad kyi mtshan ma ni zla ba la gnas pa ste /
T02TD3305E:98b-17: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bcu'i mtshan ma ni nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:98b-18: 'dir nyi ma dang zla ba sum cu rtsa gcig ni sna tshogs padma la gnas pa ste bum pa bri ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:99a-1: gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su zla ba sems dpa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po'o //
T02TD3305E:99a-2: shar du zla ba la rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor lo dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-3: lhor nyi ma la rin chen dbang po'i rin po che dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-4: nub tu nyi ma la snang ba mtha' yas kyi mda' dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-5: byang du nyi ma la don yod grub pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02TD3305E:99a-6: spyan ma'i sprin la gnas pa'i mig dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-7: m'a ma k'i'i mda' dang gos dkar mo'i mda' dang sgrol ma'i autpala dmar po'o //
T02TD3305E:99a-8: rim pa gnyis pa la shar phyogs su drag mo'i mda' dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-9: bden bral du sgra rdo rje ma'i sha kti dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-10: rlung du sa rdo rje ma'i bum pa dkar ljang ngo //
T02TD3305E:99a-11: rim pa gsum pa la shar phyogs su bzhad ma'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-12: lhor sgeg mo'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-13: nub tu glu ma'i 'khor rnga dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-14: byang du gar ma'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa ljang gu dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-15: dbang ldan du gling bu ma'i gling bu dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-16: mer pi wa nga ma'i pi wang dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-17: bden bral du rnga zlum ma'i rda zlum dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-18: rlung du rdza nga ma'i rdza rnga'o /
T02TD3305E:99a-19: phyi'i snam bu la mer me tog ma'i me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-20: bden bral du bdug spos ma'i smos med dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-21: rlung du mar me ma'i mar me'i mchod sdong dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-22: dbang ldan du der ma'i dri'i dud chos dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-23: shar du me long ma'i mi long dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-24: lhor ro ma'i ro'i snod dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-25: nub tu reg bya ma'i gos sna tshogs dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-26: byang du chos ma'i chos 'byung dkar po'o //
T02TD3305E:99a-27: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-28: rdo rje zhags pa ma dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-29: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-30: rdo rje dril bu ma rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
T02TD3305E:99a-32: rdo rje phreng ba'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje lcags sgrog dang rdo rje dril bu rnams te nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:99a-33: 'dir brjod pa'i nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa'i mchan ma bdun las gzhan pa'i mtshan ma rnams ni zla ba'i gdan la gnas pa ste /
T02TD3305E:99a-34: nyi ma dang zla ba sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs padma'i steng du thod pa rnams la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:99a-35: bum pa bri ba ni snga ma bzhin te thig zlum po drug pa las phyi rol du'o zhes pa ni khyad par ro //
T02TD3305E:99b-0: ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor la dbus dang shar dang byang dang nub dang lho rnams su @99b rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang mi bzad mkha' 'gro ma dang ro langs ma dan gtum mo rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha tv'am ga rnams so //
T02TD3305E:99b-1: dbang ldan dang me dang bden bral dang rlung rnams su seng ge mo dang stag mo dang ce spyang mo dang 'ug pa mo rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu rnams so //
T02TD3305E:99b-2: shar dang byang dang nub dang lho'i sgo rnams su /
T02TD3305E:99b-3: rgyal dbang mo dang gsal byed mo dang 'jib byed mo dan 'dra byed mo rnams kyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02TD3305E:99b-4: lag pa gnyis snyim pa phye ba dang snyim pa khrag gis bkang ba dang rdo rje thal mo las mthe bo'i rtse mo gnyis dang mdzub mo'i rtse mo gnyis sbyar ba'o //
T02TD3305E:99b-5: 'dir mtshan ma dang phyag rgya rnams ni sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:99b-6: bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i sna tshogs padma rnams ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02TD3305E:99b-7: seng ge lnga dang so ldan dkar po dang rin po che sna bdun gyi phung po dang ma he dang gdengs can gyi dbang po brgyad kyi mjug ma dang ro bzhi la gnas pa ste /
T02TD3305E:99b-8: so so'i rngul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du ni skal ba dang mi ldan pa 'dus pa na bri bar mi bya'o //
T02TD3305E:99b-9: gzhan du ni ngal bas 'jigs pa'i phyir dang sbyin bdag bsdus pa la dga' bas so //
T02TD3305E:99b-10: skal ba ldan pa rab tu dang bar bya ba'i don dang sbyin bdag gi dbang las ni bri bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:99b-11: de bzhin du phyi ma rnams la yang ji ltar 'byung bar bri ba dang mi bri bar rig par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:99b-12: phyi ngos kyi thig zlum po'i phyi rol du bum pa bri'o //
T02TD3305E:99b-13: bcu bdun gyi bdag nyid kye'o rdo rje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar khro bo'i rdo rje sngon po'o //
