T02TD3305E:116b-13: dbang ldan du sgrol ma rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu autpala ser po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:116b-14: de nas dbus kyi rim pa las phyi rol du me'i mtshams su gzugs rdo rje ma rnam par snang mdzad lta bu me long dmar po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:116b-15: bden bral du sgra rdo rje ma mi bskyod pa lta bu pi wang sngon po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:116b-16: rlung du dri rdo rje ma rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu dri'i dud chos ser po dang ral gri dang 'khor lo dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:116b-17: dbang ldan du ro rdo rje ma snang ba mtha' yas lta bu ro'i snod dmar po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:116b-18: shar sgo'i g-yon logs su reg bya rdo rje ma don yod grub pa lta bu gos sna tshogs pa dang /
T02TD3305E:117a-1: dang nor bu dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:117a-2: shar sgo'i g-yas logs su chos dbyings rdo rje ma rdo rje sems dpa' lta bu chos 'byung dkar po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o /
T02TD3305E:117a-3: 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha 'di rnams ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa phyag mtshan dang po gnyis g-yas pa dag gis dang gzhan pa gnyis g-yon pa dag gis 'dzin pa ste thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i zhal ni sku mdog bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:117a-4: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su gshin rje mthar byed dang shes rab mthar byed dang padma mthar byed dang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa rnams so //
T02TD3305E:117a-5: 'dir 'jam pa'i rdo rje dang rnam par snang mdzad dang lha mo bcu drug po rnams ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa ste /
T02TD3305E:117a-6: gzhan rnams ni nyi ma la'o //
T02TD3305E:117a-7: zla ba dang nyi ma rnams kyi 'og tu sna tshogs 'dam skyes so //
T02TD3305E:117a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis rang 'od kyi shes rab la 'khyud pa ste lha mo rnams kyang rang 'od kyi thabs la'o //
T02TD3305E:117a-9: dbu la rigs kyi bdag po ste 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang m'a ma k'i dang sgra rdo rje ma dang srung ba'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'i khro bo brgyad la mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD3305E:117a-10: spyan ma dang gzugs rdo rje ma dang gshin rje mthar byed rnams la rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02TD3305E:117a-11: dri rdo rje ma la ni rin rin chen dbang po'o //
T02TD3305E:117a-12: gos dkar mo dang ro rdo rje ma dang padma mthar byed rnams la 'od dpag med de sgrol ma dang reg bya rdo rje ma la ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02TD3305E:117a-13: chos dbyings rdo rje ma la rdo rje 'dzin pa ste gzhan rnams la ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD3305E:117a-14: 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' ni sku mdog dkar po la cung zad dmar ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal ni sngon po dang dmar po //
T02TD3305E:117a-15: rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis rang 'od kyi shes rab la 'khyud pa /
T02TD3305E:117a-16: rdo rje sngon po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i gdan la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa zla ba'i 'od can rin po che'i cod pan dang rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02TD3305E:117b-0: 'dir 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i thugs kar dam tshig sems dpa' lta bu'i ye shes sems dpa' ste da'i thugs @117b ka'i zla bar ral gri'i yu bar gnas pa'i zla ba la sa bon mam mo //
T02TD3305E:117b-1: rtag pa dang rin chen dbang po dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa dang mi bskyod pa rnams kyi thugs kar phyag mtshan la ji ltar rigs par zla bar nyi ma la bh'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um do //
T02TD3305E:117b-2: spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams la l'am m'am b'am tam dza: h'um bam ho: kham ri mo //
T02TD3305E:117b-3: khro bo rnams la ni h'um ngo zhes pa sa bon te 'khor lo'i dbang po la sogs pa'i thugs kar sngags rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:117b-4: aom a'a: mam h'um 'khor lo'i dbang po mi bskyod pa dang lhan cig dbyer med pa'i'o //
T02TD3305E:117b-5: aom a'a: dz'in dzik h'um rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02TD3305E:117b-6: aom a'a: ratna bhrik h'um rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD3305E:117b-7: aom a'a: a'a ro li ka h'um 'od dpag med kyi'o //
T02TD3305E:117b-8: aom a'a: pradzny'a dhrik h'um don yod grub pa'o //
T02TD3305E:117b-9: aom a'a: mo har ti h'um spyan ma'i'o //
T02TD3305E:117b-10: aom a'a: dr'e sha ra ti h'um m'a ma k'i'i'o //
T02TD3305E:117b-11: aom a'a: r'a ga ra ti h'um gos dkar mo'i'o //
T02TD3305E:117b-12: aom a'a: badzra ra ti h'um sgrol ma'i'o //
T02TD3305E:117b-13: aom a'a: r'u pa badzri dza: h'um gzugs rdo rje ma'o //
T02TD3305E:117b-14: aom a'a sha bta badzre h'um h'um sgra rdo rje ma'i'o //
T02TD3305E:117b-15: aom a'a: ga ndha ba dzre bam h'um dri rdo rje ma'i'o //
T02TD3305E:117b-16: aom a'a: ra sa badzre ho: h'um ro rdo rje ma'i'o //
T02TD3305E:117b-17: aom a'a: sparshe badzre kham h'um reg bya rdo rje ma'i'o //
T02TD3305E:117b-18: aom a'a: dharma dh'a tu badzre ram h'um chos dbyings rdo rje ma'i'o //
T02TD3305E:117b-19: aom a'a: ya m'anta kri ta h'um gshin rje mthar byed kyi'o //
T02TD3305E:117b-20: aom a'a: pradzny'anta kri ta h'um shes rab mthar byed kyi'i'o //
T02TD3305E:117b-21: aom a'a: bi ghn'anta kri ta h'um phat bgegs mthar byed kyi'o //
T02TD3305E:117b-22: gang gi tshe 'jam pa'i rdo rje dang dbyer med pa'i mi bskyod pa 'khor lo'i dbang por gyur pa de'i tshe aom a'a: badzra dhrik h'um /
T02TD3305E:117b-24: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor la mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD3305E:117b-25: ye shes sems dpa' bzhugs pa la sogs pa ni ma bshad do //
T02TD3305E:117b-26: de'i rjes la mig gi mngon par shes pa la sogs pa yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pas mdzes par byas pa'i yi dam gyi lha'i sku legs par yongs su dag cing rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa la rgyun mi 'chad par yang dang yang du lhag par mos pa bstan par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:118a-0: snying po'i sngags la sogs pa bstan pa ni bum pa lhag @118a * //
T02TD3305E:118a-1: par gnas pa la sogs pa la nye bar sbyar ba'i don du'o //
T02TD3305E:118a-2: gang gi tshe dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gtso bor gyur pa de'i che dbus su gnas pa de gzhan de'i gnas su dgod do //
T02TD3305E:118a-3: 'od dpag tu med pa dkar por yang 'gyur ro //
T02TD3305E:118a-4: chos rnams dkar po'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD3305E:118a-5: 'dir ni gsung gi dbang phyug dkar //
T02TD3305E:118a-7: 'di dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams su gang gi dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i gtso bo'i gnas dag gong du bshad pa de'i tshe gtso bo de nyid dkyil 'khor gyi dbang po la mngon par phyogs shing /
T02TD3305E:118a-8: de dang 'khyud pa ni de la mngon par phyogs pa nyid de gzhan gyi gnas su phyin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD3305E:118a-9: 'dir gzhal yas khang gi yan lag ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T02TD3305E:118a-10: rdo rje'i sa gzhi la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i rdo rje'i gur dang srung ba'i 'khor lo dang chos kyi 'byung gnas so //
T02TD3305E:118a-11: de la rdo rje'i gur ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gzhal yas khang thams cad la ste /
T02TD3305E:118a-12: srung ba'i 'khor lo dang chos kyi 'byung gnas ni 'ga' zhig kho na la 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD3305E:118a-13: bri bar bya ba'i gzhal yas khang rnams la ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo chos 'byung dam chos kyi dbyings kyi khongs su chud pa mtshon pa'i ched du rdo rje'i phreng ba bri bar bshad do //
T02TD3305E:118a-14: ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang //
T02TD3305E:118a-15: zhes pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dkyil 'khor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir du 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor yug mtshon pa'i rdo rje'i phreng ba bri ba ni nges par ro //
T02TD3305E:118a-16: 'dir srung ba'i 'khor lo ni de lta ma yin pas bri mi dgos te /
T02TD3305E:118a-17: bgegs zlog pa ni gzhan gyis kyang byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD3305E:118a-18: gzhan yang stong pa nyid kho na bcom ldan 'das ma ste bgegs kyi tshogs ma lus pa rtsa ba dang bcas pa rlag par byed pa'i nus pa rab tu gyur pas de la lhag par mos pa brtan pa nyid bskyed pa'i ched du bri bar bya ba'i dkyil 'khor la srung ba'i 'khor lo bri bar ma bstan to //
T02TD3305E:118a-19: bsgom par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor la yang kha cig tu bsgom par gsungs kyi thams cad la ni ma yin no //
T02TD3305E:118b-0: bgegs bsal ba'i rjes la stong pa nyid du rab tu zhugs pas bsgom par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor la srung ba'i 'khor @118b lo med de /
T02TD3305E:118b-1: de'i phyir mi bri'o zhe na de lta na khor yug mtshon pa'i rdo rje'i rab yang mi bri bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD3305E:118b-2: yang gzhal yas khang bskyed pa'i dus su de yang bskyed do zhe na ma yin te /
T02TD3305E:118b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i ra ba lan gnyis bskyed par gang nas kyang ma gsungs pas lan gnyis bskyed pas ci zhig bya //
T02TD3305E:118b-4: cig car rdzogs pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang mtshams bcing ba dang rdo rje'i rab la sogs pa ma lus pa kun brtags pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin sgyur ma'i ngo bor gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD3305E:118b-5: de ltar srung ba'i 'khor lo yod kyang dkyil 'khor du mi bri ba nyid kyi 'thad pa brjod pa nyid do //
T02TD3305E:118b-6: kha cig ni srung ba'i 'khor lo bri bar bya'o zhes kyang 'dod do zhes pa 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD3305E:118b-7: bsdus ba'i rim par gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang gzhal yas khang gi mthar thug pa ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD3305E:118b-8: khro bo rnams kyi khyad par ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD3305E:118b-9: gzhal yas khang gi dbus su mi bskyod pa nag po drag po g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal dkar po dang dmar po phyag g-yas pa rnams kyis khro bo'i rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang padma rnams dang g-yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang ral gri 'dzin pa dang 'dra ba'i reg bya rdo rje mas 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:118b-10: de'i shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste /
T02TD3305E:118b-11: me la sogs pa'i mtshams su spyan ma la sogs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:118b-12: de la rnam par snang mdzad ni dkar po zhi ba /
T02TD3305E:118b-13: dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po'i zhal can 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang padma dkar po dang dril bu dang nor bu dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:118b-14: bshad zin pa dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyag mtshan rnams ni rim ba bzhin du phyag g-yas par dang por steng nas 'og tu dang g-yon par 'og nas steng du rig par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:118b-15: rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i rim pas zhal gyi kha dog gsum yang rig par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:118b-16: rin chen 'byung ldan ni ser po ste ser po dang nag po dang dmar po'i zhal can nor bu dang rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang dril bu dang padma ser po dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:119a-0: snang ba mtha' yas ni dmar po dang nag po dang dkar ba'i zhal can phyag g-yon @119a * //
T02TD3305E:119a-1: pas dril bu dang bcas pa'i padma dmar po'i yu ba thugs kar bzung ba phyag g-yas pas kha 'byed pa ste gzhan rnams kyis rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rin po che dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:119a-2: don yod grub pa ni ljang gu ste ljang gu dang nag po dang dkar po'i zhal can ral gri dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang dril bu dang padma ljang gu dang nor bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:119a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po 'di dag dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i kun du bzang po'i bar ni ral ba'i thor cog dang rin po che'i cod pan can rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:119a-4: spyan ma ni rnam par snang mdzad dang mtshungs pa ste /
T02TD3305E:119a-5: 'on kyang padma dkar po'i gnas su autpala dkar po'o //
T02TD3305E:119a-6: m'a ma k'i ni mi bskyod pa dang mtshungs pa ste 'on kyang padma'i gnas su autpala sngo dmar ro //
T02TD3305E:119a-7: gos dkar mo ni snang ba mtha' yas dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:119a-8: sgrol ma ni don yod grub pa dang mtshungs pa ste /
T02TD3305E:119a-9: sna tshogs rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang autpala sngo ser dang dril bu dang rin po che dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:119a-10: rim pa gnyis pa la me'i mtshams su gzugs rdo rje ma spyan ma lta bu ste 'on kyang phyag dang po dag gis me long dmar po 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:119a-11: bden bral du sgra rdo rje ma ser mo ser po dang nag po dang dkar po'i zhal can rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis pi wang sngon po bsgreng ba ste phyag lhag ma rnams kyis rdo rje dang autpala sngon po dang rin po che dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:119a-12: rlung du dri rdo rje ma gos dkar mo lta bu rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis dri'i dung chos ser po'o //
T02TD3305E:119a-13: dbang ldan du ro rdo rje ma ljang gu ldan gu dang nag po dang dkar ba'i zhal can phyag dang po dag gis ro'i snod dmar po 'dzin pa ste lhag ma rnams kyis rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rin po che dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:119a-14: rim pa gsum pa'i shar gyi snam bu la byams pa dang sa'i snying po'o //
T02TD3305E:119a-15: lhor phyag na rdo rje dang nam mkha'i snying bo'o //
T02TD3305E:119a-16: nub tu 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs so //
T02TD3305E:119a-17: byang du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang kun du bzang po'o //
T02TD3305E:119a-18: brgyad po 'di rnams ni rtsa ba'i rigs kyi bdag po dang mtshungs pa ste 'on kyang byams pa ni rtsa ba'i phyag gis yal ga dang bcas pa'i klu shing gi me tog 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:119b-0: shar @119b la sogs pa'i sgo dang me la sogs pa'i mtshams dang steng dang 'og tu yang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du khro bo bcu'o //
T02TD3305E:119b-1: de la gshin rje gshed nag po nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can rdo rje tho ba dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang thugs kar zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang dgra sta 'dzin ba'o //
T02TD3305E:119b-2: shes rab mthar byed dkar po dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po'i zhal can rdo rje dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang ral gri dang thugs kar zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:119b-3: padma mthar byed dmar po dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po'i zhal can padma dmar po dang ral gri dang gtun shing dang dril bu dang dgra sta dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:119b-4: bgegs mthar byed sngon po sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can sna tshogs rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang gtun shing dang zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:119b-5: mi g-yo ba sngon po sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can ral gri dang rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang sdigs mdzub dang dgra sta dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:119b-6: 'dod pa'i rgyal po sngon po sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can rtsa ba'i phyag gis rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya mdzad cing gzhan rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang zhags pa dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:119b-7: dbyug sngon can nag po nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon po dang ral gri dang 'khor lo dang thugs kar zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang padma dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:119b-8: stobs po che nag po nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dang ral gri dang 'khor lo dang thugs kar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang bcas pa dang padma dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:119b-9: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba nag po nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya spyi bor 'dzin pa lhag ma rnams kyis rdo rje dang padma dang sdigs mdzub dang ral gri 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD3305E:120a-0: phyag gnyis thal mo gan rkyang du mnyam par brkyang ba'i srin lag gnyis kyi sen mo'i steng du mthe bong gnyis kyi sen @120a * //
T02TD3305E:120a-1: mos mnan te mthe chung gnyis brkyang ba'o //
T02TD3305E:120a-2: de bzhin du gung mo gnyis kyi sen mo yang dag par rtse sprad la mdzub mo dbus su gnyis ka'i rnam pa ni kun du snang ba zhes bya ba gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o zhes kha cig gi ste 'ga' zhig ni gzhan no //
T02TD3305E:120a-3: gnod mdzes nag po nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rin po che dang thugs kar zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang padma dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:120a-4: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa 'di rnams ni sna tshogs padma'i steng du go rims ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang 'khor lo dang cha dgu pa'i rin po che ma ra ka ta dang padma dmar po dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang padma dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang padma dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang klu shing gi me tog dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang rin po che dang padma dang rdo rje dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang rdo rje tho ba dang rdo rje dang chu skyes dmar po dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang ral gri dang rdo rje khu tshur dang dbyug pa sngon po dang dbyug pa nag po dang rdo rje dang rdo rje la gnas pa'i dbyug pa dang nyi ma dang zla ba la bzhugs pa'i zhal gsum phyag drug pa'o //
T02TD3305E:120a-5: yang gzhan las ni lha rnams kyi rang rang gi mdog lta bu'i rin po che las byas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:120a-6: de la rnam par snang mdzad dang lha mo rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni zla ba la gnas pa ste gzhan rnams ni nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:120a-7: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams ni rdo rje skyil krung can no //
T02TD3305E:120a-8: khro bo rnams ni zhabs g-yas brkyang ba g-yon bskum pa zhal so so la dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa 'bar zhing sgra sgrogs pa shin tu 'jigs su rung ba srung ba'i 'khor lor bshad pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:120a-9: 'dir ni 'khor lo'i dbang phyug kho na yum dang bcas pa ste gnod mdzes kyi mthar thug pa'i lha gzhan rnams ni yum med pa'o //
T02TD3305E:120a-10: srung ba'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'i gshin rje gshed la sogs pa ni rang 'od kyi shes rab dang bcas pa ste /
T02TD3305E:120b-0: de yang go rims bzhin du rdo rje ro langs ma dang gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang khro gnyer can ma dang ral gcig ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje ma dang @120b sna tshogs rin chen ma dang sna tshogs padma dang sna tshogs las ma dang nam mkha'i rdo rje ma dang sa 'dzin ma rnams so //
T02TD3305E:120b-1: mi bskyod pa la thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' phyag gnyis pa dmar po shes rab dang bcas pa de'i thugs kar h'um nag po'o //
T02TD3305E:120b-2: rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar aom dang rin chen dbang po la sv'a dang snang ba mtha' yas la a'a:dang don yod grub pa la h'a dang /
T02TD3305E:120b-3: spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams la l'am m'am p'am t'am dza:h'um bam ho:dang reg bya rdo rje ma la kham dang byams pa la sogs pa brgyad bo rnams la meem thlim aom aom aom h'um aom sam dang khro bo bcu po rnams la h'um do //
T02TD3305E:120b-4: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams kyi snying po'i sngags ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa nyid de byams pa la sogs pa rnams kyi ni aom a'a:mee tre ya meem h'um aom a'a:kashi ti garbha thlim h'um /
T02TD3305E:120b-5: aom a'a:badzra p'a ni aom h'um /
T02TD3305E:120b-7: aom a'a: lo ki shva ra aom h'um /
T02TD3305E:120b-8: aom a'a:mnydzu gho sha h'um h'um /
T02TD3305E:120b-9: aom a'a:sarba ni ba ra na biska mbhi ni aom h'um /
T02TD3305E:120b-10: aom a'a:sa manta bha dra sam h'um /
T02TD3305E:120b-11: aom a'a:aa tsa la h'um h'um /
T02TD3305E:120b-12: aom a'a: takakki r'a dza h'um h'um /
T02TD3305E:120b-13: aom a'a:n'i la danda h'um h'um /
T02TD3305E:120b-14: aom a'a:ma h'a ba la h'um h'um /
T02TD3305E:120b-16: aom a'a:sumbha r'a dza h'um h'um /
T02TD3305E:120b-17: gang gi tshe mi bskyod pa dang dbyer med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor lo'i dbang por gyur pa de'i tshe 'di'o //
T02TD3305E:120b-18: aom a'a:h'um h'um zhes pa'i sngags so //
T02TD3305E:120b-19: rigs kyi bdag po ni mi bskyod pa dang kun du bzang po dag gi gong du brjod pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ste 'on kyang rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang padma dang dril bu dang nor bu dang ral gri 'dzin pa rang dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyag mas yang dag par 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:120b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang m'a ma k'i dang phyag na rdo rje dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang gnod mdzes rgyal po rnams kyi mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD3305E:120b-21: spyan ma dang gzugs rdo rje ma dang byams pa dang sa'i snying po dang gshin rje mthar byed dang mi g-yo ba rnams kyi rnams par snang mdzad do //
T02TD3305E:120b-22: sgra rdo rje ma dang nam mkha'i snying po dang shes rab mthar byed dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi rin chen dbang po'o //
T02TD3305E:121a-0: gos dkar mo dang dri rdo rje ma dang @121a * //
T02TD3305E:121a-1: 'jig rten dbang phyug ma dang padma mthar byed dang dbyug sngon can rnams kyi snang ba mtha' yas so //
T02TD3305E:121a-2: sgrol ma dang ro rdo rje dang reg bya rdo rje ma dang rnam par sel ba dang bgegs mthar byed dang stobs po che rnams kyi don yod grub pa'o //
T02TD3305E:121a-3: rgyas 'debs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rang 'od kyi yum dang bcas pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs can no //
T02TD3305E:121a-4: dpal kun du kha sbyor du gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du srung ba'i 'khor lo'i lte bar rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor dang ri rab kyi steng du chos 'byung gi dbus su gzhal yas khang ngo //
T02TD3305E:121a-5: srung ba'i 'khor lo la gshin rje gshed ni phyag g-yas pa gsum gyis rdo rje lcags kyu dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang g-yon ba gsum gyis thugs kar sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang dril bu dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:121a-6: shes rab mthar byed ni rdo rje zhags pa dang rdo rje dang ral gri dang thugs kar sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang dgra sta'o //
T02TD3305E:121a-7: padma mthar byed ni lcags sgrog dang padma dang ral gri dang dril bu dang dgra sta dang zhags pa'o //
T02TD3305E:121a-8: bgegs dgra ni rdo rje dril bu dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang gtun shing dang dgra sta'o //
T02TD3305E:121a-9: mi g-yo ba ni ral gri dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub dang dgra sta dang zhags ba'o //
T02TD3305E:121a-10: 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang lcags kyu dang ral gri dang rdo rje zhags pa'o //
T02TD3305E:121a-11: dbyug sngon can ni rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon po dang ral gri dang 'khor lo dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang padma dang dgra sta'o //
T02TD3305E:121a-12: stobs po che ni rtse gsum dang ral gri dang 'khor lo dang thugs kar sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang padma dang dgra sta'o //
T02TD3305E:121a-13: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ni g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi phyag gnyis kyis gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya dang 'khor lo dang padma dang sdigs mdzub dang ral gri'o //
T02TD3305E:121a-14: gnod mdzes ni rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rin po che dang thugs kar sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang padma dang ral gri'o //
T02TD3305E:121b-0: bcu po 'di rnams @121b ni dbu la thod pa lngas brgyan pa 'khor lo la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa mi mgo'i phreng ba mgul la 'phyad ba go rims ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen dbang po dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa dang rtag pa dang rin chen dbang po dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa dang mi bskyod pa dang mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02TD3305E:121b-1: gzhal yas khang gi snying por rdo rje 'dzum pa dang bcas pa cung zad dmar ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa'i sku mdog dkar po ral pa'i thor cog nag po la gnas pa'i nor bu dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang de'i 'og tu g-yon ngos su gnas pa'i zla ba phyed pa dri ma med pa dang sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can /
T02TD3305E:121b-2: dpral ba'i steng du thod pa lnga dang 'khor lo dang rna cha dang mgul rgyan dang lag gdub dang ska rags dang thal chen rnams kyis brgyan pa zhal gsum pa g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal sngon po dang dmar po zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa phyag drug pa rdo rje dang dril bus rnam par mdzes pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab la 'khyud cing chu skyes la mnyam par sbyor ba'i dga' ba dang ldan pa phyag g-yas pa dag gis ral gri dang lcags kyu dag dang g-yon pa dag gis thod pa dang zhags pa 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:121b-3: nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can sna tshogs padma dang thod pa dang zla ba'i gdan la skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:121b-4: de'i thugs kar sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la ye shes sems dpa' sku mdog dkar dmar sems dpa'i skyil krung can sangs rgyas lngas spras pa'i rin po che'i cod pan dang rin po ches brgyan pa rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa ste de'i thugs kar ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i rang bzhin h'um yig nag po'o //
T02TD3305E:121b-5: 'dir sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang gi shar du rnam par snang mdzad dkar po zhi ba /
T02TD3305E:121b-6: phyag bzhi pa g-yas pa dag gis 'khor lo dang dril bu g-yon pa dag gis thod pa dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:122a-0: lhor rin chen dbang bo ser po phyag bzhi ba g-yas pa dag gis rin po che dang lcags kyu g-yon @122a * //
T02TD3305E:122a-1: dag gis thod pa dang zhags pa'o //
T02TD3305E:122a-2: nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dmar po phyag bzhi pa g-yas pa dag gis mda' dang padma /
T02TD3305E:122a-3: g-yon pa dag gis gzhu dang zhags pa'o //
T02TD3305E:122a-4: byang du don yod grub pa ljang gu phyag bzhi pa g-yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang lcags kyu g-yon pa dag gis dril bu dang thod pa'o //
T02TD3305E:122a-5: dbang ldan du spyan ma dkar mo phyag brgyad ma g-yas pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' dang /
T02TD3305E:122a-6: g-yon pa rnams kyis thod pa dang dril bu dang zhags pa dang gzhu'o //
T02TD3305E:122a-7: mer m'a ma k'i sngon mo phyag bcu gnyis pa g-yas pa rnams kyis mda' dang ral gri dang rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rin po che dang padma dang /
T02TD3305E:122a-8: g-yon pa rnams kyis gzhu dang lcags kyu dang dril bu dang zhags pa dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga'o //
T02TD3305E:122a-9: bden bral du gos dkar mo dmar po phyag brgyad ma g-yas pa rnams kyis mda' dang padma dang ral gri dang rdo rje /
T02TD3305E:122a-10: g-yon pa rnams kyis gzhu dang thod pa dang zhags pa dang dril bu'o //
T02TD3305E:122a-11: rlung du sgrol ma ljang gu phyag brgyad ma g-yas pa rnams kyis autpala dmar po dang ral gri dang lcags kyu dang mda'/
T02TD3305E:122a-12: g-yon pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang zhags pa dang thod pa dang gzhu'o //
T02TD3305E:122a-13: rim pa gnyis pa la shar phyogs su rdo rje drag mo dkar mo mda' dang lcags kyu dang gzhu dang byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba'i thod pa can no //
T02TD3305E:122a-14: lhor gzugs rdo rje ma ser mo rdo rje dang mdung dang zhags pa dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa can no //
T02TD3305E:122a-15: nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje ma dmar mo ral gri dang rdo rje dang dri chus gang ba'i thod pa dang dril bu can no //
T02TD3305E:122a-16: byang du rdo rje zhi ba ma ljang gu thal char dang ba dan gsum pa dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha tv'am ga dang thod pa can no //
T02TD3305E:122a-17: dbang ldan du rdo rje gnod spyin mo dkar ser dbyug pa dang autpala dang thod pa dang da ma ru can no //
T02TD3305E:122a-18: mer rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dkar ser padma dang me long dang rkang mar gyis gang ba'i thod pa dang dgra sta can no //
T02TD3305E:122a-19: bden bral du sgra rdo rje ma sngo dmar shakti dang dung dang 'khor lo dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa can no //
T02TD3305E:122b-0: rlung du sa rdo rje ma dkar ljang padma dang rdo rje dang bdud rtsi dang sgron mas gang ba'i @122b thod pa mi lpags kyis g-yogs pa dang dril bu can no //
T02TD3305E:122b-1: brgyad po 'di rnams ni phyag bzhi ma phyag dang po gnyis ni g-yas pa dag gis te gzhan gnyis ni g-yon pa dag gis 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:122b-2: rim pa gsum pa la shar phyogs su bzhad ma dmar mo phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pas mngon par bshad pa'i tshul can no //
T02TD3305E:122b-3: ltor sgeg mo sngon mo phyag gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pas bsnyems pa dang bcas par mngon par sgeg pa'i tshul can no //
T02TD3305E:122b-4: nub tu glu ma ser mo cung zad g-yo zhing sgeg pa'i phyag gnyis ting ting shags 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:122b-5: byang du gar ma ljang gu pad kor gyi tshul la sogs pa'i gar gyis g-yo ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:122b-6: dbang ldan du gling bu ma dmar mo'o //
T02TD3305E:122b-7: mer pi wang ma ser mo phyag gnyis kyis sgeg pa'i nyams kyis sku cung zad g-yo ba'o //
T02TD3305E:122b-8: bden bral du mu kun dam dkar mo'o //
T02TD3305E:122b-9: rlung du rdza rda ma du ba'i mdog can te /
T02TD3305E:122b-10: bzhi po 'di rnams ni phyag gnyis kyis rang rang gi rol mo sgrogs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:122b-11: de nas phyi'i snam bu la me mtshams su me tog ma dkar mo g-yon pa dang cig shos kyi phyag gis me tog gi phreng ba dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:122b-12: bden bral du bdug sbos ma du ba'i mdog can g-yon pa dang cig shos kyi phyag gis bdug sbos kyi snod rin po che 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:122b-13: rlung du mar me ma gser gyi mdog can g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i phyag gis mar me'i mchod sdo dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:122b-14: dbang ldan du dri chab ma dmar mo g-yon pa dang cig shos kyi phyag gis dri'i dung chos dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:122b-15: shar du me long ma dkar mo phyag gnyis kyis me long 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:122b-16: lhor ro ma dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis ro'i snod 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:122b-17: nub tu reg bya ma ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis sna tshogs pa'i gos 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:122b-18: byang du chos ma dkar mo phyag gnyis kyis chos 'byung dkar po 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:122b-19: 'di rnams dang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lha rnams ni zhal gcig spyan gsum pa ral pa'i cod pan nag po la thod pa lnga dang 'khor lo la sogs pas brgyan pa /
T02TD3305E:122b-20: lha'i na bza' gyon bskyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs pa'o//
T02TD3305E:123a-0: @123a * // sgo rnams la shar du rdo rje lcags kyu ma nam mkha' ltar sdo bsangs zhal g-yas pa dang cig shos nag po dang dkar po phyag drug gi g-yas pa rnams kyis lcags kyu dang ral gri dang 'khor lo g-yon pa rnams kyis zhags pa dang sdigs mdzub dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:123a-1: lhor rdo rje zhags pa ma dkar ser zhal g-yas pa dang cig shos nag po dang dmar po phyag drug gi g-yas pa rnams kyis zhags pa dang rdo rje dang ral gri /
T02TD3305E:123a-2: g-yon pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang dril bu dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa'o //
T02TD3305E:123a-3: nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dmar mo zhal g-yas pa dang cig shos nag po dang dkar po phyag drug gi g-yas pa rnams kyis lcags sgrog dang rdo rje dang ral gri /
T02TD3305E:123a-4: g-yon pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang dril bu dang lcags kyu'o //
T02TD3305E:123a-5: byang du rdo rje dril bu ma ljang gu zhal g-yas pa dang cig shos nag po dang dkar po phyag drug gi g-yas pa rnams kyis dril bu dang rdo rje dang ral gri /
T02TD3305E:123a-6: g-yon pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang lcags kyu dang zhags pa'o //
T02TD3305E:123a-7: bzhi po 'di rnams ni zhal re re zhing spyan gsum gsum pa dbu skra dmar ser 'bar zhing gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD3305E:123a-8: thod pa lnga dang 'khor lo la sogs pas brgyan pa /
T02TD3305E:123a-9: stag gi pags pa'i gos can zhabs g-yas brkyang zhing g-yon bskum pa'i gar gyis sna tshogs padma dang thod pa dang nyi ma la bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:123a-10: rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa rnams ni sna tshogs chu skyes dang thod pa dang nyi ma la ste lha gzhan thams cad sna tshogs padma dang thod pa dang zla ba la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:123a-11: thams cad kyang nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa nyid do //
T02TD3305E:123a-12: 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' kho na yum dang bcas pa ste lha gzhan thams cad ni yum med pa'o zhes pa ni phyogs gcig go //
T02TD3305E:123a-13: rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab dang bcas pa ni gnyis pa'o //
T02TD3305E:123a-14: rigs kyi bdag po ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang m'a ma k'i dang sgra rdo rje ma dang glu ma dang reg bya rdo rje ma dang chos dbyings rdo rje ma rnams kyi mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD3305E:123b-0: spyan ma dang rdo rje drag mo dang sa rdo rje ma dang me tog ma dang bzhad ma dang gling bu ma dang me long ma dang rdo rje lcags kyu ma rnams kyi rnam par snang @123b mdzad do //
T02TD3305E:123b-1: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje gzugs ma dang bdug spos ma dang sgeg mo dang pi wang ma dang rdo rje zhags pa ma rnams kyi rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02TD3305E:123b-2: gos dkar mo dang 'dod chags rdo rje ma dang mar me ma dang dri chab ma dang mu kun dam dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma rnams kyi snang ba mtha' yas so//
T02TD3305E:123b-3: sgrol ma dang rdo rje zhi ba ma dang rdo rje gnod sbyin mo dang gar mkhan ma dang ro ma dang rdza rda ma dang rdo rje dril bu ma rnams kyi don yod grub pa'o //
T02TD3305E:123b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni dkyil 'khor la dgod pa'i rim pas /
T02TD3305E:123b-5: h'um bhr'um a'a hri: kham bhr'um h'um hr'i: aam a'am aim a'im aum a'um aam a'a: rim ham a'am r'imlam sam kham gam /
T02TD3305E:123b-8: h'um bam ho: zhes pas rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po'i sngags ni aom badzra aa mri ta ma h'a su kha ham /
T02TD3305E:123b-10: rdo rje dril bu ma'i aom a'a: badzre ghande ho: sv'ah'a /
T02TD3305E:123b-11: zhes pa ste las thams cad pa'i sngags so //
T02TD3305E:123b-12: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor la 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi snying po'i sngags nyid kyis lha gzhan rnams kyi snying po'i sngags kyi bsgrub bya yang 'grub pa ste de rnams ni ma bris te gzhung mngas pas 'jigs pas so //
T02TD3305E:123b-13: de bzhin du snga ma dang phyi ma rnams la rig bar bya'o /
T02TD3305E:123b-15: // / ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte bar gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su gdugs dkar po dang bcas pa'i seng ge la gnas pa'i sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sngon mo ste 'di'i cod pan dar gyis bcings pa'i steng du rdo rjes mtshan zhing sangs rgyas lnga 'phro bas brgyan pa rtsa ba'i zhal khro zhing gad rgyangs dang bcas pa /
T02TD3305E:123b-16: g-yas dkar zhing bzhad pa dang bcas pa g-yon dmar zhing sgeg pa dang bcas pa zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum pa phyag g-yas pa gsum na steng du gnas pa'i kha t'vam ga dang dgra sta dang rdo rje /
T02TD3305E:123b-17: g-yon pa gsum na dril bu dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang ral gri'o //
T02TD3305E:123b-18: 'di'i shar phyogs su rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo sgag pa'i nyams can dang /
T02TD3305E:123b-19: byang du mi bzad mkha' 'gro ma gser gyi mdog can dang /
T02TD3305E:123b-20: nub tu ro langs ma sngon mo dang /
T02TD3305E:124a-0: lhor gtum mo dmar mo ste bzhi po 'di rnams kyang seng ge @124a * //
T02TD3305E:124a-1: la gnas pa'i sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la bzhugs pa /
T02TD3305E:124a-2: g-yas ba dang cig shos kyi phyag gnyis kyis steng du bgreng [?] ba'i kha tv'am ga dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:124a-3: dbang ldan du seng ge mo seng ge'i gdong ba can g-yon pa dang g-yas ba'i lus phyed phyed dkar po dang ser po glang po che dkar po la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:124a-4: mer stag mo stag gi gdong pa can g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i lus phyed phyed sngon po dang dkar po rin po che sna bdun gyi phung po la'o //
T02TD3305E:124a-5: bden bral du ce spyang mo ce spyang gi gdong pa can g-yon pa dang g-yas ba'i lus phyed nag po dang dmar po ma he la'o //
T02TD3305E:124a-6: nub tu 'ug pa mo 'ug pa'i gdong pa can g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i lus phyed phyed ser bo dang dmar po klu brgyad kyi mjug ma la'o //
T02TD3305E:124a-7: bzhi po 'di rnams ni g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pas brgyan cing sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:124a-8: de nas sgo rnams la shar du rgyal ba'i dbang phyug ma dkar mo phyag gnyis kyis thal mo khar bcug pa'o //
T02TD3305E:124a-9: byang du gsal byed ma ser mo mar me lta bu'i thal mo sbyar ba spyi bor 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:124a-10: nub tu 'jigs byed ma dmar mo khrag gis gang ba'i snyim pa steng du bkan pa kha'i thad kar bzung nas khrag gi rgyun 'thung bar byed pa'o //
T02TD3305E:124a-11: lhor kam po dz'i nag mo rdo rje'i snyam pa la mthe bong gi rtse mo gnyis phan tshun sbyar te sdigs mdzub gnyis kyi mdzub mo brkyang ba sbyar nas gsang ba'i gnas su bzhag pas rang gi bha ga ston par byed pa'o//
T02TD3305E:124a-12: bzhi po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs chu skyes la gnas pa'i yi dags kyi snying gar nyi ma la bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:124a-13: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bcu gnyis ni zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa'o //
T02TD3305E:124a-14: lha mo bcu gsum po thams cad kyang lha'i rin po che dang lha'i gos dang dbu la thod pa lnga'i phreng ba can phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa sems dpa'i skyil krung can klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyis rnam par mdzes pa /
T02TD3305E:124b-0: bskal pa'i mtha'i me 'bar ba'i 'od lta bu'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi 'bar zhing 'jigs su rung ba ste go rims ji lta ba bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang rtag pa dang rin chen dbang po dang snang ba @124b mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa dang mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag med dang rtag pa dang rin chen dbang po dang snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa rnams kyis rgyas btab pa'o //
T02TD3305E:124b-1: h'um h'um h'um h'um h'um a'am a'im r'im l'im aeem aoom aa: zhes pa 'di rnams ni thugs ka'i sa bon no //
T02TD3305E:124b-4: zhes pa ni ye shes mkha' 'gor ma'i snying po'o //
T02TD3305E:124b-5: aom be ta l'i h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:124b-6: zhes pa ni ro langs ma'i se las thams cad pa'i sngags so //
T02TD3305E:124b-7: bcu bdun gyi bdag nyid kye'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi snying por gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte ba la gnas pa'i ro'i snying gar khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa'i steng du nyi ma la gnas pa'i kye'i rdo rje rnam pa gsum ste bzhi pa ni ro dang bral ba'o //
T02TD3305E:124b-8: de la 'jig rten gsum kun du bskyod pa nag po sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD3305E:124b-9: thod pa lnga dang phyag rgya drug dang mi mgo rlon po'i phreng bas brgyan pa rgyab kyi char stag gi pags pa'i smad g-yogs can zhabs g-yon pa'i brla la zhabs g-yas pa'i sen mo yang dag par bzhag pa'i skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa /
T02TD3305E:124b-10: dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa phyag g-yon gyis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i thod pa khrag gis gang ba 'dzin pas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can gyi bdag med ma la 'khyud pa /
T02TD3305E:124b-11: phyag g-yas kyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa dbyug pa brdeg pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:124b-12: yang phyag bzhi pa ni phyag gnyis pa lta bu ste phyag gzhan pa gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje phag mo la yang dag par 'khyud pa'o zhes pa ni khyad par ro //
T02TD3305E:124b-13: yang phyag drug pa ni nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal gsum pa zhal re re zhing spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa /
T02TD3305E:124b-14: phyag g-yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje drul bu dang gzhug dang thod pa /
T02TD3305E:125a-0: g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang mda' dang rtse gsum 'dzin pa rdo rje drul bu dang ldan pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma la yang dag par 'khyud pa ste gzhan ni ji ltar rigs par sna ma bzhin @125a * //
T02TD3305E:125a-2: de ltar he ru ka gsum gyi shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma brgyad la rdo rje drag mo la sogs pa brgyad do //
T02TD3305E:125a-3: 'di dag gi phyi rol du dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su gling bu ma dang pi wang ma dang mu kun da ma dang rdza rnga ma'o //
T02TD3305E:125a-4: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang rdo rje zhags pa ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang rdo rje dril bu ma'o //
T02TD3305E:125a-5: lha mo bcu drug po 'di dag ni gong gi dang 'dra ba la yab dang bral ba'o //
T02TD3305E:125a-6: he ru ka gsum gyi rigs kyi bdag po ni mi bskyod pa ste thugs ka'i sa bon ni h'um ngo //
T02TD3305E:125a-7: snying po'i sngags ni aom a'a: h'um hr'i: sv'a h'a zhes pa'o //
T02TD3305E:125a-8: so so'i sngags ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du aom tree lo kya a'a kesha pa hum hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:125a-9: aom dzva la dzva la bhyo hum hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:125a-10: aom ki ti ki ti badzra hum hum hum phat ces pa'o /
T02TD3305E:125a-12: // / skye'i rdo rje bzhi pa ni phyag bcu drug pa ste mi skyod pas rgyas btab pa bdag med ma dang snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
T02TD3305E:125a-13: 'on kyang 'di la gong du bshad pa'i ro'i gnas su bdud bzhi ste /
T02TD3305E:125a-14: de'ang phung po'i bdud kyi ngo bo tshangs pa ser po dang nyon mongs pa'i bdud khyab 'jug nag po dang /
T02TD3305E:125a-15: 'chi bdag gi bdud dbang phyug dkar po dang /
T02TD3305E:125a-16: lha'i bu'i bdud dbang po dmar sar ro //
T02TD3305E:125a-17: de rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs bzhi'i gnyis kyis skyil krung phyed pa dang gzhan pa dag gi sa g-yon bskum zhing g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa /
T02TD3305E:125a-18: sku mdog nag po nas sna tshogs rdo rje la sogs pa dang smad g-yogs kyi bar sngar bshad pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:125a-19: zhal brgyad pa spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa /
T02TD3305E:125a-20: rtsa zhal nag po gang mo can g-yas dkar po g-yon dmar po steng ma mche ba gtsigs pa lhag ma rnams nag po'o //
T02TD3305E:125a-21: phyag g-yas pa rnams na rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' dang 'khor lo dang thod pa dang dbyug pa dang rtse gsum dang lcags kyu dang /
T02TD3305E:125a-22: g-yon pa rnams na dril bu dang padma dang gzhu dang kha tv'am ga bsgreng ba dang thod pa dang rin po che dang sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa'o //
T02TD3305E:125a-23: shar gyi 'dab ma la goo ra'i dmar ser phyag g-yas pa gnyis na mda' phyung ba dang rdo rje gri gug / g-yon gnyis na gzhu dang nya ro hi ta dang bcas pa'i thod pa khrag gis gang ba'o //
T02TD3305E:125b-0: @125b lhor tshom rkun ma dmar mo rdo rje dang da ma ru dang lcags kyu dang phag pa dang bcas pa'i thod pa khrag gis gang ba can no //
T02TD3305E:125b-1: nub tu ro langs ma dkar ser ral gri dang rus sbal dang bcas pa'i thod pa khrag gis gang ba dang /
T02TD3305E:125b-2: chang gis gang ba'i thod pa dang dri chus gang ba'i thod pa can no //
T02TD3305E:125b-3: byang du ghasma r'i ljang gu cung zad ser ba rkang mar gyis gang ba'i thod pa la gnas pa'i sbrul dang mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i me thabs dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dgra stag can no //
T02TD3305E:125b-4: dbang ldan du pukka s'i ser mo sha chen gyis gang ba'i thod pa la gnas pa'i seng ge dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang dpag bsam gyi shing gi yal ga dang rin po che chen no //
T02TD3305E:125b-5: mer ri khrod ma dkar mo khu bas gnag ba'i thod pa la gnas pa'i dge song dang rdo rje dang kha tv'am ga dang zhags pa'o //
T02TD3305E:125b-6: bden bral du gtum mo sngon mo g-yas pa na khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa la stag dang /
T02TD3305E:125b-7: g-yon na padma dkar po dang phyag gnyis na rlung ras can no //
T02TD3305E:125b-8: rlung du g-yung mo nag mo chang gi thod pa dang rtse gsum dang bdud rtsi lnga'i thod pa la gnas pa'i ce spyang dang thod gshol can no //
T02TD3305E:125b-9: 'di dag gi phyi rol gyi mtshams rnams su gling bu ma la sogs pa bzhi snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:125b-10: sgo rnams la shar du rta gdong ma nag mo ste zhal rnams ni nag po dang dkar po dang ser po dang steng du rta'i gdong pa ljang gu'o //
T02TD3305E:125b-11: lhor phag gdong ma ser mo ste zhal rnams ni ser po dang nag po dang dkar po dang steng du phag gi gdong ba dmar po'o //
T02TD3305E:125b-12: nub tu khyi gdong ma dmar mo ste zhal rnams ni dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po dang steng du khyi'i gdong pa ser po'o //
T02TD3305E:125b-13: byang du seng gdong ma ljang gu ste zhal rnams ni ljang gu dang nag po dang dkar po steng du seng ge'i gdong pa dmar po //
T02TD3305E:125b-14: 'dir rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang cig shos dang steng gi rim pas zhal bzhi pa'o //
T02TD3305E:125b-15: sgo skyong ma rnams phyag bzhi ma rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhin du phyag mtshan 'dzin pa sna tshogs chu skyes dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang ro'i steng du g-yas bskum zhing g-yon brkyang bas gnas pa dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar zhing brdzes pa'o //
T02TD3305E:126a-0: lta gzhan rnams ni skyil krung phyed pa can thams @126a * //
T02TD3305E:126a-1: cad kyang zhal re re zhing spyan gsum gsum pa phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan pa yab med pa'o //
T02TD3305E:126a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni h'um ngo //
T02TD3305E:126a-3: snying po'i sngags ni aom de ba bi tsu badzra h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:126a-5: ghasma r'i'i aom aom sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:126a-6: zhes pa ste las thams cad pa'i sngags so /
T02TD3305E:126a-8: // / bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje'i gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi snying por gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs padma'i lte bar bdag med ma ste /
T02TD3305E:126a-9: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab mar rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD3305E:126a-12: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams so //
T02TD3305E:126a-13: rim pa gnyis par sna tshogs padma rnams kyi shar la sogs par goo r'i dang chom rkun ma dang ro langs ma dang ghasma r'i rnams te /
T02TD3305E:126a-14: dbang ldan la sogs par pukka s'i dang ri khrod ma dang gtum mo dang g-yung mo rnams so /
T02TD3305E:126a-15: bdag med ma'i steng du shar gyi ngos kyi chu skyes la gnas pa'i mkha' spyod ma ste steng zhal can no //
T02TD3305E:126a-16: 'og tu nub kyi ngos kyis padma la gnas pa'i sa spyod ma ste 'og zhal can no //
T02TD3305E:126a-17: 'di'i phyi rim la gnas pa'i goo r'i la sogs pa brgyad ni phyag bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du ser po la sogs pa'i mdog can te gzhan bdun ni sngon mo'o //
T02TD3305E:126a-18: bco lnga po yang skyil krung phyed pas ro dang zla ba la gnas pa zhal gcig pa spyan gsum dmar ba dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02TD3305E:126a-19: phyag bzhi ma g-yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang gri gug /
T02TD3305E:126a-20: g-yon ba dag gis thod pa dang steng du sgreng ba'i kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:126a-21: dbu la thod pa lnga'i phreng ba can phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:126a-22: mtshams rnams su gling bu ma la sogs pa bzhi ni snga ma bzhin du'o //
T02TD3305E:126a-23: sgo rnams la shar du rta gdong ma dkar sngo dang lhor phag gdong ma ser sngo dang nub tu khyi gdod ma dmar sngo dang /
T02TD3305E:126b-0: byang du seng gdong ma ljang sngo ste bzhi po 'di rnams kyang g-yas brkyang zhing g-yon bskum pas nyi ma la gnas pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa ming dang rjes su mthun pa'i zhal gcig ma kha dog gnyis gnyis @126b dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:126b-1: khyad par gzhan rnams ni bdag med ma dang mtshungs pa /
T02TD3305E:126b-2: bdag med ma la sogs pa rnams ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang rtag pa dang rin chen dbang po dang snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa dang mi bskyod pa dang rtag pa dang rin chen dbang po dang snang ba mtha' yas dang mi bskyod pa dang rtag pa dang rin chen dbang po dang snang ba mtha' yas dang rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab pa ste /
T02TD3305E:126b-3: gling bu ma la sogs pa dang rta gdong ma la sogs pa rnams la rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa rnams kyis so //
T02TD3305E:126b-4: bdag med ma'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni aom ste aom aam sv'a h'a zhes pa ni snying po'o //
T02TD3305E:126b-6: zhes pa ni ghasma r'i'i ste las thams cad pa'i sngags so //
T02TD3305E:126b-7: yang bdag med ma la sogs pa lha mo bco lnga'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD3305E:126b-8: de yang lha mo thams cad sku mdog nag mo g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa mchod phyir thogs pa can kha tv'am ga dang bcas pa ste gzhan rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:126b-9: aom a'a:badzra ghasma r'i aom h'um sv'a h'a zhes pa ghasma r'i'i sngags te las thams cad pa'o //
T02TD3305E:126b-10: gang gi tshe dkyil 'khor gyi dbang mo ku ru ku ller gyur pa na sku mdog dmar mo phyag bzhi ma g-yas pa dag gis mda' dang lcags kyu g-yon pa dag gis autpala dmar po dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:126b-11: zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa snang ba mtha' yas kyis rigs kyi bdag po byas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:126b-12: rdo rje ma la sogs pa bcu bzhi 'ang sku mdog dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa ste bco lnga bo thams cad kyang padma dmar po dang ro'i snying gar zla ba la skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:126b-13: ku ru ku lle'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni hr'i:'o //
T02TD3305E:126b-14: aom ku ru kulle hr'i:sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:126b-16: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin du gyur pa de'i tshe ku ru kulle'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro //
T02TD3305E:127a-0: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje'i gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi snying por gnas pa'i gzhal yang khang gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar zla ba la dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi sems dpa'i skyil krung can me tog pri yang ku lta @127a * //
T02TD3305E:127a-1: bur sngo bsangs rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal gsum me tog pri yang ku lta bu sngo bsangs dang dkar po dang dmar po'o //
T02TD3305E:127a-2: sna tshogs pa'i lag gdub dang rkang gdub la sogs pa dang gos rnams kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD3305E:127a-3: phyag drug pa rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rang 'od kyi shes rab la 'khyud pa g-yas pa dag gis 'khor lo dang ral gri dang g-yon pa dag gis zhags pa dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa 'od dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can /
T02TD3305E:127a-4: zhi ba dang sgeg pa'i nyams kyi phung po can no //
T02TD3305E:127a-5: 'dab ma rnams la shar du zhi ba mo dkar mo dkar ba dang nag pa dang dmar ba'i zhal gsum mo //
T02TD3305E:127a-6: lhor zhi gdong ma ser mo ser ba dang dkar ba dang dmar ba'i zhal gsum mo //
T02TD3305E:127a-7: nub tu zla ldan ma dmar mo dmar ba dang gnag pa dang dkar ba'i zhal gsum mo //
T02TD3305E:127a-8: byang du ri bong can ma ljang gu ljang ba dang dkar ba dang dmar ba'i zhal gsum mo //
T02TD3305E:127a-9: mer zla dkyil ma sngon mo sngo ba dang dkar ba dang dmar ba'i zhal gsum mo //
T02TD3305E:127a-10: bden bral du zla tshes ma me tog pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs sngo bsangs dang dkar ba dang dmar ba'i zhal gsum mo //
T02TD3305E:127a-11: rlung du yid 'od ma autpala sngon po'i mdog can sngo pa dang dkar ba dang dmar ba'i zhal gsum mo //
T02TD3305E:127a-12: dbang ldan du yid tshim par byed ma gser gyi mdog can ser ba dang dkar ba dang dmar ba'i zhal gsum mo //
T02TD3305E:127a-13: lha mo 'di rnams 'khor lo'i dbang phyug lta bu'i phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD3305E:127a-14: 'on kyang 'khor lo'i gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD3305E:127a-15: zla tshes ma ni zla ba'i cha gcig 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:127a-16: rim pa gnyis par dbang ldan gyi mtshams su me tog ma dkar mo dkar pa dang gnag pa dang dmar ba'i zhal gsum mo //
T02TD3305E:127a-17: mer bdug spos ma du ba'i mdog can du ba'i mdog dang dkar ba dang dmar ba'i zhal gsum mo //
T02TD3305E:127a-18: bden bral du mar me ma gser gyi mdog can ser ba dang dkar ba dang gnag pa'i zhal gsum mo //
T02TD3305E:127a-19: rlung du dri chab ma dmar mo dmar ba dang dkar ba dang gnag pa'i zhal gsum mo //
T02TD3305E:127b-0: 'di rnams ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du g-yas kyi phyag dang pos me tog gi za ma tog dang spos phor dang mar me'i mchod sdong dang dri'i dung chos @127b 'dzin pa ste phyag lhag ma rnams kyis ni gtso bo'i phyag mtshan no //
T02TD3305E:127b-1: de nas shar la sogs pa'i snam bu la gling bu ma dang pi wang dang mu kun dam dang rdza rnga ma rnams ni dmar mo dang ser mo dang dkar mo dang du ba'i mdog can zhal gcig ma phyag gnyis pa gling bu la sogs pa'i sgra sgrogs par brtson pa'o //
T02TD3305E:127b-2: sgo rnams la shar du khro gnyer rim par ldan nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs dang dkar po dang dmar pa'i zhal gsum pa'o //
T02TD3305E:127b-3: lhor 'jigs sdigs dkar ba dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po'i zhal gsum pa'o //
T02TD3305E:127b-4: nub tu rta'i gzugs dmar po dmar po dang dkar po dang nag po'i zhal gsum pa'o //
T02TD3305E:127b-5: byang du tshogs kyi gtso bo ljang gu ljang gu dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal gsum pa'o //
T02TD3305E:127b-6: 'di rnams ni 'gying ba'i khro bo 'gying ba'i rkang stabs kyis bzhugs pa 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD3305E:127b-7: khyad par ni phyag g-yas kyi dang pos rim pa ji lta bar lcags gyu dang zhags pa dang lcags sgrog dang dril bu 'dzin pa mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:127b-8: 'dir ni 'khor lo'i dbang po'i gzugs brnyan de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rin po che sna tshogs pa'i cong pan no //
T02TD3305E:127b-9: de las gzhan pa'i lha nyi shu po rnams ni rdo rje bdud rtsi dang po tis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i cod pan zla ba la gnas pa /
T02TD3305E:127b-10: gtso bo lta bur rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po che la sogs pas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:127b-11: me tog la sogs pa bcu gnyis po rnams kyi zla ba'i 'og tu sna tshogs padma'o //
T02TD3305E:127b-12: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni ha:'o//
T02TD3305E:127b-13: aom ha:badzra aa mri ta sv'a h'a zhes pa ni snying po ste las thams cad pa yang 'di nyid do //
T02TD3305E:127b-14: rdo rje bdud rtsi gzhan gsum 'di ltar rnam par bsgom pa'i rim pa ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud las rig par bya ste mngas pas 'jigs nas 'dir ma bshad do //
T02TD3305E:127b-15: dgu'i bdag nyid he ru ka bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos kyi 'byung gnas la gzhal yas khang ngo //
T02TD3305E:127b-16: phyag bcu drug pa la slar yang 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i srung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa yang yod do zhes pa ni phyogs gnyis pa'o //
T02TD3305E:128a-0: gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs chu @128a * //
T02TD3305E:128a-1: skyes kyi lte ba'i steng du gan rkyal du gnas pa'i tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug dang dbang po ste /
T02TD3305E:128a-2: bdud bzhi'i rang bzhin can gyi snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i zhabs bzhi pa gcer bu gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa zhabs gnyis skyil krung phyed pa dang gzhan gnyis g-yon bskum zhing g-yas brkyang ba'i gar stabs can sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD3305E:128a-3: dpral ba'i steng du mi mgo skam po lngas brgyan pa /
T02TD3305E:128a-4: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can sku mdog nag po phyag bcu drug pa gad rgyangs dang bcas pa'i zhal brgyad pa zhal re re la dmar zhing zlum pa'i spyan gsum gsum yod ba rtsa ba'i zhal nag po g-yas pa rnams dkar po dang nag po dang nag po /
T02TD3305E:128a-5: g-yon pa rnams dmar po dang nag po dang nag po steng ma du ba'i mdog can rnam par 'gyur ba /
T02TD3305E:128a-6: zhal thams cad smin ma 'khyog po dang bcas pa khro gnyer can mche ba'i myu gu gtsigs pa phyag g-yas pa brgyad kyis thod pa rnams na glang po che dang rta dang bong bu dang glang dang rnga mo dang mi dang sha ra bha dang byi la rnams dang /
T02TD3305E:128a-7: g-yon pa brgyad kyis thod pa rnams na sa dang chu dang rlung dang me dang zla ba nyi ma dang gshin rje dang nor sbyin rnams 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:128a-8: 'khor lo dang rna cha dang mgul rgyan dang lag gdub dang ska rags dang thal chen rnams dang mi mgo rlon ba khrag 'dzag pa lnga bcu'i do shal can dpung rgyan dang rkang gdub rnams kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:128a-9: 'di'i yum ni bdag med ma nag mo gcer bu gri gug dang thod par ldan pa'i phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par 'khyud pa /
T02TD3305E:128a-10: g-yas bskum zhing g-yon brkyang ba'i gar stabs can phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:128a-11: zhal gcig ma mche ba gtsigs ma dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:128a-12: dbu skra dmar ser 'bar zhing gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD3305E:128a-13: dpral ba'i mtshams su thod pa ldas brgyan pa /
T02TD3305E:128a-14: mgrin par mi mgo skam po'i phreng ba 'phreng ba rkang gdub la sogs pas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:128b-0: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab mar gnas pa'i tshangs ba dang dbang po dang nye dbang dang drag bo rnams kyi snying ga'i steng du zla ba la goo r'i la sogs pa ste dbang ldan la @128b sogs pa'i 'dab mar gnas pa'i gshin rje dang lus ngan dang srin po dang thags bzangs ris rnams kyi snying ga'i steng du zla ba la pukka s'i la sogs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:128b-1: de la goo r'i nag mo g-yas pa na gri gug dang g-yon pa na nya ro ham ta 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:128b-2: chom rkun ma dmar mo phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis ta ma ru dang phag pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:128b-3: ro langs ma gser gyi mdog can phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis rus sbal dang padma'i snod 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:128b-4: ghasma r'i ljang gu phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis sprul dang rnal 'byor gyi snod 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:128b-5: pukka s'i sngon mo phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon bdag gis seng ge dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:128b-6: ri khrod ma dkar mo phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis dge slong dang gsil byed 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:128b-7: gtum mo nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang thong gshol 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:128b-8: g-yung mo sna tshogs pa'i mdog can phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dang gis rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:128b-9: brgyad po 'di rnams ni skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs pa ste /
T02TD3305E:128b-10: khyad par gzhan rnams ni sngar brjod pa'i bdag med ma bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:128b-11: rigs kyi bdag po ni he ru ka dang bdag med ma dag gi mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD3305E:128b-12: goo r'i la sogs pa rnams kyi mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mtha' yas te pukka s'i la sogs pa rnams kyi yang ngo //
T02TD3305E:128b-13: yang phyag gnyis pa dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gyur pa na g-yas pas rdo rje gyen du 'phyar zhing g-yon pas rdo rje thod pa 'dzin pas bdag med ma la 'khyud pa /
T02TD3305E:128b-14: kha tv'am ga yang dpung pa g-yon pa la brten pa'o //
T02TD3305E:128b-15: yang phyag bzhi pa 'khor lo'i dbang phyug tu gyur pa na /
T02TD3305E:128b-16: phyag g-yas pas rdo rje sngon po dang g-yon pas khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:128b-17: phyag lhag ma dag gis rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:128b-18: yang phyag drug pa 'khor lo'i dbang por gyur pa na rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal gsum sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar po phyag g-yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang gri gug dang g-yon pa dag gis rtse gsum dang dril bu 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:129a-0: lhag ma dag gis rdo rje @129a * //
T02TD3305E:129a-1: lu gu rgyud ma la 'khyud pa ste /
T02TD3305E:129a-2: rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma ni sku mdog dang zhal dang phyag la sogs pa bdag med ma dang mtshungs par yan lag med pa'i rdo rje'i zhabs kyis gsungs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:129a-3: phyag gnyis pa la sogs pa 'di rnams sna tshogs chu skyes kyi ze'u 'bru la ro'i snying gar nyi ma la skyil krung phyed pa'i gar stabs mdzad pa /
T02TD3305E:129a-4: mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD3305E:129a-6: smin ma 'khyog pa dang bcas pa'i khro gnyer can /
T02TD3305E:129a-8: phyag bcu drug pa rim pa bzhin du 'khor lo la sogs pas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:129a-9: goo r'i la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis bskor ba'o //
T02TD3305E:129a-10: lha mo thams cad ni thabs dang bral ba ste rdo rje phag mo dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud la ni mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02TD3305E:129a-11: kye'i rdo rje rnam pa bzhi'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni h'um ngo //
T02TD3305E:129a-12: aom de ba pi tsu badzra h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:129a-13: zhes pa ni phyag bcu drug pa'i snying po'o //
T02TD3305E:129a-14: aom tree lokya a'akshe pa h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:129a-15: zhes pa ni phyag gnyis pa'o //
T02TD3305E:129a-16: aom dzva la dzva la bhyo h'um h'um h'um phat ces pa phyag bzhi pa'i'o //
T02TD3305E:129a-17: aom ki ti ki ti badzra h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:129a-19: aom a'a: badzra ghasma r'i aom h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:129a-20: zhes pa ni ghasma r'i'i ste las thams cad pa'o //
T02TD3305E:129a-21: sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du gnas pa ni chos 'byung gi dbus su gzhal yas khang ste /
T02TD3305E:129a-22: kha cig ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung med par gzhal yas khang ngo zhes so //
T02TD3305E:129a-23: gzhal yas khang gi dbus su padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar nyi ma la sgyu ma chen po las byung ba'i he ru ka nag po nyi ma'i 'od zer can 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa 'gying ba'i khro bo dbu skra dmar ser 'bar zhing gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD3305E:129a-24: thod pa'i cod pan can rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang rgyab dang g-yon pa'i zhal bzhi sngon po dang ser po dang dkar po dang ljang gu zhal re re la dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum gsum pa phyag bzhi pa g-yas pa dag gis thod pa dang mda'/
T02TD3305E:129a-25: g-yon pa dag gis kha tv'am ga dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:129a-27: mi'i pags pa'i na bza' 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:129b-0: skyil krung phyed pa'i @129b gar gyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:129b-1: dpal ldan sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma ni sku mdog dmar mo dmar po dang ser po dang dkar po dang ljang gu'i zhal can gtso bo lta bu'i mtshon cha 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:129b-2: phyag gnyis kyis de'i mgul nas 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:129b-3: 'dab ma rnams la shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma sngon mo sngon po dang ser po dang dkar po dang ljang gu'i zhal can rdo rje dang thod pa dang dril bu dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:129b-4: lhor rin chen mkha' 'gro ma ser mo ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po dang ljang gu'i zhal can /
T02TD3305E:129b-5: rin po che'i pa tra dang rtse gsum dang mgrin pa btsir ba'i ce spyang dang ba dan 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:129b-6: nub tu padma mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo dkar po dang ser po dang sngon po dang ljang gu'i zhal can sna tshogs padma dang mda' dang thod pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:129b-7: byang du sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma ljang gu ljang gu dang ser po dang dkar po dang sngon po'i zhal can ral gri dang ta ma ru dang zhags pa dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:129b-8: thams cad phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa zla ba'i gdan dang 'od can te /
T02TD3305E:129b-9: 'di rnams kyi khyad par rnams ni gtso mo lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:129b-10: rigs kyi bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mi bskyod pa ste /
T02TD3305E:129b-11: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtag pa dang mi bskyod pa dang rin chen dbang po dang gsung gi dbang phyug dang don yod grub pa rnams so //
T02TD3305E:129b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni h'um ngo //
T02TD3305E:129b-14: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yang aom aom h'um /
T02TD3305E:129b-17: aom a'a: h'um aom h'a h'um zhes pa ste sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags ni las thams cad pa'i'o //
T02TD3305E:129b-18: bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thod pa'i lha dgu'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ni /
T02TD3305E:129b-19: rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung la gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte ba la la ngo'i snying gar nyi ma la shes rab ma dang bral ba'i bcom ldan 'das te sku mdog la sogs pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i 'khor lo gsum la gnas pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thod pa bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:130a-0: shar dang byang dang nub dang lho'i 'dab ma rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sna tshogs sde ma dang 'dod ma dang sa 'og na gnas pa ma dang legs bzangs ma @130a * //
T02TD3305E:130a-1: rnams ni sku mdog sngon mo g-yas bskum zhing g-yon brkyang ba /
T02TD3305E:130a-2: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02TD3305E:130a-3: phyag g-yas pa dag gis gri gug dang thod pa /
T02TD3305E:130a-4: g-yon pa dag gis kha tv'am ga dang ta ma ru 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:130a-5: dbang ldan dang me lha dang bden bral dang rlung gi 'dab ma rnams la chad 'tshong ma dang 'byung mo dang phyag bzhi ma dang nam mkha' la gnas ma rnams ni ser mo na bza' ser po gyon pa 'od zer ser po 'phro ba /
T02TD3305E:130a-6: zhabs gnyis g-yas brkyang zhing g-yon bskum pa klu brgyad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD3305E:130a-7: phyag g-yas pa dag gis gri gug dang ta ma ru /
T02TD3305E:130a-8: g-yon pa dag gis kha tv'am ga dang padma'i snod 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:130a-9: brgyad po 'di rnams kyang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gar gyi tshul gyis gnas pa /
T02TD3305E:130a-10: dbu skra dmar ser 'bar zhing gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD3305E:130a-11: dbu la thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:130a-12: phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan pa /
T02TD3305E:130a-13: mi mgo rlon pa lnga bcu mgul du 'chang ba /
T02TD3305E:130a-14: mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'i zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi ba'o //
T02TD3305E:130a-15: bcom ldan 'das la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas lngas rgyas btab pa ste /
T02TD3305E:130a-16: sna tshogs sde ma la sogs pa rnams la mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mtha' yas rnams kyis so //
T02TD3305E:130a-17: chang 'tshong ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yang de rnams nyid do //
T02TD3305E:130a-18: yang na bcom ldan 'das 'di dang phyogs kyi lha mo rnams kyang dkar po ste mtshams kyi lha mo rnams dmar mo'o //
T02TD3305E:130a-19: 'di ni yum dang bral ba 'am yum dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:130a-20: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung la gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma'i steng du g-yon bskum zhing g-yas brkyang ba'i zhabs dag gis 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan mnan pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba khro bo bsal ba'i dus kyi me ltar 'od zer 'bar zhing 'gro ba ma lus pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs thams cad rab tu gsol bar mdzad pa /
T02TD3305E:130a-21: sku mdog sngon po rnam par 'gyur zhing gdangs pa'i zhal gsum pa /
T02TD3305E:130a-22: rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal rnams sngon po dang ser po dang ljang gu mche ba gtsigs shing rab tu gtum pa /
T02TD3305E:130b-0: ljags 'dril @130b zhing shin tu 'jigs su rung ba zhal re re zhing dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum gsum pa smin ma g-yo ba dang bcas pa'i khro gnyer can dpral ba'i steng na thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:130b-1: khrag 'dzag pa'i mi mgo lnga bcu'i phreng ba mgul bar 'phyang ba /
T02TD3305E:130b-2: phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:130b-3: klu mtha' yas sngon pos dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba bcings pa /
T02TD3305E:130b-4: 'jog po dmar pos rna rgyan byas pa /
T02TD3305E:130b-5: padma chen po padma'i rtsa ba lta bu dkar pos mgul rgyan byas pa /
T02TD3305E:130b-6: stobs kyi rgyu d'ur ba lta bu ljang gus mchod phyir thogs byas pa /
T02TD3305E:130b-7: nor rgyas dkar pos ska rags byas pa /
T02TD3305E:130b-8: padma dkar po kunda'i me tog ltar mdzes pas rkang gdub byas pa /
T02TD3305E:130b-9: dung skyong ser pos lag gdub byas pa /
T02TD3305E:130b-10: rigs ldan du ba lta bu khra bos dpung rgyan byas pa /
T02TD3305E:130b-11: rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab pa /
T02TD3305E:130b-12: rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag dang gis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya mdzad pas rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma la snyoms par 'jug pa /
T02TD3305E:130b-13: phyag g-yas pa dag gis lcags kyu dang zhags pa /
T02TD3305E:130b-14: g-yon pa dag gis thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:130b-15: 'di'i shar phyogs su rdo rje dbyug pa sngon po rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal rnams sngon po dang ser po dang ljang gu /
T02TD3305E:130b-16: phyag g-yas pa dag gi rdo rje tho ba dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gyen du 'phyar ba /
T02TD3305E:130b-17: g-yon pa dag gis thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:130b-18: byang du rdo rje nyi ma ser po dang sngon po dang ljang gu'i zhal can /
T02TD3305E:130b-19: phyag dang pos rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:130b-20: rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan rnams ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i lta bu ste 'chad par 'gyur ba gzhan rnams kyang ngo //
T02TD3305E:130b-21: nub tu rdo rje gtsug tor dmar po dmar po dang dkar po dang ljang gu'i zhal can phyag na padma dmar po'o //
T02TD3305E:130b-22: lhor rdo rje 'khyil pa ljang gu ljang gu dang dkar po dang ser po'i zhal can phyag na sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan ba'o //
T02TD3305E:130b-23: mer rdo rje gnod sbyin du ba'i mdog can du pa'i mdog dang ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal can lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:130b-24: bden bral du rdo rje dus dmar po dmar po dang ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal can phyag na dgra sta'o //
T02TD3305E:131a-0: rlung du nag po chen po sngon po sngon po dang ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal can phyag @131a * //
T02TD3305E:131a-2: dbang ldan du rdo rje 'jigs rung nag po mig yon nag po dang ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal can phyag na ral gri'i //
T02TD3305E:131a-3: rdo rje dbyug pa la sogs pa brgyad po 'di rnams ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin gshin rje mthar byed dang shes rab mthar byed dang padma mthar byed dang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang dbyug sngon can dang stobs po che dang mi g-yo ba rnams kyi ming gzhan no //
T02TD3305E:131a-4: steng du gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dkar po dkar po dang sngon po dang ljang gu'i zhal can phyag na 'khor lo'o //
T02TD3305E:131a-5: 'og tu rdo rje sa 'og ma gnod mdzes kyi ming gi rnam grangs can sngon po sngon po dang ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal can phyag na rol pa dang bcas pa'i rdo rje'i gtun shing ste /
T02TD3305E:131a-6: 'di'i phyag g-yon pa na klu'i zhags pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa dang kha tv'am ga'o //
T02TD3305E:131a-7: rdo rje dbyug pa la sogs pa'i khro bo 'di rnams phyag mtshan gyi gtso bo dang thod pas mtshan pa'i phyag dag gis rang 'od kyi shes rab ma la 'khyud pa /
T02TD3305E:131a-8: dbu skra dmar ser 'bar zhing gyen du 'khyil pa rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag po'i cod pan mdzes par brgyan pa /
T02TD3305E:131a-9: smin ma g-yo ba dang bcas pa'i khro gnyer can /
T02TD3305E:131a-11: zhal re re la dmar zhing zlum pa'i spyan gsum pa /
T02TD3305E:131a-12: mi mgo'i phreng ba dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa dang klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD3305E:131a-13: sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma rnams la gnas pa'i phyogs skyod brgyad dang /
T02TD3305E:131a-14: steng du tshangs pa dang 'og tu thags bzangs ris rnams mnan pa'i g-yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa rang gi rigs kyi bdag pos rgyas btab pa ste /
T02TD3305E:131a-15: 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsibs bcu pa'i 'khor lo ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:131a-16: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni h'um ngo //
T02TD3305E:131a-17: aom kha badzra dhri ka badzra h'um phat ces pa ni snying po'o //
T02TD3305E:131a-18: aom badzra kunda li badzra h'um phat ces pa ni rdo rje 'khyil pa'i sngags te las thams cad pa'o //
T02TD3305E:131a-19: yang na shar la sogs pa'i phyogs dang mtshams dang steng dang 'og tu sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma rnams la g-yas skor gyis gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa'i khro bo bcu ste 'di dag thams cad kyi gnas dang sku mdog la sogs pa ni bsdus pa'i rim pa'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:131b-0: yang na @131b 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsibs bcu pa'i 'khor lo ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:131b-1: yang na dpal kun du kha sbyor gyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:131b-2: phyogs 'di gsum ka la yang aom a'a: bighn'anta krita h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:131b-3: ces pa ni bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags te las thams cad pa'o //
T02TD3305E:131b-5: / bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang ri rab kyi steng du sna tshogs chu skyes kyi ze'u 'bru la sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte bar gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su bcom ldan 'das te g-yas brkyang gi zhabs dag gis sna tshogs padma'i lte ba'i steng du nyi ma la gnas pa'i 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan mnan pa /
T02TD3305E:131b-6: sku mdog nag po shar dang byang la sogs pa'i zhal ni nag po dang ljang gu dang dmar po dang ser po'o //
T02TD3305E:131b-7: zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum pa /
T02TD3305E:131b-8: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can phyag bcu gnyis pa rdo rje dang dril bur bcas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa /
T02TD3305E:131b-9: phyag gnyis kyis rgyab tu glang po che dkar po'i pags pa khrag dang bcas pa brgyangs nas 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:131b-10: de dag las gzhan pa'i phyag g-yas pa rnams kyis da ma ru dang dgra sta dang gri gug dang rtse gsum pa dang /
T02TD3305E:131b-11: g-yon pa rnams kyis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha tv'am ga dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang rdo rje zhags pa dang tshangs pa'i mgo bo 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:131b-12: 'dzag pa'i mi mgo lnga bcu'i phreng ba mgul du 'phyang pa /
T02TD3305E:131b-13: phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa mi'i rgyus pas mchod phyir thogs byas pa dpral ba'i steng du thod pa lnga dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:131b-14: nor bu dang g-yon ngos su gnas pa'i zla ba phyed pa dang sna tshogs rdo rje rnams kyis mnan pa'i ral pa'i thor cog nag po can /
T02TD3305E:131b-15: rnam par 'gyur zhing gdangs pa'i zhal mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02TD3305E:131b-16: gar gyi nyams dgu'i tshogs dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:131b-17: rdo rje phag mo ni dmar mo zhal gcig ma spyan gsum pa skra'i tshogs grol pa gcer bu thod pa'i dum bus rked pa'i rgyan byas pa /
T02TD3305E:131b-18: 'khyud pa'i phyag gis gzung ba'i thod pa khrag gis gang ba 'dzag pa'i rgyun gtso bo'i zhal du stobs pa /
T02TD3305E:131b-19: sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i rdo rje steng du 'phyar bas gdug pa can rnams bsdigs pa /
T02TD3305E:131b-20: khrag dang bral ba'i mi mgo skam po'i phreng ba can /
T02TD3305E:132a-1: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:132a-2: cung zad bzhad pa zla mtshan 'bab pa dang bcas shing ba spu gyen du langs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:132a-3: de nas shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams la g-yon skor gyis dang /
T02TD3305E:132a-4: me la sogs ba'i mtshams rnams la g-yas skor gyis dgod par bya'o//
T02TD3305E:132a-5: de la phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams su mkha' 'gro ma dang l'a ma dang dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma rnams ni nag mo dang ljang gu dang dmar mo dang ser mo'i mdog can zhal gcig ma spyan gsum ma skra grol ba /
T02TD3305E:132a-6: phyag bzhi ma g-yon bdag gis kha tv'am ga dang thod pa dang /
T02TD3305E:132a-7: g-yas pa dag gis da ma ru dang gri gug 'dzin pa g-yas brkyang gis gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:132a-8: mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la byang chub kyi sems dang khrag dang bdud rtsi dang sgron ma lnga rnams grub pa'i dngul chu lta bu'i bdud rtsir gyur pas gang ba'i padma'i snod rnams te /
T02TD3305E:132a-9: yang na bzhi char yang bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'o //
T02TD3305E:132a-10: de nas thugs kyi 'khor lo la rtsibs rnams su shar du thod ba'i dum pu dang rab tu gtu ma mo /
T02TD3305E:132a-11: byang du keng rus chen po dang gtum pa'i mig can ma /
T02TD3305E:132a-12: nub tu keng rus dang 'od ldan ma /
T02TD3305E:132a-13: lhor mche ba rnam par gtsigs ma dang sna chen mo /
T02TD3305E:132a-14: mer chang dgra dang brtan pa'i blo can ma /
T02TD3305E:132a-15: bden bral du 'od dpag med dang mi'u thung ma /
T02TD3305E:132a-16: rlung du rdo rje'i 'od dang langka'i dbang phyug ma /
T02TD3305E:132a-17: dbang ldan du rdo rje'i sku dang shing grib ma'o //
T02TD3305E:132a-18: rim pa de bzhin du gsung gi 'khor lo la myu gu can dang sa srung ma dang /
T02TD3305E:132a-19: rdo rje ral pa can dang 'jigs byed chen mo dang dpa' bo chen mo dang rlung gi shugs can ma dang rdo rje h'um mdzad dang chad 'thung ma dang shin tu bzang mo dang sngo bsangs lha mo dang rdo rje bzang po dang shin tu bzang mo dang 'jigs byed chen po dang rta rna ma dang mig mi bzang dang bya gdong ma'o //
T02TD3305E:132b-0: de bzhin du sku'i dkyil 'khor la stobs po che dang 'khor lo'i shugs can ma dang rin chen rdo rje dang dum skyes ma dang rta mgrin dang chang 'tshong ma dang nam mkha'i snying po dang 'khor lo'i go cha ma dang dpal he ru ka dang shin tu dpa' mo dang padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang stobs chen ma dang rnam par snang mdzad dang 'khor los sgyur ma dang rdo rje sems dpa' dang brtson @132b 'grus chen mo'o //
T02TD3305E:132b-1: de la thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo rnams ni zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa ral pa'i thor gtsugs [*gtsug] can dpral bar gnas shing /
T02TD3305E:132b-2: rdo rje mtshan pa'i dpa' bo'i dar dpyad dang ldan pa phyag bzhis 'khyud pa'i phyag gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:132b-3: g-yon pas kha tv'am ga dang g-yas pas da ma ru 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:132b-4: tshangs pa'i skud pa can dpung rgyan dang ldan pa mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal can phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa g-yas brkyang gis gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:132b-5: rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa drag po'i gzugs can ma /
T02TD3305E:132b-6: skra grol ba gcer bu phyag gnyis ma 'khyud pa'i phyag gis thod pa dang g-yas pas gdug pa can bsdigs par byed pa'i gri gug 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:132b-7: sgo rnams la khva gdong ma dang 'ug gdong ma dang khyi gdong ma dang phag gdong ma la sogs pa rnams ni mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhin te 'di rnams kyi zhal ni ming dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
T02TD3305E:132b-8: mtshams rnams su gshin rje brtan ma dang gshin rje pho nya mo dang gshin rje mche ba mo dang gshin rje 'joms ma rnams ni mi'i zhal can te /
T02TD3305E:132b-9: g-yas dang g-yon gyi sku phyed de g-yas dang g-yon gyi lha mo rnams kyi sku dang 'dra ba'o //
T02TD3305E:132b-10: brgyad po 'di rnams ni ro'i gdan can nyid do //
T02TD3305E:132b-11: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i lha mo thams cad kyang 'dzag pa'i mi mgo'i phreng ba mgul du 'chang ba /
T02TD3305E:132b-12: rdo rje'i phreng bas dpral ba mtshan pa /
T02TD3305E:132b-13: phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa ska rags la sgra dang bcas pa'i g-yer kha la sogs pas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:132b-14: rigs kyi bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mi bskyod pa ste rdo rje phag mo'i rnam par snang mdzad dang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i rin chen dbang phyug go //
T02TD3305E:132b-15: thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo rnams kyi mi bskyod pa dang snang ba mtha' yas dang rtag pa rnams te dam tshig gi 'khor lo la gnas pa rnams kyi ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02TD3305E:132b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni h'um ngo //
T02TD3305E:132b-17: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ram sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:132b-19: aom khanda ro he h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:132b-20: zhes pa ni dum skyes ma'i sngags te las thams cad pa'o //
T02TD3305E:133a-1: lo'i dbang phyug la sogs pa nas gshin rje 'joms ma'i mthar thug pa thams cad zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa'o //
T02TD3305E:133a-2: de la dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa lnga thams cad ni 'khyud pa'i g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD3305E:133a-3: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi dang khva gdong ma la sogs pa rnams ni g-yon pas thod pa dang dpung pa la brten pa'i kha tv'am ga dang /
T02TD3305E:133a-4: g-yas pas da ma ru 'dzin pa ste gzhan thams cad ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:133a-5: yang na 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la sogs pa phyag gnyis pa nyid kyi phyogs la ni dpal bde mchog dang rdo rje phag mo gser gyi mdog can nam yang na sngon po ste /
T02TD3305E:133a-6: bcom ldan 'das ni phyag g-yas pas rdo rje gsor ba mchog tu brtson pa /
T02TD3305E:133a-7: g-yon pas thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'am yang na rdo rje dang dril bu'i phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD3305E:133a-8: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhin ni ser mo g-yas bas da ma ru 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:133a-9: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams ni nag po rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD3305E:133a-10: dpa' mo rnams ni dkar mo phyag g-yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub can no //
T02TD3305E:133a-11: gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams ni dmar po padma dang padma'i dril bu 'dzin ba ste mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni nag mo g-yas pa padma dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub can no //
T02TD3305E:133a-12: sku'i 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams ni dkar po 'khor lo dang 'khor lo'i dril bu 'dzin pa ste lha mo rnams ni dmar mo g-yas pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:133a-13: dpa' bo thams cad yum la 'khyud par brtson zhing g-yas brkyang zhing bzhugs pa ste dpa' mo rnams ni de'i brla gnyis la 'khril ba'i tshul lo //
T02TD3305E:133a-14: khra gdong ma la sogs pa ni g-yas pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i gri gug 'dzin pa ste lha mo thams cad phyag g-yon pas thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:133a-15: gshin rje brtan ma la sogs pa ni g-yas pas da ma ru dang /
T02TD3305E:133a-16: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pas mi mgo 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:133a-17: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams dang khva gdod ma la sogs pa rnams kyi g-yon pa na kha tv'am ga'o //
T02TD3305E:133b-0: bcu gnyis po 'di rnams ni skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas pa ste gzhan rnams ni @133b snga ma bzhin no zhes pa bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum mo //
T02TD3305E:133b-1: gang gi tshe 'di rnams la dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa lnga mi bsgom par rdo rje phag mo dkyil 'khor gyi gtso mor gyur pa de'i tshe rdo rje phag mo'i dkyil 'khor gsum mo //
T02TD3305E:133b-2: rdo rje phag mo'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni bam mo //
T02TD3305E:133b-3: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um h'um phat ces pa ni snying po'o //
T02TD3305E:133b-4: bde mchog phyag gnyis pa la sogs pa'i lha 'di rnams kyi phyag g-yas su gnas pa'i phyag mtshan ni bri bya'i dkyil 'khor la yang bri bar bya'o //
