T02TD3305E:133b-5: bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thod pa lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi snying por gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa la gnas pa'i sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar ro gan rkyal gyi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka sku mdog nag po skyil krung phyed pa can gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pas gar mdzad pa zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa dmar la zlum pa phyag bzhi pa g-yas pa dag gis da ma ru dang gri gug / g-yon pa dag gis thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa mi mgo rlon pa lnga bcu'i do shal mgrin pa la 'phyad ba /
T02TD3305E:133b-6: gnyis 'thung gi pags pa'i sham thabs rgyab na cung zad dpyangs pa /
T02TD3305E:133b-7: sna tshogs rdo rje dang zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa'i ral pa nag po'i thor cog can dpral ba'i mthar thod pa lngas brgyan pa /
T02TD3305E:133b-8: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can no //
T02TD3305E:133b-9: mnga' bdag 'di'i dga' ma ni sna tshogs sde ma /
T02TD3305E:133b-10: na bza' med pa mi mgo'i phreng ba can dbu skra sil bur grol zhing gyen du 'bar ba thod pa lngas dbu la mtshan pa /
T02TD3305E:133b-11: mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa sku mdog dmar mo zhal gcig ma spyan gsum pa phyag g-yon pa bdag po'i mgrin par 'khyud pas khrag gi 'dzag pa'i thod pa yab la stobs pa /
T02TD3305E:133b-12: phyag g-yas pa na gri gug rdeg pa'i tshul can no //
T02TD3305E:133b-13: rtsibs nag po'i steng gi 'dab ma rnams la shar du legs phreng can ma dang /
T02TD3305E:133b-14: byang du thod pa can ma dang nub tu 'jigs ma dang lhor thub dka' ma'o //
T02TD3305E:134a-0: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la g-yas skor gyis khu ba dang rdul dang bdud rtsi dang sgron ma lngas gang ba'i padma'i snod de rim pa dang po @134a * //
T02TD3305E:134a-1: 'di ni rdo rje sngon po'i khor yug can no //
T02TD3305E:134a-2: de nas rim pa gnyis ba'i rtsibs brgyad dmar po la gnas pa'i padma brgyad ni rdo rje'i phreng ba dmar bos bskor ba ste /
T02TD3305E:134a-3: de'i rtsibs rnams la shar du dge ba'i ska rags can ma dang /
T02TD3305E:134a-4: byang du gzugs can ma dang /
T02TD3305E:134a-5: nub tu rnam par rgyal ma dang /
T02TD3305E:134a-7: dbang ldan du dus can ma dang /
T02TD3305E:134a-9: bden bral du phyed ma dang /
T02TD3305E:134a-11: de nas rim pa gsum pa'i rtsibs brgyad dkar po la gnas pa'i padma brgyad ni rdo rje'i phreng ba dkar po'i 'khor yug can te /
T02TD3305E:134a-12: de'i rtsibs rnams la shar du sgrol ma dang byang du 'jigs mthong ma dang /
T02TD3305E:134a-13: nub tu legs mthong ma dang /
T02TD3305E:134a-15: dbang ldan du dge ma dang /
T02TD3305E:134a-17: bden bral du dus mtshan ma dang /
T02TD3305E:134a-19: sgo rnams su shar gyi padma la mdzes ma dang /
T02TD3305E:134a-20: byang gi padma la nor 'dzin ma dang /
T02TD3305E:134a-21: nub kyi padma la skal bzang ma dang /
T02TD3305E:134a-23: 'di rnams thams cad g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag dag gis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:134a-24: so cung zad sto ba zhal gcig ma spyan gsum ma /
T02TD3305E:134a-25: rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan ma /
T02TD3305E:134a-26: mi mgo'i phreng ba dang bral ba /
T02TD3305E:134a-27: dbu skra sil bu dmar ser gyi tshogs gyen du 'bar ba byang sems 'dzag pa /
T02TD3305E:134a-28: nyi ma la skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:134a-29: sgo skyong ma rnams ni g-yas ba skum zhing g-yon brkyang ba ste /
T02TD3305E:134a-30: thams cad stag gi pags pa'i na bza' sku mdog sngon mo'o //
T02TD3305E:134a-31: yang na legs ma la sogs pa bzhi nag mo dang rim pa gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams dkar ser dang rim pa gsum ba la gnas pa rnams ljang gu dang sgo'i lha mo rnams nag mo'o //
T02TD3305E:134a-32: bcom ldan 'das la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lngas rgyas btab pa ste /
T02TD3305E:134a-33: sna tshogs sde ma la rnam par snang mdzad dang legs phreng ma la sogs pa bzhi la rin chen dbang po dang /
T02TD3305E:134a-34: rim pa gnyis par gnas pa rnams la snang ba mtha' yas dang /
T02TD3305E:134a-35: rim pa gsum pa na gnas pa rnams la rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD3305E:134a-36: sgo'i lha mo rnams la don yod grub pa'o //
T02TD3305E:134a-37: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni h'um ngo //
T02TD3305E:134b-0: aom buddhya ka p'a li n'i a'a: hi hi h'um @134b phat /
T02TD3305E:134b-2: las thams cad pa'i sngags kyang 'di nyid kyis bya'o //
T02TD3305E:134b-3: rnal 'byor nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rgya mtsho chen po la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i ri rab kyi spyi bor sna tshogs chu skyes dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi snying por rim pa dbus ma'i lte bar seng ge'i steng du sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor nam mkha' sku mdog nag po rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal gsum nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po /
T02TD3305E:134b-4: zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum pa /
T02TD3305E:134b-5: phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dpral bar gnas pa nor bu dang zla ba phyed pa dang sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ral pa nag po'i thor cog can /
T02TD3305E:134b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga 'phro ba'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:134b-7: stag gi pags ba'i sham thabs rgyab tu cung zad 'phyad ba /
T02TD3305E:134b-8: phyag drug pa rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa'i phyag dag gis ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo 'am nag mo la 'khyud pa /
T02TD3305E:134b-9: g-yas pa dag gis nu ma dang mda'/
T02TD3305E:134b-10: g-yon pa dag gis padma'i snod dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:134b-11: de nas re'u mig rnams la shar du glang po che'i rgyal po la 'gying ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo //
T02TD3305E:134b-12: byang du rma bya la skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa'i mi bzad mkha' 'gro ma ser mo sbrul gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:134b-13: nub tu mkha' lding la tsog pu'i 'dug stangs kyis gnas pa'i ro langs ma dmar mo'o //
T02TD3305E:134b-14: lhor mi'am ci'i gdan la skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa'i gtum mo sngon mo dbu skra dmar po grol zhing spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02TD3305E:134b-15: 'dir ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa lnga ni g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis kha tv'am ga dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:134b-16: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa ni glang po che la sogs pa padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa glang po che'i pags pa'i smad g-yogs dang mi'i pags pa'i stong g-yogs can no //
T02TD3305E:134b-17: dbang ldan du seng ge la 'gying ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa'i seng ge ma dkar ser phyag gnyis ma g-yas pas steng du 'phyar ba'i kha tv'am ga dang /
T02TD3305E:135a-0: g-yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas @135a * //
T02TD3305E:135a-2: mer rdo rje phag la zlum po'i tshul gyis gnas pa'i stag mo dkar nag phyag gnyis ma g-yas pa dang g-yon pas lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:135a-3: bden bral du ma he la skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa'i ce spyang mo ce spyang gi gdong pa can dmar nag phyag gnyis kyis dgra sta dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:135a-4: rlung du ce spyang la tsog pu'i 'dug stangs kyis gnas pa'i 'ug pa mo 'ug pa'i gdong pa can dmar ser phyag gnyis kyis dbyug pa dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:135a-5: 'di rnams ni rang rang gi bzhon pa rnams la padma dang nyi mar gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:135a-6: shar du mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyab tu mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo phyag gnyis kyi rtse mo khar bcug pa'o //
T02TD3305E:135a-7: byang du mi bzad mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyab tu mar me ma ser mo spyi bor mar me lta bu'i thal mo sbyar ba dang /
T02TD3305E:135a-8: nub tu ro langs ma'i rgyab tu 'jigs byed ma dmar mo snyim pa khrag gis bkang nas gsol ba dang /
T02TD3305E:135a-9: lhor gtum mo'i rgyab tu kam po dz'i nag mo phyag dag gis thugs kar gtun shing 'phyar ba ste 'di rnams ni padma dang nyi ma dang rol gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:135a-10: de nas rdo rje phreng ba dang 'od zer gyi 'khor yug gi phyi rol du zlum po'i rim par padma dang zla ba rnams la shar phyogs su pukka s'i dang dra mi di dang gtum mo rnams phyag gnyis kyis bdud rtsi'i snod 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:135a-11: byang du mi bzad ma khrag ma dang sha ma rnams ni sgron ma lngas gang ba'i padma'i snod 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:135a-12: nub tu drag shul ma dang 'bar ma dang mi sdug ma rnams gtor ma'i snod 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:135a-13: lhor thod pa ma dang rdo rje ma dang bum pa can ma rnams btung ba'i snod 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:135a-14: dbang ldan du sgeg mo bsnyems pa'i phyag rgya can dang dri chab ma dri'i snod 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:135a-15: mer pi wang ma pi wang bsgreng ba dang me tog ma me tog 'thor ba'o //
T02TD3305E:135a-16: bden bral du glu ma kha'i thad kar mdzub mo g-yo ba dang bdug spos ma spos dang bcas pa'i spos phor 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:135a-17: rlung du gar ma gar gyi tshul gyis steng du thal mo sbyar ba dang mar me ma mar me dang bcas pa'i mar me'i snod 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:135a-18: ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i lha sum cu rtsa gsum po 'di rnams ni phyag gnyis ma zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa skra grol ba dbu la thod pa'i phreng ba can no //
T02TD3305E:135b-0: @135b mi bzad mkha' 'gro ma ni dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa ste seng ge mo la sogs pa ni gos dmar bo gyon pa'o //
T02TD3305E:135b-1: pukka s'i la sogs pa me'i mtshams kyi lha mo dag ni dkar mo'o //
T02TD3305E:135b-2: mi bzad ma la sogs pa dang dbang ldan gyi lha mo dag ni ser mo'o //
T02TD3305E:135b-3: drag shul ma la sogs pa dang rlung gi mtshams kyi lha mo dag ni dmar mo'o //
T02TD3305E:135b-4: thod pa ma la sogs pa dang bden bral gyi mtshams kyi lha mo dag ni nag mo'o //
T02TD3305E:135b-5: de nas rdo rje phreng ba'i khor yug gi phyi rol gyi rim par sgo rnams dang snam bu rnams la chu skyes dang zla ba'i gdan rnams la shar sgor khyab 'jug nag po dang /
T02TD3305E:135b-6: byang du tshangs pa ser po dang /
T02TD3305E:135b-7: nub tu dbang phyug dkar po dang /
T02TD3305E:135b-8: lhor gdong drug dmar po dang /
T02TD3305E:135b-9: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su dbang po ser po dang /
T02TD3305E:135b-10: mer lus ngan po ser po dang /
T02TD3305E:135b-11: bden bral du gshin rje nag po dang /
T02TD3305E:135b-12: rlung du chu lha dkar po'o //
T02TD3305E:135b-13: lha'i snam bu la shar du keng rus 'jigs dang kha tv'am ga'i srin po dang tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang dril bu'i rnam ba can rnams dkar po'o //
T02TD3305E:135b-14: byang du gtum mo'i dbang phyug dang mdun du sa'i lha dang rim gyi dbang phyug dang bzhi ka ra 'jigs su rung ba rnams ser po'o //
T02TD3305E:135b-15: nub tu drag po'i 'dod pa dang shandi li'i dbang phyug dang da ma ru'i 'dul byed dang sgras 'jigs byed rnams dmar po'o //
T02TD3305E:135b-16: lhor tumbu ra'i dbang phyug dang /
T02TD3305E:135b-17: sth'a ra n'a do dang mche ba gtsigs pa dang gzhu 'dzin rnams nag po'o //
T02TD3305E:135b-18: khyab 'jug la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams ni zhal gcig ba spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi pa g-yas pa dag gis kha tv'am ga dang rtse gsum 'dzin pa g-yon pa dag gis lha mo la 'khyud pa dang thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:135b-19: ral ba nag po'i thor cog can thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dang phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:135b-20: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can no //
T02TD3305E:135b-21: 'di rnams kyi lha mo rnams kyang phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:135b-22: 'dir dpal ldan nam mkha'i rnal 'byor la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lngas rgyas btab pa ste /
T02TD3305E:135b-23: ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la mi bskyod pa 'am rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab pa'o //
T02TD3305E:136a-0: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi dang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi rtag pa dang rin @136a * //
T02TD3305E:136a-1: chen dbang po dang snang ba mtha' yas dang /
T02TD3305E:136a-2: don yod grub pa rnams kyi ste /
T02TD3305E:136a-3: seng ge ma la sogs pa bzhi la mi bskyod pa dang rnam bar snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mtha' yas rnams kyis so //
T02TD3305E:136a-4: tshangs pa la rnam par snang mdzad kyis te dbang phyug chen po la snang ba mtha' yas kyis so //
T02TD3305E:136a-5: lha gzhan dkar po rnams la rnam par snang mdzad dang ser po rnams la rin chen dbang po dang /
T02TD3305E:136a-6: dmar po rnams la tshe dpag med dang nag po rnams la mi bskyod pa nag po'o //
T02TD3305E:136a-7: dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug gi thugs ka'i sa bon ni h'um ngo //
T02TD3305E:136a-8: aom hum ha: sv'a h'a zhes pa ni snying po'o //
T02TD3305E:136a-10: zhes pa ni ro langs ma'i ste las thams cad pa'i sngags so zhes pa rim pa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD3305E:136a-11: snying po'i dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang lta bu la mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi po rnams ni sgo rnams su'o //
T02TD3305E:136a-13: rim pa gnyis pa la yang gzhal yas khang gi gzugs so zhes pa ni gzhan dag gi ste de yang zlum po'i byed pa kha cig go //
T02TD3305E:136a-14: gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi lte bar gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma'i steng du gnas pa'i ma he nag po khros ba rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyab tu sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la g-yas bskum zhing g-yon brkyang ba'i rkang stabs kyis gshin rje mnan nas bzhugs pa'i gshin rje gshed nag po smin ma dang sma ra langs shing dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD3305E:136a-15: rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa sku bong thung zhing gsus pa 'phyang ba /
T02TD3305E:136a-16: yan lag rags pa mi mgo'i phreng ba mgul bar 'phyang ba ljags 'gyur ba mche ba 'bar zhing gtsigs ba rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po phyag drug gi gri gug dang thod par ldan pa'i g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag dag gis rang 'od kyi shes rab ma la 'khyud pa /
T02TD3305E:136a-17: g-yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang ral gri g-yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang padma 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:136a-18: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba bzhin du mtha' yas la sogs pa'i klu rnams kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:136b-0: 'di'i shar du rnam par snang mdzad dkar po rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal gsum dkar po dang nag po dang @136b dmar po //
T02TD3305E:136b-1: phyag g-yas pa dag gis 'khor lo dang ral gri dang /
T02TD3305E:136b-2: g-yon pa dag gis rin po che dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:136b-3: lhor rin chen dbang po gser btso ma'i mdog lta bu ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po'i zhal gsum pa phyag g-yas pa dag gis rin po che dang ral gri /
T02TD3305E:136b-4: g-yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:136b-5: nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dmar po dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po'i zhal gsum pa /
T02TD3305E:136b-6: phyag g-yas pa dag gis padma dang ral gri dang /
T02TD3305E:136b-7: g-yon pa dag gis nor bu dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:136b-8: byang du phrag dog gshin rje gshed ljang gu ljang gu dang nag po dang dkar po'i zhal gsum pa /
T02TD3305E:136b-9: phyag g-yas pa dag gis ral gri dang 'khor lo /
T02TD3305E:136b-10: g-yon pa dag gis nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:136b-11: bzhi char yang 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi mtshan nyid can gyi khro bo /
T02TD3305E:136b-12: g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas rang dang 'dra ba'i yum la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:136b-13: me'i mtshams su rdo rje tsartsi ka sku dang phyag mtshan rnams gti mug gshin rje gshed lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:136b-14: bden bral du rdo rje phag mo phag zhal can ma zhe sdang gshin rje gshed lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:136b-15: dbang ldan du goo r'i phrag dog gshin rje gshed lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:136b-16: 'dir rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtsa ba rnams su te /
T02TD3305E:136b-17: mtshams rnams su ni rdo rje tsartsi ka la sogs pa rang dang 'dra ba'i thabs dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:136b-18: sgo rnams la shar du tho ba gshin rje gshed nag po'o //
T02TD3305E:136b-19: nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can /
T02TD3305E:136b-20: phyag g-yas pa dag gis tho ba dang ral gri dang /
T02TD3305E:136b-21: g-yon pa dag gis nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:136b-22: lhor dbyug pa gshin rje gshed dkar po dkar po dang sngon po dang dmar po'i zhal can phyag g-yas pa dag gis dbyug pa dang ral gri /
T02TD3305E:136b-23: g-yon pa dag gis padma dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:136b-24: nub tu padma gshin rje gshed 'dod chags gshin rje gshed lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:136b-25: byang du ral gri gshin rje gshed phrag dog gshin rje gshed lta bu las cung zad sngo ba'o //
T02TD3305E:136b-26: thams cad kyang khro bo klu rnams kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD3305E:136b-28: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal can /
T02TD3305E:137a-0: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas rang 'od kyi shes rab ma la @137a * //
T02TD3305E:137a-2: 'dir rnam par snang mdzad dang lha mo rnams ni sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i gdan la ste /
T02TD3305E:137a-3: lha gzhan rnams ni sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:137a-4: dkyil 'khor gyi me la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhir sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i thod pa bzhi ni /
T02TD3305E:137a-5: khu ba dang rdul dang bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lngas gang ba'o //
T02TD3305E:137a-6: rigs kyi bdag po ni gshin rje gshed nag po'i spyi bor rang nyid de /
T02TD3305E:137a-7: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bzhi'i yang de bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:137a-8: de rnams ni go rims ji lta bar spyan ma la sogs pa bzhi dang tho ba gshin rje gshed la sogs pa rnams kyi yang ngo //
T02TD3305E:137a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni ya'o //
T02TD3305E:137a-10: aom hri: shti:bi kri t'a nan h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:137a-11: zhes pa ni snying po ste las thams cad pa'i sngags kyang 'di'o //
T02TD3305E:137a-12: rdo rje sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi snying por gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar zla ba la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sgrol ma gser gyi mdog lta bu sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can /
T02TD3305E:137a-13: rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang rgyab dang g-yon pa'i zhal bzhi gser gyi mdog dang /
T02TD3305E:137a-14: dkar po dang sngon po dang dmar po'o //
T02TD3305E:137a-15: phyag brgyad ma g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang zhags pa dang mda' dang dung rnams 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:137a-16: g-yon pa rnams ni autpala ser po dang gzhu dang lcags kyu dang sdigs mdzub can no //
T02TD3305E:137a-17: shar gyi 'dab ma la me tog sgrol ma dkar mo phyag dag gis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:137a-18: lhor bdug sbos sgrol ma nag mo phyag dag gis bdug sbos kyi snod 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:137a-19: nub tu mar me sgrol ma ser mo phyag gnyis kyis mar me'i kong bu 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:137a-20: byang du dri chab sgrol ma dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis dri chab kyi dung chos 'dzin pa ste lha mo bzhi po 'di rnams kyang zla ba la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:137a-21: me la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bo de dag lta bu'i 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang padma dang ral gri'o //
T02TD3305E:137a-22: rim pa gnyis pa la sgo rnams su shar du rdo rje lcags kyu ma dkar mo phyag g-yas pas lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:137a-23: lhor rdo rje zhags pa ma ser mo phyag g-yas pas zhags pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:137b-0: nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dmar mo phyag g-yas bas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog @137b 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:137b-1: byang du rdo rje dril bu ma ljang gu phyag g-yas pas rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:137b-2: me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su gnas pa'i sna tshogs padma rnams la /
T02TD3305E:137b-3: spyan ma la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi bum pa dang /
T02TD3305E:137b-4: ri rab dang me thab dang rgyal mtshan chen po'o //
T02TD3305E:137b-5: steng du gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma dkar mo phyag g-yas pas 'khor lo 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD3305E:137b-6: 'og tu gnod mdzes ma sngon mo klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:137b-7: lha mo bcu drug po 'di rnams ni phyag g-yon pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa ste sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:137b-8: bcu po 'di rnams kyang zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis ma'o //
T02TD3305E:137b-9: bcu gcig po rnams kyang rdo rje skyil krung can gser gyi rna cha g-yo ba /
T02TD3305E:137b-10: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po ches brgyan pa /
T02TD3305E:137b-12: rigs kyi bdag po ni rdo rje sgrol ma'i rin chen dbang po'o //
T02TD3305E:137b-13: me tog sgrol ma la sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa dang snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa rnams te rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yang ngo //
T02TD3305E:137b-14: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i rin chen dbang po ste /
T02TD3305E:137b-15: gnod mdzes ma'i mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD3305E:137b-16: bcom ldan 'das ma'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni t'am ngo //
T02TD3305E:137b-17: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:137b-18: zhes pa ni snying po ste las thams cad pa'i sngags kyang 'di'o //
T02TD3305E:137b-19: 'od zer can gyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du gnas pa'i chos 'byung gi nang du gzhal yas khang ste /
T02TD3305E:137b-20: kha cig ni chos 'byung med par ri rab kyi steng du gzhal yas khang ngo zhes pa'o //
T02TD3305E:137b-21: gzhal yas khang gi lte bar mchod rten gyi phug gi snying por sna tshogs chu skyes la gnas pa'i zla ba'am nyi ma la g-yas bskum zhing g-yon brkyang bas gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma 'od zer can ser mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi cod pan can /
T02TD3305E:137b-22: dbu'i rtser mchod rten gyis brgyan pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:137b-23: zhal gsum ma rtsa ba'i zhal ser po g-yas zhal dkar bo /
T02TD3305E:137b-24: g-yon zhal nag po phag pa'i gdong can khros pa khro gnyer dang zur mig tu ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:137b-25: ljags 'dril ba'i 'jigs su rung ba phyag drug ma g-yas pa rnams kyis mda' dang rdo rje dang khab 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:138a-0: g-yon pa rnams kyis gzhu dang skud pa dang mya ngan med pa'i shing gi yal ga me @138a * //
T02TD3305E:138a-2: smad g-yogs sngon po gyon pa rnam bar bkra ba'i stod g-yogs sngon po can /
T02TD3305E:138a-3: ser po'i mdog can gyi phag pa la gnas shing de'i mdog can gyi phag pas yongs su bskor ba /
T02TD3305E:138a-4: mya ngan med pa'i me tog gi phreng bas dbu la brgyan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:138a-5: shar phyogs su aarka ma s'i me tog bandu ka'i mdog can g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag gis khab dang skud pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:138a-6: lhor ma rka ma s'i ser mo gser gyi mdog can g-yas pas skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab dang g-yon pas mya ngan med pa'i yal ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:138a-7: nub tu aandhra dha ma s'i ser mo g-yas pas mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang g-yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:138a-8: byang du te dzo ma s'i dmar mo'i mdog can g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag gis mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:138a-9: me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su au da ya ma s'i dang gul mam s'i dang pa nam s'i dang tsi bar ma s'i rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du aa rka ma s'i la sogs pa'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan no //
T02TD3305E:138a-10: rim pa phyi ma'i snam bu rnams la shar du ma h'a tsi ba ram si dang ba r'a h'a mu khi mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs su rung ba g-yas pas rdo rje lcags kyu dang g-yon pas rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:138a-11: lhor pa ta kra ma s'i dang bar li ser mo g-yas pas mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang g-yon pas rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:138a-12: nub tu pa ra kram s'i dang ba da le dmar mo g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:138a-13: byang du a'urma ma s'i dang ba ra li ljang gu g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag dag gis khab dang skud pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:138a-14: me'i mtshams su batt'a li dmar po'i mdog can g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag dag gis khab dang skud pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:138a-15: bden bral du ba d'a li ser mo g-yas pas skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab dang g-yon pas yal ga dang bcas pa'i mya ngan med pa'i me tog gi chun po 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:138a-16: rlung du ba r'a li dkar mo g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:138a-17: dbang ldan du ba r'a h'a mu khi dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:138a-18: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su a'a lo dang /
T02TD3305E:138a-21: sad pa lo samba m'urdha ti rnams ni rim pa ji lta bzhin du /
T02TD3305E:138b-1: ljang gu ste phyag gnyis ma rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
T02TD3305E:138b-2: zhags pa dang lcags sgrog dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:138b-3: aarka ma s'i la sogs pa'i lha mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams mngon par gsar du byung ba'i lang tsho can spyi bor mchod rten gyis brgyan pa /
T02TD3305E:138b-4: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa rnam par bkra ba'i gos sngon pos stod g-yogs byas pa /
T02TD3305E:138b-5: phag zhal gcig ma spyan gsum ma phyag gnyis ma gser gyi mdog can gyi phag pa la gnas shing /
T02TD3305E:138b-6: gser gyi mdog can gyi phag pas yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02TD3305E:138b-7: sgo skyong ma rnams ni sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la g-yas brkyang gis gnas pa ste gzhan nyi shu rtsa bzhi po sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la g-yon brkyang gis gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:138b-8: rigs kyi bdag po ni 'od zer can ma'i rtag pa'o //
T02TD3305E:138b-9: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs la bskor ba rnams kyi mi bskyod pa dang rin chen dbang po dang snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa rnams te me la sogs pa'i mtshams la bskor ba rnams kyi 'dod bzhin no zhes pa ni kha cig go //
T02TD3305E:138b-10: yang na dkar mo rnams kyi rnam par snang mdzad dang nag mo rnams kyi mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD3305E:138b-11: ser mo rnams kyi rin chen 'byung ldan dang /
T02TD3305E:138b-12: ljang gu rnams kyi don yod grub pa'o zhes pa ni gzhan no //
T02TD3305E:138b-13: 'od zer can gyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni mam mo//
T02TD3305E:138b-14: aom m'a r'i tsyee sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:138b-16: aom m'a r'i tsyee h'um sarbba bighn'a na audb'a da ya h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:138b-17: ces pa las thams cad pa'i sngags so /
T02TD3305E:138b-19: // / bsrung ba lnga'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du ri rab kyi steng gi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ma chen mo 'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can /
T02TD3305E:138b-20: zhal bzhi ma rtsa ba'i zhal ser mo g-yas dkar ba rgyab sngo ba /
T02TD3305E:138b-21: g-yen dmar ba phyag bcu gnyis ma g-yas pa rnams kyis rin po che'i gdugs dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang mda' dang ral gri dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD3305E:138b-22: g-yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang zhags pa dang rtsa gsum dang gzhu dang dgra sta dang dung rnams 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:138b-23: dbu la mchod rten gyis brgyan pa rdo rje'i skyil krung can ma'o //
T02TD3305E:138b-24: de'i shar phyogs su sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma rol pa'i kun du bskyod pas bzhugs pa /
T02TD3305E:139a-0: sku mdog dkar mo zla ba'i @139a * //
T02TD3305E:139a-1: dkyil 'khor gyi 'od can zhal bzhi ma rtsa ba'i zhal dkar mo g-yas sngo ba rgyab ser ba g-yon ljang gu phyag bcu ma g-yas pa rnams kyis padma la gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dang mchog sbyin dang lcags kyu dang mda' dang ral gri dang g-yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa dang gzhu dang dgra sta rnams 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:139a-2: lhor sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma chen mo rdo rje'i skyil krung can ma nag mo nyi ma'i 'od can rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal rnams nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po phyag bcu gnyis ma g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya mdzad pa /
T02TD3305E:139a-3: gzhan pa gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa g-yas pa'i phyag rnams kyis rdo rje dang mda' dang mchog sbyin dang mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya dang g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang gzhu dang rin po che'i gdugs dang padma la gnas pa'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:139a-4: nub tu sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la bsil ba'i tshal chen mo skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa dmar mo nyi ma'i 'od can rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal rnams dmar po dang dkar po dang nag po phyag brgyad ma g-yas pa rnams kyis padma dang bcas pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya dang mda' dang rdo rje dang ral gri dang /
T02TD3305E:139a-5: g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang gzhu dang rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang thugs kar po ti 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:139a-6: byang du sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la rma bya chen mo sems dpa'i skyil krung can ljang gu zla ba'i 'od can rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal rnams ljang gu dang nag po dang dkar po phyag brgyad ma g-yas pa rnams kyis rma bya'i mjug sgro dang mda' dang mchog sbyin dang ral gri /
T02TD3305E:139a-7: g-yon pa rnams kyis lhung bzed la gnas pa'i dge slong dang gzhu dang pang du gnas pa'i bum pa rin po che 'bar ba 'bab pa can dang sna tshogs rdo rjes sbras pa'i rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:139a-8: rim pa gnyis pa la me'i mtshams su dus ma nag mo phyag dag gis dung 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:139a-9: bden bral du dus mtshan ma ser mo phyag dag gis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:139a-10: rlung du dus kyi rnab mo dmar mo phyag dag gis dgra sta 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:139b-0: dbang ldan du dkar mo sku @139b mdog dkar mo phyag dag gis rtse gsum 'dzin pa ste bzhi po 'di dag ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma'o //
T02TD3305E:139b-1: dgu po 'di rnams ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang lha'i gos dang rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02TD3305E:139b-2: zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rin chen dbang po dang rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa dang snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa dang mi bskyod pa dang rin chen dbang po dang snang ba mtha' yas dang rnam par snang mdzad rnams kyis rgyas btab pa'o //
T02TD3305E:139b-3: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang rdo rje zhags pa ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang rdo rje 'bebs ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:139b-4: so sor 'brang ma chen mo la sogs pa rnams kyi sa bon ni pram dang /
T02TD3305E:139b-5: aom ma ni dha ri badzr'i ni ma h'a pra ti sa re h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a zhes pa ni snying po dang /
T02TD3305E:139b-7: aom a'a: ma h'a s'a ha sra pra marda n'i h'um h'um ni snying po dang /
T02TD3305E:139b-9: aom a'a:ma h'a mantra aa nu s'a ri ni h'um h'um ni snying po dang /
T02TD3305E:139b-11: aom a'a:ma h'a sh'i ta ba ti dz'im h'um h'um ni snying po dang /
T02TD3305E:139b-13: aom a'a:ma h'a ma y'u r'a bi dy'e r'a dznyi h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:139b-15: dgos pa'i dbang gis 'di rnams gang yang rung bas 'khor lo'i dbang phyug ma bya ste /
T02TD3305E:139b-16: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug ma'i snying po'i sngags ni las thams cad pa'o //
T02TD3305E:139b-17: rdo rje dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du gling rnams dang nye ba'i gling rnams rgya mtsho bdun la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i ri rab kyi steng du gzhal yas khang ste /
T02TD3305E:139b-18: de'i dbus su seng ge'i steng du sna tshogs padma'i lte ba la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dkar po rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD3305E:139b-20: sangs rgyas lngas spras pa'i rin po che'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa'i ral pa'i thor cog dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:139b-21: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang /
T02TD3305E:139b-23: dkar po dang ser po dang /
T02TD3305E:139b-26: phyag brgyad pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:139b-27: gzhan pa dag gis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:139b-28: g-yas pa dag gis bgrang phreng dang mda' 'dzin pa g-yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:140a-1: na 'di ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dang bcas pa'i byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD3305E:140a-2: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo bslang ba g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung ba ni byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD3305E:140a-3: 'dab ma rnams la mdun du sems ma rdo rje ma sngon mo g-yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po dang g-yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:140a-4: g-yas su rin chen rdo rje ma ser mo g-yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i rtse mor rin po ches mtshan pa 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:140a-5: g-yon pas sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o //
T02TD3305E:140a-6: rgyab tu chos kyi rdo rje ma dmar mo g-yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i padma 'dab brgyad dkar dmar dang g-yon pas padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:140a-7: g-yon du las kyi rdo rje ma ljang gu g-yas pas de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i mdog can sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa 'dzin zhing g-yon pas sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o //
T02TD3305E:140a-8: de nas shar phyogs su glang po che'i dbang po'i steng du sna tshogs padma'i lte ba la mi bskyod pa sngon po rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD3305E:140a-9: phyag g-yas ba'i sor mo gung mos rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po bzung nas sa gnon gyi tshul mdzad cing /
T02TD3305E:140a-10: phyag g-yon pa gan rkyang pang du bzhag pa'o //
T02TD3305E:140a-11: 'dab ma rnams la mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po phyag g-yas pa'i ser mo gung mos thugs kar gtod pa'i tshul du rdo rje 'dzin pa g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bsnyems pa dang bcas pa'i dril bu dkur brten nas 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:140a-12: g-yas su rdo rje rgyal po ser po phyag g-yas par gnas pa'i rdo rje lcags kyus 'gugs pa'i tshul mdzad cing g-yon pas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:140a-13: kha cig ni phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pas spyan 'dren pa'i tshul byed pa'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD3305E:140a-14: g-yon du rdo rje chags pa dmar po g-yon pa dang cig shos dag gis gzhu dang mda' 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:140a-15: rgyab tu rdo rje legs pa mar ka ta'i mdog lta bu rdo rje dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis thugs kar legs so sbyin pa'i tshul mdzad pa'o //
T02TD3305E:140a-16: lhor rta'i steng du sna tshogs padma'i lte bar rin chen 'byung ldan ser bo rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD3305E:140a-17: g-yas pa rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rin po che sor mo gung mos bzung nas mchog sbyin gyi tshul mdzad cing /
T02TD3305E:140a-18: g-yon pa gan rkyal du pang par bzhag pa'o //
T02TD3305E:140b-0: 'dab ma rnams la mdun du rdo rje @140b rin chen ser po g-yas pas rdo rje dang bcas pa'i khu tshur gyis mtha' gnyis su rdo rje gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'ching bar mdzad cing /
T02TD3305E:140b-1: g-yon pa rdo rje dril bu bsnyems pa dang bcas pas 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:140b-2: g-yas su rdo rje gzi brjid dmar po phyag gnyis kyis nyi ma thugs kar 'dzin pa'i 'od kyis gsal bar mdzad ba'o //
T02TD3305E:140b-3: g-yon du rdo rje rgyal mtshan ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin zhing g-yon gyi dpung pa'i gnas su 'phyang ba'o //
T02TD3305E:140b-4: rgyab tu rdo rje bzhad pa dkar po g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag dag gis so'i phreng ba rdo rje gnyis dang ldan pa bzung nas zhal gyi thad kar 'jog pa'o //
T02TD3305E:140b-5: nub tu rma bya'i steng du sna tshogs padma'i lte ba la snang ba mtha' yas dmar po rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD3305E:140b-6: phyag g-yon dang g-yas pa gan rkyal du pang ba'i thad du bzhag nas ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya mdzad de g-yas ba'i sor mo gung mos rdo rjes mtshan pa'i sor mo 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:140b-7: 'dab ma rnams la mdun du rdo rje chos dkar dmar g-yon pas bsnyems pa dang bcas pas padma'i yu ba 'dzin zhing g-yas pas kha 'byed pa'o //
T02TD3305E:140b-8: g-yas su rdo rje rnon po nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs g-yon pas thugs kar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam dang /
T02TD3305E:140b-9: g-yas pas ral gri 'phar thabs su 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:140b-10: g-yon du rdo rje rgyu gser gyi mdog can phyag g-yon par gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa phyag g-yas pa'i sor mo gung mos 'gal me'i 'khor lo ltar bskor zhing chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:140b-11: rgyab tu rdo rje smra ba dmar po g-yon pas chos kyi dung dang g-yas pas rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu'i lce 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:140b-12: byang du nam mkha' lding gi steng du sna tshogs padma'i lte ba la don yod grub pa ljang gu rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD3305E:140b-13: phyag g-yas pa'i sor mo gung mos sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul mdzad cing /
T02TD3305E:140b-14: g-yon pa gan rkyal du pang par bzhag pa'o //
T02TD3305E:140b-15: 'dab ma rnams la mdun du rdo rje las ljang gu g-yas pas bslang ba'i sbyor bas sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa thugs kar gtod pa'i tshul du 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:140b-16: g-yon sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu dkur brten pa ste /
T02TD3305E:141a-0: yang na phyag gnyis kyi thal mo @141a * //
T02TD3305E:141a-1: spyi bor sbyar nas sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:141a-2: g-yas su rdo rje srung ba ser po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje'i go cha 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:141a-3: g-yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin nag po phyag dag gis mthe'u chung gnyis rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon gyi rtse mo can rang gi zhal gyi grvar 'dzin pas gdug pa can rnams bsdigs par byed pa'o //
T02TD3305E:141a-4: rgyab tu rdo rje khu tshur ser po khu tshur gyi mtshams su rdo rje ste rdo rje khu tshur dag gis 'tshir ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bzung ba'o //
T02TD3305E:141a-5: dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi me'i padma la rdo rje sgeg mo dkar mo rdo rje dkur brten pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i phyag gis rdo rje gnyis 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:141a-6: bden bral gyi padma la phreng ba ma ser mo phyag dag gis rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:141a-7: rlung gi padma la glu ma dmar mo phyag dag gis pi wang sgrogs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:141a-8: dbang ldan gyi padma la gar ma ljang gu rdo rje rtse gsum pa bzung ba'i phyag dag gis gar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD3305E:141a-9: dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol gyi snam bu'i shar gyi padma rnams la byams pa dang mthong ba don yod dang ngan song kun 'dren dang mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros rnams ni mi bskyod pa lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:141a-10: lho'i padma rnams la spos kyi glang po dang dpa' bar 'gro ba dang nam mkha'i mdzod dang ye shes tog rnams ni rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:141a-11: nub kyi padma rnams la 'od dpag med dang zla ba'i 'od dang bzang skyong dang /
T02TD3305E:141a-12: dra ba can gyi 'od rnams ni snang ba mtha' yas lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:141a-13: byang gi padma rnams la rdo rje snying po dang blo gros mi zad pa dang spobs pa brtsegs pa dang kun du bzang po rnams ni don yod grub pa lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:141a-14: yang na shar la sogs pa'i snam bu rnams la byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' stong du bzhi yis ma tshang ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:141a-15: de dag gi mtshan rnams ni rnam par rgyas pas 'jigs nas ma bshad de /
T02TD3305E:141a-16: gal te 'dod na bdag gis byas pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa rnal 'byor snying po'i phreng ba las rtogs par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:141a-17: me'i mtshams kyi padma la rdo rje bdug spos ma dkar mo dang /
T02TD3305E:141a-18: bden bral gyi padma la rdo rje me tog ma ser mo dang /
T02TD3305E:141a-19: rlung gi padma la rdo rje mar me ma dkar dmar dang /
T02TD3305E:141a-20: dbang ldan gyi padma la rdo rje dri chab ma ljang gu ste /
T02TD3305E:141b-0: bdug spos @141b ma la sogs pa 'di rnams sngar dang 'dra ba'i phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:141b-1: shar la sogs pa'i sgo'i padma rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
T02TD3305E:141b-2: rdo rje zhags pa dang rdo rje lcags sgrog dang /
T02TD3305E:141b-3: rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams ni rim pa bzhin du dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu ste sngar dang 'dra ba'i phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:141b-4: 'dir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings las gzhan pa'i lha thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po ches brgyan pa /
T02TD3305E:141b-5: rin po che'i cod pan can no //
T02TD3305E:141b-6: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ma gtogs pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs pa ste /
T02TD3305E:141b-7: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug ni rang rang gi bdag po'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon du phyogs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:141b-8: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i lha thams cad ni ji skad bshad pa'i lte ba dang 'dab ma rnams la zla ba la gnas shing nyi ma'i 'od zer can no ;
T02TD3305E:141b-9: / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga las gzhan pa'i lha bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad ni sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:141b-10: 'dir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings rnam par snang ba shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid la rang dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje sems dpas rgyas gdab po //
T02TD3305E:141b-11: me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i bdag nyid mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i rigs kyi bdag po ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD3305E:141b-12: sems ma rdo rje ma dang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bzhi dang sgeg mo dang bdug spos ma dang /
T02TD3305E:141b-13: byams pa la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02TD3305E:141b-14: rdo rje lcags kyu rnams kyi mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD3305E:141b-15: rin chen rdo rje ma dang rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02TD3305E:141b-16: phreng ba ma dang me tog ma dang spos kyi glang po la sogs pa bzhi dang rdo rje zhags pa rnams kyi rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02TD3305E:141b-17: chos kyi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje chos rab la sogs pa bzhi dang glu ma dang mar me ma dang 'od dpag med la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02TD3305E:141b-18: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma rnams kyi snang ba mtha' yas so //
T02TD3305E:141b-19: las kyi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje las rab la sogs pa bzhi dang gar ma dang dri chab ma dang rdo rje snying po la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02TD3305E:141b-20: rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams kyi don yod grub pa'o //
T02TD3305E:142a-0: 'dir nang gi gzhal yas khang gi sgo rnams @142a * //
T02TD3305E:142a-1: la rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bsgom par bya'o zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan no //
T02TD3305E:142a-2: rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni aa'o //
T02TD3305E:142a-3: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a yo g'i shva ra h'um zhes pa ni snying po'o //
T02TD3305E:142a-4: aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi ste las thams cad pa'i sngags so //
T02TD3305E:142a-5: gang yang rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa'i rgyud rnams su rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang lha'i rnam pa'i khyad par gsungs pa de dag ni mngas pas 'jigs pas ma bshad do //
T02TD3305E:142a-6: bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid can 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje'i gur la sogs pa nas gzhal yas khang gi bar du dang por bshad pa'i 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:142a-7: 'on kyang 'dir khro bo rnams ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can no zhes pa ni phyogs gcig ste /
T02TD3305E:142a-8: rdo rje gur gyi nang ri rab kyi steng du sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte ba la gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang ngo zhes pa ni gnyis pa'o //
T02TD3305E:142a-9: phyogs gnyis ka la yang mchod rten dkar po'i nang du gzhal yas khang ngo //
T02TD3305E:142a-10: de'i lte bar seng ge'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni sku mdog gser ba tsom lta bu sdug cing yid du 'ong ba me tog sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa'i zur phud gsum gyis rnam par brgyan pa /
T02TD3305E:142a-11: rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal rnams ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po phyag drug pa g-yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang mchog sbyin dang mda' g-yon pa rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang /
T02TD3305E:142a-12: autpala sngon po dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:142a-13: rang dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:142a-14: de'i shar gyi re'u mig la glang po che'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la mi bskyod pa sngon po 'gying ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa /
T02TD3305E:142a-15: rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal rnams sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar po phyag brgyad pa g-yas pa'i sor mo gung mos rdo rje thugs kar gyen du bsgreng ba /
T02TD3305E:142a-16: g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje dril bu dkur brten pa /
T02TD3305E:142a-17: gzhan g-yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang lcags kyu dang mda' dang /
T02TD3305E:142a-18: g-yon pa rnams kyis nu ma dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:142b-0: lhor rta'i @142b steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma rin chen 'byung ldan ser po sems dpa'i skyil krung can /
T02TD3305E:142b-1: rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal rnams ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po phyag drug pa rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya mdzad pa /
T02TD3305E:142b-2: g-yas bdag gis rin po che dang ral gri g-yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:142b-3: nub tu rma bya'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la snang ba mtha' yas dkar po sems dpa'i skyil krung can /
T02TD3305E:142b-4: rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal rnams dkar po dang sngon po dang dmar po phyag drug pa g-yon pas sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i padma'i yu ba thugs kar bzung ste g-yas pas kha 'byed pa /
T02TD3305E:142b-5: g-yas pa dag gis bgrang phreng dang rdo rje 'dzin cing /
T02TD3305E:142b-6: g-yon pa dag gis nu ma dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:142b-7: byang du nam mkha' lding gi steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la don yod grub pa dmar po sems dpa'i skyil krung can /
T02TD3305E:142b-8: rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal rnams dmar po dang sngon po dang dkar po phyag drug pa dang pho gnyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya bcings pa /
T02TD3305E:142b-9: g-yas pa dag gis ral gri dang rdo rje g-yon pa dag gis nu ma dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:142b-10: dbang ldan du spyan ma ser mo sems dpa'i skyil krung can /
T02TD3305E:142b-11: phyag brgyad ma g-yas pa rnams kyis mchog sbyin dang mi 'jigs pa dang 'khor lo dang mda' g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang rin po che'i snye ma dang bgrang phreng dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:142b-12: mer m'a ma k'i sngon mo khro ba dang bcas pas rgod pa sems dpa'i skyil krung can /
T02TD3305E:142b-13: phyag drug ma g-yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mda' g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:142b-14: bden bral du gos dkar po 'gying ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa phyag drug ma /
T02TD3305E:142b-15: g-yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mda'/
T02TD3305E:142b-16: g-yon pa rnams kyis padma dang bgrang phreng dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:142b-17: rlung du sgrol ma ma ra ka ta lta bu sems dpa'i skyil krung can phyag drug ma /
T02TD3305E:142b-18: g-yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mda' g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang autpala dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:143a-0: rim pa gnyis par shar la sogs pa'i @143a * //
T02TD3305E:143a-1: phyogs rnams su sems ma rdo rje ma dang rin chen rdo rje ma dang chos kyi rdo rje ma dang las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang mtshon cha rnams ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:143a-2: 'on kyang nu ma 'dzin pa med par sems ma rdo rje ma dang rin chen rdo rje ma dang las kyi rdo rje ma rnams ni sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa ste chos kyi rdo rje ma ni zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:143a-3: dbang ldan du tsunda ma zla ba'i mdog can phyag nyi shu rtsa drug ma rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis thugs kar rtsa ba'i phyag rgya dang g-yon pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang ral gri dang rin po che'i phreng ba dang p'i dza p'u ra dang mda' dang dgra sta dang dbyug to dang tho ba dang lcags kyu dang rdo rje dang bden gsum gyi tshul dang bgrang phreng rnams dang /
T02TD3305E:143a-4: g-yon pa rnams kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang padma dang spyi blugs dang zhags pa dang gzhu dang shakta dang 'khor lo dang ral gri dang sdigs mdzub dang bum pa bzang po dang mtshon rtse gcig pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:143a-5: kanytsu ka'i stod g-yogs bcings pa bla gos phrag pa la gzar ba /
T02TD3305E:143a-6: gar gyi nyams dgu'i rang bzhin can rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po g-yas pa'i zhal sngon po ljags 'dril zhing mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa g-yon pa ser po ma mchu mnan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:143a-7: thal mo yang dag par sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i tshigs bar pa la zlum po'i rnam par bzhag cing mthe bong dag mdzub mo'i logs kyi rtsa bar 'dzin pa ni 'di'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD3305E:143a-8: mer rin chen skar mda' ma ser mo phyag drug ma dang po gnyis kyis thugs kar rin po che kha sbyor 'dzin pa g-yas pa dag gis mi 'jigs pa dang mda' dang /
T02TD3305E:143a-9: g-yon pa rnams sdigs 'dzub [*mdzub?] dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:143a-10: bden bral du khro gnyer can ma dkar mo phyag bcu drug ma g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang mda'/
T02TD3305E:143a-11: g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang spyi blugs dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:143a-12: rlung du rdo rje lcags sgrog ma ljang gu phyag drug ma g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang rdo rje lcags sgrog dang mda' dang g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:143b-0: spyan ma la sogs pa lha mo bcu gnyis po 'di rnams ni rol pa'i kun du bskyod pa dang ldan pas zla ba'i @143b gdan la bzhugs shing 'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag po bzhin du zhal gsum pa'o //
T02TD3305E:143b-1: rim pa gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu rnams la shar du byams pa gser gyi mdog can phyag dang po gnyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad cing /
T02TD3305E:143b-2: g-yas pa mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD3305E:143b-3: g-yon pas me tog dang bcas pa'i klu shing gi yal ga 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:143b-4: 'jam dpal dmar po'i gzugs can khyad par du shes rab ma dang bral ba dang /
T02TD3305E:143b-5: spos kyi glang po ljang gu g-yon pas bum par gnas pa'i glang po che'i sna 'dzin zhing g-yas pa mchog sbyin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:143b-6: ye shes tog ser po g-yon pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:143b-7: g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa bya'o //
T02TD3305E:143b-8: lhor bzang skyong sku mdog dmar po g-yon pas rin po che 'dzin zhing g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:143b-9: blo gros rgya mtsho dkar po phyag gnyis kyis ser mo thams cad brkyang bas chu rlabs kyi tshul mdzad pa pa dang /
T02TD3305E:143b-10: blo gros mi zad pa gser gyi mdog can g-yon pa'i khu tshur thugs kar bzhag ste g-yas mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya can dang /
T02TD3305E:143b-11: spobs pa brtsegs pa ljang gu g-yon pa'i khu tshur pang du bzhag cing g-yas pas se gol gtogs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:143b-12: nub tu mthu chen thob pa dkar po g-yon par cung zad kha bye ba'i padma dkar po 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:143b-13: g-yon pas mchog sbyin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:143b-14: ngan song kun 'dren dkar po phyag gnyis kyis sdig pa 'dor ba'i tshul can dang /
T02TD3305E:143b-15: mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros ser po phyag gnyis kyis kha sbyar brdeg pa'i tshul can dang /
T02TD3305E:143b-16: dra ba can gyi 'od dmar po g-yon pas autpala la la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin zhing g-yas mchog sbyin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:143b-17: byang du zla 'od dkar po g-yon pas autpalar gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin zhing g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:143b-18: 'od dpag med dmar po phyag gnyis kyis dbang bskur ba'i bum pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:143b-19: nam mkha'i mdzod ser po g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur dkur brten zhing /
T02TD3305E:143b-20: g-yas pa nam mkha' la bskor ba dang /
T02TD3305E:143b-21: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sngon po'am dkar po g-yon pas la reg cing g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mo dang mthe bong sbyar te dri ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:144a-1: sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams ni zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od can /
T02TD3305E:144a-2: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD3305E:144a-3: spyan gsum pa rang phyogs kyi bdag po dang 'dra bar zhal gsum pa /
T02TD3305E:144a-4: phyag drug gi gnyis kyis mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD3305E:144a-5: gnyis kyis gzhu dang mda' 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:144a-6: byams pa dang 'jam dpal gnyis ni mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya med pa'o //
T02TD3305E:144a-7: 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po che'i rgyan can /
T02TD3305E:144a-8: zhal 'dzum bag dang bcas shing sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:144a-9: shar sgor ma he'i steng du gshin rje mthar byed nag po phyag drug pa g-yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang rdo rje dang mda' 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:144a-10: g-yon pas zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub gyen du bsgreng bas bsdigs par byed pa /
T02TD3305E:144a-11: gnyis pas 'khyud par byed pa'i lha mo'i nu ma nas 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD3305E:144a-12: de yang phyag gnyis ma dkar mo phyag g-yon pas 'dam skyes 'dzin zhing g-yas pas kun nas 'khyud par brtson pa'o //
T02TD3305E:144a-13: g-yon pa'i gsum pas dngul gyi gzhu 'dzin pa mar ka ta ltar ljang ba'i lha mo phyag gnyis ma g-yas pa autpala la sngon po 'dzin zhing phyag g-yon pa mgul pa la 'khyud pas g-yas phyogs nas rnam par mdzes pa zhabs drug pa /
T02TD3305E:144a-15: zhal drug ni sngon po rtsa ba'i zhal gad rgyangs dang bcas pa /
T02TD3305E:144a-16: gnyis pa 'jigs par byed pa gsum pa gdangs pa /
T02TD3305E:144a-17: bzhi pa drag po chen po lnga pa rdo rje'i mche ba can /
T02TD3305E:144a-18: drug pa spyi bor gnas shing ljags bsgril ba'o //
T02TD3305E:144a-19: yang na spyi bor gnas pa sngon po rtsa ba'i zhal la sogs pa rnams g-yas skor gyis sngon po dang dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu rnams so //
T02TD3305E:144a-20: lho sgor gzhan gyis mi thub pa ser po rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal rnams ser po dang nag po dang dkar po dang phyag drug pa g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang mda' 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:144a-21: g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:144a-22: nub tu rta mgrin dmar po rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal rnams dmar po dang sngon po dang phyag drug pa g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dbyug pa dang ka na ya dang mda' 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:144b-0: g-yon @144b pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:144b-1: byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa sngon po zhabs kyis bgegs mnan pa phyag drug pa g-yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang dgra sta dang mda' 'dzin zhing g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:144b-2: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su rin po che'i ri bo'i steng du mi g-yo ba sngon po mi g-yo ba phyag drug pa g-yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang zhags pa dang mda' 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:144b-3: g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa g-yon ngos su 'phyang ba'i gos sngon po can /
T02TD3305E:144b-4: khrag gis brlan zhing ljags 'dril ba'i zhal gdangs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:144b-5: mer 'dod pa'i rgyal po sngon po phyag drug pa phyag dang po gnyis kyis phyag rgya mdzad pa /
T02TD3305E:144b-6: g-yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang mda' g-yon pa dag gis nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD3305E:144b-7: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis phan tshun rgyab sbyar nas mthe ba chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar byas te sdigs mdzub gnyis rab tu brkyang nas zhags pa ltar byas pa ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD3305E:144b-8: bden bral du dbyug sngon can sngon po phyag drug pa g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang mda' g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:144b-9: rlung du stobs po che sngon po phyag brgyad pa g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang ral gri dang mda' g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags dang nu ma dang tho ba dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:144b-10: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi steng du gnod mdzes rgyal po sngon po phyag drug pa rtsa phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings pa /
T02TD3305E:144b-11: g-yas pa dag gis ral gri dang mda' 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:144b-12: g-yon pa dag gis nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD3305E:144b-13: 'dir 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi mdzub mo gnyis gyen du bsgreng ba ni gnod mdzes kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD3305E:144b-14: 'og tu rdo rjes 'og sngon po phyag drug pa g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang mda' 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:144b-15: g-yon pa rnams kyis nu ma dang zhags pa dang bcas pa'i rtse gcig pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:145a-0: bgegs mthar byed la sogs pa bdun ni rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal gsum sngon po @145a * //
T02TD3305E:145a-1: dang ser po dang dmar po'o //
T02TD3305E:145a-2: khro bo bcu po rnams kyang khros pa'i lta stangs can spyan gsum dmar la smin ma g-yo ba rtsa ba'i zhal cung zad bye ba /
T02TD3305E:145a-4: g-yon pa'i zhal tshems kyis mchu mnan pa /
T02TD3305E:145a-5: mche ba gtsigs pa stag gi pags pa'i gos gyon pa ;
T02TD3305E:145a-6: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can /
T02TD3305E:145a-7: skra dang smar ser po gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD3305E:145a-8: rol pa'i kun du bskyod pa can /
T02TD3305E:145a-10: sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la g-yon brkyang gis gnas pa ste /
T02TD3305E:145a-11: gshin rje mthar byed ni g-yas brkyang ba'am rdo rje skyil krung gis so //
T02TD3305E:145a-12: dkyil 'khor 'dir gnod mdzes rgyal po'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa'i gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ni dkyil 'khor ba nyid du logs su ma bshad de dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud las rnal 'byor rgyas par bstan pa la'o //
T02TD3305E:145a-13: bar ma'i rim par bstan pa la ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i spyi gtsug gi steng du rin po che'i ri la gnas pa'i padma dang nyi ma la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ser po rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal rnams ser po dang sngon po dang phyag brgyad pa /
T02TD3305E:145a-14: dang po gnyis kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa /
T02TD3305E:145a-15: g-yas pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang bgrang phreng dang mda' 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:145a-16: g-yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po che'i rgyan dang ral pa'i cod pan can /
T02TD3305E:145a-17: spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhis gzhogs gnyis su rnam par brgyan pa'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD3305E:145a-18: de'i rjes su 'brangs nas rnal 'byor rgyas pa la yang gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dkyil 'khor par tha dad du dang /
T02TD3305E:145a-19: de'i steng du gnod mdzes rgyal po shes par bya'o zhes pa ni kha cig gi'o //
T02TD3305E:145a-20: lha bzhi bcu rtsa gsum po rnams kyang zhal re re zhing spyan gsum pa'o //
T02TD3305E:145a-21: 'dir nu ma 'dzin par bshad pa de yang mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi ni rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma la snyoms par zhugs pa rnams kyi ste khro bo rnams ni rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma g-yon logs su gnas pa rnams kyi'o zhes shes par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:145b-0: gshin rje mthar byed las gzhan rnams la shes rab ma med kyang de'i nu ma 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis rang gi nu ma 'dzin pa'o zhes pa ni @145b gzhan no //
T02TD3305E:145b-1: 'dir rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin 'jam pa'i rdo rje shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid la rang dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyas btab pa ste /
T02TD3305E:145b-2: me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i rnag bzhin mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi dang /
T02TD3305E:145b-3: spyan ma dang tsunda rnams la 'jam pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD3305E:145b-4: m'a ma k'i dang sems rdo rje ma dang byams pa la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02TD3305E:145b-5: khro bo bcu la mi bskyod pa dang rin chen rdo rje ma dang rin chen skar mda' dang bzang skyong la sogs pa bzhi la rin chen 'byung ldan dang /
T02TD3305E:145b-6: gos dkar mo dang chos kyi rdo rje ma dang khro gnyer can ma dang mthu chen thob la sogs pa bzhi la snang ba mtha' yas dang /
T02TD3305E:145b-7: sgrol ma dang las kyi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang zla 'od la sogs pa rnams la don yod grub pa'o //
T02TD3305E:145b-8: 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni mu:'o //
T02TD3305E:145b-9: aom a'a:zhes pa ni snying po'o //
T02TD3305E:145b-10: aom aa mri ta kundala bighn'anta ka h'um /
T02TD3305E:145b-11: zhes pa las thams cad pa'o //
T02TD3305E:145b-12: chos kyi dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gyur la sogs pa bsgom pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:145b-13: gzhan 'dir gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i khro bo rnams ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can te mchod rten 'di la med do //
T02TD3305E:145b-14: gzhal yas khang gi lte bar sna tshogs chu skyes kyi ze'u 'bru la gnas pa'i seng ge'i steng du padma dang zla ba la 'jam pa'i dbyangs rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD3305E:145b-15: nyi ma gzhon nu'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od dang ldan pa gser gyi mdog can aindra n'i la lta bu'i zur phud dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:145b-16: rdo rje dang rin po che dang padma dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'i cod pan gyi steng su sangs rgyas lnga 'phro ba'i rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02TD3305E:145b-17: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dag na bza' can sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyam gyi tshogs dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:145b-18: rtsa ba dang g-yas dang rgya ba dang g-yon gyi zhal rnams ni ser po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar po'o //
T02TD3305E:145b-19: phyag brgyad kyi gnyis kyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad pa /
T02TD3305E:145b-20: g-yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang mda' dang rdo rje g-yon pa rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i to ti dang gzhu dag rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD3305E:146a-0: 'dab ma brgyad la gnas pa'i seng ge'i steng @146a * //
T02TD3305E:146a-1: du padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su gtsug tor chen po dang gdugs dkar po dang gzi brjid phung po dang rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor rnams dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba dang 'phags pa dang cher 'phags dang rgyal ba rnams te /
T02TD3305E:146a-2: gtsug tor brgyad po 'di rnams ni rdo rje'i skyil krung dang rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02TD3305E:146a-3: sku mdog ser po phyag gnyis kyi g-yas pas 'khor lo gyen du gzung ba g-yon pa rang gi gdan la brten pa'o //
T02TD3305E:146a-4: de nas shar gyi re'u mig gi dbus su glang po che'i rgyal po la mi bskyod pa sngon po zhal ba zhing rtsa ba'i zhal sngon po khro zhing sgeg pa dang bcas pa g-yas pa dkar po gdangs shing drag pa /
T02TD3305E:146a-5: rgyab ma ser po dpa' ba g-yon pa dmar po mche ba gtsigs shing ma mchu mnan pa /
T02TD3305E:146a-6: phyag brgyad kyi g-yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:146a-7: g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang gzhu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:146a-8: rdo rje sems dpa' dang rdo rje rgyal po dang rdo rje chags pa dang rdo rje legs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02TD3305E:146a-9: lho'i re'u mig gi dbus su rta'i rgyal po la rin chen 'byung ldan ser po ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can phyag brgyad kyi g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:146a-10: g-yon pa rnams kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD3305E:146a-11: rdo rje dril bu dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:146a-12: rdo rje rin chen dang rdo rje gzi brjid dang rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang rdo rje bzhad pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02TD3305E:146a-13: nub kyi re'u mig gi dbus su rma bya la snang ba mtha' yas dmar po dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po dang ser po'i zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad kyi g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang mda' dang ral gri dang lcags kyu 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:146a-14: g-yon pa rnams kyis padma dang gzhu dang zhags pa dang dril bu 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:146a-15: rdo rje chos dang rdo rje rnon po dang rdo rje rgyu dang rdo rje srung ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02TD3305E:146a-16: byang gi re'u mig gi dbus su nam mkha' lding la don yod grub pa ljang gu zhal bzhi'i rtsa ba ljang gu mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02TD3305E:146a-17: g-yas pa ser po zhi ba /
T02TD3305E:146a-18: rgyab ma dmar po rnam par sgeg pa /
T02TD3305E:146a-19: g-yon pa dkar po zhi ba /
T02TD3305E:146b-0: @146b phyag brgyad kyi g-yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang rdo rje dang mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:146b-1: g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang gzhu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:146b-2: rdo rje las dang rdo rje srung ba dang rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje khu tshur rnams kyis bskor ba'o //
T02TD3305E:146b-3: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rang rang gi bzhon pa'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD3305E:146b-4: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang gos dang cod pan can no //
T02TD3305E:146b-5: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bcu drug po rnams ni dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su gnas pa'i sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i sku mdog la sogs pa can no //
T02TD3305E:146b-6: 'di dag kyang phyogs su gnas pa'o zhes pa'i phyogs kyang yod do //
T02TD3305E:146b-7: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su gnas pa'i sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba rnams la /
T02TD3305E:146b-8: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis spyan ma dang m'a ma k'i dang gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma rnams ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD3305E:146b-9: snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:146b-10: sgo rnams la shar du rdo rje lcags kyu dmar ser rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:146b-11: g-yas brkyang gis gnas pa dang /
T02TD3305E:146b-12: lhor rdo rje zhags pa ser po rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:146b-13: g-yon brkyang gis gnas pa dang /
T02TD3305E:146b-14: nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:146b-15: sa ga'i stabs kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD3305E:146b-16: byang du rdo rje 'bebs pa ljang gu rdo rje bsdams pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa zlum po'i stabs kyis gnas pa ste /
T02TD3305E:146b-17: bzhi po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma gnas pa zhal gcig pa /
T02TD3305E:146b-18: phyag gnyis pa spyan gsum pa /
T02TD3305E:146b-19: dbu skra dang sma ra ser po gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD3305E:146b-20: klu brgyad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:146b-21: snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di las phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la /
T02TD3305E:146b-22: shar phyogs su dbang ldan nas brtsams nas g-yas skor gyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02TD3305E:146b-23: sa ma bcu gnyis ni phyag gnyis ma g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:146b-24: g-yon pa rnams kyis rang rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD3305E:147a-0: de la mos pas spyod pa'i sa ma padma dmar @147a * //
T02TD3305E:147a-1: po lta bu chu skyes dmar po 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147a-2: rab dga' ma dmar mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147a-3: dri med ma dkar mo chu skyes dkar po 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147a-4: 'od byed ma dmar mo sna tshogs chu skyes la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147a-5: 'od 'phro ma mar ka ta'i mdog can autpala sngon po 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147a-6: sbyang dka' ma ser mo pang par gnas pa'i phyag gan rkyal gyis ma ra ka ta'i nor bu 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147a-7: mngon du gyur ma gser gyi mdog can padma'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147a-8: ring du song ma nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs sna tshogs chu skyes la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147a-9: mi g-yo ma zla ba'i mdog can zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar pos mtshan pa'i padma'i yu ba khengs pa dang bcas pas 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147a-10: legs pa'i blo gros ma dkar mo ral gris mtshan pa'i autpala 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147a-11: chos kyi sprin ma ser mo chos kyi sprin gyis yongs su bskor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147a-12: kun du 'od ma nyin gung gi nyi ma'i mdog can padma'i steng du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mtshon par byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:147a-13: lhor pha rol tu phyin ma bcu gnyis ni phyag gnyis ma g-yas pa rnams kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:147a-14: g-yon pas rang rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD3305E:147a-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ni phyag gnyis kyis lhag pa'o //
T02TD3305E:147a-16: de la rin po che padma'i pha rol tu phyin ma dmar mo padma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147a-17: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ma dkar dmar gyi mdog can sna tshogs pa'i so ba'i snye ma 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147a-18: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dkar mo yal gdang bcas pa'i mya ngan med pa'i me tog gi chun po 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147a-19: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin ma ser mo chu skyes dkar po 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147a-20: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ma ra ka ta'i mdog can autpala la sngon po 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147a-21: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin ma nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs pa padma dkar po 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147a-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma gser gyi mdog can padma la gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:147b-0: phyag gnyis kyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i @147b phyag rgya mdzad pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147b-1: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin ma pri yang ku ltar ljang gu chu skyes ser po la gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa dang smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin ma autpala sngon po'i mdog can /
T02TD3305E:147b-2: autpala la sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147b-3: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dmar mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147b-4: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dkar mo sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i 'bras bus brgyan pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi yal ga 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147b-5: rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu phyin ma sna tshogs mdog can autpala la sngon po la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:147b-6: nub tu dbang ma bcu gnyis ni /
T02TD3305E:147b-7: phyag gnyis ma g-yas pa rnams kyis autpala la 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:147b-8: g-yon pas bsnyems pa dang bcas pas rang rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD3305E:147b-9: de la tshe la dbang ma dkar dmar gyi mdog can nor bu padma r'a ga la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya can gyi sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa'i sku gzugs 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147b-10: sems la dbang ma dkar mo rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147b-11: yo byad la dbang ma ser mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147b-12: las la dbang ma ljang gu sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147b-13: skye pa la dbang ma sna tshogs mdog can rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mdog can gyi dz'a ti'i 'khri shing 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147b-14: rdzu 'phrul la dbang nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs padma gnas pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147b-15: mos pa la dbang ma padma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar ba pri yang ku'i me tog gi snyem 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147b-16: smon lam la dbang ma ser mo autpala sngon po 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147b-17: ye shes la dbang ma sngon mo autpala la sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147b-18: chos la dbang ma dkar mo padma la gnas pa'i bum pa bzang po 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147b-19: de bzhin nyid ma dkar mo phyag g-yas pas padma dkar po 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:147b-20: g-yon pas rdo rje rin po che'i snye ma 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:147b-21: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ma gser zhun ma lta bu g-yas pas chu skyes ser po la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:147b-22: g-yon pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi steng du 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:147b-23: byang du gzugs ma bcu gnyis ni /
T02TD3305E:148a-1: ma g-yas pa rnams kyis sna tshogs rdo rje dang /
T02TD3305E:148a-2: g-yon pas bsnyems pa dang bcas pas rang rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD3305E:148a-3: de la nor gyi blo gros ma ser mo 'bras kyi snye ma 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148a-4: rin chen skrar mda' ma dmar mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148a-5: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma dkar mo nor bu zla ba chu shel gyi bum pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148a-6: 'od zer can ma dkar dmar skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148a-7: ri khrod lo ma can ma ljang gu rma bya'i mjug sgro 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148a-8: dug sel ma dkar mo dug gi me tog gi chun po 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148a-9: sgo mtha' yas ma me tog pri yang ku ltar ljang gu chu skyes dmar po la gnas pa mi zad pa'i gter chen po'i bum pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148a-10: tsunda ma dkar mo bgrang phreng 'chang ba'i ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148a-11: shes rab 'phel ma dkar mo autpala sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148a-12: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ma ljang gu rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i padma dkar dmar 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148a-13: ye shes mi zad pa'i za ma tog dmar mo rin po che'i za ma tog 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148a-14: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod ma ser mo padma la gnas pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi dpe sgrom 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:148a-15: sgo rnams la shar du chos so so yang dag par rig ma dkar dmar phyag gnyis kyis lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148a-16: lhor don so so yang dag par rig ma ma ra ka ta'i mdog can g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag dag gis rin po che'i zhags pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148a-17: nub tu nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig ma dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis mtha' gnyis su padmas mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148a-18: byang du spobs pa so so yang dag par rig ma mar ka ta ltar ljang gu phyag gnyis rdo rje rtse gsum pa mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:148a-19: mtshams rnams su mer sgeg mo ser mo sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i phyag dag gis rdo rje gnyis 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148a-20: bden bral du phreng ba ma dmar ser phyag gnyis kyis rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148a-21: rlung du glu ma dmar mo phyag dag gis pi wang 'dzin zhing sgra sgrogs pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148b-0: dbang ldan du gar ma ljang gu phyag gnyis gar gyi tshul gyis rdo rje rtsa gsum pa dang dril bu 'dzin @148b pa'o //
T02TD3305E:148b-1: mos pas spyod pa'i sa ma la sogs pa'i lha mo 'di rnams thams cad ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang /
T02TD3305E:148b-3: rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02TD3305E:148b-4: cung zad 'dzum zhing sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:148b-5: sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa ste /
T02TD3305E:148b-6: khyad par sgo skyod ma rnams ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD3305E:148b-7: gzhan dag ni de rnams kyang zla ba la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:148b-8: dkyil 'khor gsum pa la dbang ldan nas brtsams nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
T02TD3305E:148b-9: de la snam bu rnams kyi shar du kun du bzang po ser po g-yas pas mchog sbyin dang g-yon pas autpala la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148b-10: blo gros mi zad pa ser po g-yas pas ral gri dang g-yon pas mi 'jigs pas padma 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148b-11: sa'i snying po ser po g-yas pas sa gnon mdzad cing g-yon pas padma la gnas pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148b-12: nam mkha'i snying po ljang gu g-yas pas rin po che thams cad kyi char 'bebs shing /
T02TD3305E:148b-13: g-yon pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:148b-14: lhor nam mkha'i mdzod ser po g-yas pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang g-yon pas bum pa bzang po las 'phyangs pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148b-15: phyag na rin chen ljang gu g-yas pas rin po che dang /
T02TD3305E:148b-16: g-yon pas chu skyes la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148b-17: blo gros rgya mtsho dkar po g-yas pas dung dang g-yon pas ral gri 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148b-18: rdo rje snying po autpala sngon po'i mdog can g-yas pas rdo rje dang /
T02TD3305E:148b-19: g-yon pas sa bcu pa'i glegs bam 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:148b-20: nub tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkar po g-yas pas mchog sbyin dang /
T02TD3305E:148b-21: g-yon pas chu skyes 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148b-22: mthu chen thob pa ser po g-yas pas ral gri dang g-yon pas padma 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148b-23: zla 'od dkar po g-yas pas 'khor lo dad g-yon pas chu skyes la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:148b-24: dra ba can gyi 'od dkar dmar g-yas pas ral gri dang g-yon pas chu skyes la gnas pa'i nyi ma 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:148b-25: byang du 'od dpag med dkar po g-yas pas sna tshogs chu skyes dang /
T02TD3305E:148b-26: g-yon pas chu skyes la gnas pa'i bum pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:149a-1: po g-yas pas se gol gtogs shing g-yon pas padma la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:149a-2: mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros gur gum gyi mdog g-yas rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang /
T02TD3305E:149a-4: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sngon po g-yas pas ral gri dang g-yon pas sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ba dang 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:149a-5: bcu drug po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i dkyil la sems dpa'i skyil krung can rin po che'i cod pan dang sna tshogs pa'i rin po che dang na bzas brgyan pa /
T02TD3305E:149a-6: zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa rnams so //
T02TD3305E:149a-7: sgo rnams la shar du ma he la gshin rje mthar byed nag po gsus pa 'phyang pa zhal drug pa phyag drug pa g-yas pa rnams kyis lcags kyu dang /
T02TD3305E:149a-9: g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang dril bu dang gzhu 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD3305E:149a-10: zhal dang zhabs kyi khyad par ni snga ma bzhin no//
T02TD3305E:149a-11: lhor shes rab mthar byed ser po zhal bzhi pa rtsa ba'i zhal sgeg pa dang bcas pa g-yas pa gdangs pa /
T02TD3305E:149a-12: rgyab ma drag po chen po //
T02TD3305E:149a-14: yang na 'di rnams rim pa ji lta bar ser po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang ljang gu'o //
T02TD3305E:149a-15: 'di'i phyag brgyad kyi g-yas pa rnams kyis zhags pa dang /
T02TD3305E:149a-16: rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' dang /
T02TD3305E:149a-17: g-yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang shakti dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:149a-18: nub tu padma mthar byed dmar po zhal dmar po bzhi'i rtsa ba dang g-yas dang rgyab dang g-yon gyi zhal rnams sgeg pa dang drag pa dang bzhad pa dang zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:149a-19: yang na 'di rnams dmar po dang nag po dang ser po dang dkar po'o //
T02TD3305E:149a-20: phyag brgyad kyi gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags sgrog dang /
T02TD3305E:149a-21: g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda'/
T02TD3305E:149a-22: g-yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD3305E:149a-23: gsum pa 'di dag ni rol pa'i kun du bskyod pas gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:149a-24: byang du bgegs mthar byed sngon po zhal sngon po bzhi pa /
T02TD3305E:149a-25: yang na 'di rnams sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu /
T02TD3305E:149a-26: phyag brgyad kyi gnyis kyis rdo rje bsdams pa'i tshul gyis dril bu dang /
T02TD3305E:149a-27: g-yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang mda' dang lcags kyu /
T02TD3305E:149b-0: g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas @149b pa'i zhags pa dang gzhu dang dril bu 'dzin pa g-yon brkyang gis log 'dren mnan nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:149b-1: mtshams rnams la dbang ldan du 'jig rten gsum na rnam par rgyal ba sngon po zhal sngon po bzhi'i rtsa ba khro zhing sgeg pa dang bcas pa g-yas drag po rgyab dpa' ba /
T02TD3305E:149b-2: g-yon mi sdug pa'i nyams can /
T02TD3305E:149b-3: yang na 'di rnams sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po'o //
T02TD3305E:149b-4: phyag brgyad kyi gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu thugs kar bzung nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya mdzad pa /
T02TD3305E:149b-5: g-yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang lcags kyu dang mda'/
T02TD3305E:149b-6: g-yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:149b-7: zhabs g-yon brkyang bas dbang phyug chen po'i mgo dang /
T02TD3305E:149b-8: g-yas bskum pas au ma'i nu ma mnan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:149b-9: mer rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba nag po sgeg pa dang dpa' ba dang 'jigs su rung ba snying rje'i nyams dang ldan pa'i zhal bzhi pa /
T02TD3305E:149b-10: yang na 'di rnams sngon po dang dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po /
