T02TD3305E:149b-11: 'di'i phyag brgyad kyi g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' dang 'khor lo 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:149b-12: g-yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang zhags pa dang gzhu dang kha tv'am ga dang 'brel ba'i ba dang 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:149b-13: chung ma dang bcas pa'i khyab 'jug g-yas brkyang gis mnan nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:149b-14: bden bral du he ru ka sngon po zhal sngon po bzhi'i rtsa ba drag po //
T02TD3305E:149b-15: g-yas pa rab tu dga' bas bzhad pa /
T02TD3305E:149b-16: rgyab ma za bar rngam pa /
T02TD3305E:149b-17: g-yon pa sgeg pa dang bcas pa /
T02TD3305E:149b-18: yang na 'di rnams sngon po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang dkar po phyag brgyad kyi g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang mda' dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa /
T02TD3305E:149b-19: g-yon pa rnams kyis snying gar padma kha bye ba dang gzhu dang kha tv'am ga dril bu ba dang dang bcas pa 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:149b-20: gnyis kyis 'jigs byed chen po'i pags pa rlung ras lta bu 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:149b-21: chung ma dang bcas pa'i tshangs pa g-yon brkyang gis mnan nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:149b-22: rlung du rta mchog ljang gu zhal ljang gu bzhi'i rtsa ba khro zhing sgeg pa dang bcas pa /
T02TD3305E:149b-23: g-yas pa drag po g-yon pa tshangs pa'i gdong can /
T02TD3305E:149b-24: yang na 'di rnams ljang gu dang sngon po dang dkar po ste spyi bor rta mgo ljang gu 'di'i phyag brgyad kyi g-yas pa sna tshogs rdo rje ba dan dang ldan pas bsgreng ba'i tshul dang /
T02TD3305E:149b-25: gnyis pas ba dan gsum pa'i tshul dang /
T02TD3305E:150a-3: g-yon pas phub dang bcas pa'i phyag gis sna tshogs chu skyes dang /
T02TD3305E:150a-4: gsum gyis shakta dang dbyug pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:150a-5: g-yas brkyang pa dang g-yon brkyang ba ste zhabs bzhi pa /
T02TD3305E:150a-6: g-yas pa gcig gis dbang mo dang dpal mo //
T02TD3305E:150a-7: gnyis pas dga' ma dang rangs ma g-yon pa gcig gis dbang po dang sbrang rtsir byed pa /
T02TD3305E:150a-8: gnyis pas rgyal bar byed pa dang dpyid kyi lha mnan nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:150a-9: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi steng gi nam mkhar gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ser po zhal ser po bzhi pa /
T02TD3305E:150a-10: yang na ser po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar po'i zhal bzhi pa /
T02TD3305E:150a-11: phyag brgyad kyi g-yas pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang lcags kyu dang ral gri dang mda'/
T02TD3305E:150a-12: g-yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang zhags pa dang bgrang phred dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:150a-13: rol pa'i kun du bskyod pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:150a-14: 'og tu gnod mdzes rgyal po nag po drag po dang zhi ba dang bzhad pa dang sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i zhal nag po bzhi pa yang na nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po dang ser po'i zhal bzhi pa /
T02TD3305E:150a-15: phyag g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang ral gri dang mda' g-yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang zhags pa dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:150a-17: khro bo bcu po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa /
T02TD3305E:150a-18: zhal re re zhing dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum pa /
T02TD3305E:150a-19: smin ma 'khyog pa dang bcas pa /
T02TD3305E:150a-20: stag gi pags pa'i gos dang smad g-yogs can /
T02TD3305E:150a-21: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:150a-22: dbu skra dmar ser 'bar ba gyen du bcings pa smar dmar ser can gdengs can gyi dbang po brgyad dang ldan pa 'jigs su rung ba'o //
T02TD3305E:150a-23: dkyil 'khor gsum pa gnyis kyi grva bzhi'i nang du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i khro bo bzhi'i phyi'i re kh'a'i phyi rol gyi gnas su me la sogs pa'i zur thig bzhi po rnams kyi g-yas logs su ma tog ma la sogs pa bzhi dang g-yon logs su rdo rje gzugs ma la ste /
T02TD3305E:150a-24: de la me tog ma ser mo phyag na me tog gi snod can dang /
T02TD3305E:150a-25: bdug spos ma nag mo phyag na sbos phor can dang /
T02TD3305E:150a-26: mar me ma dmar mo phyag na rin po che'i sgron ma'i mchod sdong can dang /
T02TD3305E:150b-0: dri cha ba ma @150b ljang gu phyag na dri'i dung can dang /
T02TD3305E:150b-1: rdo rje gzugs ma ser mo phyag na me long can dang /
T02TD3305E:150b-2: rdo rje sgra ma ljang gu phyag na pi wang can dang /
T02TD3305E:150b-3: rdo rje ro ma dmar mo phyag na dri'i snod can dang /
T02TD3305E:150b-4: rdo rje reg bya ma sna tshogs pa'i mdog can phyag na gos sna tshogs can no //
T02TD3305E:150b-5: brgyad po 'di rnams ni phyag gnyis ma rin po che'i cod pan can rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che dang gos kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD3305E:150b-6: padma dang zla ba la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:150b-7: bzhi pa rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la dbang po'i phyogs su sa srung dkar po la gnas pa'i dbang po ser po rdo rje dang nu ma 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:150b-8: gshin rjer ma he la gshin rje nag po da byug pa dang mdung 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:150b-9: chur chu srin la chu bdag dkar po gdengs ka bdun pa klu'i zhags pa dang drung 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:150b-10: lus ngan du mi la gnas pa'i lus nang po ser po lcags kyu dang dbyug to 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:150b-11: dbang ldan du glang la gnas pa'i dbang ldan dkar po rtse gsum dang thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:150b-12: ral pa'i thor cog la thod pa dang zla ba phyed pas brgyan zhing sprul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa mgrin pa sngon po dang /
T02TD3305E:150b-13: mer ra la me ha dmar po blugs gzar dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:150b-14: bden bral du rol srin po'i bdag po bden bral sngon po ral gri dang phub 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:150b-15: rlung du ri dag sa la rlung lha sngon po rlung ras 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD3305E:150b-16: brgyad po 'di rnams ni phyag bzhi pa /
T02TD3305E:150b-17: g-yas pas phyag mtshan dang po dang /
T02TD3305E:150b-18: g-yon pas gnyis pa 'dzin zhing rang snang gi btsun mo la 'khyud pa /
T02TD3305E:150b-19: gnyis kyis spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas 'dud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:150b-20: dbang ldan dang nye ba'i phyi rol du dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams nas rim pas tshangs pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD3305E:150b-21: de yang dang pa la tshangs pa ser po zhal bzhi pa /
T02TD3305E:150b-23: bgrang phreng dang chu skyes 'dzin zhing g-yas pa dang cig shos dag thal mo sbyar bas dbyug pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:150b-24: mkha' lding la khyab 'jug nag po phyag bzhi pa dang po gnyis 'khor lo dang dung 'dzin zhing g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis thal mo sbyar bas dbyug to dang s'a ram ga'i gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:150b-25: glang la dbang phyug dkar po ri bong gis mtshan pa'i ral pa'i thor cog can /
T02TD3305E:150b-26: phyag bzhi pa spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba dang rtse gsum dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-0: rma bya la gdong drug dmar po @151a * //
T02TD3305E:151a-1: zhal drug pa phyag drug pa g-yas pa dag gis shakti dang rdo rje dang /
T02TD3305E:151a-2: g-yon pa dag gis khyim bya dang dril bu 'dzin zhing gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-3: 'di rnams kyang snga ma bzhin du rang snang gi btsun mo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-4: tshangs ma ni tshangs pa dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-5: drag mo ni drag po dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-6: khyab 'jug ma ni khyab 'jug dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-7: gzhon nu ma ni gzhon nu dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-8: dbang mo ni dbang po dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-9: phag mo nag mo 'ug pa la gnas ma phyag bzhi ma g-yas pa dang cig shos dag gis ro hi ta dang thod pa 'dzin zhing gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-10: yi dags kyi steng du tsa mundi dmar mo phyag bzhi ma g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin zhing gzhan pa dag gis thal mo sbyar pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-11: bhri nggi ni ma nag mo shin tu skem pa bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin zhing gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-12: byi ba la tshogs bdag dkar po glang po che'i gdong ba can sprul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:151a-13: phyag bzhi pa g-yas pa dag gis rtse gsum dang la du /
T02TD3305E:151a-14: g-yon pa dag gis dgra sta dang la phug 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-15: nag po chen po nag po rtse gsum dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-16: dga' byed dbang phyug nag po rdza rnga la zhon zhing rdza rnga brdung par brtson pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-17: rta bdun pa'i shing rta la nyi ma dmar po g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-18: dang pa la zla ba dkar po g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis ku mu ta la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-19: ral bkra shis dmar po g-yas pas chu gri dang g-yon pas mi'i mgo bo zla ba'i tshul gyis 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-20: padma la gza' lhag ser po mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-21: sbal pa 'am thod pa la phur bu dkar po bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-22: padma la pa sangs dkar po bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-23: rus sbal la spen pa nag po dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-24: sgra gcan dmar nag phyag dag gis nyi ma dang zla ba 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-25: mjug rings nag po ral gri dang klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151a-26: glang po la stobs bzangs dkar po ral gri dang gshol 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151b-0: khu byug gi shing rta la rgyal bar byed pa ljang gu phyag bzhi pa @151b g-yas pa dag gis me tog gi phreng ba dang mda'/
T02TD3305E:151b-1: g-yon pa dag gis btung ba'i snod dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151b-2: ne tso'i shing rta la sbrang rtsir byed pa dkar po phyag bzhi pa g-yas pa dag gis chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang mda'/ g-yon pa dag gis btung ba'i snod dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151b-3: spre'u la dpyid kyi lha dkar po phyag bzhi pa g-yas pa dag gis mda' dang ral gri /
T02TD3305E:151b-4: g-yon pa dag gis gzhu dang btung ba'i snod 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151b-5: mtha' yas dang nor rgyas dang 'jog po dang stobs rgyud dang padma dang padma chen po dang dung skyong dang /
T02TD3305E:151b-6: rigs ldan rnams ni sbrul gyi gdengs ka bdun dang ldan pa thal mo sbyar ba ste /
T02TD3305E:151b-7: yang na rang rang gi yab kyi phyag mtshan gtso bo dang ldan pas thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02TD3305E:151b-8: thags bzangs ris dang stobs ldan dang tshim byed la sogs pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams ni nag po g-yul 'gyed pa'i go cha gyon pa ral gri dang phub la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha phyag na 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151b-9: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po gshog pa rab tu brkyang ba pus mo'i bar du dkar pa /
T02TD3305E:151b-10: de'i steng nas lte ba'i bar du ser po lte ba'i steng nas mgrin pa'i bar du dmar po //
T02TD3305E:151b-11: de'i steng nas spyi bo'i bar nag po //
T02TD3305E:151b-12: phyag dag gis thal mo sbyar pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151b-13: mi 'am ci'i rgyal po dmar ser pi wang gi sgra sgrogs par brtson pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151b-14: dri za'i rgyal po zur phung lnga pa ser po pi wang gi sgra sgrogs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151b-15: rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang po don thams cad grub pa dkar po me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151b-16: gang ba bzang po sngon po dang /
T02TD3305E:151b-17: nor bu bzang po ser po dang /
T02TD3305E:151b-19: rnam thos sras ser po dang /
T02TD3305E:151b-20: tsi bi kunda li dmar po dang /
T02TD3305E:151b-21: ki li ma l'i ljang gu dang sgo'i dbang po ser po dang spyod pa'i dbang po ser po ste /
T02TD3305E:151b-22: gang ba bzang po la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'di rnams ni g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag dag gis b'i dza p'u ra ka'i 'bras bu dang ne'u le 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:151b-23: 'phrog ma ser mo chad bu gnyis 'dzin pa bu dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:152a-2: gre me tog bri yang ku ltar ljang ser dang /
T02TD3305E:152a-20: tha skar la sogs pa'i lha 'di rnams ni g-yo ba dang bcas pa'i stod g-yogs yongs su 'dzin pa thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02TD3305E:152a-21: gzhan yang lha rnams ni 'khor los 'dren pa'i khang brtsegs la gnas par shes par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:152a-22: dbang po la sogs pa'i lha 'di rnams padma la gnas pa /
T02TD3305E:152a-23: re re 'ang 'khor dpag tu med pas bskor ba /
T02TD3305E:152a-24: 'byor ba ji lta ba bzhin du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po ches brgyan pa /
T02TD3305E:152a-25: dkyil 'khor gyi dbang po bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra phyogs thams cad du sgrogs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:152a-26: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs sgo skyong rnams ni snying po'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:152a-27: 'dir bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rang bzhin 'jam pa'i dbyangs shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la rang dang 'dra pa'i rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02TD3305E:152a-28: me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi dang gtsug tor brgyad dang /
T02TD3305E:152a-29: spyan ma rnams la 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis so //
T02TD3305E:152a-30: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02TD3305E:152a-33: sa ma bcu gnyis dang chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang sgeg mo dang kun du bzang mo la sogs pa bzhi dang khro bo bcu dang me tog ma dang gzugs ma dang shar phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la mi bskyod pas so //
T02TD3305E:152a-34: rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa bzhi dang rdo rje zhags pa dang pha rol tu phyin ma bcu gnyis dang /
T02TD3305E:152a-35: don so so yang dag par rig ma dang /
T02TD3305E:152b-0: phreng ba ma dang nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa bzhi dang bdug spos ma dang sgra ma dang lho phyogs na gnas pa'i @152b lha rnams la rin chen 'byung ldan gyis so //
T02TD3305E:152b-1: rdo rje chos la sogs pa bzhi dang gos dkar mo dang rdo rje lcags sgrog dang tshe dang dbang ma bcu gnyis dang nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig ma dang glu ma dang spyan ras gzigs la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02TD3305E:152b-2: mar me ma dang ro ma dang nub phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la 'od dpag med kyis so //
T02TD3305E:152b-3: rdo rje las rab la sogs pa bzhi dang sgrol ma dang rdo rje 'bebs pa dang /
T02TD3305E:152b-5: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig ma dang /
T02TD3305E:152b-6: gar ma dang 'od dpag med la sogs pa bzhi dang dri chab ma dang reg bya rdo rje ma dang byang phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la don yod grub pas rgyas btab po //
T02TD3305E:152b-7: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni mu:'o //
T02TD3305E:152b-8: aom aa aa: sarba ta th'a ga t'a hri da ya ha ra ha ra /
T02TD3305E:152b-9: aom h'um hr'i: bha ga w'a na dzny'a na m'u rti w'a g'i shva ra /
T02TD3305E:152b-11: sarba dha rma ga ga na aa ma la su pa ri shuddha dha rma dh'a tu dzny'a na grbha aa: zhes pa snying po'i sngags so //
T02TD3305E:152b-12: aom aa mri ta kunda li bhi ghn'anha ka h'um /
T02TD3305E:152b-13: zhes pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags te las thams cad pa'o //
T02TD3305E:152b-14: ngan song yongs su spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang ri rab kyi steng gi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su /
T02TD3305E:152b-15: nang gi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa ser po//
T02TD3305E:152b-16: rdo rje phred ba sngon pos yongs su bskor ba ste 'ga' zhig 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa sngon por gsungs la /
T02TD3305E:152b-17: gzhan du ni 'di'i 'khor lo'i lte ba sngon po dang /
T02TD3305E:152b-18: rtsibs rnams kyi shar dkar po dang /
T02TD3305E:152b-21: byang ljang gu'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD3305E:152b-22: 'khor lo'i lte par sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i seng ge'i steng du /
T02TD3305E:152b-23: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya ser ge rnam par snang mdzad chen po gser gyi mdog can chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad pa'o //
T02TD3305E:152b-24: shar gyi rtsibs la rdo rje gtsug tor dkar po sa gnon gyi phyag rgya can no //
T02TD3305E:152b-25: lho'i rtsibs la rin chen gtsug tor sngon po mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya can no //
T02TD3305E:152b-26: nub kyi rtsibs la padma gtsug tor dmar po bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya can no //
T02TD3305E:152b-27: byang gi rtsibs la sna tshogs gtsug tor ljang gu mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:152b-28: me'i rtsibs la gzi brjid gtsug tor dkar dmar 'dres pa'i mdog can phyag g-yas pas nyi ma 'dzin cing /
T02TD3305E:153a-2: bden bral gyi rtsibs la rgyal mtshan gtsug tor dmar po dang 'dres pa'i nag po phyag dag gis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:153a-3: rlung gi rtsibs la rnon po'i gtsug tor nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs phyag g-yas pa ral gri dang g-yon pas po ti 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:153a-4: dbang ldan gyi rtsibs la gdugs can gtsug tor dkar po phyag dag gis gdugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:153a-5: rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su sgeg mo dang phreng ba dang glu ma dang gar ma rnams ni /
T02TD3305E:153a-6: dkar mo dang ser mo dang dmar mo dang /
T02TD3305E:153a-7: sna tshogs kyi mdog can phyag gnyis ma'o //
T02TD3305E:153a-8: snam bu rnams la sgo'i g-yon du byang chub sems dpa' gnyis dang g-yas gnyis te /
T02TD3305E:153a-9: de yang shar gyi snam bu la byams pa ser po g-yas pas klu shing gi me tog dang /
T02TD3305E:153a-10: g-yon pas spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:153a-11: mthong pa don yod ser po phyag g-yas pas spyan dang bcas pa'i padma 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:153a-12: g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang /
T02TD3305E:153a-13: ngan song kun 'dren dkar po phyag gnyis kyis lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:153a-14: mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dkar ser bsres pa'i mdog can phyag g-yas dbyug pa 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:153a-15: g-yon pa'i khu tshur bkur brten pa'o //
T02TD3305E:153a-16: lho phyogs su spos kyi glang po dkar ljang g-yas pas dri'i dung chos 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:153a-17: g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang /
T02TD3305E:153a-18: dpa' bar 'gro ba dkar po g-yas pa ral gri 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:153a-19: g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang /
T02TD3305E:153a-20: nam mkha'i mdzod dkar ser g-yas pa padma la gnas pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:153a-21: g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang /
T02TD3305E:153a-22: ye shes tog sngon po phyag g-yas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:153a-23: g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa'o //
T02TD3305E:153a-24: nub tu bdud rtsi'i 'od dkar po g-yas pa cod pan gyi steng du bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:153a-25: g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang /
T02TD3305E:153a-26: zla ba'i 'od dkar po g-yas pa padma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:153a-27: g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang /
T02TD3305E:153a-28: bzang skyong dkar po g-yas pa 'bar ba'i 'od can gyi rin po che 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:153b-0: g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang dra ba @153b can gyi 'od dkar po g-yas pa rdo rje'i gur 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:153b-1: g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa'o //
T02TD3305E:153b-2: byang du rdo rje snying po sngo skya g-yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa'i autpala sngon po 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:153b-3: g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang /
T02TD3305E:153b-4: blo gros mi zad pa dkar po phyag gnyis kyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:153b-5: spobs pa brtsegs pa dmar po g-yas pa chu skyes la gnas pa'i rin po che brtsegs pa 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:153b-6: g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang /
T02TD3305E:153b-7: kun du bzang po gser gyi mdog can phyag g-yas pa rin po che'i snye ma 'dzin pa'i khu tshur 'khur brten pa'o //
T02TD3305E:153b-8: dkyil 'khor gyi me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su me tog ma dang bdug spos ma dang mar me ma dang dri chab ma rnams ni dkar mo dang nag mo dang dmar mo dang ljang gu ste me tog la sogs pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:153b-9: sgo rnams la shar du rdo rje lcags kyu dkar po phyag gnyis kyis lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:153b-10: lhor rdo rje zhags pa sngon po phyag gnyis kyis zhags pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:153b-11: nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:153b-12: byang du rdo rje 'bebs pa ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:153b-13: lha sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di rnams kyang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po ches brgyan pa rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02TD3305E:153b-14: spyan gnyis pa phyag gnyis pa sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba rnams la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:153b-15: 'dir rnam par snang mdzad chen po la rang dang 'dra ba'i rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab pa'o //
T02TD3305E:153b-16: rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pa bzhi la rnam par snang mdzad chen pos so //
T02TD3305E:153b-17: shar phyogs dang me mtshams na gnas pa'i lha rnams la rdo rje gtsug tor gyis so //
T02TD3305E:153b-18: lho phyogs dang bden bral gyi mtshams na gnas pa rnams la rin chen gtsug tor gyis so //
T02TD3305E:153b-19: nub phyogs dang rlung gi mtshams na gnas pa rnams la padma gtsug tor gyis so //
T02TD3305E:153b-20: byang phyogs dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams na gnas pa rnams la sna tshogs gtsug tor gyis so //
T02TD3305E:153b-21: 'dir phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gnas kyi snam bu la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa brgyad po blta bar bya'o zhes sbyong rgyud las gsungs pa'i phyir /
T02TD3305E:154a-1: la byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug dgod pa ni yang dag par rigs so //
T02TD3305E:154a-2: kha cig ni nang gi dkyil 'khor zhes rgyud las gsungs pas phyi'i gzhal yas khang gi nang du gzhal yas khang gnyis pa'o zhes smra'o //
T02TD3305E:154a-3: 'ga' zhig tu ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgu po gtsug tor dang bcas pa dge slong gi cha lugs 'dzin pa'o zhes bshad do //
T02TD3305E:154a-4: de ni mi rigs te chags pa dang ldan pa'i gzugs can 'khor los sgyur pa'i gzugs su mngon par sprul ba'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD3305E:154a-5: padma'i phreng bas yongs su bskor pa dang /
T02TD3305E:154a-6: khor yug gi nang du dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams te g-yas skor gyis mgrin ba sngon po la sogs pa dgod par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:154a-7: de nas dbang ldan nas glang la mgrin pa sngon po dkar po sprul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can /
T02TD3305E:154a-8: phyag g-yas pa dag na rdo rje dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD3305E:154a-9: g-yon pa dag na rtse gsum dang ral gri'o //
T02TD3305E:154a-10: nam mkha' lding la khyab 'jug nag po g-yas pa dag na dbyug to dang rdo rje dang /
T02TD3305E:154a-11: g-yon pa dag na dung dang 'khor lo'o //
T02TD3305E:154a-12: rdo rje gser ma khyab 'jug lta bu ste khyad par ni gser gyi mdog can no //
T02TD3305E:154a-13: rma bya la rdo rje dril bu zhal drug pa dmar po g-yas pa dag na shakti dang rdo rje dang /
T02TD3305E:154a-14: g-yon pa dag na khyim bya dang rdo rje dril bu'o //
T02TD3305E:154a-15: rdo rje gzhon nu ma ni rdo rje dril bu lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:154a-16: ngang pa la mi smra rdo rje ser po zhal bzhi pa /
T02TD3305E:154a-17: g-yas pa dag na rdo rje dang bgrang phreng dang /
T02TD3305E:154a-18: g-yon pa dag na dbyug pa dang spyi blugs so //
T02TD3305E:154a-19: rdo rje zhi ba ma ni tshangs pa lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:154a-20: so ldan gyi dbang po dkar po mche ba drug pa dang /
T02TD3305E:154a-21: zla ba rdo rje mtshon cha ser po phyag g-yas pas rdo rje 'dzin zhing g-yon pas rdo rje dkur brten pa'o //
T02TD3305E:154a-22: lha mo rdo rje khu tshur ma ni rdo rje mtshon cha lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:154a-23: rta bdun gyi shing rta la rdo rje 'khyil pa khro bo dmar po phyag g-yas pa na padma dang /
T02TD3305E:154a-24: g-yon pa na padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD3305E:154a-25: rdo rje bdud rtsi ma ni rdo rje 'khyil pa lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:154a-26: ngang pa la rdo rje'i 'od khro bo dkar po //
T02TD3305E:154a-27: g-yas pa na rdo rje dang g-yon pa na padma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:154a-28: rdo rje mdog ma ni rdo rje'i 'od lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:154a-29: ral rdo rje dmar ser khro bo dmar po phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang g-yon pas mi bzung nas za ba'i tshul lo //
T02TD3305E:154b-0: rdo rje ska rags ma ni rdo rje @154b dmar ser lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:154b-1: padma la rdo rje zhi ba khro bo ser po mda' dang gzhu can no //
T02TD3305E:154b-2: rdo rje zhi ba ma ni rdo rje zhi ba lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:154b-3: sbal pa la rdo rje bla ma khro bo ser po bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:154b-4: rdo rje bla ma ma ni rdo rje bla ma lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:154b-5: padma la rdo rje ba sangs khro bo dkar po bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:154b-6: rdo rje pa sangs ma ni rdo rje pa sangs lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:154b-7: rus sbal la rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo nag po g-yas pa na rdo rje dang g-yon pa na dbyug pa'o //
T02TD3305E:154b-8: rdo rje dbyug pa ma ni rdo rje dbyug pa lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:154b-9: rdo rje sgra gcan khro bo dmar nag g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag dag na zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor can no //
T02TD3305E:154b-10: rdo rje lha min mo ni rdo rje sgra gcan lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:154b-11: rdo rje mjug rings khro bo nag po ral gri dang klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:154b-12: rdo rje klu mo rdo rje mjug rings lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:154b-13: bzhi po 'di dag dang rdo rje zhi ba la sogs pa drug ni rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa ltar bris pa'o //
T02TD3305E:154b-14: glang po che la rdo rje glang sna dkar po g-yas pa na rdo rje dang g-yon pa na thang gshol lo //
T02TD3305E:154b-15: rdo rje 'dul pa ma ni rdo rje glang sna lta bu ste khyad par ni g-yas pas kha tv'am ga'o //
T02TD3305E:154b-16: khu byug gi shing rta la rdo rje phreng pa can ljang gu g-yas pa na rdo rje dang /
T02TD3305E:154b-17: g-yon ba na me tog gi phreng ba'i //
T02TD3305E:154b-18: rdo rje gdan ma ni rdo rje phreng ba can lta bu ste khyad par ni phyag g-yon na shakti'o //
T02TD3305E:154b-19: ne tso'i shing rta la rdo rje dbang can ser po g-yas na rdo rje dang /
T02TD3305E:154b-20: g-yon na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan no //
T02TD3305E:154b-21: rdo rje dbang can ma ni rdo rje dbang can lta bu ste khyad par ni sku mdog dmar mo'o //
T02TD3305E:154b-22: sbal pa'i shing rta la rnam bar rgyal ba'i rdo rje dkar po rdo rje dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:154b-23: rdo rje gdan ma ni rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:154b-24: me tog gi shing rta la rdo rje gtun shing ser po g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis rdo rje gtun shing 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:154b-25: rdo rje pho nya mo ni rdo rje gtun shing lta bu ste g-yon pas kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa ni khyad par ro //
T02TD3305E:154b-26: ra la rdo rje ma dmar mo g-yas pa dag na rdo rje dang go cha /
T02TD3305E:154b-27: g-yon pas dbyug pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:154b-28: rdo rje 'bar ba ma ni rdo rje me lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:154b-29: ma he la rdo rje dus nag po rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:154b-30: ro langs la rdo rje dus ma nag mo rdo rje dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:154b-31: klu lhag ma rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu sngon po phag gi gdong pa can rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:155a-0: skyes bu la rdo rje gdong @155a * //
T02TD3305E:155a-1: ma sngon mo phag pa'i gdong can ma rdo rje dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:155a-2: chu srin la rdo rje klu dkar po gdengs ka brgyad dang ldan pa g-yas na rdo rje dang /
T02TD3305E:155a-3: g-yon na klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:155a-4: chu srin la rdo rje chu srin ma dkar mo gdengs ka brgyad dang ldan pa g-yas na rdo rje dang /
T02TD3305E:155a-5: g-yon na rdo rjes mtshan pa'i chu srin can no //
T02TD3305E:155a-6: ri dvags la rdo rje rlung sngon po g-yas na rdo rje dang g-yon na rlung ras can no //
T02TD3305E:155a-7: rdo rje shugs can ma ni rdo rje rlung lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:155a-8: ro langs la rdo rje 'jigs byed sngon po rdo rje dang dbyug to 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:155a-9: rdo rje rnam par gtsigs ma ni rdo rje 'jigs byed lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:155a-10: g-yon pas zhags pa 'dzin pa na khyad par ro //
T02TD3305E:155a-11: byi ba la rdo rje legs 'dren dkar po glang po che'i gdong can phyag g-yas pa ngag gis rdo rje dang dgra sta 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:155a-12: g-yon pa dag gis rtse gsum dang dbyug to 'dzin pa sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can no //
T02TD3305E:155a-13: byi ba la srul mo sngon mo g-yas pa na rdo rje dang g-yon pas /
T02TD3305E:155a-15: sdigs ma ljang gu g-yas pa na rdo rje dang g-yon pa na ral gri 'gegs byed 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:155a-16: dpal mo ser mo g-yas pa na rdo rje dang g-yon pa na padma can no //
T02TD3305E:155a-17: dbyangs can ma dkar mo g-yas pa na rdo rje dang g-yon pa na pi wang can no //
T02TD3305E:155a-18: seng ge la bgrad dka' ma ljang gu g-yas pa dag na rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang /
T02TD3305E:155a-19: g-yon pa dag na lda man dang ral gri can no //
T02TD3305E:155a-20: 'dir mgrin pa sngon po la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi phyag g-yas pa rnams su ji ltar 'byung ba'i rdo rje rnams ni rtsa mo gsum par rig par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:155a-21: nub tu rdo rje klu dang nye bar padma la sa'i lha mo gser gyi mdog can phyag dag gis bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:155a-22: lha ma yin rnams ni sna tshogs pa'i mdog can go cha dang bcas pa ral gri 'dzin pa ras bal gyi gdan la 'dug pa'o //
T02TD3305E:155a-23: klu rnams ni nor bu dang ldan pa'i gdengs ka can btsun mo dang bcas pa thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02TD3305E:155a-24: khor yug gi phyi rol mtshams rnams su mer ma nar med la sogs pa'i dmyal ba rnams dang /
T02TD3305E:155a-25: bden bral du yi dags kyi 'gro ba rnams dang /
T02TD3305E:155a-26: rlung du byol song gi 'gro ba rnams dang /
T02TD3305E:155a-27: dbang ldan du mi'i 'gro ba rnams gnas pa ste /
T02TD3305E:155a-28: rim pa 'di ni rgyud gzhan las bris pa'o //
T02TD3305E:155b-0: gzhan dag ni rdo rje 'jigs byed dang nye bar sa'i lha mo dang gnod sbyin rnams @155b dang nye bar lha ma yin rnams so zhes rjod par byed do //
T02TD3305E:155b-1: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi thugs gar zla ba la aom mu ne mu ne ma h'a mu na ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:155b-2: zhes pa'i sngags te 'di nyid ni snying pa'o //
T02TD3305E:155b-3: aom na mo bha ga wa te sarba du rga ti ba ri sho dha na r'a dz'a ya ta th'a ga t'a ya /
T02TD3305E:155b-7: aom sho dha ne sho dha ne /
T02TD3305E:155b-8: sarba p'a pam sho dha ne shuddhe bi shu ddhe /
T02TD3305E:155b-9: sarba krma a'a ba ra na bi shuddhe sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:155b-10: zhes pa phreng pa'i sngags so //
T02TD3305E:155b-12: aom sarba bita sarba aa p'a ya gti ha na bi sho dha ni h'um ho: phat /
T02TD3305E:155b-13: ces pa ste las thams cad pa'o //
T02TD3305E:155b-14: aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes pa ni gzhan dag go //
T02TD3305E:155b-15: 'byung bo 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang ri rab kyi steng sna tshogs chu skyes kyi ze'u 'brul gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i steng du gzhal yas khang gi lte ba la glang po che'i rgyal po'i steng ngam /
T02TD3305E:155b-16: glang po che dang bral ba yang rung sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 'byung po chen po dkar po zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa'i ral ba'i thor cog dang /
T02TD3305E:155b-18: thod pa lnga dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:155b-22: sprul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa dang bcas pa stag gi pags pa'i smad g-yogs can /
T02TD3305E:155b-23: lag pa bzhi'i g-yas pa dag gis gri gug dang da ma ru 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:155b-24: g-yon pa dag gis thod pa dang rtse gsum 'dzin pa drag po ste /
T02TD3305E:155b-25: de g-yon brkyang gis mnan pa'i 'byung po 'dul byed drag po chen po sku mdog sngon po thong pa lngas mtshan pa'i cod pan la de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:155b-26: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du bcings pa na bza' sngon po mnabs pa mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal can bzhad pa'i gang rgyangs can spyan gsum dmar la zlum pa /
T02TD3305E:155b-27: phyag bzhi'i g-yas pas rdo rje sngon po kha gyes pa gsor zhing /
T02TD3305E:155b-28: g-yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:155b-29: gnyis kyis phyag rgya bcings pa ste /
T02TD3305E:155b-30: phyag rgya ni ming med gnyis bsnol nas mdzub mo gnyis bskum ste mthe'u chung dang gung mo yang mthe bong rgan pas mnan pa'o zhes pa 'di gsungs so //
T02TD3305E:155b-31: klu'i rgyal po chen po brgyad kyis brgyan pa ste /
T02TD3305E:155b-32: de'ang stobs kyi rgyu sngon pos spyi bo bcings pa /
T02TD3305E:156a-1: dang nyer dga' ser pos rna rgyan /
T02TD3305E:156a-2: mtha' yas dkar pos tshangs skud /
T02TD3305E:156a-3: nor rgyas dkar pos ska rags /
T02TD3305E:156a-4: phyag rgya'i phyag dag gi dpung par ni rigs ldan phug ron gyi mdog can /
T02TD3305E:156a-5: phyag gzhan pa gnyis kyi dpung pa la dung skyong dkar po //
T02TD3305E:156a-6: rkang gdub dag ni padma dang padma chen po dmar po //
T02TD3305E:156a-7: re'u mig rnams la shar du glang dang nyi ma la dbang phyug chen po dkar po mtshan ma gyen du langs pa thod pa'i phreng ba can /
T02TD3305E:156a-8: spyan gsum pa zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa'i ral pa'i thor cog can sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa dang bcas pa /
T02TD3305E:156a-9: phyag bzhi'i g-yas pa dag gis gri gug dang da ma ru 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:156a-10: g-yon pa dag gis thod pa dang rtse gsum 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:156a-11: lhor nam mkha' lding dang nyi ma la khyab 'jug nag po rin po che'i con pan can g-yas pa dag gis rnga yab dang dung 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:156a-12: g-yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang dbyug to 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:156a-13: nub tu ngang pa dang zla pa la tshangs pa dkar po zhal bzhi pa /
T02TD3305E:156a-15: g-yas pa dag gis bgrang phreng dang gdugs kyi yu ba 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:156a-16: g-yon pa dag gis padma dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:156a-17: byad du rma bya dang nyi ma la smin drug gi bu dmar po gtsug phud gsum dang ldan pa g-yas pas rnga yab dang /
T02TD3305E:156a-19: dbang ldan du byi pa dang zla ba la tshogs bdag dkar po glang po che'i gdod pa can spyan gsum pa spyi bor zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa g-yas pa dag gis la phug dang dgra sta /
T02TD3305E:156a-20: g-yon pa dag gis rtse gsum dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:156a-21: mer nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la nyi ma dmar po g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:156a-22: bden bral du shing rta la gnas pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba la sgra gcan dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba mig dang smin ma dang smin ma dang smar dmar ser 'bar ba /
T02TD3305E:156a-23: mche ba bzhi pa zhal gdangs pa phyag dag gis nyi ma dang zla bar bcas pas thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02TD3305E:156a-24: rlung du zla ba la dga' byed dbang phyug ser po gar byed pa /
T02TD3305E:156a-25: spyi bor zla ba phyed pa can sprul gyi mchod spyir thogs pa dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:156a-26: g-yas pa dang cig shos dag gis da ma ru dang rtse gsum 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:156b-0: rim pa gnyis pa'i shar phyogs su zla ba la dpal mo dkar mo thugs kar thal mo sbyar bas me @156b tog padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:156b-1: lho ru zla ba la thig le mchog ma dmar mo spos snod 'dzin zhing gar byed pa'o //
T02TD3305E:156b-2: nub tu zla ba la ri bong can ma dmar mo mar me 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:156b-3: byang du zla ba la dka' zlog ma ser mo spyi bor gdengs ka'i rnam par byas pa'i lag pa zlog cing gar byed pa'o //
T02TD3305E:156b-4: mer zla ba la rin chen dpal mo dmar mo dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:156b-5: bden bral du zla ba la dbyangs can ma ljang gu pi wang sgrogs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:156b-6: rlung du zla ba la lha mdzes ma nag po rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:156b-7: dbang ldan du zla ba la kun 'byor ma ser mo gar byed cing phyag na rdo rje rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:156b-8: rim pa gsum pa'i gar dus srung dkar po dang zla ba la brgya byin ser po rin po che'i cod pan can g-yas pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing g-yon pa rdo rje'i mtshon cha can no //
T02TD3305E:156b-9: lhor ma he dang nyi ma la gshin rje nag po gsus pa 'phyang ba /
T02TD3305E:156b-10: spyan dang smin ma dang smar dang ral pa dmar ser can /
T02TD3305E:156b-11: gos ser po gyon pa g-yas pa thod pas mtshan pa'i dbyug pa 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:156b-12: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas bas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:156b-13: nub tu lag 'gro dang zla ba la chu lha dkar po gdengs ka bdun dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:156b-14: g-yon pas klu'i zhags pa 'dzin zhing g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:156b-15: byang du gnod sbyin la gnas pa'i lus ngan ser po sha rgyas shing gsus pa 'phyang ba rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02TD3305E:156b-16: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis dbyug to dang ne'u le 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:156b-17: mer ra dang nyi ma la me lha dmar po ral pa dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:156b-18: skra dang smar ser zhing 'bar ba /
T02TD3305E:156b-20: ril ba dang mchod phyir thogs pa can /
T02TD3305E:156b-21: g-yas pa dag gis mchog sbyin dang bgrang phreng 'dzin zhing /
T02TD3305E:156b-22: g-yon pa dag gis dbyug gu gsum pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:156b-23: bden bral du ro langs dang nyi ma la srin po nag po smar ser po can /
T02TD3305E:156b-24: g-yas pas ral gri dang g-yon pas mi shas gang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:156b-25: rlung du ri dags dang zla ba la rlung lha sngon po gtsug phud gsum dang ldan pa phyag dag gis rlung ras 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:156b-26: dbang ldan du ngang pa dang zla ba la zla ba dkar po g-yon pa na ku mu ta na gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD3305E:156b-28: dbang ldan du dbang ldan yang dbang phyug chen po lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:157a-1: du zla ba la seng ge'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin ma dkar mo seng ge'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:157a-2: lho ru zla ba la rnam par 'byor ma dmar mo lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:157a-3: nub tu padma la ldan ma chen mo dkar mo gzhu dang mda' 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:157a-4: byang du zla ba la chang mchog ma dmar mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:157a-5: dbang ldan du zla ba la mchog 'phrog ma dmar mo thugs kar me tog dang bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02TD3305E:157a-6: mer zla ba la rin chen dbang phyug ma ser mo spos phor 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:157a-7: bden bral du zla ba la rgyal mtshan ma ser mo dri'i dung chos 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:157a-8: rlung du zla ba la 'gro skyod ma ser mo mar me'i mchod sdong 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:157a-9: 'dir gang la khyad par gyi tshig med pa der ni nyi ma dang zla ba thams cad sna tshogs padma la gnas pa ste /
T02TD3305E:157a-10: lha thams cad sems dpa'i skyil krung /
T02TD3305E:157a-11: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po ches brgyan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:157a-12: 'dir 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi rigs kyi dbang po ni mi bskyod pa ste thugs ka'i sa bon ni h'um ngo //
T02TD3305E:157a-13: h'um badzra phat ces pa ni snying po ste /
T02TD3305E:157a-15: aom bh'u ta d'a ma ra bh'u ta aa dhi pa ti aaksha bhya:ki r'i di na sarbba bh'u ta pre ta pi sh'a tsa na s'a dha ya h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:157a-17: las thams cad pa'i sngags kyang 'di nyid de yang na bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags so //
T02TD3305E:157a-18: mkha' 'gro lnga'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje'i sa gzhi la sogs pa nas gzhal yas khang gi mthar thug pa sngar gyi 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:157a-19: de la dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su goo r'i la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02TD3305E:157a-20: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su pukka s'i la sogs pa rnams so //
T02TD3305E:157a-21: de yang goo r'i dkar mo g-yas pa lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:157a-22: tsoo r'i ser mo zhags pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:157a-23: be ta l'i dmar mo lcags sgrog 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:157a-24: ghasma r'i ljang gu dril bu 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:157a-25: pukka s'i sngon mo byang chub kyi sems kyi bum pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:157a-26: sha pa r'i dkar mo ri rab 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:157a-27: tsanda l'i sngon mo me thab 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:157a-28: dombi n'i sna tshogs mdog can rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:157a-29: shar gyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su zla ba la sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro dkar mo ste /
T02TD3305E:157b-0: rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po g-yon pa @157b dmar po lhag ma rnams sngon po g-yas pa'i thod pa brgyad po rnams na rma bya dang ma he dang chu srin dang nya dang /
T02TD3305E:157b-1: glang po che dang rus sbal dang klu lhag ma can dang /
T02TD3305E:157b-2: dang pa rnams dang g-yon pa'i thod pa brgyad po rnams na dpyid dang /
T02TD3305E:157b-4: sbrul ha la ha la dang /
T02TD3305E:157b-5: a'anydza na bho dang byi ba dang g-yag dang dri can dang ts'a ta ka rnams so //
T02TD3305E:157b-6: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su rim pa ji lta bar lha mo rnams te /
T02TD3305E:157b-7: de yang skam pa ma sngon mo skam pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:157b-8: zhags pa ma ser mo zhags pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:157b-9: dol zlum ma dmar mo nya rgya zlum po 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:157b-10: lcags kyu ma lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:157b-11: me tog ma dkar mo me tog gi za ma tog 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:157b-12: bdug spos ma nag mo spos phor 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:157b-13: mar me ma ser mo mar me'i mchod sdong 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:157b-14: dri chab ma ser mo dri yis gang ba'i dung chos 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:157b-15: lho'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rin chen mkha' 'gro ser mo ste 'di'i rtsa ba dang g-yon pa'i zhal dag ni ser po dang dkar po'o //
T02TD3305E:157b-16: lhag ma rnams ni sngon po'o //
T02TD3305E:157b-17: g-yas pas thod pa rnams na bya ka randa dang /
T02TD3305E:157b-25: g-yon pa rnams na stobs kyi rgyu dang /
T02TD3305E:157b-33: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams dang /
T02TD3305E:157b-34: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su lha mo rnams te /
T02TD3305E:157b-35: de yang nyi phyag ma dkar mo nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:157b-36: mar me ma sngon mo mar me'i mchod sdong 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:157b-37: rin chen dkar mda' ma ser mo rin po che 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:157b-38: glog phyag ma ljang gu glog gi 'khri shing 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:157b-39: sgeg mo dmar mo bsnyems shing sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i tshul gyi phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:157b-40: phreng ba ma dmar mo phyag dag gis rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:157b-41: glu ma dmar skya phyag dag gis ting ting shags sgrogs pa dang /
T02TD3305E:157b-42: gar ma sna tshogs mdog can rdo rje dang bcas pa'i phyag dag gis gar byed pa'o //
T02TD3305E:158a-0: nub kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su padma mkha' 'gro dmar mo ste @158a * //
T02TD3305E:158a-1: 'di'i rtsa ba dang g-yon pa'i zhal dag ni dmar po dang dkar po /
T02TD3305E:158a-2: lhag ma rnams ni sngon po'o //
T02TD3305E:158a-3: g-yas pa'i thod pa rnams na dom dang /
T02TD3305E:158a-4: bya rgod dang bse dang ba men dang stag dang sbre'u dang chu srin dang ce spyang rnams dang /
T02TD3305E:158a-5: g-yon pa rnams na khra dang 'ug pa dang /
T02TD3305E:158a-9: ra dang ri dags dang phag rnams so //
T02TD3305E:158a-10: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su lha mo rnams ta /
T02TD3305E:158a-11: de yang padma dkar po padma 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:158a-12: chos 'byung ma ser mo chos 'byung 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:158a-13: lcags sgrog ma nag mo phyag dag gis lcags sgrog 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:158a-14: rang 'khyud ma ljang gu sangs rgyas la rjes su chags pa 'ching ba'i phyag gnyis rdo rje dang thod pa 'dzin pas rang la 'khyud par brtson pa'o //
T02TD3305E:158a-15: gling bu ma dmar mo phyag dag gis gling bu 'bud par brtson pa dang /
T02TD3305E:158a-16: pi wang ma ser mo phyag gnyis kyis pi wang sgreng ba la brtson pa dang /
T02TD3305E:158a-17: rnga zlum ma dkar mo phyag dag gis rnga bo che brdung ba dang /
T02TD3305E:158a-18: rdza rnga ma du ba'i mdog can phyag dag gis rdza rnga brdung ba la brtson pa'o //
T02TD3305E:158a-19: byang gi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs mkha' 'gro d'ur ba ltar ljang gu ste /
T02TD3305E:158a-20: 'di'i rtsa ba'i zhal ni stag gdong ljang gu gzhan rnams ni lha'i zhal can /
T02TD3305E:158a-21: phyogs kha cig ni rtsa ba'i zhal yang lha'i yin la g-yon pa dkar po //
T02TD3305E:158a-22: lhag ma rnams ni sngon po'o //
T02TD3305E:158a-23: g-yas pa'i thod pa rnams na gza' lhag dang phur bu dang mjug rings dang sgra gcan dang mig dmar dang pa sangs dang spen pa dang khyab 'jug rnams dang /
T02TD3305E:158a-24: g-yon pa rnams na dbang po dang chu lha dang tshongs pa dang dag po dang 'dod pa'i lha dang stobs bzang dang thags bzangs ris dang stobs can rnams so //
T02TD3305E:158a-25: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su lha mo rnams te /
T02TD3305E:158a-26: de'ang sgo lcags ma dkar mo sgo lcags 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:158a-27: lde kyog ma ser mo lde kyog 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:158a-28: sgo glegs ma dmar mo sgo glags 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:158a-29: yol ba ma nag mo yol ba 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:158a-30: spyan ma dkar mo 'khor lo 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:158a-31: m'a ma k'i sngon mo rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:158a-32: gos dkar mo dmar mo padma 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:158a-33: sgrol ma ljang gu autpala sngon po 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:158b-0: gzhal yas khang chen po'i sgo rnams dang dpa' @158b ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su goo r'i la sogs pa dang /
T02TD3305E:158b-1: pukka s'i la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:158b-2: 'dir rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i gdan dang sku mdog dang dbyibs dang zhal dang phyag la sogs pa rnams ni dgu'i bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag bcu drug pa'i kye'i rdo rje ji lta ba ste /
T02TD3305E:158b-3: kun nas 'khyud pa'i bdag med ma yang de bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:158b-4: 'khor lo la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro bzhi brjod pa'i khyad par gzhan rnams ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:158b-5: de rnams la 'khyud pa'i lha mo rnams ni rim pa ji lta bar /
T02TD3305E:158b-9: sgrol ma rnams te dkar mo dang ser mo dang dmar mo dang ljang gu gri gug dang sdigs mdzub dang ldan pa'i phyag gnyis ma rnams so //
T02TD3305E:158b-10: mkha' 'gro lnga po rnams kyang re re zhing sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can no //
T02TD3305E:158b-11: thams cad du gzhal yas khang gi lha mo rnams ni gcir bu spyan gsum dmar la zlum pa /
T02TD3305E:158b-12: mche ba gtsigs pa zhal gcig ma phyag gnyis ma dbu skra 'bar zhing gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD3305E:158b-13: dpral ba'i dbyings su gnas pa'i thod pa lnga dang mi mgo skam po'i phreng ba'i do shal dang phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa sna tshogs chu skyes dang ro dang nyi ma la g-yon brkyang gi gar gyis gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:158b-14: khyad par ma bshad pa rnams ni thugs ka'i g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyi sdigs mdzub kyis bsdigs par mdzad pa ste /
T02TD3305E:158b-15: 'khyud pa'i lha mo rnams la ni gdan tha dang pa med do //
T02TD3305E:158b-16: goo r'i la sogs pa brgyad la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du ro'i gdan gyi gnas su tshangs pa dang dbang po dang nye dbang dang drag po dang gshin rje dang lus ngan dang bden bral dang thags bzangs ris rnams so zhes pa ni phyogs gcig go //
T02TD3305E:158b-17: mkha' 'gro rnams dang goo r'i la sogs pa rnams ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro la mngon par phyogs pa ste lha mo gzhan rnams ni rang rang gi bdag po la mngon par phyogs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:158b-18: kye'i rdo rje'i spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pa dang rdo rje ste sgo dang mtshams kyi lha mo la thugs dang rtag pa dang rin chen dbang po dang 'od dpag med rnams so //
T02TD3305E:158b-19: rtag pa la 'khor lo 'dzin pa dang 'khor lo ste sgo dang mtshams kyi lha mo rnams la thugs dang rin chen dbang po dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa rnams so //
T02TD3305E:159a-0: rdo rje nyi ma la rin chen @159a * //
T02TD3305E:159a-1: 'dzin pa dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu ste /
T02TD3305E:159a-2: sgo dang mtshams kyi lha mo rnams la sku dang thugs dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa rnams so //
T02TD3305E:159a-3: padma gar gyi dbang phyug la padma 'dzin pa dang rdo rje padma ste /
T02TD3305E:159a-4: sgo dang mtshams kyi lha mo rnams la sku dang rin chen dang mi bskyod pa dang 'od dpag med rnams so //
T02TD3305E:159a-5: rta mchog la ral gri 'dzin pa dang ral gri ste /
T02TD3305E:159a-6: sgo dang mtshams kyi lha mo rnams la sku dang thugs dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa rnams so //
T02TD3305E:159a-7: phyi rol gyi goo r'i la sogs pa rnams la ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:159a-8: rdo rje la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro rnams kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02TD3305E:159a-9: h'um aom tr'am a'a:kham zhes pa'o //
T02TD3305E:159a-10: snying po'i sngags ni aom dha ra dha ra dh'a ra ya dh'a ra ya mrda mrda badzra dhri ka phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:159a-11: aom sh'a shra ta per ma sh'a shva ta ae hye hi dzi na dzi ka h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:159a-12: aom badzra s'u rya ta mo pidha ma na sa ma ya stvam aa ham ratna dhri ka phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:159a-13: aom badzra dha rm'a sa ma ya stvam hu lu hu lu a'a ro lika phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:159a-14: aom h'um h'um hi hi pradzny'a dhti ka h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:159a-17: na mo badzra kro dh'a ya ma h'a damshta autka ta bhee ra wa ya badzra santo ha darp'a ya aa mri te kunta li h'um zhes pa ni mthar byed kyi sngags te las thams cad pa'o //
T02TD3305E:159a-18: mkha' 'gro lnga po 'di rnams las gang yang rung ba dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsgom par bya ste re re zhing yang dkyil 'khor so so'o //
T02TD3305E:159a-19: de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
T02TD3305E:159a-20: gang zhig sangs rgyas mgon po nyid //
T02TD3305E:159a-21: dbus su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD3305E:159a-22: de nyid kyis ni dkyil 'khor gsungs //
T02TD3305E:159a-25: yang bsdus pa yi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD3305E:159a-27: 'khor los sgyur ba drug gi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje'i sa gzhi la sogs pa nas rtsebs bcu pa'i 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin te /
T02TD3305E:159a-28: rtsibs bcu pa'i 'khor lo la khro bo bcu'o //
T02TD3305E:159a-29: gzhan 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i khro bo'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rdo rje sa 'og gi bar lta bu'o zhes pa ni khyad par ro //
T02TD3305E:159b-0: 'dir 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa'i lte ba'i nang chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dbus su rlung dang @159b me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor dang ri rab kyi steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang rdo rje'i lte ba la gzhal yas khang chen po ste /
T02TD3305E:159b-1: phyogs gzhan la ni 'dir chos 'byung med pa'o //
T02TD3305E:159b-2: gzhal yas khang chen po'i lte bar gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su gnas pa'i seng ge'i steng du sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhugs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya'o zhes mngon par brjod pa bla ma las gsungs pa'i phyir /
T02TD3305E:159b-3: nyi ma la gnas pa'i 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan gyi steng du rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i ye shes mkha' 'gro ste rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po'am nag po //
T02TD3305E:159b-4: rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bur bcas pa'i g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi phyag dag gis lha mo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:159b-5: de ni rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub tu bcas pa'i phyag g-yas brkyang zhing phyag g-yon thod pa khrag gis gang ba 'dzin pas 'khyud pa /
T02TD3305E:159b-6: sku mdog dmar mo ye shes mkha' 'gro ma ste /
T02TD3305E:159b-7: ming gzhan chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dang /
T02TD3305E:159b-8: rdo rje phag mo zhes par yang grags so //
T02TD3305E:159b-9: de nas shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su g-yas skor gyis sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro la sogs pa lnga po dgod par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:159b-10: de dag gi 'khor lo rnams ni dkyil 'khor so so'i shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su g-yon skor dang /
T02TD3305E:159b-11: me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su g-yas skor gyis so //
T02TD3305E:159b-12: rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshams rnams su rim pa ji lta bar mkha' 'gro ma dang l'a ma dang dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma rnams ni /
T02TD3305E:159b-13: sngon mo dang ser mo dang dmar mo dang ljang gu rnams te g-yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:159b-14: sgo rnams su thod pa'i dum bu dang keng rus chen po dang keng rus dang mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa rnams ni nag po ste rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bur bcas pa'i phyag dag gis rab tu gtum mo dang /
T02TD3305E:159b-15: gtum pa'i mig can ma dang 'od ldan ma dang sna chen mo thal ba dkar po'i mdog can rnams la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:160a-0: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su seng ge'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la gnas pa'i tshangs pa'i snying gar skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dkar po ste 'khor lo dang 'khor los @160a * //
T02TD3305E:160a-1: mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa'i g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag dag gis sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:160a-2: sgo rnams la chang dgra dang 'od dpag med dang rdo rje'i 'od dang /
T02TD3305E:160a-3: rdo rje'i sku rnams ni dkar po ste 'khor lo dang 'khor lo'i dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag dag gis dpa' bo'i blo can ma dang mi'u thud ma dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma dang shing grib ma ser mo rnams la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:160a-4: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su rta'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i lha'i bu nyi ma'i snying gar rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i rin chen mkha' 'gro ser mo ste rin po che dang rin po ches mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa'i g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag dag gis rin chen mkha' 'gro ma ser mo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:160a-5: sgo rnams la myu gu can dang rdo rje ral pa can dang dpa' bo chen po dang rdo rje h'um mdzad rnams ni ser po ste rin po che dang rin po che'i dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag dag gis sa srung ma dang 'jigs byed chen mo dang rlung shugs ma dang chang 'thung ma ljang gu rnams la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:160a-6: snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su rma bya'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i snying gar rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i padma mkha' 'gro dmar po ste padma dang padmas mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa'i g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag dag gis padma mkha' 'gro ma dmar mo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:160a-7: sgo rnams la shin tu bzang po dang rdo rje bzang po dang 'jigs byed chen po dang mig mi bzang rnams ni sku mdog dmar po ste padma dang padma'i dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag dag gis sngo bsangs lha mo dang shin tu bzang mo dang rta rna ba dang bya gdong ma dkar mo rnams la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:160a-8: mi bskyod pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su glang po che'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la khyab 'jug gi snying gar rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro nag po ste rdo rje dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa'i g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag dag gis rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:160a-9: de ni dmar mo'am nag mo'o //
T02TD3305E:160b-0: sgo rnams la stobs po che dang rin chen rdo rje dang nam mkha'i snying po rnams ni nag po ste rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag dag gis @160b 'khor lo'i shugs can ma dang dum skyes ma dang chang 'tshong ma dang 'khor lo'i go cha ma rnams ser mo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:160b-1: don yod grub pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su nam mkha' lding gi steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i lha'i bu zla ba'i snying gar rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ljang gu ste sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa'i g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag dag gis sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma ljang gu la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:160b-2: sgo rnams la dpal he ru ka dang padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang rnam par snang mdzad dang rdo rje sems dpa' rnams ljang gu ste sna tshogs rdo rje dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag dag gis shin tu dpa' mo dang stobs chen mo dang 'khor los sgyur ma dang brtson 'grus chen mo du ba ltar sngo skya'i mdog can rnams la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:160b-3: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni g-yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:160b-4: 'dir mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa ni g-yon pas thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang g-yas pas da ma ru 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:160b-5: ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dang rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa bzhi ni phyag g-yas pas rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub gdengs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:160b-6: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma dang dpa' bo'i blo can ma la sogs pa rnams ni 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub can no //
T02TD3305E:160b-7: rin chen mkha' 'gro ma dang sa srung ma la sogs pa rnams ni rin po che dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub po //
T02TD3305E:160b-8: padma'i mkha' 'gro ma dang bsngo bsangs lha mo la sogs pa rnams ni padma dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub po //
T02TD3305E:160b-9: rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang 'khor lo'i shugs can ma la sogs pa ni rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub bo //
T02TD3305E:160b-10: sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma dang shin tu dpa' mo la sogs pa rnams ni sna tshogs rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub bo //
T02TD3305E:160b-11: ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa thams cad kyang 'khyud par byed pa g-yon pa'i phyag dag gis 'dzag pa'i khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:160b-12: dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo rnams la khva gdong ma dang 'ug gdong ma dad kyi gdong ma dang phag gdong ma rnams ni ming dang rjes su mthun pa'i zhal can te rim pa ji lta bar sngon mo dang ser mo dang dmar mo dang ljang gu'i mdog can /
T02TD3305E:161a-1: pa rnams kyis lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang lcags sgrog dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:161a-2: mtshams rnams la gshin rje brtan ma dang shin rje pho nya mo dang gshin rje mche ba ma dang gshin rje 'joms ma rnams ni mi'i gdong can te /
T02TD3305E:161a-3: g-yas dang g-yon gyi sku phyed phyed g-yas dang g-yon gyi lha mo'i mdog can /
T02TD3305E:161a-4: phyag g-yas pa rnams kyis me long dang pi wang dang dri'i dung chos dang ro'i snod 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:161a-5: lha mo brgyad po 'di dag kyang g-yon pas thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa g-yas brkyang gis gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:161a-6: gzhal yas khang drug po rnams kyi mtshams rnams su byang chub kyi sems la sogs pas gang ba'i thod pa rnams ni sna tshogs chu skyes la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:161a-7: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa nas gshin rje 'joms ma'i mthar thug pa rnams ni sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i ro rnams la bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:161a-8: 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyang ro la gnas pa'o zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan no //
T02TD3305E:161a-9: lha pho rnams ni sku rgyab tu 'phyang ba'i stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs dkris pa /
T02TD3305E:161a-10: mchod phyir thogs pa can mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba mgrin pa la 'phyang ba /
T02TD3305E:161a-11: ral pa nag po'i thor cog can no //
T02TD3305E:161a-12: lha mo rnams ni gcer bu dbu skra nag po grol zhing mi mgo skam po'i phreng ba mgrin par 'phyang ba'o //
T02TD3305E:161a-13: lha mo bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po rnams kyang zhal gcig ma phyag gnyis ma spyan gsum pa rdo rje phreng bas mtshan pa'i dpral ba'i dbyes nas thod pa lngas brgyan pa /
T02TD3305E:161a-14: dpung rgyan dang g-yer kha la sogs pas mngon par brgyan pa /
T02TD3305E:161a-15: phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:161a-16: 'khor los sgyur ba drug ni mchog gi phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:161a-17: nor bu dang zla ba phyed pa dang sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ral pa nag pa'i thor cog can no //
T02TD3305E:161a-18: lha mo sum cu rtsa bzhi po rnams ni rang rang gi 'khor lo'i dbang po la mngon par phyogs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:161a-19: 'khor los sgyur ba lnga dang khva gdong ma la sogs pa rnams ni dbus kyi 'khor lo'i dbang po la mngon par phyogs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:161a-20: dpa' bo rnams ni rang rang gi shes rab ma la mngon par phyogs ba'o //
T02TD3305E:161a-21: de ltar 'di ni phyogs gcig go //
T02TD3305E:161b-0: 'khor los sgyur ba drug po 'di dag kyang g-yas brkyang gi zhabs can no zhes pa'i khyad par ni phyogs gnyis @161b pa'o //
T02TD3305E:161b-1: phyogs gnyis po 'di dag la yang ye shes mkha' 'gro dang sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro dang de dag gi 'khor rnams kyang seng ge'i steng du gnas pa dang /
T02TD3305E:161b-2: rin chen mkha' 'gro dang de'i 'khor rnams kyang rta'i steng du gnas pa dang /
T02TD3305E:161b-3: padma mkha' 'gro dang de'i 'khor rnams kyang rma bya'i steng du gnas pa dang /
T02TD3305E:161b-4: rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang de'i 'khor rnams kyang glang po che'i steng du gnas pa dang /
T02TD3305E:161b-5: sna tshogs mkha' 'gro dang de'i 'khor rnams kyang nam mkha'i lding gi steng du gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:161b-6: ye shes mkha' 'gro la sogs pa 'di dag ni rdo rje'i skyil krung can no //
T02TD3305E:161b-7: khva gdong ma la sogs pa brgyad po 'di dag phyogs skyong ba brgyad po rnams la g-yas brkyang gis gnas pa'o zhes pa ni phyogs gsum pa'o //
T02TD3305E:161b-8: phyogs 'di rnams dang phyogs gzhan la yang ye shes mkha' 'gro la sogs pa rnams ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma nyid la sogs pa dang /
T02TD3305E:161b-9: zhal gsum phyag drug ma nyid la sogs pa dang /
T02TD3305E:161b-10: zhal lnga phyag brgyad ma nyid la sogs pa dang /
T02TD3305E:161b-11: zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis ma nyid la sogs pa dang /
T02TD3305E:161b-12: zhal brgyad phyag bcu drug ma nyid la sogs pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu spros nas gsungs mod /
T02TD3305E:161b-13: gzhung rnam par rgyas pas 'jigs nas 'dir ma bstan no//
T02TD3305E:161b-14: rigs kyi bdag po ni 'khor los sgyur ba drug po rnams rang rang gi dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi ste /
T02TD3305E:161b-15: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni 'khor los sgyur ba lnga'i'o //
T02TD3305E:161b-17: khva gdong ma la sogs pa rnams kyi ni sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ste /
T02TD3305E:161b-18: ye shes mkha' 'gro'o zhes pa ni kha gcig gi'o //
T02TD3305E:161b-19: thugs ka'i sa bon rnams ni ye shes mkha' 'gro la sogs pa rnams kyi rim pa ji lta bar bam bhr'um a'am hr'im kham ngo //
T02TD3305E:161b-20: snying po'i sngags rnams ni aom shr'i ma h'a su kha badzra satv'a d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ram h'um a'a h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:161b-21: aom shr'i buddha d'a ka aa la la la bhr'um a'a:d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ram h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:161b-22: aom shr'i ratna d'a ka tram aa:h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ram h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:161b-23: aom shr'i padma d'a ka hr'i:d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ram h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:161b-24: aom shr'i badzra d'a ka a'a:h'um phat d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ram h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:161b-25: aom shr'i bi shva d'a ka ho: kham a'a: h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ram h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:162a-0: ces pa ni dum skyes ma'i ste @162a * //
T02TD3305E:162a-1: las thams cad pa'i sngags so //
T02TD3305E:162a-2: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du srung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa'o //
T02TD3305E:162a-3: de'i shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi rtsibs rnams la shin tu stobs dang rmugs byed dang /
T02TD3305E:162a-4: rengs byed dang khengs byed rnams ni ming gzhan ni bgegs mthar byed dang shes rab mthar byed dang gshin rje mthar byed dang padma mthar byed rnams so //
T02TD3305E:162a-5: me la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams la /
T02TD3305E:162a-6: dbyug sngon can dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang stobs po che dang mi g-yo ba rnams so //
T02TD3305E:162a-7: steng gi rtsibs la gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ste 'og gi rtsibs la gnod mdzes rgyal po'o //
T02TD3305E:162a-8: de skad du'ang bsdus pa'i rgyud las /
T02TD3305E:162a-9: slar yang 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas khro bo'i tshogs ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD3305E:162a-10: zhes pa dang dri ma med pa'i 'od las srung ba'i 'khor lo khro bo la sogs pa spro bar bya ste dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi bsrung ba'i don du'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD3305E:162a-11: khro bo 'di rnams ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can no //
T02TD3305E:162a-12: srung ba'i 'khor lo'i lte ba'i nang du chos kyi 'byung gnas te /
T02TD3305E:162a-13: gang yang dri ma med pa'i 'od las phyi rol du skye ba'i mtshan ma ni nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa ste nang du ni shes rab kyi chos 'byung zur gsum pa'o zhes gsungs pas /
T02TD3305E:162a-14: phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i khams nyid dkyil 'khor la chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi gzugs su bsgom bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:162a-15: chos 'byung gi dbus su rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i ri rab dang sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang thig le nag po'i gzugs can sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gnas shing /
T02TD3305E:162a-16: phyi rol nas rdo rje'i 'od zer dang nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i khor yug gis yongs su bskor ba'i gzhal yas khang chen po'o //
T02TD3305E:162a-17: yang na srung ba'i 'khor lo ni bgegs nye bar zhi ba tsam gyi dgos pa'o zhes pas bgegs bcom pa'i rjes nas ma bsams shing /
T02TD3305E:162b-0: chos 'byung yang ma bsgoms par srung ba'i gur gyi nang du nam mkha' la rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug ba'i steng du gnas shing phyi rol nas 'od zer la sogs pa'i khor yug rnams kyis @162b yongs su bskor ba'i gzhal yas khang chen po'o //
T02TD3305E:162b-1: de'i phyed du gsung gi 'khor lo dang /
T02TD3305E:162b-2: de'i phyed du thugs kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02TD3305E:162b-3: de'i phyed du bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo dang /
T02TD3305E:162b-4: de'i phyed du bcom ldan 'das kyi padma ljang gu ste /
T02TD3305E:162b-5: padma'i sum cha ni lte ba'o //
T02TD3305E:162b-6: de'i steng nas steng du gnas pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma la sgra gcan dang dus me'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yan lag med pa dang drag po gan rkyal du bsgyel ba'i snying gar g-yas brkyang gi gar gyis bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo ste /
T02TD3305E:162b-7: sku mdog nag po nor bu dang zla ba phyed pa dang sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ral pa'i thor cog can /
T02TD3305E:162b-8: rdo rje'i nor bu dang rdo rje'i rna cha dang rdo rje'i mgul rgyan dang /
T02TD3305E:162b-14: stag gi pags pa 'phyang ba'i sham thabs can /
T02TD3305E:162b-15: zhal bzhi pa spyan bcu gnyis pa'o ;
T02TD3305E:162b-16: / de yang rtsa ba'i zhal nag po mche ba gtsigs pa drag po /
T02TD3305E:162b-17: g-yas pa dmar po chags pa dang bcas pa /
T02TD3305E:162b-18: rgyab ma ser po ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa /
T02TD3305E:162b-19: g-yon pa dkar po zhi ba'o //
T02TD3305E:162b-20: dbus dang g-yas dang g-yon gyi mgrin pa gsum ni sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar po ste bcom ldan 'das ni mgrin pa gsum pa'o //
T02TD3305E:162b-21: g-yas pa'i phrag pa dang po sngon po dang gnyis pa dmar po dang gsum pa dkar po ste /
T02TD3305E:162b-22: de bzhin du g-yon pa'i yang sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar po'o //
T02TD3305E:162b-23: de ltar na phrag pa drug dang /
T02TD3305E:162b-24: dpung pa bcu gnyis dang nye ba'i dpung pa nas brtsams te phyag dar nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02TD3305E:162b-25: de la g-yas kyi dpung pa gnyis sngon po dang gnyis dmar po dang gnyis dkar po'o //
T02TD3305E:162b-26: de bzhin du g-yon gyi'ang ngo //
T02TD3305E:162b-27: de bzhin du phyag bzhi bzhi nag po dang /
T02TD3305E:162b-30: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa rnams kyi'o //
T02TD3305E:162b-31: phyag re re 'ang sor mo lnga pa ste /
T02TD3305E:162b-32: de dag re re zhing yang tshigs gsum pa'o //
T02TD3305E:162b-33: de'ang mthe bong ser po dang mdzub mo dkar po dang gung mo dmar po dang ming med nag po dang mthe chung ljang gu ste /
T02TD3305E:162b-34: phyag gi mthil nas sor mo thams cad kyi tshigs kyi phreng ba dang po nag po gnyis pa dmar po /
T02TD3305E:163a-0: @163a * // de rnams kyang sor gdub rnams kyi 'od dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:163a-1: g-yas pa'i phyag rnams kyi nag po rnams na rdo rje dang ral gri dang rtse gsum dang gri gug dang /
T02TD3305E:163a-2: dmar po rnams na me'i mda' dang rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang /
T02TD3305E:163a-5: dkar po rnams na 'khor lo dang /
T02TD3305E:163a-6: mdung dang dbyug pa dang dgra sta rnams so //
T02TD3305E:163a-7: g-yon pa'i nag po rnams na dril bu dang /
T02TD3305E:163a-9: kha tv'am ga dbye ba dang /
T02TD3305E:163a-10: khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang /
T02TD3305E:163a-11: dmar po rnams na gzhu dang /
T02TD3305E:163a-16: dkar po rnams na dung dang /
T02TD3305E:163a-19: tshangs pa'i mgo bo rnams so //
T02TD3305E:163a-20: brla nas brtsams nas dmar po'i mdog can gyi zhabs g-yas pa'i mthil dmar pos 'dod pa'i lha dmar po gdong gcig pa lag pa bzhis me tog gi mda' lnga dang /
T02TD3305E:163a-23: lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i snying gar mnan cing /
T02TD3305E:163a-24: brla nas brtsams nas dkar po'i zhabs g-yon pa'i mthil gyis drag po dkar po gdong gcig pa mig gsum pa lag pa bzhis rtse gsum dang /
T02TD3305E:163a-27: kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'i snying gar mnan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:163a-28: 'dod lha'i gzhogs su dga' ma dang dbang phyug chen po'i gzhogs su dkar mo ste lha mo 'di dag ni dman pa'i bzhin dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'jus pa'o //
T02TD3305E:163a-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khyud pa'i sna tshogs yum ni g-yon brkyang gis gnas pa gser gyi mdog can phyag g-yas pa rnams kyis gri gug dang lcags kyu dang da ma ru dang /
T02TD3305E:163a-31: g-yon pa rnams kyis thod pa dang zhags pa dang padma dkar po dang rin po che rnams 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:163a-32: 'dab ma rnams la shar du nag mo 'bar ma nag mo phyag g-yas pa rnams kyis bdug spos kyi snod dang tsandan gyi snod dang gur gum gyi snod dang gla rtsi dang bcas pa'i ga bur gyi snod dang /
T02TD3305E:163a-33: g-yon ba rnams kyis dril bu dang padma dang lha'i ljon pa'i me tog dang sna tshogs pa'i me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:163a-34: lhor dmar mo 'bar ma dmar mo g-yas pa rnams kyis mar me dang do shal dang cod pan dang lag gdub dang /
T02TD3305E:163b-0: g-yon pa @163b rnams kyis gos dang ska rags dang rin po che'i rna rgyan dang rkang gdub 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:163b-1: nub tu ser mo 'bar ma ser mo g-yas pa rnams kyis dung dang gling bu dang nor bu dang da ma ru dang /
T02TD3305E:163b-2: g-yon pa rnams kyis pi wang dang rnga zlum dang 'khar rnga dang zangs dung 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:163b-3: byang du dkar mo 'bar ma dkar mo g-yas pa rnams kyis 'o ma'i snod dang chu'i snod dang lha'i sman dang chang gi snod dang /
T02TD3305E:163b-4: g-yon pa rnams kyis bdud rtse'i snod dang grub pa'i bcud kyi snod dang bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu dang bza' ba'i snod 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:163b-5: me la sogs pa rnams su du ba ma dang smig rgyu ma dang mar me ma dang mkha' snang ma'i lha mo rnams te /
T02TD3305E:163b-6: rim pa ji lta bar nag mo dang dmar mo dang ser mo dang dkar mo'i mdog can phyag brgyad kyis rang rang gi mdog can gyi rnga yab brgyad 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:163b-7: de dag gi rgyab kyi phyi rol du yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang chos kyi gandi dang /
T02TD3305E:163b-8: dpag bsam gyi shing dang chos kyi dud rnams te nag po dang dmar po dang ser po dang dkar po'o //
T02TD3305E:163b-9: nag mo 'bar ma la sogs pa brgyad ni mnyam pa'i rkang stabs kyi gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:163b-10: sna tshogs yum la sogs pa'i lha mo thams cad phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:163b-11: phyag brgyad ma zhal bzhi ma spyan bcu gnyis ma'o //
T02TD3305E:163b-12: de yang shar lho dang nub byang gi rim pas sna tshogs yum gyi zhal rnams ni ser po dang dkar po dang sngon po dang dmar po ste /
T02TD3305E:163b-13: de bzhin du lha mo ser mo dag gi'ang ngo //
T02TD3305E:163b-14: nag mo dag gi ni nag po dang dmar po dang ser po dang dkar po'o //
T02TD3305E:163b-15: dmar mo dag gi ni dmar po dang ser po dang dkar po dang sngon po'o //
T02TD3305E:163b-16: dkar mo dag gi ni dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po dang ser po'o //
T02TD3305E:163b-17: rim pa gnyis pa dang gsum pa dag gi lha mo rnams ni zhal gsum pa spyan dgu pa phyag drug pa rnams so //
T02TD3305E:163b-18: de yang phyogs rnams la shar du don yod grub pa nag po nag po dang dmar po dang dkar po'i zhal can /
T02TD3305E:163b-19: g-yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang gri gug dang rtse gsum dang g-yon pa rnams kyis phub dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa spyan mas 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:163b-20: lhor rin chen 'byung ldan dmar po dmar po dang dkar po dang nag po'i zhal can /
T02TD3305E:163b-21: g-yas pa rnams kyis me'i mda' dang lcags kyu dang da ma ru dang /
T02TD3305E:164a-1: pa rnams kyis gzhu dang zhags pa dang rin po che cha dgu pa 'dzin pa m'a ma k'i sa 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:164a-2: nub tu rnam par snang mdzad ser po ser po dang dkar po dang nag po'i zhal can /
T02TD3305E:164a-3: g-yas pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang dbyug pa dang mi 'jigs pa mdzad pas rdo rje dang /
T02TD3305E:164a-4: g-yon pa rnams kyis dung dang rdo rje lcags sgrog dang dril bu 'dzin pas sgrol ma la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:164a-5: byang du snang ba mtha' yas dkar po dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po'i zhal can /
T02TD3305E:164a-6: g-yas pa rnams kyis thob dang mdung dang rtse gsum dang /
T02TD3305E:164a-7: g-yon pa rnams kyis padma dkar po dang me long dang bgrang phreng 'dzin pa /
T02TD3305E:164a-9: bzhi po 'di rnams ni chu skyes dkar po dang nyi ma la gnas pa ral pa'i thor cog can te /
T02TD3305E:164a-10: zhal rnams ni rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i rim pas so //
T02TD3305E:164a-11: me dang bden bral dang rlung dang dbang ldan rnams su padma dmar po dang zla ba la sgrol ma dang gos dkar mo dang spyan ma dang m'a ma k'i rnams ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du don yod grub pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang rtag pa dang snang ba mtha' yas dang mtshungs pa ste /
T02TD3305E:164a-12: rnam par snang mdzad dang snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa dang /
T02TD3305E:164a-13: rin chen 'byung ldan rnams dang snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
T02TD3305E:164a-14: yang na sgrol ma'i kha tv'am ga'i gnas su autpala ste /
T02TD3305E:164a-15: gzhogs brgyang du ni bdud rtsi'i bum pa brgyad do //
T02TD3305E:164a-16: rim pa gsum pa'i snam bu la shar sgo'i g-yon ngos su kun du bzang po sngon po g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang gri gug dang dgra sta /
T02TD3305E:164a-17: g-yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang thod pa dang tshangs pa'i mgo bo 'dzin pa yang na tshangs pa'i mgo'i gnas su autpala ste /
T02TD3305E:164a-18: chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma dang snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
T02TD3305E:164a-19: g-yas su nam mkha'i snying po don yod grub pa lta bu la dri rdo rje mas 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:164a-20: lho sgo'i g-yon du phyag na rdo rje ljang gu g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang gri gug dang dgra sta /
T02TD3305E:164a-21: g-yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang thod pa dang tshangs pa'i mgo 'dzin pa sgra rdo rje mas 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:164b-0: g-yas su sa'i snying po rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu gzugs rdo rje ma dang snyoms par 'jug pa nub sgo'i g-yon du chos @164b kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma phyag na rdo rje lta bu la kun du bzang pos 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:164b-1: g-yas su sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba rnam par snang mdzad lta bu la reg bya rdo rje mas 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:164b-2: byang sgo'i g-yon du sgra rdo rje ma kun du bzang po lta bu la phyag na rdo rjes 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:164b-3: g-yas su 'jig rten dbang phyug snang ba mtha' yas lta bu la ro rdo rje mas 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:164b-4: mer reg bya rdo rje ma sgrol ma lta bu la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
T02TD3305E:164b-5: bden bral du ro rdo rje ma gos dkar mo lta bu la 'jig rten dbang phyug gis 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:164b-6: rlung du dri rdo rje ma spyan ma lta bu la nam mkha'i snying pos 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:164b-7: dbang ldan du gzugs rdo rje ma m'a ma k'i lta bu la sa'i snying pos 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD3305E:164b-8: 'dir don yod grub pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02TD3305E:164b-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rdo rje'i gdan gyis bzhugs pa ste ;
T02TD3305E:164b-10: sgrol ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni padma'i 'dug stangs kyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:164b-11: sgo rnams la khro bo shin tu stobs don yod grub pa lta bu la rengs byed mas yang dag par 'khyud pa ste de'ang spyan ma lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:164b-12: lhor rmugs byed rin chen dbang po lta bu la khengs byed mas snyoms par zhugs pa ste de yang m'a ma k'i lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:164b-13: nub tu rengs byed rnam par snang mdzad lta bu la shin tu stobs mas 'khyud pa ste de yang sgrol ma lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:164b-14: byang du khengs byed 'od dpag med lta bu la rmugs byed mas yang dag par 'khyud pa ste de yang gos dkar mo lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:164b-15: 'on kyang khro bo 'di rnams ni g-yas brkyang gis gnas pa ste khro bo'i lha mo rnams ni g-yon brgyang gis gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:164b-16: 'dir lha pho rnams kyi gdan ni padma dkar po dang nyi ma rnams te /
T02TD3305E:164b-17: lha mo rnams kyi gdan ni padma dmar po la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams so //
T02TD3305E:164b-18: yang na nag po dang dkar po dang ljang gu rnams la zla ba la gnas pa dang dmar po dang ser po rnams dang kun du bzang po dang sgra rdo rje ma ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa ste /
T02TD3305E:164b-19: de dag gi rigs pa yang dri ma med pa'i 'od las gsungs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:165a-0: 'dir gang gi gnas su lha rnams gang gsungs pa de ni de'i btso bo @165a * //
T02TD3305E:165a-1: yin pa'i phyir 'khor lo'i dbang po la mngon par phyogs pa ste /
T02TD3305E:165a-2: de'i pang du gnas pa ni ma yin no //
T02TD3305E:165a-3: 'dir 'dab ma brgyad kyi lha mo rnams dang bum pa rnams dang chos kyi dung la sogs pa spangs nas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yang bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:165a-4: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis nye bar bskor ba yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa lta bu'o //
T02TD3305E:165a-5: stegs bu rnams la shar gyi g-yon rta babs kyi ka ba'i rtsa ba'i g-yon du dri chab ma nag mo dri'i dung chos 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:165a-6: g-yas su phreng ba ma nag mo me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:165a-7: lhor bdug spos ma dmar mo bdug sbos kyi snod 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:165a-8: mar me ma dmar mo mar me'i mchod sdong 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:165a-9: nub tu sgeg mo ser mo cod pan ser po 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:165a-10: bzhad ma ser mo do shal ser po 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:165a-11: byang du bdud rtsi ma'am ming gzhan zhal zas ma zhes bya ba dkar mo 'bras bu dkar po 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:165a-12: 'bras bu mi zad pa'am ming gzhan bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ma zhes bya ba dkar mo bdud rtsis gang ba'i snod 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:165a-13: stegs bu thams cad la yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa 'dzin pa'i lha mo grangs med pa'o //
T02TD3305E:165a-14: shar gyi rta babs kyi mchod pa'i lha mo'i gnas su gar ma sngon mo gar gyi tshul gyis gos 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:165a-15: lhor 'dod ma dmar mo padma 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:165a-16: nub tu sil snyan ma ser mo rnga pa ta ha brdung ba dang /
T02TD3305E:165a-17: byang du glu ma dkar mo rdo rje 'dzin pa ste bdud rtsi ma la sogs pa dgod ba 'di dag ni dbang bskur ba'i le'u'i rim pa'o //
T02TD3305E:165a-18: gang yang sgrub thabs kyi le'u'i 'grel pa las byang du sil snyan ma dang gar ma dang /
T02TD3305E:165a-19: nam mkhar glu ma dang 'dod ma dang /
T02TD3305E:165a-21: bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ma zhes gsungs pa de la yang dbang bskur ba'i le'u las gsungs pa'i dgod pa 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:165a-22: gzhung de dag rjes su mthun par sbyor ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD3305E:165a-23: gzhan du na snga ma dang phyi ma dag 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD3305E:165a-24: lha mo bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni padma'i 'dug stangs kyis gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:165a-25: gsung gi dkyil 'khor la phyogs kyi padma rnams ni dmar po dang /
T02TD3305E:165b-0: mtshams @165b kyi padma rnams ni dkar po ste de rnams nyi ma dang zla ba dang bral ba la sa ga'i 'dug stangs kyis gnas pa'i lha mo rnams so //
T02TD3305E:165b-1: de yang yi dags dmar po'i steng du gnas pa'i shar gyi chu skyes kyi lte ba la rtsa rtsig nag mo zhal gcig ma spyan gsum ma /
T02TD3305E:165b-2: phyag g-yas pa dag gis gri gug dang rtse gsum dang /
T02TD3305E:165b-3: g-yon pa dag gis thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa dbang po ser pos 'khyud pa ste /
T02TD3305E:165b-4: mdun la sogs pa'i 'dab ma brgyad la /
T02TD3305E:165b-5: 'jigs ma dang drag mo dang dus kyi mche ba ma dang me 'bar gdong ma dang rlung shugs ma dang rab gtum ma dang drag mig ma dang sna chen ma rnams so //
T02TD3305E:165b-6: nam mkha' lding gi steng du gnas pa'i me'i chu skyes kyi lte ba la khyab 'jug ma nag mo g-yas pa dag gis 'khor lo dang dbyug pa /
T02TD3305E:165b-7: g-yon pa dag gis padma dang dung 'dzin pa tshangs mas 'khyud pa ste /
T02TD3305E:165b-8: 'dab ma rnams la dpal mo dang sgyu ma dang grags ma dang g-yang mo dang phun sum tshogs ma dang rnam par rgyal ma dang dpal ldan rgyal ma dang dpal ldan rgyal byed ma dang dpal ldan 'khor lo can ma rnams so //
T02TD3305E:165b-9: ma he'i steng du lho'i chu skyes kyi lte ba la phag mo dmar mo phag gi zhal can /
T02TD3305E:165b-10: g-yas pa dag gis dbyug pa dang ral gri dang /
T02TD3305E:165b-11: g-yon pa dag gis lcags sgrog dang phub 'dzin pa drag pos 'khyud pa ste /
T02TD3305E:165b-12: 'dab ma rnams la keng rus ma dang dus mtshan ma dang rab khros gdong ma dang dus kyi lce ma dang /
T02TD3305E:165b-13: gtsigs ma dang nag mo dang gzugs ngan ma rnams so //
T02TD3305E:165b-14: rma bya'i steng du bden bral gyi chu skyes kyi lte ba la gzhon nu ma dmar mo zhal drug ma g-yas pa dag gis shakti dang lcags kyu /
T02TD3305E:165b-15: g-yon ba dag gis rin po che dang zhags pa 'dzin pa tshogs bdag gis 'khyud pa ste /
