T02TD3305E:182a-0: aom yam ga dza ratn'a yan ma: aom ram aa shvo ratn'a yan ma: aom lam pu ru sha ratn'a yan ma: aom wam str'i ratn'a yan ma: shar lus @182a * //
T02TD3305E:182a-1: 'phags po la sogs pa'i nang du me tog dbul lo //
T02TD3305E:182a-2: aom ya: tsa kra ratn'a ya na ma: aom ya: khadga ratn'a ya na ma: aom l'a: ma ni ratn'a ya na ma: aom w'a: sarba ni dha ne bhyo na ma: me la sogs pa'i zur rnams kyi nang du me tog dbul lo //
T02TD3305E:182a-3: aom a'a: badzra gu ra we ai dam badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:182a-4: 'dis ri rab kyi dbus kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba'i steng du bla ma rdo rje sems dpar bsams ba la me tog snyim pa gsum spyi bor dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:182a-5: aom a'a: badzra gu ra we badzra dh'u pe h'um aom a'a: badzra gu ra we badzra d'i pa h'um /
T02TD3305E:182a-6: aom a'a: badzra gur we badzra gandhe h'um /
T02TD3305E:182a-7: aom a'a: badzra gur we badzra nee wi tya h'um /
T02TD3305E:182a-8: aom a'a: badzra gu ra we badzr'a darsha na ph'a l'a ya h'um /
T02TD3305E:182a-9: rim pa 'di nyid kyis gzhan du yang gang cung zad de thams cad cho ga 'dis dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:182a-11: slar yang me tog gi snyim pas phul te //
T02TD3305E:182a-12: sangs rgyas gtso la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3305E:182a-13: skyob ba chos la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3305E:182a-15: gsum rnams la yang rtag phyag 'tshal //
T02TD3305E:182a-16: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs 'chi //
T02TD3305E:182a-17: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02TD3305E:182a-18: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02TD3305E:182a-19: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02TD3305E:182a-20: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la //
T02TD3305E:182a-21: byang chub par du skyabs su mchi //
T02TD3305E:182a-22: rang gzhan don ni rab bsgrub phyir //
T02TD3305E:182a-23: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed bgyi'o //
T02TD3305E:182a-24: byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed bgyis nas //
T02TD3305E:182a-25: sems can thams cad bdag gis mgron du gnyer //
T02TD3305E:182a-26: byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi //
T02TD3305E:182a-27: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'gyur bar shog //
T02TD3305E:182a-28: sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi //
T02TD3305E:182a-29: bsod nams la yang rjes yi rang //
T02TD3305E:182a-30: byas nas bsnyen gnas spyad par bgyi //
T02TD3305E:182a-31: 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad gso sbyong //
T02TD3305E:182a-32: zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis dkon mchog gsum gyi ngo bo bla ma la bstod pa bya'o //
T02TD3305E:182a-34: bla ma byang chub sems rnams la //
T02TD3305E:182a-35: rin chen mandala yongs rdzogs pas //
T02TD3305E:182a-36: dngos po thams cad dbul bgyi ste //
T02TD3305E:182a-37: 'gro bas kun mkhyen thob phyed du'o //
T02TD3305E:182a-38: lcog brgyad ldan pa'i ri rab ni //
T02TD3305E:182a-39: gling dang nye gling mdzes pa dang //
T02TD3305E:182a-40: rin chen brgyad dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD3305E:182b-0: bla med ster ba bo la @182b dbul //
T02TD3305E:182b-2: gang gi bka' drin 'od kyis gsal byas bdag nyid kyi //
T02TD3305E:182b-3: de nyid rin chen 'od kyi tshogs kyis mun bcom ste //
T02TD3305E:182b-4: mig skyon med rnams rol bar bcas te steng du ni //
T02TD3305E:182b-5: lta gyur bla ma nyi ma de la phyag 'di bgyid //
T02TD3305E:182b-6: ces pas me tog rab tu gtor ste phyag 'tshal bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:182b-7: zhes pa bla ma'i mandala lo //
T02TD3305E:182b-8: de nas sbyin ba lci ba zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod nas sngar gyi mandala gsum bya ste /
T02TD3305E:182b-9: de la rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa rnams 'khor dang mi bskyod pa gtsor byas pa'i mandala ni sangs rgyas kyi mandala lo //
T02TD3305E:182b-10: bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnams 'khor dang /
T02TD3305E:182b-11: rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud gtso bor byas pa'i mandala chos kyi'o //
T02TD3305E:182b-16: 'jam dbyangs dang sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang sa'i snying po dang ye shes bla ma rnams 'khor dang /
T02TD3305E:182b-17: 'jig rten dbang phyug gtsor byas pa ni dge 'dun gyi mandala lo //
T02TD3305E:182b-18: mandala gsum po 'di rnams su shar la sogs pa nas g-yas skor gyis te /
T02TD3305E:182b-19: aom gyi yi ge dang po dang /
T02TD3305E:182b-20: na ma:'i sgra mthar bcug nas so so rang rang gi mtshan brjod nas sngar gyi mandala du me tog dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:182b-21: de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas mandala bzhi po byas nas /
T02TD3305E:182b-22: dad pas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dge ba'i tshes dang gza' dang dus sbyor la sogs pa la /
T02TD3305E:182b-23: gtsang zhing gtsang ba'i gos bgos te /
T02TD3305E:182b-24: yid du 'ong ba rab tu ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs la mchod pa de'i mchog ji lta bar rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD3305E:182b-25: me tog la sogs pa dbul ba sngon du 'gro bas dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal pa sngon du 'gro bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:182b-26: de bzhin du ji ltar nus pa'i mchod ba dang yon phul nas /
T02TD3305E:182b-27: thugs rje dang rnam mkhyen dang ldan pa'i bla ma la me tog gi snyim pa sngon du 'gro bas zhabs dag la phyag bya zhing /
T02TD3305E:182b-28: bus mo'i lha ngas la btsugs pa'am /
T02TD3305E:182b-29: tsog tsog por 'dug la thal mo sbyar te gnas pas 'di skad ces gsol ba gdab pa lan gsum bya'o //
T02TD3305E:183a-0: dge ba'i bshes gnyen bdag la @183a * //
T02TD3305E:183a-1: sdig pa bshags pa dang skyabs su 'gro ba'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa stsal du gsol zhes pas so //
T02TD3305E:183a-2: de nas bla mas lhag pa'i bsam pa rab tu 'phel bas slob ma bltas te ji ltar nus pa sbyin par bya'o zhes khas blang ba sngon du 'gro bas 'di ltar sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:183a-3: cho dang ldan pa khyod 'di skad ces smros shig / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang dag par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
T02TD3305E:183a-4: byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T02TD3305E:183a-6: bdag mid 'di zhes bgyi bas gang cung zad lus dang ngag dang yid kyis /
T02TD3305E:183a-7: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02TD3305E:183a-9: de las gzhan pa'i sems can yang dag par 'ongs pa rnams la skye ba 'di'am skye ba gzhan mtha' yas ba rnams su bdag gis sdig pa'i las bgyis pa'am /
T02TD3305E:183a-11: bgyid pa la rjes su yid rang ba de thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bsdoms te bzlums la mnyam par byas nas /
T02TD3305E:183a-12: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02TD3305E:183a-13: slob dpon gyi spyan sngar ma lus pa rab tu bshags shing so sor bshags par bgyi'o //
T02TD3305E:183a-14: shes pa dang dran pa rnams la 'chab par mi bgyid do //
T02TD3305E:183a-15: de bzhin du lan gsum mo //
T02TD3305E:183a-16: de nas bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de ltar sdig pa bshags te nyi ma 'di nas nye bar bzung nas ji srid byang chub snying bo la mchis kyi bar du /
T02TD3305E:183a-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa /
T02TD3305E:183a-18: thams cad du dgra'i 'jigs pa med pa /
T02TD3305E:183a-23: rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02TD3305E:183a-24: de nas bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba de ltar sdig pa bshags te /
T02TD3305E:183a-25: nyi ma 'di nas nye bar bzung nas ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du /
T02TD3305E:183a-26: chos rnams kyi rab mchog bla na med pa theg pa chen po'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02TD3305E:183a-27: de nas bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de ltar sdig pa bshags te nyi ma 'di nas nye bar gzung nas ji srid byang chub snying bo la mchis kyi bar du /
T02TD3305E:183b-0: @183b dul ba'i tshogs rnams kyi mchog phyir mi ldog pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02TD3305E:183b-1: de bzhin du lan gsum mo //
T02TD3305E:183b-2: de nas bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di ltar bstan pa las ma 'das par nyi ma 'di nas nye bar bzung ste ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du /
T02TD3305E:183b-3: gsum la skyabs su 'gro bas mtha' yas ba'i sems can gyi khams rnams nges par bsgral ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD3305E:183b-4: mngon par bsgral ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD3305E:183b-5: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD3305E:183b-6: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la so sor dgod pa'i phyir du /
T02TD3305E:183b-7: ji ltar 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
T02TD3305E:183b-8: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa dang /
T02TD3305E:183b-9: sangs rgyas kyi don du lhag par gshegs par gyur pa dang /
T02TD3305E:183b-11: lhag par gshegs par 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD3305E:183b-12: ji ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams thams cad kyis sgrib pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang /
T02TD3305E:183b-13: sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis mkhyen pas gzigs pa dang /
T02TD3305E:183b-14: ji ltar chos rnams kyi chos nyid mkhyen nas mngon par rjes su mkhyen pa ltar cho ga de nyid kyis bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba slob dpon gyi drung dang /
T02TD3305E:183b-15: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyan sngar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02TD3305E:183b-16: de bzhin du lan gsum mo //
T02TD3305E:183b-17: de ring bdag byang chub sems dpar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang slob dpon gyis gzung du gsol zhes pa /
T02TD3305E:183b-18: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bas sngon du byang chub sems bskyed pa'o //
T02TD3305E:183b-19: bslab pa'i gnas lnga 'dzin pa'i dge bsnyen gyi sngom pa de yang gsol ba 'debs par gyur na slob ma'i ched du 'di ltar sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:183b-20: tshe dang ldan pa khyod 'di skad smros shig / slob dpon dgongs su gsol //
T02TD3305E:183b-21: ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te srog gcod pa las slar log pa de bzhin du /
T02TD3305E:184a-0: bdag che ge mo zhes bgyi bas kyang dus 'di nas nye bar bzung ste @184a * //
T02TD3305E:184a-1: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te srog gcod pa las slar log par bgyi'o //
T02TD3305E:184a-3: bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su bslab po //
T02TD3305E:184a-6: gzhan yang slob dpon dgongs su gsol /
T02TD3305E:184a-7: ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ma byin par len pa dang /
T02TD3305E:184a-8: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
T02TD3305E:184a-11: bcos pa'i chang myos bar 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te ma byin par len pa dang /
T02TD3305E:184a-12: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
T02TD3305E:184a-15: bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar log pa de bzhin du /
T02TD3305E:184a-16: bdag che ge mo zhes bgyi bas kyang nyin par 'di nas nye bar bzung ste /
T02TD3305E:184a-17: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ma byin par len pa dang /
T02TD3305E:184a-18: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
T02TD3305E:184a-21: bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar ldog par bgyi'o//
T02TD3305E:184a-22: yan lag lnga pa 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su slob bo //
T02TD3305E:184a-25: dge bsnyen du yang bdag slob dpon gyis gzung du gsol /
T02TD3305E:184a-26: de bzhin du lan gnyis dang gsum du yang ngo //
T02TD3305E:184a-27: 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong bya bar 'dod pas de'i tshe sngar bzhin du gsol ba btab bar gyur ba dang /
T02TD3305E:184a-28: slob ma'i ched du gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas brgyad po 'di ltar sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:184a-29: tshe dang ldan pa khyod 'di smros shig / slob dpon dgongs su gsol /
T02TD3305E:184a-30: bdag che ge mo zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas nye bar bzung ste /
T02TD3305E:184a-31: ji srid mtshan mo song ba dang ji srid nyi ma shar ba'i mthar thug par srog gcod pa thams cad dang /
T02TD3305E:184b-0: @184b mi tshangs par sbyong pa dang /
T02TD3305E:184b-1: ngag gi dbye ba las brdzun du smra ba dang /
T02TD3305E:184b-2: myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba dang /
T02TD3305E:184b-3: dus ma yin pa'i kha zas dang /
T02TD3305E:184b-6: gar dang glu dang rol sgeg dang mal stan mthon po rnams la de ring nas bdag dga' ba dang bral bar bgyi ste dgra bcom pa'i yon tan brgyad la 'jug pas so //
T02TD3305E:184b-7: de bzhin du lan gsum ste bdag gis gso sbyong gi tshul khrims kyi sngom pa yang dag par blangs pa 'di ni sems kyi rgyan dang /
T02TD3305E:184b-9: sems can thams cad kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ched du'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD3305E:184b-10: de nas bla mas thabs yin no zhes brjod par bya zhing slob mas legs so zhes so //
T02TD3305E:184b-11: gang phyir dge ba ma lus gso ba dang //
T02TD3305E:184b-12: bsags pa'i sdig pa 'dir ni sbyong byed pa //
T02TD3305E:184b-13: de bzhin gso dang rnam par sbyong byed pa //
T02TD3305E:184b-14: de bzhin gshegs pas gso sbyong zhes su gsungs //
T02TD3305E:184b-15: zhes pa gso sbyong gi cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:184b-17: // /'di nyid kyi sngom pa go mi'o zhes so //
T02TD3305E:184b-18: de nas rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ram dkyil 'khor gzhan du yang rung ste sngar brjod pa'i cho gas dang por bum pa lhag par gnas pa dang dgod pa dang nye bar spyod pa lnga la sogs pa'i mchod pa byas nas /
T02TD3305E:184b-19: legs bar yongs su brtags pa'i slob ma nga rgyal la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba /
T02TD3305E:184b-20: dge bsnyen la sogs pa'i bslab pa la gnas pa yongs su thob pa la sogs pa legs par yongs su byang zhing gus pa dang ldan pa /
T02TD3305E:184b-21: rdo rje sems dpa'i sngom pa gzung ba'i nus pa dang ldan na /
T02TD3305E:184b-22: rigs gzugs kyi yon tan dang bral ba rnams kyang lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:184b-23: gal te de dag kyang dad pas rdo rje sems dpa'i sngom pa shin tu don du gnyer zhing /
T02TD3305E:184b-24: rdo rje theg pa la ston pa gzhan mi tshol bar gyur na'o //
T02TD3305E:184b-25: de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis phyed dang bzhi brgya pa las gsungs te /
T02TD3305E:184b-26: gzugs ngan yon tan med pa dang //
T02TD3305E:184b-27: dman pa'ang lhag par gnas par bya //
T02TD3305E:185a-0: @185a * // 'khor ni bzhi po rnams la yang //
T02TD3305E:185a-1: dkyil 'khor dag tu cho ga gnang //
T02TD3305E:185a-2: rang rang bslab pa legs par ldan //
T02TD3305E:185a-3: theg chen la dga'i bsam pa can //
T02TD3305E:185a-9: cho ga ni gzhug pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:185a-11: theg chen la dga' ba'i bsam pa can 'dis ni theg pa 'di la yid kyi las gtso bor ston par byed do /
T02TD3305E:185a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis rang bzhin gyis kha na mtho ba'i las nyid la yang kun slong gi khyad par las lhung bar mi 'gyur ba mang po rab tu bstan to //
T02TD3305E:185a-15: gdol ba smig ma mkhan la sogs /
T02TD3305E:185a-16: gsod don don du sems pa po //
T02TD3305E:185a-17: de rnams kye rdo rje shes nas //
T02TD3305E:185a-21: sems dge ba la ltung med de //
T02TD3305E:185a-22: snying rjer ldan zhing byams phyir ro //
T02TD3305E:185a-24: snying rje ldan zhing don mthong la //
T02TD3305E:185a-25: bkag pa yang ni gnang ba yin //
T02TD3305E:185a-26: zhes pa ltar gang zhig slar yang bsod nams nye bar bsags pa mang du thos ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:185a-27: chos thams cad sgyu ma rmi lam lta bu dang stong pa nyid du ro gcig par shin tu brtan par mos pa byed pa de la ni dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sngom pa dag la 'gal ba'i dri ma ga la yod /
T02TD3305E:185a-28: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02TD3305E:185a-29: dge slong rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya //
T02TD3305E:185a-31: de ni nges par khas blangs dgos te /
T02TD3305E:185a-32: gzhan du na dus mtshungs par gnyi ga ci ltar 'gyur /
T02TD3305E:185a-33: bag chags rab tu sad pa las dge slong gis nyams su myong ba'i bde ba de'i sbyor ba'i bde ba rmi lam du mthong na rmi lam du mthong ba'i phyi rol gyi yan lag dbang po gnyis kyi bde ba'i mthar thug pa nyams su myong na yang ltung ba med do zhes /
T02TD3305E:185a-34: de 'dul bar bstan pa rtogs par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:185a-35: gal te yang skye ba ngan pa'i spyod yul du rab tu bstan par gyur na ni /
T02TD3305E:185a-36: de'i tshe de la yang ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsad ba dang /
T02TD3305E:185a-37: shes rab ye shes kyi mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin bar bya ste /
T02TD3305E:185a-38: skye bo ngan pa med na ni //
T02TD3305E:185a-39: las kyi phyag rgya nyid kyis so //
T02TD3305E:185b-0: de kho na nyid la lhag par mos pa mi brtan @185b pa'i dge slong la ni dad pa dang ldan yang phyi'i shes rab ma'i dbang gzung ba bkag ste /
T02TD3305E:185b-1: gzhan du sngom pa snga ma nyams pas don med pa chen por 'gyur ro //
T02TD3305E:185b-2: gal te yang bla ma bsgom pa la brtan par gyur na ni /
T02TD3305E:185b-3: de'i tshe de la yang des gtad pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:185b-4: de blangs pa la yang tshangs par spyod pa dang bral ba'i dogs pa ni med de lus kyi las med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD3305E:185b-5: de yang sngar khyim na gnas pa yin na ni nyams su myong ba'i bde ba dran du bcug la dga' ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba so sor brtan par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:185b-6: bla ma la dge slong du gyur pa nyid na ni gsang ba'i dbang mngon par dbang bskur ba la sogs pa ster ba na /
T02TD3305E:185b-7: thams cad brjod pas mtshams sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:185b-8: ha cang spros pas chog ste skabs su bab pa brjod par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:185b-9: de'i rjes su slob mas mandala byas nas /
T02TD3305E:185b-10: me tog bzung ba'i thal mo sbyar zhing bus mo sa la btsugs pa rnams la /
T02TD3305E:185b-11: sngags kyi tshul gyi skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la ni 'jig rten 'di nyid kyi mngon par mtho ba don du gnyer bas ma yin /
T02TD3305E:185b-12: 'jig rten pha rol gyi mngon par mtho ba'i ched du yang ma yin gyi /
T02TD3305E:185b-13: 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum gyi phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:185b-14: de lta na ni mngon par mtho ba gnyis kyang thob par 'gyur ro zhes bsgrags nas /
T02TD3305E:185b-15: slob ma rnams rang gi lus la kha nas bcug ste /
T02TD3305E:185b-16: rang gi rdo rje'i lam nas 'thon pa rang 'od kyi shes rab ma'i padmar gnas pa rnams la snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab dang bcas pa kha nas zhugs shing zhu bar gyur pa rnams kyis mngon par dbang bskur bar bsams nas /
T02TD3305E:185b-17: dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor bzhag ste 'jug par gsol ba 'debs su gzhug go //
T02TD3305E:185b-18: skye rga 'tshe ba na kra yi //
T02TD3305E:185b-19: chu srin la sogs 'jigs rung ba //
T02TD3305E:185b-20: srid pa'i mtsho las bdag grol mdzod //
T02TD3305E:185b-21: dga' chen ston pa khyod gcig pu //
T02TD3305E:185b-22: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
T02TD3305E:185b-23: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3305E:185b-24: dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol //
T02TD3305E:185b-25: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD3305E:186a-0: @186a * // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD3305E:186a-1: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD3305E:186a-2: thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du //
T02TD3305E:186a-3: mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol //
T02TD3305E:186a-4: zhes brjod pas de'i rjes su slob ma gcig gtso bor byas te /
T02TD3305E:186a-5: bu tshur shog cig theg chen po'o //
T02TD3305E:186a-6: gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga rnams //
T02TD3305E:186a-7: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02TD3305E:186a-8: khyod ni tshul chen snod yin gyi //
T02TD3305E:186a-9: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02TD3305E:186a-10: dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD3305E:186a-11: rdo rje sngags kyi mthu yis ni //
T02TD3305E:186a-12: ye shes mnyam med yang dag brnyes //
T02TD3305E:186a-13: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med pa //
T02TD3305E:186a-14: gang gis sh'akya seng ge sogs //
T02TD3305E:186a-15: mchog rnams kyis ni bdud kyi sde //
T02TD3305E:186a-16: mi bzad chen po'i stobs chen bcom //
T02TD3305E:186a-19: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD3305E:186a-20: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / ces rang gis brjod la /
T02TD3305E:186a-21: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs 'chi //
T02TD3305E:186a-22: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02TD3305E:186a-23: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02TD3305E:186a-24: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02TD3305E:186a-25: zhes lan gsum brjod du gzhug go //
T02TD3305E:186a-26: de ltar thun mong gi sdom pa can gyis slob dpon gyi sdom pa gzung ba'i phyir /
T02TD3305E:186a-27: 'khor lo phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang //
T02TD3305E:186a-28: dam pa bdag la mgon pos stsol //
T02TD3305E:186a-29: 'khor lo lha yi de nyid dang //
T02TD3305E:186a-30: slob dpon gyi ni phrin las dang //
T02TD3305E:186a-31: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dang //
T02TD3305E:186a-32: sdom pa gsang mchog bshad du gsol //
T02TD3305E:186a-33: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD3305E:186a-34: rtag tu bdag ni slob dpon pa gying//
T02TD3305E:186a-35: ces khyad par du gsol ba 'debs su bcug nas /
T02TD3305E:186a-36: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bya ste /
T02TD3305E:186a-37: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T02TD3305E:186a-38: slob dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T02TD3305E:186a-39: bdag che ge mo zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas nye bar bzung ste /
T02TD3305E:186a-40: ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du /
T02TD3305E:186a-41: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD3305E:186a-42: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i //
T02TD3305E:186a-43: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
T02TD3305E:186a-44: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD3305E:186a-45: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02TD3305E:186a-46: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02TD3305E:186b-0: sems can don byed tshul @186b khrims gsum //
T02TD3305E:186b-1: so sor brtan por bdag gis gzung //
T02TD3305E:186b-2: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD3305E:186b-3: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD3305E:186b-4: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i //
T02TD3305E:186b-5: sdom pa deng nas brtan por gzung //
T02TD3305E:186b-6: rdo rje rin chen bsdus pa la //
T02TD3305E:186b-7: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02TD3305E:186b-8: de nyid kyis ni rab tu gzung //
T02TD3305E:186b-9: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD3305E:186b-10: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD3305E:186b-11: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02TD3305E:186b-12: nyin re zhing yang dus drug tu //
T02TD3305E:186b-13: sbyin pa rnam bzhi so sor sbyin //
T02TD3305E:186b-14: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02TD3305E:186b-15: padma'i rigs chen dag pa la //
T02TD3305E:186b-16: phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum //
T02TD3305E:186b-17: dam pa'i chos rnams so sor gzung //
T02TD3305E:186b-18: las kyi rigs mchog bsdus pa la //
T02TD3305E:186b-19: sdom pa thams cad yang dag ldan //
T02TD3305E:186b-20: de nyid so sor gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD3305E:186b-21: mchod pa'i las kyang cu nus bgyi //
T02TD3305E:186b-22: sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir //
T02TD3305E:186b-23: byang chub sems ni bla na med//
T02TD3305E:186b-24: dam pa yang dag bskyed bgyis shing //
T02TD3305E:186b-25: sdom pa ma lus gzung bgyis nas //
T02TD3305E:186b-26: ma brgal ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi //
T02TD3305E:186b-27: ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol //
T02TD3305E:186b-28: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02TD3305E:186b-29: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02TD3305E:186b-30: ces lan gsum brjod du bcug pas so //
T02TD3305E:186b-31: de'i rjes su bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis bsrungs nas /
T02TD3305E:186b-32: de rnams kyi snying ga dang mgrin pa dang spyi bo rnams la rdo rje dang padma dang 'khor lo'i steng du /
T02TD3305E:186b-33: nyi ma dang padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i h'um a'a: aom gyi yi ge nag po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams bsams te /
T02TD3305E:186b-34: de nas brjod cing snying ga dang mgrin pa dang spyi bo rnams su dri'i chu rdo rje dang bcas pas yang dag par reg nas /
T02TD3305E:186b-35: mgo bor me tog dang mdun du bdug sbos dang mar me dang snying gar slar yang dri sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:186b-36: aa shva dtha la sogs pas so shing sor bcu gnyis pa drang po srog chags med cing ma gas pa rma med pa dri bzangs kyi chus bsgos pa /
T02TD3305E:186b-37: rtse mor me tog bcings pa slob ma rnams la sbyin zhing /
T02TD3305E:186b-38: de rnams kyis kyang khru bzhi pa gru bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ba'i lci ba la sogs pas byugs par shar ram byang du phyogs pas so shing /
T02TD3305E:187a-0: aom badzra h'a sa ham zhes brjod nas rtse mo 'chos te ma gas pa steng du blta bas @187a * //
T02TD3305E:187a-1: ltos pa med par mdun du dor bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:187a-2: de rnams la so shing lhung ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub brjod par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:187a-3: shar dang byang dang nub dang lho dang steng dang 'og tu phyogs par gyur na rim ba ji lta ba bzhin du zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang mngon spyod dang rig pa 'dzin pa dang sa 'og gi dngos grub rnams so //
T02TD3305E:187a-4: dkyil 'khor gyi pha rol du lhung na ni dngos grub med do //
T02TD3305E:187a-5: de'i rjes su bam yig las skyes shing de bzlas pa'i chu kha bkru ba'i phyir byin nas /
T02TD3305E:187a-6: 'khyil pa lan bdun bzlas pa'i dri chu khyor ba gsum /
T02TD3305E:187a-7: aom hr'i: bi shuddha sarbba dharmm'a:sarbba p'a pam ni tsasya shodha ya sarbba bi kalp'a na aa pa na ya h'um zhes brjod cing 'thung du gzhug go //
T02TD3305E:187a-8: de nas de rnams phyi rol du bzhag la h'um las skyes shing de bzlas pa'am 'khyil pa bzlas pa'i ku sha sngas kyi don du /
T02TD3305E:187a-9: aom badzra t'i kshna bam zhes brjod pa'i sngags kyis sbyin no //
T02TD3305E:187a-10: de'i rjes su gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud ba lus kyi tshad sum lta ba la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis mdud pa gsum byas pa de rnams kyi dpung pa g-yas pa'am bud med kyi g-yon par aom buddha mee tri raksha raksha sarb'a na sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:187a-11: zhes brjod cing rang nyid kyis bcings nas yang dag par bsrungs la spro ba bskyed par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:187a-12: bskal pa bye ba du ma ru //
T02TD3305E:187a-13: sngon du sdig pa gang byas pa //
T02TD3305E:187a-15: de dag thams cad zad par 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:187a-16: spyod mchog 'di la gang rnams kyis //
T02TD3305E:187a-17: blo gros shin tu dri med pa //
T02TD3305E:187a-18: de dag rnams kyi sdug bsngal kun //
T02TD3305E:187a-20: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
T02TD3305E:187a-21: rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed //
T02TD3305E:187a-22: gang gis khyed rnams rgyal ba kun //
T02TD3305E:187a-23: bdag nyid chen po sras bcas kyi //
T02TD3305E:187a-24: bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun //
T02TD3305E:187a-25: yongs su gzung ste skye 'gyur ni //
T02TD3305E:187a-26: de yis khyed rnams theg chen la //
T02TD3305E:187a-27: legs par skye ba nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:187a-28: theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i //
T02TD3305E:187a-29: lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan //
T02TD3305E:187a-31: de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD3305E:187a-32: zhes nyan du bcug nas de nas de rnams 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis bsrungs nas //
T02TD3305E:187b-0: bzlas pa'i don du 'khyil pa'i sngags brjod du @187b bcug ste /
T02TD3305E:187b-1: gang cung zad rmi lam du mthong ba de thams cad nang par nga la smros shig ces mngon par brjod nas /
T02TD3305E:187b-2: dkyil 'khor gyi khang ba'i nang ngam /
T02TD3305E:187b-3: yol ba la sogs pas bcad pa'am gzhan du yang rung ste seng ge'i nyal stabs kyis nyal du gzhug go //
T02TD3305E:187b-4: rang nyid kyang dkyil 'khor gyi khang par zhugs nas bsrung ba'i don du 'khyil pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:187b-5: 'dir sngom pa gang slob dpon du mi byed pa la byed pa la yang ster ba de ni thun mong ba ste /
T02TD3305E:187b-6: skyabs su 'gro ba dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa tsam gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD3305E:187b-7: gang yang slob dpon byed pa la ster ba de ni slob dpon gyi sdom pa ste /
T02TD3305E:187b-8: rigs lngas yang dag par bsdus pa'o //
T02TD3305E:187b-9: de bas na 'di ni sdom pa gnyis sbyin pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:187b-11: // / de'i rjes su bla mas nang par gtor ma phul te dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa nas 'thon la /
T02TD3305E:187b-12: slob ma rnams la rmi lam dri zhing ri las lhung ba la sogs pas mtshon pa mi dge ba'i rmi lam ni 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:187b-13: slar yang dkyil 'khor gyi khang par 'jug pa'i dus su slob ma rnams kyis aom bra bi sha bha ga w'a na ma h'a su kha moksha su ram sarba bi ddha pra dam par ma su khotta ma siddya dza: h'um bam ho:pra siddhya sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:187b-14: zhes yang dag par spro bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:187b-15: de nas langs nas rnal 'byor gyi //
T02TD3305E:187b-16: dbang phyug rab rgyas spyan 'bar ba //
T02TD3305E:187b-17: g-yas skor byas nas 'khor lo yi //
T02TD3305E:187b-18: sgo dbye bdud rnams gzhom par bya //
T02TD3305E:187b-19: nub kyi sgo ru gnas byas nas //
T02TD3305E:187b-20: g-yon brkyang stabs kyis spro ba yis //
T02TD3305E:187b-21: shar sgro dbye phyir 'di brjod cing /
T02TD3305E:187b-22: rdo rje h'um mdzad phyag rgya bya //
T02TD3305E:187b-23: aom badzro dgh'a ta sa ma ya bra be sha ya h'um /
T02TD3305E:187b-24: de bzhin byang phyogs yang dag gnas //
T02TD3305E:187b-25: khro bo'i lta bas de ltar brjod //
T02TD3305E:187b-26: lho yi sgo ni nges par dbye //
T02TD3305E:187b-27: khro bo'i phyag rgya'i rnam thar bya //
T02TD3305E:187b-28: shar gyi phyogs su yang dag gnas //
T02TD3305E:187b-29: de bzhin rnal 'byor nub tu phyogs//
T02TD3305E:187b-30: chu yi sgo ni nges par dbye //
T02TD3305E:187b-31: khro bo'i phyag rgya'i rnam thar bya //
T02TD3305E:187b-32: de bzhin lho phyogs yang dag gnas //
T02TD3305E:187b-33: g-yas skor gyis ni snga ma bzhin //
T02TD3305E:187b-34: nor sbyin gnas ba'i sgo dbye zhing //
T02TD3305E:187b-35: de ltar slar yang 'jug par bya //
T02TD3305E:188a-0: aom pa ram su kha sha ya su la li ta bi l'a sa na @188a */
T02TD3305E:188a-1: na ma mi bha ga w'a ntam dza: h'um bam ho: hi hi hi hi h'i pra t'i tstsha ku su m'anydza li n'a tha ho: zhes pa'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor du dor nas //
T02TD3305E:188a-2: slar yang bzung ste phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i bsam pas mgo bor bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:188a-3: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug ni bla ma la mngon sum du gyur par lhag par mos par bya zhing /
T02TD3305E:188a-4: de las ster bzhin pa phreng ba'i dbang gzung ba la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dbang bskur ba mtha' dag dang /
T02TD3305E:188a-5: cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du slob dpon gyi las thams cad la rjes su gnang ba thob par byas slob ma gzhug pa'i ched du /
T02TD3305E:188a-6: bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin de kho na nyid kyi bstod pa sngon du 'gro bas dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub zhu zhing bden pa'i byin brlab bya ste /
T02TD3305E:188a-7: nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir //
T02TD3305E:188a-8: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog / sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
T02TD3305E:188a-9: mi bskyod rdo rjer deng bdag sgrubs //
T02TD3305E:188a-10: kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
T02TD3305E:188a-11: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
T02TD3305E:188a-12: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02TD3305E:188a-13: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag bsgrub mdzod //
T02TD3305E:188a-14: nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod //
T02TD3305E:188a-15: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa //
T02TD3305E:188a-16: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
T02TD3305E:188a-17: bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod //
T02TD3305E:188a-18: shin tu rnam dag chos kyi mchog / gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD3305E:188a-19: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD3305E:188a-20: byang chub sems dpar bdag bsgrub mdzod //
T02TD3305E:188a-21: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug mchog gi phyag rgya can //
T02TD3305E:188a-22: grub pa'i rdo rje cher gsal ba //
T02TD3305E:188a-23: rdo rje snyems dag bdag bsgrub mdzod //
T02TD3305E:188a-24: sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa //
T02TD3305E:188a-25: sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //
T02TD3305E:188a-26: sems can kun gyi yab kyang nyid //
T02TD3305E:188a-27: 'dod pa mchog gi dam tshig mchog / shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD3305E:188a-28: bden pa de yis mgon po khyod //
T02TD3305E:188a-29: bdag la 'dod pa yongs rdzogs mdzod //
T02TD3305E:188a-30: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD3305E:188a-31: gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med //
T02TD3305E:188a-32: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD3305E:188a-33: rgyu dang las las yang dag byung //
T02TD3305E:188a-34: bden pa de yis dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD3305E:188a-35: gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma rnams //
T02TD3305E:188b-0: kun @188b gyis sgrib bral mthong bar shog / ces brjod pas so //
T02TD3305E:188b-3: // / de nas lhag par gnas pa byas shing sdom pa gnyis dang ldan pa'i slob ma shar gyi sgor yol bas bcad par bzhag nas /
T02TD3305E:188b-4: dri zhim po la sogs pas yang dag par byas pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs sam 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi gzugs su dmigs te /
T02TD3305E:188b-5: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa nutta ra bodhi aa langk'a ra wastra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra sphar na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD3305E:188b-6: zhes pa'i sngags kyis gos dmar po'am gzhan yang rung bas smad g-yogs byas la /
T02TD3305E:188b-7: aom badzra raksha ham zhes pas stod g-yogs bya zhing /
T02TD3305E:188b-8: aom badzra aushn'i sha h'um phat ces pas gtsug tor bya'o //
T02TD3305E:188b-9: aom tsa kshu badha bar m'a na ya h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis mig bcing zhing /
T02TD3305E:188b-10: a'a kham b'i ra h'um zhes pas me tog gi phreng bzung nas yon phul ba /
T02TD3305E:188b-11: las thams cad pa'i sngags chus bsangs te /
T02TD3305E:188b-12: rnal 'byor ma'am las kyi rdo rje can gyis bzung la /
T02TD3305E:188b-13: de nas rang gi slob ma la dri bar bya ste /
T02TD3305E:188b-14: dga' ba la dga' khyod su kye //
T02TD3305E:188b-15: slob ma de dag rnams kyis kyang //
T02TD3305E:188b-16: skal bzang bdag ni bde chen la'o //
T02TD3305E:188b-18: aom sarba yo ga tsitta audp'a da y'a mi /
T02TD3305E:188b-19: zhes brjod cing byang chub tu sems bskyed la /
T02TD3305E:188b-20: snying gar rdo rje me tog dang bcas pa bzung nas /
T02TD3305E:188b-21: aom su ra ta sa ma ya stvam ho: siddhya badzra ya th'a su kham /
T02TD3305E:188b-23: deng khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur gyi khyod kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la smra bar mi bya zhing ma dad par yang mi bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:188b-24: aom ya m'anta kri ta h'um zhes brjod cing khrid la /
T02TD3305E:188b-25: a'a kham b'i ra h'um zhes pa 'dis yol ba'i nang du bcug nas /
T02TD3305E:188b-26: ma h'a ra ta su dri dhya su toshya su su kho badzra satva a'a dya siddhya mam zhes brjod pas g-yas skor bya zhing thal mo sbyar la dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgo'i phyi rol du phyin nas phyag 'tshal bar bya ste /
T02TD3305E:188b-28: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dzo pa sth'a n'a ya /
T02TD3305E:188b-29: a'atma n'am n'i rya ta y'a mi sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra satva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am /
T02TD3305E:189a-0: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza au pasth'a n'a ya a'atma n'am @189a * //
T02TD3305E:189a-2: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra bee ro tsa na aa dhi tishtha mam /
T02TD3305E:189a-3: lhor snying gar thal mo sbyar te /
T02TD3305E:189a-4: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza aa bhi she ka ya a'atma n'am n'i rya ta ya mi /
T02TD3305E:189a-5: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02TD3305E:189a-6: nub tu dpral bar thal mo sbyar te /
T02TD3305E:189a-7: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza pra wa rta n'a ya a'atma n'am n'i rya ta y'a mi /
T02TD3305E:189a-8: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dharm'a bra warta ya m'am /
T02TD3305E:189a-9: byang du snying gar thal mo sbyar te /
T02TD3305E:189a-10: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza karma ne a'atma ne a'atma n'am n'i rya ta y'a mi /
T02TD3305E:189a-11: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra karma ku ru m'am /
T02TD3305E:189a-12: zhes pa'i rigs lngas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag byed du bcug ste /
T02TD3305E:189a-13: slar yang shar sgo'i phyi rol nas rab tu dang bas /
T02TD3305E:189a-14: aom gu ru tsa ra no pa stha n'a ya a'atma n'am ni rya ta y'a mi /
T02TD3305E:189a-15: aom sarba satva pa ri dra narth'a ya a'atma n'am n'i rya ta y'a mi /
T02TD3305E:189a-16: zhes pa rnams don go ba sngon du 'gro bas 'don du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:189a-17: de nas deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyi /
T02TD3305E:189a-18: de'i phyir ngas khyod la rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:189a-19: ye shes gang gis khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'grub na dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T02TD3305E:189a-20: khyod kyis 'di dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya ste khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur te re zhes brjod nas mgo bor rdo rje gzung zhing dril bu dkrol nas /
T02TD3305E:189a-21: khyod kyi dam tshig rdo rje 'dis //
T02TD3305E:189a-22: gal te khyod kyis 'ga' zhig la //
T02TD3305E:189a-25: slar yang snying gar rdo rje gzung ste /
T02TD3305E:189a-26: de ring rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
T02TD3305E:189a-27: khyod kyi snying la yang dag gnas //
T02TD3305E:189a-28: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD3305E:189a-29: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02TD3305E:189a-31: bdud rtsi lnga padma'i snod du gnas pa la yi ge gsum gyis bsngags pa rnam rgyal bum pa'i steng du bzhag pa /
T02TD3305E:189a-32: aom badzra aa mri ta au da ka tha: zhes pa bdun bzlas te ming med dang mthe bong gis bzung ba'i snod kyi kha nas de'i khar sbyin zhing /
T02TD3305E:189a-33: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD3305E:189a-34: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02TD3305E:189a-35: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ste //
T02TD3305E:189a-36: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thung shig / ces brjod pas ma na'i btung ba byed du bcug la /
T02TD3305E:189a-37: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyi //
T02TD3305E:189b-0: ngas 'di gyis shig ces gang @189b bsgo ba de khyod kyis bya dgos so //
T02TD3305E:189b-1: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par yang mi bya ste /
T02TD3305E:189b-2: khyod yang ba ma spangs par dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes brjod par bya'o zhes pa dam tshig gi chu sbyin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:189b-3: de rjes slob mas 'di brjod de /
T02TD3305E:189b-4: rang nyid mnyam par gzhag pas dbab /
T02TD3305E:189b-5: slob dpon gyis bskul tshig gis ni /
T02TD3305E:189b-6: dngos grub thams cad rab bsgrub phyir //
T02TD3305E:189b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
T02TD3305E:189b-8: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig ces so //
T02TD3305E:189b-10: rkang pa'i mthil nas steng kun du //
T02TD3305E:189b-11: lus la bug pa rnams bsam zhing //
T02TD3305E:189b-12: de yi rkang pa'i 'og tu ni //
T02TD3305E:189b-14: de yi steng du dzheem yig ni //
T02TD3305E:189b-15: dmar mo'i mdog can rnam bsams te //
T02TD3305E:189b-16: de las byung ba'i me 'od kyis //
T02TD3305E:189b-17: brtul zhugs can gyis lus rnams sbyang //
T02TD3305E:189b-18: de bzhin 'od ni gsal bya zhing //
T02TD3305E:189b-19: mkhas pas blang ba byas nas slar //
T02TD3305E:189b-20: slob ma'i snying mgrin mgo bo la //
T02TD3305E:189b-21: h'um ha: a'a: zhes rnam par dgod //
T02TD3305E:189b-22: dril bu sgra ni sgrogs ldan pa //
T02TD3305E:189b-23: 'dzin pa yis ni dbab par bya //
T02TD3305E:189b-24: de bzhin gshegs rnams dbab pa yi //
T02TD3305E:189b-25: don du sngags 'di brjod par bya //
T02TD3305E:189b-26: 'di de dam tshig rdo rje ste //
T02TD3305E:189b-27: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su brjod //
T02TD3305E:189b-28: rdo rje ye shes bla med 'di //
T02TD3305E:189b-29: de ring nyid du 'bab par shog //
T02TD3305E:189b-30: aom badzra a'a be sha aa: aa: aa: aa:/
T02TD3305E:189b-31: gal te phebs pa nyid min na //
T02TD3305E:189b-32: sngags 'di yang ni brtan par brjod //
T02TD3305E:189b-33: de nas a'a: yig 'od zer gyis //
T02TD3305E:189b-34: ye shes sems dpa' rab bskul bya //
T02TD3305E:189b-35: a'a be sha ya stambha ya ra rar ra tsa la ya tsal ya h'um ha: a'a: dzheem /
T02TD3305E:189b-37: brgyal ba'am gang gis gar byed pa //
T02TD3305E:189b-38: de dag steng du 'phar ba yang //
T02TD3305E:189b-39: phebs pa'i mtshan nyid rig par bya //
T02TD3305E:189b-40: dga' zhing lta bas zhugs pa yi //
T02TD3305E:189b-41: slob ma'i lce la aa: yig dgod //
T02TD3305E:189b-42: yi ge brgya pas brtan byas te //
T02TD3305E:189b-43: mkhas pas dge dang mi dge dri //
T02TD3305E:189b-44: phebs pa gtong bar byed pa ni //
T02TD3305E:189b-45: sngags kyi rim pa 'di yis rig / nges par zhugs pa'i lha rnams snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon la bstim zhing slob ma'i mgo bor rdo rje gzung la /
T02TD3305E:189b-46: aom khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02TD3305E:190a-0: ces pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i h'um ha: aa: dzheem mum zhes @190a * //
T02TD3305E:190a-1: pas gshegs su gsol bar bya ste /
T02TD3305E:190a-4: // / de nas slob ma dkyil 'khor du mngon par phyogs pa la khyod kyi mig gis bltas pa la ji ltar snang zhes dris te /
T02TD3305E:190a-5: de na re dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang nag por snang ngo zhes zer na /
T02TD3305E:190a-6: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhi ba dang /
T02TD3305E:190a-9: mngon spyod kyi dngos grub la skal ba dang ldan par go bar bya zhing /
T02TD3305E:190a-10: 'di'i mthe bong gnyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa g-yas pas gzung la /
T02TD3305E:190a-11: rdo rje'i rkang stabs kyi gar gyi tshul gyis 'khyil pa'i sngags brjod cing skor ba gsum byed du bcug nas bden pa'i byin gyis brlab pa 'di bya ste /
T02TD3305E:190a-13: bdag gis slob ma gzhug pa 'di //
T02TD3305E:190a-14: lha rnams rigs kyi rim pa ni //
T02TD3305E:190a-15: bsod nams rim pa de bzhin shog /'di yi dngos grub ci 'drar 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:190a-16: rigs ni gang gi snod du rung //
T02TD3305E:190a-17: bsod nams mthu yang ci 'dra ba //
T02TD3305E:190a-18: de 'drar dkyil 'khor du gyur cig / ces pa 'di brjod pas so //
T02TD3305E:190a-19: de nas sngar bzung pa'i me tog gi phreng ba yi ge tram gis bsngags pa las yang zhing ma rnying pa'i me tog cig bton la /
T02TD3305E:190a-20: de'i lag pa thal mo sbyar bar sbyin par bya zhing des de'i tshe me tog gi phreng bar lhag par mos te /
T02TD3305E:190a-21: bdag nyid kyang yi ge gsum gyis 'od gsal zhing sdig pa dang bral bar mos la /
T02TD3305E:190a-22: bla mas de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang gus pa sngon du 'gro bas dkyil 'khor ba dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug mdun na gnas bzhin par dmigs pa'i dkyil 'khor der yid kyis zhugs nas de'i dbu la me tog dor bar bya ste /
T02TD3305E:190a-23: aom tishtha badzra dri dho me bha wa /
T02TD3305E:190a-24: sh'a shva to me bha wa /
T02TD3305E:190a-26: aa dhi tishtha sarba siddhi me pra yatstsha h'um ha ha ha ha ho: a'a kham b'ir h'um pra t'i tstsha ku su m'a nydza li n'a tha ho: zhes pa'i sngags brjod pas so //
T02TD3305E:190a-27: re kh'a lnga'i nang du me tog lhung ba dang rjes su mthun par 'di'i rigs la sogs pa bstan par bya zhing /
T02TD3305E:190a-29: dngos grub mtshon par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:190a-30: gal te sangs rgyas kyi dbu'am gtsug tor ram /
T02TD3305E:190a-31: mdzod spu la me tog lhung na de'i tshe phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bo //
T02TD3305E:190a-32: spyan nam zhal la lhung na de'i tshe sngags kyi dngos grub bo /
T02TD3305E:190b-0: @190b sku'i stod la ni mchog ste /
T02TD3305E:190b-2: 'og gi cha la ni dman pa'o //
T02TD3305E:190b-3: sku las shin tu ring bar gyur pa la ni yun ring bos te /
T02TD3305E:190b-4: nye ba la ni myur bar rab tu 'grub bo //
T02TD3305E:190b-5: lha rnams kyi rang gi gnas ni re'u mig la sogs pas rnam par bcad pa las shes par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:190b-6: gal te lha gnyis kyi bar du lhung na de'i tshe me tog gang la nye bar gyur pa de'i rigs su 'gyur ro //
T02TD3305E:190b-7: mnyam ba nyid la ni gnyi ga'i chog 'grub ste de'i tshe de rnams gang dad pa de'i rigs su 'gyur ro //
T02TD3305E:190b-8: re kh'a lnga'i phyi rol du lhung na slar yang lan gsum gyi bar du dor bar bya ste /
T02TD3305E:190b-9: de la yang phyi rol du lhung na ni dngos grub phra mo'o //
T02TD3305E:190b-10: phyi'i re kh'a zlum po rnams dang rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol du lhung na ni dngos grub med de 'di la dkyil 'khor yang bstan par mi bya'o //
T02TD3305E:190b-11: sngags bzlas pa la sogs pas skal ba dang ldan pa nyid du bsgrubs nas skabs gzhan du de gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:190b-12: de nas me tog de bzung nas aom pra ti grihna stvam ai mam satva ma h'a ba la /
T02TD3305E:190b-13: zhes brjod de slob ma'i mgo bo la bcing /
T02TD3305E:190b-14: 'di ni phreng ba'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:190b-16: // /'dir phebs par gyur pa na dge ba la sogs pa smras pa'i mthar aom tishtha badzra zhes pa 'dis phebs pa brtan par bya zhing mig gi snang ba dri ba la sogs pa nas mgo bor bcing ba'i mthar thug par te /
T02TD3305E:190b-17: nges par zhugs pa'i lha gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:190b-18: mi nus pas ni 'bebs pa'i cho ga ma byas par dam tshig gi chu byin pa'i mjug thogs su mig ni snang ba dri ba la sogs pa bya'o zhes 'chad do //
T02TD3305E:190b-19: de'i rjes su slob ma'i mig gnyis la 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i aom gnyis rnam par bsgoms te /
T02TD3305E:190b-20: de ring rdo rje sems dpa' rang //
T02TD3305E:190b-21: khyod kyi mig ni 'byed par brtson //
T02TD3305E:190b-22: rdo rje mig ni bla na med //
T02TD3305E:190b-23: thams cad mig ni dbye bar mdzod //
T02TD3305E:190b-24: aom dzny'a na tsakshu h'um aa: zhes brjod cing gdod g-yogs bsal bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:190b-25: de nas kye rdo rje ltos shig ces smras nas /
T02TD3305E:190b-26: da ni dad pa'i shugs kyis su //
T02TD3305E:190b-28: khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02TD3305E:190b-29: gsang sngags rnams la bsgrub par bgyis //
T02TD3305E:190b-31: de nas rim bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD3305E:190b-32: de nyid rab tu bsal bar bya //
T02TD3305E:191a-2: ngo bo 'ang nye bar bstan par bya //
T02TD3305E:191a-4: tshangs pa'i gnas pas zur rnams te //
T02TD3305E:191a-5: sgo rnams bsdu ba'i dngos por brjod //
T02TD3305E:191a-6: so sor bzhir ni yang dag shes //
T02TD3305E:191a-7: dad dbang la sogs sems gang yin //
T02TD3305E:191a-8: ra ba lngar ni yang dag byung //
T02TD3305E:191a-9: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po ni //
T02TD3305E:191a-10: sgo khyud rnam bzhi de rnams so //
T02TD3305E:191a-11: de yi dbus su 'khor lo gang //
T02TD3305E:191a-12: dkyil 'khor brgyad la mtshungs pa ste //
T02TD3305E:191a-13: rnam par thar pa brgyad po 'dis //
T02TD3305E:191a-14: dngos grub thams cad rab tu bsgrub //
T02TD3305E:191a-15: dngos grub chen po'i phung po kun //
T02TD3305E:191a-16: ka ba lta bur rtag tu 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:191a-18: ka ba brgyad ces bya bar bshad //
T02TD3305E:191a-19: chos kyi dbyings kyi don gyi brdar //
T02TD3305E:191a-22: thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog //
T02TD3305E:191a-23: bsam gtan rnams ni rta babs 'dir //
T02TD3305E:191a-24: ba dan rang bzhin de bzhin te //
T02TD3305E:191a-25: byang chub 'bras bu ra ba ni //
T02TD3305E:191a-26: sgo rnams su ni dpag bsam shing //
T02TD3305E:191a-27: phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD3305E:191a-28: sangs rgyas lnga ni rab tu bstan //
T02TD3305E:191a-29: spyan ma la sogs lha mo bzhi //
T02TD3305E:191a-30: sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid //
T02TD3305E:191a-31: 'dod pa lnga yi rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD3305E:191a-32: gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs de bzhin //
T02TD3305E:191a-33: mig la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yang //
T02TD3305E:191a-34: sa yi snying po la sogs so //
T02TD3305E:191a-35: lag sogs ngo bo khro bo'i dbang //
T02TD3305E:191a-36: gshin rje'i dgra sogs rab bstan te //
T02TD3305E:191a-37: sku yi 'khor lor gnas sangs rgyas //
T02TD3305E:191a-38: rim bzhin mi bskyod la sogs mgon ;
T02TD3305E:191a-39: / phyi yi 'khor lor slob ma la //
T02TD3305E:191a-40: gsal bya snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD3305E:191a-42: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor chen por bdag zhugs so //
T02TD3305E:191a-43: rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor chen po bdag gis mthong //
T02TD3305E:191a-44: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor chen por bdag dbang bskur //
T02TD3305E:191a-45: zhes brjod du bcug nas dam tshig bsgrags par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:191a-47: slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:191a-49: // / de'i rjes la chu'i dbang gi don du bla ma la ji ltar 'byar ba'i yon phul nas /
T02TD3305E:191a-50: pus mo sa la btsugs shing thal mo sbyar te /
T02TD3305E:191a-51: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02TD3305E:191b-0: mchod @191b chen ji ltar stsal ba ltar //
T02TD3305E:191b-1: bdag kyang bskyab ba'i don gyi phyir //
T02TD3305E:191b-2: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02TD3305E:191b-3: zhes brjod cing gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:191b-4: de nas dkyil 'khor phyi rol du //
T02TD3305E:191b-5: shar gyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor te //
T02TD3305E:191b-6: yang na dbang ldan sngags pas bri //
T02TD3305E:191b-7: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD3305E:191b-8: khru do rim pa gnyis pa nyid //
T02TD3305E:191b-9: de dbus sna tshogs 'dam skyes te //
T02TD3305E:191b-10: dkar dmar de bzhin nag po yi //
T02TD3305E:191b-11: ra ba gsum ni de la bri //
T02TD3305E:191b-12: ra ba'i rdul tshon ldan byas nas //
T02TD3305E:191b-13: phyag rgya bzhi ni dgod bya ste //
T02TD3305E:191b-14: shar du 'khor lo lhor rin chen //
T02TD3305E:191b-15: nub tu chu skyes ge sar bcas //
T02TD3305E:191b-16: nor sbyin sna tshogs rdo rje gzhag //
T02TD3305E:191b-17: bum pa yang ni dgod par bya //
T02TD3305E:191b-18: zhes pa khrus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:191b-20: // / phreng ba'i dbang bskur byas nas ni //
T02TD3305E:191b-21: slob ma bzung nas mandala gyi //
T02TD3305E:191b-22: da bus su padmar yang dag gzhag / lha yi nga rgyal 'dzin pas so //
T02TD3305E:191b-23: slob dpon tshogs dang bcas rnams kyis //
T02TD3305E:191b-24: shis brjod tshigs bcad sngon 'gro bas //
T02TD3305E:191b-25: bum pa las byung rnams kyis ni //
T02TD3305E:191b-26: rdo rje slob ma bkru bar bya //
T02TD3305E:191b-27: til gyi gang bu ltar gang ba'i //
T02TD3305E:191b-28: bum pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal ba rnams //
T02TD3305E:191b-29: de ring khyod la dbang bskur gyi //
T02TD3305E:191b-30: shes nas yid ni bde bar gyis //
T02TD3305E:191b-31: zhes brjod nas slob ma rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs su bsgoms te sngar brjod pa'i cho gas sbyang bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:191b-32: de nas gzhan yang snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams kyis phyogs mtha' yas pa na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyang spyan drangs nas yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD3305E:191b-33: slob ma dbang bskur ba'i don du //
T02TD3305E:191b-34: rdo rje can gyis sangs rgyas la //
T02TD3305E:191b-35: 'gro ba bskyab pa'i ched du dbang //
T02TD3305E:191b-36: ji ltar yon tan 'byung gnas stsal //
T02TD3305E:191b-37: de ltar 'di la stsal du gsol //
T02TD3305E:191b-38: zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02TD3305E:191b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams shes rab dang snyoms par zhugs pas 'dod chags chen pos zhu bar gyur pa /
T02TD3305E:192a-0: rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas zhugs te rdo rje'i lam nas byung ba'i khu ba de rnams kyi kha nas lha mo'i padmar zhugs pa'i slob ma skad cig gis stong pa nyid kyi rjes la h'um dang rdo rje las skyes pa'i mi bskyod pa shes rab dang bcas pa'i gzugs ye shes @192a * //
T02TD3305E:192a-1: sems dpa' dang dbyer med pa la mngon par dbang bskur nas /
T02TD3305E:192a-2: slar yang phyag dang zhal la sogs pa'i sku rnams kyi padma las byung sten ma mkha' gang bar gnas pa'i spyan ma la sogs pa'i rig ma rnams dang lhan cig pas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang na bza' dang rol mo'i sgra dang /
T02TD3305E:192a-3: glu dang gar dang me tog dang bdug spos dang gur gum gyi char rnams dang /
T02TD3305E:192a-4: phyag gis cung zad yo bar bzung ba'i bum pa dkar po cung zad yo ba byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba rnams padma nas phyung ba'i slob ma de rnams la mngon par dbang bskur bzhin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:192a-5: gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis /
T02TD3305E:192a-6: bkra shis gang zhig sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //
T02TD3305E:192a-7: kun gyi bdag nyid rigs kun gyi ni bdag po mchog //
T02TD3305E:192a-8: sems can ma lus skyed mdzad bde ba chen po ste //
T02TD3305E:192a-9: des ni deng khyod dbang bskur mchog la zhi byed shog //
T02TD3305E:192a-10: bkra shis gang zhig mtha' dag rdo rje'i rigs dang ldan //
T02TD3305E:192a-11: zhe sdang zil gnon skye bo yongs su sbyong ba po //
T02TD3305E:192a-12: de ni mi bskyod mgon po zhes bya'i mtshan 'chang ba //
T02TD3305E:192a-13: des ni deng khyod dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog //
T02TD3305E:192a-14: bkra shis gang zhig mtha' dag gti mug rigs dang ldan //
T02TD3305E:192a-15: rnam par snang mdzad rtag tu srid pa'i sdug bsngal 'phrog //
T02TD3305E:192a-16: gti mug zil gnon skye bo yongs su spyod ba po //
T02TD3305E:192a-17: des ni deng khyod dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog //
T02TD3305E:192a-18: bkra shis gang zhig mtha' dag rin chen rigs dang ldan //
T02TD3305E:192a-19: dbul ba'i sdug bsngal yongs su grol ba'i ched du brtson //
T02TD3305E:192a-20: nga rgyal zil gnon skye bo yongs su sbyong ba bo //
T02TD3305E:192a-21: des ni deng khyod dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig mtha' dag padma'i rigs dang ldan //
T02TD3305E:192a-22: 'jig rten dbang phyug srid pa'i dra ba rnams 'joms shing //
T02TD3305E:192a-23: 'dod chags zil gnon skye bo yongs su spyod ba po //
T02TD3305E:192a-24: des ni deng khyod dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog //
T02TD3305E:192a-25: bkra shis gang zhig mtha' dag las kyi rigs dang ldan //
T02TD3305E:192a-26: brdzun smrar dga' ba rnams la snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD3305E:192a-27: de rnams phrag dog sdig las grol ba'i gnyen po ste /
T02TD3305E:192a-28: des ni deng khyod dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog //
T02TD3305E:192b-0: phun sum @192b tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra //
T02TD3305E:192b-1: 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa //
T02TD3305E:192b-2: sangs rgyas padma rnam rgyas 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba //
T02TD3305E:192b-3: des ni de ring khyod la zhi byed bkra shis shog / de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g-yo ba //
T02TD3305E:192b-4: 'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa //
T02TD3305E:192b-5: chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa //
T02TD3305E:192b-6: des ni de ring khyod la zhi byed bkra shis shog / dge 'dun dam pa'i chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug / mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyi yon gyi gnas //
T02TD3305E:192b-7: tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi //
T02TD3305E:192b-8: des ni de ring khyod la zhi byed bkra shis shog / ces pa la sogs pa'i bkra shis kyi glu rnams kyis bkra shis nye bar sbyor bzhin pa la /
T02TD3305E:192b-9: rang gis kyang de rnams kyi glu nye bar blang zhing //
T02TD3305E:192b-10: dang bor rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang /
T02TD3305E:192b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i bum pa dang /
T02TD3305E:192b-12: de nas lha mo bzhi'i bum pa dang /
T02TD3305E:192b-13: de nas ji ltar rigs par dkyil 'khor pa'i bum pa'i chu byang chub kyi sems kyi bdud rtsi'i ngo bo rnams yal 'dab dang bcas rdo rje lag pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung ba'i rdo rje rtse mo las blugs te aom ma h'a su kha badzra sa tva aa bhi she ke na stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi sarba ta th'a ga ta aa dhi pa ti tre na dri dho bha wa zhes brjod cing /
T02TD3305E:192b-14: dbang bskur chen po rdo rje ni //
T02TD3305E:192b-15: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa //
T02TD3305E:192b-16: rdo rje'i gsang gsum yang dag byung //
T02TD3305E:192b-17: sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya //
T02TD3305E:192b-18: aom a'a: badzra au da ka aa bhi shinytsa h'um su ra te aa ham zhes brjod pas mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:192b-19: yang khrus kyi dkyil 'khor med na dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi sgor slob ma nye bar gzhag pa la rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i bum pa rnams las chu nyung zad pa bsdus te padma'i snod dam dung chos su bzung ba rnams blugs shing dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:192b-20: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ma 'byor na yang ras la sogs pa la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'ba' zhig tu rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i chu nyid mi bskyod pa'i bdag nyid byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bos mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:192b-21: de'i tshe de rnams bde ba chen po la mnyam par 'gyur ro//
T02TD3305E:193a-0: @193a * // zhes bsam par bya'o zhes pa ni chu'i dbang bskur ba ste me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
T02TD3305E:193a-1: 'ga' zhig ni shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so zhes so //
T02TD3305E:193a-2: khrus kyi dkyil 'khor rim pa las //
T02TD3305E:193a-3: chu yi dbang bskur yad dag thob //
T02TD3305E:193a-4: rgyan rnams rab 'dzin gang yin pa //
T02TD3305E:193a-6: dmar po'i gos ni 'dzin gyur pa //
T02TD3305E:193a-7: rgyal ba'i rgyan rnams kyis ni brgyan //
T02TD3305E:193a-8: cod pan dkar po yang dag 'dzin //
T02TD3305E:193a-9: glu 'di yis ni dga' bar bya //
T02TD3305E:193a-10: bde ba chen po chags pa che //
T02TD3305E:193a-11: rdo rje chen po nor chen po //
T02TD3305E:193a-12: shes rab chen po ye shes che //
T02TD3305E:193a-13: rdo rje sems dpar deng bdag bsgrub //
T02TD3305E:193a-14: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje che //
T02TD3305E:193a-15: rdo rje'i dbang phyug bla na med //
T02TD3305E:193a-16: dbang bskur thams cad kun don du //
T02TD3305E:193a-17: dngos grub thams cad bde rab stsol //
T02TD3305E:193a-18: ji bzhin dang po'i sangs rgyas don dam bde ba ster ba po //
T02TD3305E:193a-19: ji bzhin 'dod pa thar ba nor dang chos rnams ster ba po //
T02TD3305E:193a-20: ji bzhin ye shes lnga dang shin tu dga' ba'i grogs byed pa //
T02TD3305E:193a-21: ji bzhin phyag na rdo rje bde ba chen po'i mgon po nyid //
T02TD3305E:193a-22: dza aa a'a ai buddh'a sa ra ma the de ha ao //
T02TD3305E:193a-23: dza aa k'a mo mokkha dha na dharma d'a aa ao //
T02TD3305E:193a-24: dza aa panydza nya na su ra aa sa h'a aa ao //
T02TD3305E:193a-25: dza aa badzra b'a ni ma h'a su ha na ao //
T02TD3305E:193a-26: slar yang 'dir ni bla ma yi //
T02TD3305E:193a-27: dkyil 'khor bskor ba gsum byas te //
T02TD3305E:193a-28: de nas shar du gnas pa yis //
T02TD3305E:193a-29: sgo phye nas ni rnam par gzhug //
T02TD3305E:193a-30: sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur gyis //
T02TD3305E:193a-31: bla mas slob ma bsdu bya ste //
T02TD3305E:193a-32: mgo bo'i dbus su dpral ba dang //
T02TD3305E:193a-33: logs gnyis de bzhin spyi po dang //
T02TD3305E:193a-34: rgyab tu 'ang phyag rgya yang dag gzhag / sngags 'di rjes su brjod par bya //
T02TD3305E:193a-35: aom badzra dh'a t'i shva ri aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD3305E:193a-36: aom satva badzri aa bhi shinytsa bhr'um /
T02TD3305E:193a-37: aom ratna badzri aa bhi shi nytsa hr'am aom dharma badzri aa bhi shinytsa hr'i:/
T02TD3305E:193a-38: aom karma badzri aa bhi shinytsa tr'am /
T02TD3305E:193a-39: dbang bskur chen po zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang /
T02TD3305E:193a-40: aom a'a:badzra mu ku ta aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD3305E:193a-41: su ra ta stvam aa ham /
T02TD3305E:193a-44: aom h'um hr'am hr'i:aa: zhes pa'i sngags kyis dpral bar dar dpyangs bcings la /
T02TD3305E:193b-0: badzra tu shya ho: zhes brjod pas mnyam pa nyid du dgyes par bya'o zhes pa ni cod pan gyi dbang @193b bskur ba ste /
T02TD3305E:193b-1: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02TD3305E:193b-2: de nas slob ma hr'i: dang padma yongs su gyur pa las //
T02TD3305E:193b-3: snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzugs ye shes sems dpa' dang dbyer med pa la rdo rje snang ba mtha' yas kyi bdag nyid de /
T02TD3305E:193b-4: slob ma'i snying gar bzung nas /
T02TD3305E:193b-5: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02TD3305E:193b-6: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02TD3305E:193b-7: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD3305E:193b-8: rab tu grub phyir rdo rje gzung //
T02TD3305E:193b-9: zhes brjod cing slob ma'i snying ga dang mgrin pa dang mgo bo rnams la rdo rje reg nas lag pa g-yas par rdo rje sbyin par bya'o zhes pa ni rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba ste so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so ;
T02TD3305E:193b-10: / de nas slob ma kham dang ral gri las skyes pa'i don yod grub pa'i gzugs ye shes sems dpa' dang dbyer med pa la dril bu'ang don yod grub pa yongs su gyur pa ste lag pa g-yon par byin pa la /
T02TD3305E:193b-11: rdo rje dang dril bur ldan pa'i lag pa dag gis phyag rgya la 'khyud pa'i tshul byed du bcug nas /
T02TD3305E:193b-12: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi tishtha badzra sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod cing /
T02TD3305E:193b-14: bcom ldan 'das gzung ngo bdag la ni //
T02TD3305E:193b-15: yang dag nye bar gyur par mdzod //
T02TD3305E:193b-16: ces kyang 'don du gzhug go zhes pa ni /
T02TD3305E:193b-17: dril bu'i dbang bskur ba ste bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD3305E:193b-18: de'i rjes su aom dang 'khor lo las byung ba'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs ye shes sems dpa' dang ro gcig par bsams la mgo bor rdo rje dang dril bu mnyam par gzung ste /
T02TD3305E:193b-19: aom badzra satva stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta kye dpal che ge mo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa siddhi sa ma ya stvam bhurbhu wa sva: zhes pas me tog lhung ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas rang gi rigs kyi ming gi rnam par snang mdzad kyi bdag nyid can gyis mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:193b-20: de la rdo rje sems dpa'i ming rnams ni mchog gi dang po dang /
T02TD3305E:193b-30: lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rje rnams so //
T02TD3305E:193b-31: re re la yang rdo rje'i sgra mngon par sbyar bar bya ste /
T02TD3305E:194a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi ming @194a * //
T02TD3305E:194a-2: mi bskyod pa'i bzhad pa dang /
T02TD3305E:194a-25: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi yid bzhin nor bu dang /
T02TD3305E:194a-32: rin chen rdo rje rnams so //
T02TD3305E:194a-33: snang ba mtha' yas kyi 'dod chags dang /
T02TD3305E:194a-38: shin tu dga' ba'i myu gu dang /
T02TD3305E:194a-42: shin tu dga' ba'i dga' ba dang /
T02TD3305E:194a-45: snang ba mtha' yas rdo rje rnams so //
T02TD3305E:194a-46: don yod grub pa'i rta mchog dang /
T02TD3305E:194a-49: pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:194a-54: don yod rdo rje rnams so //
T02TD3305E:194a-55: bud med rnams la rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje shugs ma dang /
T02TD3305E:194a-60: rdo rje phreng ba ma dang /
T02TD3305E:194a-62: mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje bdag med ma dang /
T02TD3305E:194a-65: rdo rje m'a ma k'i dang /
T02TD3305E:194a-66: zhe sdang dga' ma zhes pa'o //
T02TD3305E:194a-67: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02TD3305E:194a-70: rdo rje rnam snang ma dang /
T02TD3305E:194a-74: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rdo rje sgrol ma dang /
T02TD3305E:194a-75: rdo rje do shal ma dang /
T02TD3305E:194a-78: rdo rje nga rgyal ma dang /
T02TD3305E:194a-79: nga rgyal ma rdo rje dang /
T02TD3305E:194a-80: rdo rje nam mkha' ma dang /
T02TD3305E:194a-81: nam mkha' rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD3305E:194a-82: nam mkha' dga' ma zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD3305E:194a-83: snang ba mtha' yas kyi 'dod chags ma dang /
T02TD3305E:194a-86: rdo rje ae ma bde dang /
T02TD3305E:194a-87: rdo rje ro langs ma dang /
T02TD3305E:194b-0: rdo rje @194b blo gros ma dang /
T02TD3305E:194b-2: rdo rje gos dkar mo dang /
T02TD3305E:194b-4: don yod grub pa'i rdo rje snyems ma dang /
T02TD3305E:194b-7: rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang /
T02TD3305E:194b-8: dam tshig rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD3305E:194b-9: rdo rje dga' ma zhes pa'o //
T02TD3305E:194b-10: ming gi dbang bskur ba ste /
T02TD3305E:194b-11: shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
T02TD3305E:194b-12: sngar bshad pa'i dbang bskur ba 'di rnams la so sor /
T02TD3305E:194b-13: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02TD3305E:194b-14: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba gdab cing /
T02TD3305E:194b-15: dbang bskur chen po rdo rje ni //
T02TD3305E:194b-16: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas kyang bkru bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:194b-17: phreng ba dang chu la sogs pa'i dbang bskur drug po 'di rnams ni /
T02TD3305E:194b-18: ma rig pa'i gnyen po nus pa nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i rig pa'i dbang bskur ba zhes brjod do //
T02TD3305E:194b-19: dbang 'di rnams bskur ba'i rim pa ni /
T02TD3305E:194b-20: bya ba dang spyod pa'i rgyud nyan pa dang 'chad pa dang sngags bsgrub pa la dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD3305E:194b-21: slar yang rnal 'byor ba dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyang ngo zhes /
T02TD3305E:194b-22: slob dpon gyi dbang du rlom pa 'dod pa ni lung dang mi ldan te /
T02TD3305E:194b-23: lhan cig skyes dbang dang sngom pa bral ba rnams la de'i rang gi ngo bo mngon par brjod par bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud gang du yang ma bstan cing rigs pa yang ma yin no //
T02TD3305E:194b-24: dbang 'di rnams slob dpon gyi dbang don du mi gnyer ba la ni thun mong gi sngom ba sbyin pa sngon du 'gro bas bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:194b-25: don du gnyer pa la ni gnyis ka'i sngom pa sbyin pa sngon du 'gro bas so //
T02TD3305E:194b-26: de nas slob mas yon phul la thal mo sbyar te /
T02TD3305E:194b-27: gang gis bdag ni khyod drin las //
T02TD3305E:194b-28: rang dang gzhan don nus gyur pa //
T02TD3305E:194b-29: rdo rje slob dpon gyi ni dbang //
T02TD3305E:194b-30: thugs rje'i gter gyis bdag la stsol du gsol //
T02TD3305E:194b-31: zhes brjod cing bla ma la gsol ba btab pa de la /
T02TD3305E:194b-32: rdo rje h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su bsams nas /
T02TD3305E:194b-33: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD3305E:194b-34: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02TD3305E:194b-35: kun du bzang bo kun bdag nyid //
T02TD3305E:194b-36: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po'i bdag //
T02TD3305E:194b-37: bcom ldan 'das mchog gi dang po'i skyes bu zhes brjod cing lag pa g-yas par rdo rje sbyin par bya ste rdo rje'i dam tshig go //
T02TD3305E:194b-38: de nas dril bu aa las skyes par bsams nas //
T02TD3305E:194b-39: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD3305E:195a-2: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung //
T02TD3305E:195a-3: byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed //
T02TD3305E:195a-4: ces brjod cing lag pa g-yon par dril bu sbyin par bya ste dril bu'i dam tshig go //
T02TD3305E:195a-5: slob mas kyang dril bu de /
T02TD3305E:195a-6: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
T02TD3305E:195a-7: rang bzhin dag mchog sems dpa' yi //
T02TD3305E:195a-8: dam pa'i srid pa byed par 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:195a-9: zhes brjod cing dkrol bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:195a-10: de nas gzhan yang phyag rgya'i dam tshig gsungs pa /
T02TD3305E:195a-11: yid kyi lus ni brtan pa nyid //
T02TD3305E:195a-12: phyag rgya'i dam tshig rab tu brjod //
T02TD3305E:195a-13: gang gis lus 'di thams cad brtan //
T02TD3305E:195a-14: des na phyag rgyar rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD3305E:195a-15: 'dis ni lhag pa'i bdag nyid ye shes kyi phyag rgyar byin gyis brlabs pa la lag pas 'khyud pa'i tshul bya'o zhes pa phyag rgya'i dam tshig go //
T02TD3305E:195a-16: mchog gi dang po las gang gsungs pa /
T02TD3305E:195a-17: rdo rje de nyid kyis ni gzung //
T02TD3305E:195a-18: dril bu chos kyis dkrol nas ni //
T02TD3305E:195a-19: dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya che //
T02TD3305E:195a-20: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas /
T02TD3305E:195a-21: zhes so dam tshig gsum sbyin pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:195a-23: // / de nas dam tshig gsum gzung ba ni /
T02TD3305E:195a-24: slob ma rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su bsgoms te /
T02TD3305E:195a-25: snying ga'i sa bon gyis bskul ba'i lha mo rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkhar bzhugs pa rnams kyis mngon par dbang bskur bzhin par rnam par bsams la /
T02TD3305E:195a-26: dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni //
T02TD3305E:195a-27: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa //
T02TD3305E:195a-28: gsang gsum yang dag 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02TD3305E:195a-29: sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya //
T02TD3305E:195a-30: aom a'a: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02TD3305E:195a-31: zhes brjod pas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:195a-32: de nas mi bskyod pa cod pan du bsams te /
T02TD3305E:195a-33: gzhan de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang lha mo rnams ye shes sems dpa'i ngo bos bcug la /
T02TD3305E:195a-34: aom su pra tishtha badzre sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:195a-35: zhes pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab cing /
T02TD3305E:195a-36: de rnams la me tog la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:195a-38: shes rab bcu drug lon pa la //
T02TD3305E:195a-39: lag pa dag gis yang dag 'khyud //
T02TD3305E:195a-40: rdo rje dril bu mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD3305E:195a-41: slob dpon gyi ni dbang du 'dod //
T02TD3305E:195b-0: de'i rjes su mdor bsdus pas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dkyil 'khor gyi @195b rnam par dag pa yang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:195b-1: phung po dri med nyid ni dkyil 'khor te //
T02TD3305E:195b-2: mtha' dag lha mo'i chogs kyi rnam par nges //
T02TD3305E:195b-3: he ru ka dang dpa' bo de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD3305E:195b-4: der yang lus dang ro yi rgyun las rtogs //
T02TD3305E:195b-5: zhes pa phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba ste //
T02TD3305E:195b-6: ming gzhan slob dpon gyi dbang gi cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:195b-8: // / de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam par bltas nas /
T02TD3305E:195b-9: me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod cing bstod de /
T02TD3305E:195b-10: sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i me tog gcig gis slob ma la bsnun nas 'di rnams brjod par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:195b-11: deng nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD3305E:195b-12: srog dang bcas pa rnam rol phyir//
T02TD3305E:195b-13: rdo rje bsnyems ma'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD3305E:195b-14: dga' mchog bde ba'i mchod pa gyis //
T02TD3305E:195b-16: a'a:/ sgeg dang bcas pas phreng ba 'phang //
T02TD3305E:195b-17: sangs rgyas thams cad chod par bya //
T02TD3305E:195b-19: phreng ba 'di ni rgyan yin no //
T02TD3305E:195b-21: lus can kun la dam chos kyi //
T02TD3305E:195b-22: glu ni khyod kyis blang par gyis //
T02TD3305E:195b-23: de yis bde gshegs dngos grub ni //
T02TD3305E:195b-24: shin tu bde ba thob par 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:195b-26: de nyid thal mo'i gar gyis ni //
T02TD3305E:195b-27: rdzogs sangs rgyas la rjes chags pa'i //
T02TD3305E:195b-28: sangs rgyas 'dul ba'i phrin las kyis //
T02TD3305E:195b-29: gar mkhan tshul du bsgyur bar gyis //
T02TD3305E:195b-31: rdzogs sangs rgyas la spos phul bas //
T02TD3305E:195b-32: dam tshig brtul zhugs legs bsgos pa'i //
T02TD3305E:195b-33: lus can bde gshegs cha lugs su //
T02TD3305E:195b-34: ye shes kyi ni tshul du bgyis //
T02TD3305E:195b-36: a'a:/ sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dor //
T02TD3305E:195b-37: byang chub yan lag tshogs gyur pas //
T02TD3305E:195b-38: mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa yi //
T02TD3305E:195b-39: bde gshegs sku ni thob par gyis //
T02TD3305E:195b-41: chos kyi me ni legs spar bas //
T02TD3305E:195b-42: rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar dang //
T02TD3305E:195b-43: sems can ma rig ljongs rnams las /
T02TD3305E:195b-44: ye shes snang bas gsal bar gyis //
T02TD3305E:195b-46: rgyal ba rnams la dri phul bas //
T02TD3305E:195b-47: tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang //
T02TD3305E:195b-48: rnam grol ye shes gzigs pa yis //
T02TD3305E:195b-49: byang chub lus can rnams la bskor //
T02TD3305E:195b-51: ga:/ de nas rang gi snying po la sogs pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dam lan gsum du bzlas te /
T02TD3305E:195b-52: bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sbyin lags kyis //
T02TD3305E:195b-53: 'di la nye bar mdzad du gsol //
T02TD3305E:195b-54: zhes brjod cing slob ma la sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:195b-56: bcom ldan bdag gis bzung lags kyis //
T02TD3305E:196a-2: zhes 'dis gzungs lan gsum bzlas so //
T02TD3305E:196a-5: // /'di'i rjes su gser ram dngul gyi snod du bzhag pa'i sbrang rtsi dang mig sman thur mas blangs nas de dag nyid kyis bsku zhing sngags kyi de kho na nyid rig pas /
T02TD3305E:196a-6: aom badzra nee tra aa pa ha ra pa ta lam hr'i:/
T02TD3305E:196a-7: thur ldan sman pa'i rgyal po yis //
T02TD3305E:196a-8: ji ltar 'jig rten rab rib bzhin //
T02TD3305E:196a-9: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02TD3305E:196a-10: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02TD3305E:196a-11: zhes brjod par bya ste mig sman gyi cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:196a-13: // / de nas me long blangs la /
T02TD3305E:196a-14: aa:yig gis mngon par bsngags nas slob ma'i gdong la bstan zhing tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:196a-15: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD3305E:196a-16: gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med //
T02TD3305E:196a-17: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD3305E:196a-18: rgyu dang las las yang dag byung //
T02TD3305E:196a-19: rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin //
T02TD3305E:196a-20: de ni dag gos la rnyog pa med //
T02TD3305E:196a-21: sangs rgyas kun bdag bdag nyid ni //
T02TD3305E:196a-22: bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs //
T02TD3305E:196a-23: rang bzhin med cing gnas med par //
T02TD3305E:196a-24: chos rnams de ltar shes nas khyod //
T02TD3305E:196a-25: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02TD3305E:196a-26: skyob pa rnams kyi sras su skye //
T02TD3305E:196a-28: me long bstan pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:196a-30: // / de nas ho: yig las byung ba'i gzhu ho:zhes brjod cing /
T02TD3305E:196a-31: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga ya sva zhes pas byin nas mnga' 'phang ba'i tshe yang slob mas /
T02TD3305E:196a-32: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga ya nas /
T02TD3305E:196a-33: bgegs la phyigs pa'i bsam pas phyogs ba zhir mda' 'phang mnga' 'phang bar bya ste steng du gcig dang 'og tu gzhan no zhes ba mda' 'phang ba'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:196a-35: // / dbang bskur ba 'di rnams thams cad du /
T02TD3305E:196a-36: aom sarba ta th'a ga ga aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:196a-37: zhes brjod pas dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes slob dpon gyi dbang bskur te lus rnam par spyod ba'o //
T02TD3305E:196a-38: de nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dam tshig 'khor lo'i tshogs dam tshig byas nas yol bas bcad pa la sogs pa dben par byas nas slob ma la rab tu bstan pa'i ched du gzugs dang tsho la sogs pas brgyan cing /
T02TD3305E:196b-0: dam tshig dang sngom pa dang skal bar ldan pa'am ma rnyed na gzhan @196b yang rung ba'i shes rab ma bla ma la gsang ba'i don du dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:196b-1: de la bla ma rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bor lhag par mos pas thal mo sbyar te /
T02TD3305E:196b-2: khyod kyi zhabs kyi bka' drin las //
T02TD3305E:196b-3: bdag gis bla med bya ba thob //
T02TD3305E:196b-4: de phyir gsang ba'i dbang gis ni //
T02TD3305E:196b-5: mgon po rjes su gzung bar mdzod //
T02TD3305E:196b-6: ces pa lan gsum gyis gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:196b-7: de nas rim pas dam tshig la nye bar bzhag ste /
T02TD3305E:196b-8: de la ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis dge ba'i bla mas /
T02TD3305E:196b-9: tha mal ba'i bud med kyi gzugs stong pa nyid kyi rjes la lha mo'i gzugs su bskyed pa de dang /
T02TD3305E:196b-10: rdo rje dang padma 'du bya ba sngon du 'gro bas snyoms par 'jug par bya zhing /
T02TD3305E:196b-11: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atmako& ham /
T02TD3305E:196b-12: zhes brjod nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas spyan ma la sogs pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa bkug ste /
T02TD3305E:196b-13: rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas bdag nyid la bcug pa rnams 'dod chags chen pos zhu bar gyur pa aa wa dh'u t'i nas 'gro bar bsams la /
T02TD3305E:196b-14: rdo rje nor bur lhan cig skyes pa bstan par bya zhing /
T02TD3305E:196b-15: mthe bong dang ming med dag gis rdo rje nor bu btsir nas padma las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs ba zhu ba de rnams rang gi byang chub kyi sems dang dbyer med par mos par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:196b-16: gsung rdo rje'i ngo bos slob ma rnams la'o //
T02TD3305E:196b-17: thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba mthong nas ma dad par dogs par gdong g-yogs bcings la /
T02TD3305E:196b-18: der 'jug pa rnams rnal 'byor ma'i las kyi rdo rje can gyis bzung nas gzhug par bya /
T02TD3305E:196b-19: pus mo btsugs nas me tog dang bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar zhing /
T02TD3305E:196b-20: bcom ldan zhi ba chen po kye //
T02TD3305E:196b-21: rdo rje rnal 'byor gcig bzhed pa //
T02TD3305E:196b-22: mi phyed phyag rgya sgrub pa po //
T02TD3305E:196b-23: rdo rje'i sbyor las yang dag byung //
T02TD3305E:196b-24: ji ltar khyod ni bdag nyid che //
T02TD3305E:196b-25: khyab bdag bdag kyang de 'drar mdzod //
T02TD3305E:196b-27: bying pa skyabs med bdag la skyobs //
T02TD3305E:196b-28: zhes pas bla ma la bstod pa bya'o //
T02TD3305E:196b-29: de nas bla mas langs te /
T02TD3305E:196b-31: ji ltar sangs rgyas sras dbang bskur //
T02TD3305E:196b-32: byang chub sems ni bzang po yis //
T02TD3305E:196b-33: de bzhin bu khyod dbang bskur bgyi /
T02TD3305E:197a-0: zhes pa'i tshigs bcad brjod pa sngon @197a * //
T02TD3305E:197a-2: aom a'a:badzra dhri ka h'um zhes pa la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug gi sngags rnams ji lta ba bzhin du brjod pas slob ma'i khar dbab par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:197a-3: des kyang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i slob ma aam ho ma h'a su kham zhes brjod cing btung bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:197a-4: shes rab kyis kyang langs nas gos med pa nyid du lhung ba'i chu skyes na gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdud rtsi'i thig le rnams de'i khar gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:197a-5: des kyang de bzhin du btung bar bya'o zhes pa /
T02TD3305E:197a-6: gsang ba'i mngon par dbang bskur ba ste ngag rnam par sbyong ba'o //
T02TD3305E:197a-7: de'i rjes la de'am gzhan yang rung ba'i shes rab ma dam tshig dang sngom pa la gnas pa'am /
T02TD3305E:197a-8: gzhan yang rung ste gzugs dang lang tsho can la sogs pa dang ldan zhing /
T02TD3305E:197a-9: khyod kyi zhabs kyi bka' drin las /
T02TD3305E:197a-10: gsang ba'i dbang bskur bla med thob //
T02TD3305E:197a-11: shes rab ye shes dbang bskur gyis //
T02TD3305E:197a-12: mgon po rjes su gzung bar mdzod //
T02TD3305E:197a-13: ces pa'i tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba btab ba can gyis slob ma la /
T02TD3305E:197a-15: bstan byar sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan //
T02TD3305E:197a-16: 'khor lo'i rim pa sbyor ba yis //
T02TD3305E:197a-17: dam pa'i bde pa myong bar gyis //
T02TD3305E:197a-18: dga' sbyin gnas sbyin lha mo 'di//
T02TD3305E:197a-19: sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'ong ma //
T02TD3305E:197a-20: zung zhig zung zhig sems dpa' che //
T02TD3305E:197a-21: zhes go bar byas nas gtad par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:197a-22: de nas rig mas kyang 'dod lha bzhin du sgrub pa po la rnam par blta zhing /
T02TD3305E:197a-23: gos dang bral ba la me tog gi rgyan rnams kyis brgyan te langs nas g-yon brkyang la sogs pa rnams kyis sgeg par byas la g-yas brkyang gi rkang stabs kyi tshul dang /
T02TD3305E:197a-25: tsog pu rnams kyang bya zhing /
T02TD3305E:197a-26: bzhi mnyam la sogs pa rnams kyis dri zhim par byas te /
T02TD3305E:197a-27: chu skyes gsal por nye bar bstan nas dga' bas 'di nyid brjod par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:197a-29: bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas //
T02TD3305E:197a-30: gang zhig cho gas sten byed pa //
T02TD3305E:197a-31: de yi mdun na nga gnas so //
T02TD3305E:197a-32: sangs rgyas bstan pa la sogs pa //
T02TD3305E:197a-33: bya ba padmar ji bzhin gyis //
T02TD3305E:197a-34: bde chen rgyal po rang nyid kyang //
T02TD3305E:197a-35: 'di nyid du ni rtag tu zhugs //
T02TD3305E:197b-1: des kyang langs nas 'o byas la yang dag par 'khyud de gnas par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:197b-2: de la bla mas dga' pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba bshad par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:197b-3: rdo rje padmar rab bzhag nas //
T02TD3305E:197b-4: byang chub sems ni spro mi bya //
T02TD3305E:197b-5: bskyod byas de ni dga' ba yi //
T02TD3305E:197b-6: sems ni bskyed cing bsgom par bya //
T02TD3305E:197b-7: rnal 'byor can gyis byang chub sems //
T02TD3305E:197b-8: ji srid gshegs par mi bya bar //
T02TD3305E:197b-9: gang yang dga' bde skyes thob pa //
T02TD3305E:197b-10: de srid rgyun mi 'chad par bsten //
T02TD3305E:197b-11: dngos grub kun gyi bsten gyur pa //
T02TD3305E:197b-12: byang chub sems ni lhung ba na //
T02TD3305E:197b-13: rnam shes phung po brgyal 'gyur bas //
T02TD3305E:197b-14: ma smad dngos grub ga la yod //
T02TD3305E:197b-15: mkha' dbyings rdo rje sbyor ba yis //
T02TD3305E:197b-16: reg pa rmad byung chen po ste //
T02TD3305E:197b-17: bde ba skyes pa gang de ni //
T02TD3305E:197b-18: mchog tu dga' ba'i byed pa po //
T02TD3305E:197b-20: nam mkha' nor bu padma yi //
T02TD3305E:197b-21: ze'u 'bru bltams pa'i gnas dag la //
T02TD3305E:197b-22: rdo rje skyil krung gis ni sems //
T02TD3305E:197b-23: nor bu'i nang du gnas par blta //
T02TD3305E:197b-24: nges par skyes pa'i ye shes gang //
T02TD3305E:197b-25: ye shes de ni dri med gzugs //
T02TD3305E:197b-26: mchog dang dga' bral dag pa'i dbus //
T02TD3305E:197b-27: mtshan nyid bltas te brtan par bya //
T02TD3305E:197b-28: zhes pas bla ma'i bka' drin las dga' ba so so'i dbye ba dang ldan par rang nyid lha'i sku dang shes rab ma lha mo'i gzugs su bskyed nas /
T02TD3305E:197b-29: hr'i:dang h'um dag las skyes pa'i padma dang rdo rje dag gi ze'u 'bru dang nor bu dag aa:dang aom dag las skyes pa dang //
T02TD3305E:197b-30: rdo rje'i khar phat yig ser po rnam par bsgoms la g-yon gyi char gnas pa'i rtsa dang mdzub mo dang lce rnams kyi rtse mor yang hr'i:yig dmar po gnas shing /
T02TD3305E:197b-31: sh'ita yig sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par bskul ste /
T02TD3305E:197b-32: aom sh'i sh'i sh'i sh'i ha ha ha sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:197b-34: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atmako& to /
T02TD3305E:197b-36: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa lus la bcug ste /
