T02TD3305E:197b-37: bla mas kyang rnam par snang mdzad dang spyan ma la sogs pa dpag tu med pa bcug pa dang ro gcig tu gyur pas dga' ba brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:197b-38: gang tshe rnal 'byor ye shes mthong //
T02TD3305E:197b-39: bde bas gnas te 'gyur ba med //
T02TD3305E:197b-40: thun tshod yang na nyin zhag gam /
T02TD3305E:197b-41: phyogs dang zla ba lo yis sam //
T02TD3305E:198a-0: @198a * // bskal pa 'am bskal pa stong phrag tu //
T02TD3305E:198a-1: ye shes mngon sbyor gnas par bya //
T02TD3305E:198a-3: slob mas de yi cha gzung ste //
T02TD3305E:198a-4: padma'i nang du spro bar bya //
T02TD3305E:198a-5: de nas bcud len sems kyis ni //
T02TD3305E:198a-6: byang chub sngon du gzung bar bya //
T02TD3305E:198a-7: zhes pa shes rab ye shes kyi mngon par dbang bskur ba ste thugs rdo rje rnam par spyod pa'o //
T02TD3305E:198a-9: shes rab ye shes dbang bskur gyis //
T02TD3305E:198a-10: sems kyi rdo rje rnam par sbyangs //
T02TD3305E:198a-11: da ni bdag la bzhi pa yang //
T02TD3305E:198a-12: 'dren pas bka' drin mdzad du gsol //
T02TD3305E:198a-13: zhes pa gsol ba btab ba can gyi slob ma la /
T02TD3305E:198a-14: sngar gyi don gyi yang dag pa'i de kho na nyid tshig gis bstan par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:198a-15: ji skad gsungs pa'i tshigs mngon sum du gzung ba'i shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba de bzhin du bzhi par mngon par brjod cing 'bras bur gyur pa'i dbang bskur ba rin po che bshad par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:198a-16: ma yin par gzhan du na dam tshig zad pa'i 'jigs pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
T02TD3305E:198a-17: ji ltar gsungs pa'i cho gas dbang bskur sbyin //
T02TD3305E:198a-18: slob ma'i mos pa'i yid ni yang dag brtag / rgya chen zab mo'i tshul la lhag mos na //
T02TD3305E:198a-19: dbang bskur rin chen de nyi tshig gis sbyin //
T02TD3305E:198a-21: dbang bskur med na rnal 'byor ba //
T02TD3305E:198a-22: rnal 'byor nyid la slu bar byed //
T02TD3305E:198a-23: mkha' la khu tshur bsnun pa dang //
T02TD3305E:198a-25: byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba la yang sngom pa med na ni thar ba 'dzin pa ma yin no zhes so //
T02TD3305E:198a-26: 'o na 'di ni rgya chen po la lhag par mos pa'o zhes bya bar ji ltar khong du chud par bya zhe na /
T02TD3305E:198a-28: chu skyar las ni chu yod dang //
T02TD3305E:198a-29: du ba las ni mer shes bzhin //
T02TD3305E:198a-30: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyi //
T02TD3305E:198a-31: rigs ni mtshan ma dag las shes /
T02TD3305E:198a-32: shin tu rab dang chu skyes gdong //
T02TD3305E:198a-33: dga' bar brgyas lus las skyes //
T02TD3305E:198a-34: de nyid bltas na mkhas ba yis //
T02TD3305E:198a-35: dam pa'i slob ma rjes su gzung //
T02TD3305E:198a-37: de nyid kye'i rdo rjer yang gsungs pa //
T02TD3305E:198a-38: dbang bskur rnam gsum dbyer med pa //
T02TD3305E:198a-39: rgyud 'di las ni rnam par gnas //
T02TD3305E:198a-40: slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang //
T02TD3305E:198a-41: bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:198a-42: skad cig dgod dang lag pas thob //
T02TD3305E:198b-0: de yang 'khyud ba @198b rgyud las te //
T02TD3305E:198b-1: dgod pa dag la slob dpon nyid //
T02TD3305E:198b-2: lta ba gsang ba de bzhin te //
T02TD3305E:198b-3: lag bcangs las ni shes rab nyid //
T02TD3305E:198b-4: gnyis gnyis 'khyud la de yang ngo //
T02TD3305E:198b-5: dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' nyid //
T02TD3305E:198b-6: dga' bral lhan skyes de bzhin te //
T02TD3305E:198b-7: sna tshogs dang ni rnam smin dang //
T02TD3305E:198b-8: rnam nyed de bzhin mtshan nyid bral //
T02TD3305E:198b-9: dbang gi rim pa'i cho ga kun //
T02TD3305E:198b-10: shes rab yan lag chags las skyes //
T02TD3305E:198b-11: dga' ba'i bde ba cung zad skye //
T02TD3305E:198b-12: mchog tu dga' ba de bas lhag / dga' bral ba chags bral yin //
T02TD3305E:198b-13: lhag ma lhan cig skyes dgar 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:198b-14: dang po reg par 'dod pa ste //
T02TD3305E:198b-15: gnyis pa bde bar 'dod pa yin //
T02TD3305E:198b-17: de nas bzhi pa bsgom par bya //
T02TD3305E:198b-18: sna tshogs dang po'i dga' ba ste //
T02TD3305E:198b-19: rnam smin la ni mchog dga' ba //
T02TD3305E:198b-20: rnam nyed dga' bral dga' ba yin //
T02TD3305E:198b-21: mtshan bral lhan cig skyes dga' nyid //
T02TD3305E:198b-23: sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs brjod //
T02TD3305E:198b-24: rnam smin de las bzlog pa ste //
T02TD3305E:198b-25: yang dag bde ba'i ye shes spyod //
T02TD3305E:198b-26: rang nyid bde ba spyad pa yi //
T02TD3305E:198b-27: gos ni rnam par nyed par gsungs //
T02TD3305E:198b-28: mtshan nyid bral ba gsum la gzhan //
T02TD3305E:198b-29: chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs //
T02TD3305E:198b-30: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02TD3305E:198b-31: 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min //
T02TD3305E:198b-32: dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD3305E:198b-33: gsum po spangs pa nyid kyi phyir //
T02TD3305E:198b-34: lhan cig skyes pa byang chub brjod //
T02TD3305E:198b-35: de nyid nag po zhabs kyis gsungs //
T02TD3305E:198b-36: reg ba la sogs sna tshogs yin te padmar rdo rje gnas pa gang yin de ni rnam smin no //
T02TD3305E:198b-37: phyi nas bsrubs pa las skyes chags pa'i me yis bsregs nas mgron la zhen pa'i phung po rnam nyed yin //
T02TD3305E:198b-38: de la yid ni 'dzin pas rlung dag lhan cig spyod cing chu skyes la ni lhag par gyur pa'i me //
T02TD3305E:198b-39: de 'dir rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam ste mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sku ni rnal 'byor bgrod bya mtshan bral lo //
T02TD3305E:198b-40: d'a ri ka pa'i zhabs kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T02TD3305E:198b-41: nor bu'i rtsa bar rab tu gnas pa sna tshogs dga' ba tsam yin te //
T02TD3305E:198b-42: slar yang nor bu'i dbus su lhag ma'o rnam rtog dang bcas g-yo ba dang //
T02TD3305E:198b-43: de las steng du spyi bo'i thur ni 'dzag cing 'pho ba med pa'i gzugs //
T02TD3305E:199a-0: lhan cig skyes pa 'dam skyes la gnas sangs rgyas @199a * //
T02TD3305E:199a-2: bi r'u pa zhes bya ba'i zhabs kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T02TD3305E:199a-3: ji snyed rang bzhin 'od gsal bsil zer can gyi sgo las khru ba lhung ba ma yin par //
T02TD3305E:199a-4: lta mo'i padma'i 'dab ma'i nang du ro mnyam gyur pa rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams kyis //
T02TD3305E:199a-5: rdo rje'i spyi bo'i rtse mor spro zhing snying rjes mi phyed 'gro la mdzad pa can //
T02TD3305E:199a-6: ji snyed dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs ni lhan cig skyes par shes bya khyab pa dag gzugs //
T02TD3305E:199a-7: aindra bhu t'i zhabs kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T02TD3305E:199a-8: ji srid rdo rje nor bur rdo rje gsum ni bsreg cing g-yo ba'i zla ba rlung gis ni //
T02TD3305E:199a-9: chu skyes gnas kyi lte ba'i nang du 'gro bar 'dod pa'i skad ces 'di la brtan gyur pa //
T02TD3305E:199a-10: gang du rang dang gzhan la sogs pa'i rnam rtog bral gyur bya ba rnams ni dman pa'i yid //
T02TD3305E:199a-11: shes par bya ste lhan cig skyes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni slar yang rig par 'gro ba gsal //
T02TD3305E:199a-13: de yi rtsa bar ma yin po la'i snying por min //
T02TD3305E:199a-14: padma'i sbyor ba med pa yang ni ma yin te //
T02TD3305E:199a-15: ji snyed rdo rje'i rtse las 'pho ba med gyur pa //
T02TD3305E:199a-16: de snyed mtshan nyid bral bas lhan skyes mtshan nyid do //
T02TD3305E:199a-18: don 'di nyid dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las kyang gsungs pa /
T02TD3305E:199a-19: bsgrub bya sgrub byed yang dag sbyor //
T02TD3305E:199a-20: gang de bsnyen par gsungs pa de //
T02TD3305E:199a-21: rdo rje padma mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD3305E:199a-22: nye bar sgrub pa zhes brjod do //
T02TD3305E:199a-23: h'um phat yi ge yang dag ldan //
T02TD3305E:199a-24: sgrub pa la ni g-yo bar gsungs //
T02TD3305E:199a-25: ngo bo nyid kyis gang bde zhing //
T02TD3305E:199a-26: sgrub pa chen po zhes brjod do //
T02TD3305E:199a-27: bsgrub bya ni shes rab dang /
T02TD3305E:199a-28: sgrub byed ni thabs te de dag yang dag par sbyor ba ni bsnyen pa'o //
T02TD3305E:199a-29: padmar rdo rje rab tu zhugs pa ni nye bar sgrub pa'o //
T02TD3305E:199a-31: ngo bo nyid kyis rang nyid bde zhing zhi ba ni sgrub pa chen por gsungs so //
T02TD3305E:199a-32: bsgrub bya dang ni sgrub byed dag /
T02TD3305E:199a-33: rdo rje rab zhugs mthar dga' ba //
T02TD3305E:199a-34: shin tu bskyod pa'i byang sems kyi //
T02TD3305E:199a-35: mthar ni mchog tu dga' ba po //
T02TD3305E:199a-36: 'pho ba la ni dga' bral gyi dga' ba ste /
T02TD3305E:199a-37: gang gi tshe 'di dag gi dbus su rang bde zhing zhi bar gyur pa de rjes lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba zhes pa'o //
T02TD3305E:199a-38: de nyid dpal kyee'i rdo rjer yang gsungs pa /
T02TD3305E:199a-39: da ni thog ma dbus mtha' min //
T02TD3305E:199a-40: srid min mya ngan 'das pa 'ang min //
T02TD3305E:199a-41: 'di ni mchog gi bde chen te //
T02TD3305E:199b-0: gzhan min @199b gzhan pa min pa'ang min //
T02TD3305E:199b-1: mchog tu dga' ba srid par brjod //
T02TD3305E:199b-2: dga' bral las ni mya ngan 'das //
T02TD3305E:199b-3: dbu ma dga' ba tsam nyid de //
T02TD3305E:199b-4: 'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa'ang spangs //
T02TD3305E:199b-5: mchog tu dga' bas yang dag thob //
T02TD3305E:199b-6: sna tshogs spangs pa'i skad cig la //
T02TD3305E:199b-7: ston pas gsungs pa sems dpa' che //
T02TD3305E:199b-8: bde ba chen po gzung bar gyis //
T02TD3305E:199b-9: ji srid byang chub mthar thug par //
T02TD3305E:199b-10: sems can don gyi rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD3305E:199b-11: zhes pa la sogs pa rgya cher ro //
T02TD3305E:199b-12: 'o na ji ltar rnam pa gsum po de dag dbyer med par gsungs she na /
T02TD3305E:199b-13: 'bras bu rgyu las gzhan min phyir //
T02TD3305E:199b-14: rnam gsum mngon du rab grag ste //
T02TD3305E:199b-15: dga' bral dga' ba'i dbus dag tu //
T02TD3305E:199b-16: bzhi pa rnam par bsal phyir ro //
T02TD3305E:199b-17: 'o na ji ltar 'di dag gi dbus nyid du rab tu gsal bar bshad ce na //
T02TD3305E:199b-18: mchog gi mtha' dang dga' bral dbus //
T02TD3305E:199b-19: stong dang stong min he ru ka //
T02TD3305E:199b-21: stong dang stong min zhes pa ji ltar zhe na /
T02TD3305E:199b-22: thog ma tha ma med zhi ba //
T02TD3305E:199b-23: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso //
T02TD3305E:199b-24: rang nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //
T02TD3305E:199b-25: byang chub sems zhes brjod par bya //
T02TD3305E:199b-26: zhes pa grub pa'i mtha' las so //
T02TD3305E:199b-27: 'di nyid thabs gang gis bskyed par bya zhe na /
T02TD3305E:199b-29: rang byin brlab pa'i rim pa yis //
T02TD3305E:199b-30: byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya //
T02TD3305E:199b-31: kun rdzob ba don dam gzugs can no //
T02TD3305E:199b-32: 'di dag ni gang gis brjod par mi nus te /
T02TD3305E:199b-33: gang dang gang gi phyir zhe na /
T02TD3305E:199b-34: so so rang rig ye shes 'di //
T02TD3305E:199b-35: dag gi las 'das spyod yul te //
T02TD3305E:199b-36: rang byin brlab pa'i rim pa 'dis //
T02TD3305E:199b-37: kun mkhyen ye shes de rang bzhin //
T02TD3305E:199b-38: gzhan gyis brjod min lhan cig skyes //
T02TD3305E:199b-39: gang du yang ni mi rnyed de //
T02TD3305E:199b-40: bla ma'i rim pa nyer bsten dang //
T02TD3305E:199b-41: bdag nyid bsod nams las shes bya //
T02TD3305E:199b-42: bla ma'i zhal gyi bka' drin dang //
T02TD3305E:199b-43: rang nyid bsod nams che ldan pa //
T02TD3305E:199b-44: 'dzin pa las kyi ye shes ni //
T02TD3305E:199b-45: ngag gi lam 'das spyod yul lo //
T02TD3305E:199b-47: gang gis 'di ni rjod par byed pa'i tshe //
T02TD3305E:199b-48: thams cad mkhyen pa'ang tshig gis phongs gyur pa //
T02TD3305E:199b-49: byed pa dang bral 'gro la rtag tu shar //
T02TD3305E:199b-50: bde ba'i rgyal po gcig nyid rgyal gyur cig / sa ra ha pa'i zhabs kyis kyang gsungs pa //
T02TD3305E:199b-51: de yi de nyid bla ma yi //
T02TD3305E:200a-0: @200a * // gsung las bla mas rtogs par 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:200a-1: lhan skyes gnas skabs bdud rtsi'i ro //
T02TD3305E:200a-2: gang du smra zhing ci ltar shes //
T02TD3305E:200a-4: 'di ni blo yi spyod yul ma yin tshig gi spyod pa las //
T02TD3305E:200a-5: ring du gyur cing bla ma dngos po'i gtam gyi 'jug pas stong //
T02TD3305E:200a-6: rgyud kyi rim pas snying rje la sogs yon tan 'jug 'gyur pa //
T02TD3305E:200a-7: rang nyid dang dang ldan pa'i snying la go 'phang ster bar byed //
T02TD3305E:200a-8: 'on byang chub sems kyi sa'i mtshan nyid ci zhe na /
T02TD3305E:200a-10: dbang po rnams ni rang nyid bzhin //
T02TD3305E:200a-11: yid ni nang du du zhugs pa bzhin //
T02TD3305E:200a-12: tshig ni nyams pa bzhin du 'jug / lus ni bde bas yang dag rgyas //
T02TD3305E:200a-13: dbang po'i tshogs ni nyams shing 'jug pa med //
T02TD3305E:200a-14: rnam rtog ma rdzogs srid pa'i sa bon te //
T02TD3305E:200a-15: dga' ba'i rang bzhin 'di ni nam mkha' yi //
T02TD3305E:200a-16: me tog bsil ba'i rol myang ba'o //
T02TD3305E:200a-17: dbang po'i lam ni rnam par zhi gyur cing //
T02TD3305E:200a-18: nyams par gyur pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa //
T02TD3305E:200a-19: de yi 'bras bu lan cig skyes dga' ste //
T02TD3305E:200a-20: lus kyi me tog bla ma'i zhal las dris //
T02TD3305E:200a-22: gang zhig shar bas dus rnams nyams zhing spyi bor gnas //
T02TD3305E:200a-23: yul dang dbang po mtshungs pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3305E:200a-24: gang yang mngon dga' rgyal pa'i mdzes sku gcig pu nyid //
T02TD3305E:200a-25: sad gyur de yang mkhas pa'i snying la bcang bar gyis //
T02TD3305E:200a-27: blo yi rnam rtog rnam par bcom na ni //
T02TD3305E:200a-28: gang 'dir dam pa'i bde ba stobs byed do //
T02TD3305E:200a-29: bya ba de yang mkhas pa rnams kyis bya //
T02TD3305E:200a-31: phun tshogs bsam pa dang ldan nyid //
T02TD3305E:200a-32: ces pa la sogs pa rgya cher ro //
T02TD3305E:200a-33: de'i phyir yang dag pa'i bla ma dam pa la slob ma dam pas gus par bya zhing gsum la 'jug pa'i bde ba chen po rang gis rig par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD3305E:200a-34: de'i rjes thogs nyid la shes rab ma de'i lag pa slob ma'i lag par gtad cing /
T02TD3305E:200a-35: me tog gi phreng ba bcings nas /
T02TD3305E:200a-36: de gnyis rang gi lag pa g-yon pas bzung ste /
T02TD3305E:200a-37: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa g-yas pa slob ma'i mgo bor bzhag la dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du /
T02TD3305E:200a-38: 'dir ni khyed rnams dbang po lags //
T02TD3305E:200a-40: zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang por bcug ste /
T02TD3305E:200a-41: thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas min //
T02TD3305E:200b-1: de phyir 'di dang bral bar ni //
T02TD3305E:200b-2: khyod kyis nam yang ma byed cig /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD3305E:200b-3: rig ma'i brtul zhugs bla na med //
T02TD3305E:200b-4: rmongs pa gang zhig 'da' byed pa //
T02TD3305E:200b-5: de la mchog gi dngos grub med //
T02TD3305E:200b-6: ces brjod cing rig ma'i brtul zhugs gzung bar bya ste /
T02TD3305E:200b-7: 'di ni rig ma'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:200b-9: // / de nas slob ma rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD3305E:200b-10: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02TD3305E:200b-11: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas //
T02TD3305E:200b-12: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung //
T02TD3305E:200b-13: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD3305E:200b-14: zhes brjod nas rdo rje lag pa g-yas par sbyin zhing des kyang /
T02TD3305E:200b-15: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ye tishtha ae sha satvam dha ra ya mi badzra satva hi /
T02TD3305E:200b-16: hi hi hi hi h'um zhes brjod de gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:200b-17: zhes pa rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:200b-19: // / de nas sangs rgyas thod pa dang bde mchog dang /
T02TD3305E:200b-20: kye'i rdo rje la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i snying po'i sngags kyis kha tv'am ga dang da ma ru dang padma'i snod rnams la lan gsum bzlas la /
T02TD3305E:200b-21: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di //
T02TD3305E:200b-22: phyi dang nang du yang dag gnas //
T02TD3305E:200b-23: de nas kha tv'am cang te'u //
T02TD3305E:200b-24: snod sbyin dpa' bos gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD3305E:200b-25: zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing 'dzin du gzhug go /
T02TD3305E:200b-26: kha tv'am ga la sogs pa las gzhan spyod pa'i yan lag rgyud du gsungs pa rnams kyang /
T02TD3305E:200b-27: deng de'i 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi snying po'i sngags kyis bzlas la //
T02TD3305E:200b-28: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa la sogs pas 'dzin du bzhug go //
T02TD3305E:200b-29: de ltar yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las //
T02TD3305E:200b-30: thor tshugs cod pan 'dzin pa gzugs //
T02TD3305E:200b-31: kha dog dkar po lta bu che //
T02TD3305E:200b-32: thams cad cho ga bzhin du bya //
T02TD3305E:200b-33: sngags kyi sngom pas yang dag bsdam //
T02TD3305E:200b-34: sdong bu rtsa ba 'bras bu ste //
T02TD3305E:200b-35: longs spyod kun la mnyam par spyad //
T02TD3305E:200b-36: ces pa la sogs pas rig ma'i brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs te spyod pa'i brtul zhugs bya bar gsungs so //
T02TD3305E:200b-37: gang yang btsun mo'am skyes pa spyod pa'i brtul zhugs ni //
T02TD3305E:200b-38: de rnams rdo rje phag mo'i gzugs sam bdag med ma'i gzugs sam me tog lhung ba dang rjes su mthun ba'i rigs kyi lha'i gzugs dang /
T02TD3305E:201a-0: skyes pa rnams bde mchog dang kye'i rdo rje la sogs @201a * //
T02TD3305E:201a-1: pa gang yang rung ba'i gzugs su rnam par bsams la /
T02TD3305E:201a-2: de dang de la snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i ye shes kyi lha rnams gzhug cing /
T02TD3305E:201a-3: 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mi bskyod pa /
T02TD3305E:201a-4: rna cha'i bdag nyid 'od dpag med //
T02TD3305E:201a-5: mgul gyi phreng ba rin chen dbang//
T02TD3305E:201a-6: lag pa rnam par snang mdzad dran //
T02TD3305E:201a-7: ska rags la ni don yod gnas //
T02TD3305E:201a-8: yan lag kun la rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD3305E:201a-9: zhes gsungs pas rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor lo dang /
T02TD3305E:201a-14: thal ba rnams la mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD3305E:201a-17: rnam par snang mdzad dang don yod grub pa dang rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su skad cig gis bsams te /
T02TD3305E:201a-18: de dang de'i ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin du spyan dangs pa bcug nas /
T02TD3305E:201a-19: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan rnams mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs par lhag par mos la /
T02TD3305E:201a-20: aom dha ra dha ra dh'a ra ya dh'a ra ya ma rda ma rda badzra dhri ka phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:201a-21: zhes pas lan gsum bzlas pa'i 'khor lo de dang de'i mgor rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas te /
T02TD3305E:201a-22: bud med kyi phyogs la ni dpa' bo zhes pa'i tshab tu lha mo zhes pa bcug cing brjod pas gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:201a-23: aom badzra dharma sa ma ya stvam hu lu hu lu a'a ro lika phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:201a-24: zhes pa lan gsum bzlas pa'i rna rgyan gnyis ni rna ba dag la'o //
T02TD3305E:201a-25: aom badzra s'urya ta mo buddha ma na sa ma ya stvam aa ratna dhri ka phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:201a-26: zhes pa lan gsum bzlas pa'i mgul rgyan gyi ni mgrin par ro //
T02TD3305E:201a-27: aom sh'a shva ta par ma sh'a shva ta ae hye hi dzi na dzi ka phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:201a-28: zhes pa lan gsum bzlas pa'i lag gdub gnyis ni lag pa dag la gdu bu bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:201a-29: aom phu:phu:hi hi hi pradzny'a dhri ka phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:201a-30: zhes pa lan gsum bzlas pa'i ska rags ni sked pa la'o //
T02TD3305E:201a-31: yang dag gnas zhes pa'i rjes la /
T02TD3305E:201a-32: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02TD3305E:201a-33: 'khor lo mi bskyod pa yi gzugs //
T02TD3305E:201a-35: rna rgyan gnyis ni gsung rdo rje //
T02TD3305E:201a-37: mgul rgyan phreng ba rin 'byung ldan //
T02TD3305E:201b-0: lag gdub @201b rtag pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD3305E:201b-2: ska rags don yod grub pa ni //
T02TD3305E:201b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:201b-5: aom badzra satva h'um zhes pa lan gsum bzlas pa'i thal ba ni yan lag thams cad la dgod par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:201b-6: bud med rnams kyis ni thal ba dang bral ba'i phyag rgya gzung bar bya ste /
T02TD3305E:201b-7: skyes pa rnams kyis ni thal ba lhan cig phyag rgya drug go //
T02TD3305E:201b-8: gang yang bud med skyes pa lta stangs la sogs pa'i nus pa thob pas gzhan don du dpa' bo'i brtul zhugs blang bar 'dod na /
T02TD3305E:201b-9: de rnams rdo rje phag mo'i gzugs dang bde mchog gi gzugs ye shes sems dpa' dang ro gcig tu rnam par bsams la /
T02TD3305E:201b-10: 'khor lo la sogs pa sngar bzhin du mos pa bya zhing /
T02TD3305E:201b-11: mgo bo'i phreng ba la sogs pa rnams rang rang gi sngags kyis lha'i rang bzhin du mos te /
T02TD3305E:201b-12: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:201b-13: zhes pa lan gsum bzlas nas 'khor lo la sogs pa de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:201b-14: sangs rgyas lnga'i bdag nyid kyi thod pa yang ste /
T02TD3305E:201b-15: bee ro tsa na'i sngags gang yin /
T02TD3305E:201b-16: mgo bor thod pas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:201b-18: thod pa ni 'dir 'khor lo'i gzugs kyang ngo //
T02TD3305E:201b-19: aom hr'i:ha ha h'um h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:201b-20: ces lan gsum bzlas pa'i rna rgyan gnyis te /
T02TD3305E:201b-21: yi ge bdun pa'i gsang sngags kyis //
T02TD3305E:201b-22: rna rgyan gyis ni rna bar mdzes //
T02TD3305E:201b-24: rdo rje phag mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags sam /
T02TD3305E:201b-25: aom sarba buddha zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis lan gsum bzlas pa'i mgul rgyan te /
T02TD3305E:201b-26: rdo rje phag mo'i sngags gang yin /
T02TD3305E:201b-27: mgrin par mgul rgyan rnam par brgyan //
T02TD3305E:201b-34: zhes pa lan gsum bzlas pa'i gdu bu gnyis te /
T02TD3305E:201b-35: dpa' bo'i go cha drug gis ni /
T02TD3305E:201b-36: phyag rgya 'di ni lus la mdzas //
T02TD3305E:201b-38: aom bam hom yam hrim h'um h'um phat phat /
T02TD3305E:201b-39: ces pa lan gsum bzlas pa'i ska rags te /
T02TD3305E:201b-41: ces pa lan gsum bzlas pa'i ska rags te /
T02TD3305E:201b-42: rnal 'byor ma drug ces pa yi //
T02TD3305E:201b-43: sngags kyis ska rags rgyan du bya //
T02TD3305E:201b-45: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um phat d'a ki n'i dzva la samba ram sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:202a-1: bzlas pa'i mi mgo lnga bcu'i phreng ba ni mgrin pa la ste /
T02TD3305E:202a-2: lha yi snying po'i sngags kyis ni //
T02TD3305E:202a-3: brgya phyed phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
T02TD3305E:202a-5: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra barna n'i ye h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:202a-6: zhes pa lan gsum bzlas pa'i stag gi pags pa ni sham thabs kyi ched du ste /
T02TD3305E:202a-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro mas //
T02TD3305E:202a-8: pags pa'i gos ni 'dzin pa mchog / ces gang gsungs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:202a-9: aom pra tsande h'um h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:202a-10: ces pa la sogs pa nas /
T02TD3305E:202a-11: aom r'u pi n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:202a-12: ces pa'i bar sngags sum cu rtsa drug gis lan gsum bzlas shing /
T02TD3305E:202a-13: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi sngags kyis /
T02TD3305E:202a-14: gang ba'i snod ni lag par te //
T02TD3305E:202a-16: sngags kyis btung ba'i thod pa'o //
T02TD3305E:202a-18: kha tv'am ga dang da ma ru //
T02TD3305E:202a-19: na mo bha ga wa te b'a re sha ya zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags kyis lan gsum mngon par bsngags te /
T02TD3305E:202a-20: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas so //
T02TD3305E:202a-21: slar yang sngags de nyid kyis lan gsum bzlas pa'i tshangs skud dang /
T02TD3305E:202a-22: mgrin par 'phyang ba'i do shal dang /
T02TD3305E:202a-24: rkun ma'i skra las byas pa'i cod pan dang /
T02TD3305E:202a-25: skor gnyis pa'i ska rags dang /
T02TD3305E:202a-29: g-yer kha rnams ni rang rang gi gnas su ste /
T02TD3305E:202a-30: dpa' bo'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyis kyang //
T02TD3305E:202a-31: tshangs skud la sogs gnas su gdags //
T02TD3305E:202a-33: de la phreng gcig gis tshangs skud bya'o //
T02TD3305E:202a-34: phreng brgyad kyis ni ska rags te /
T02TD3305E:202a-35: de nyid bud med kyi rked par bcu drug gis te /
T02TD3305E:202a-36: nyi shu rtsa lngas ni do shal lo //
T02TD3305E:202a-38: skud pa gcig gis tshangs skud de //
T02TD3305E:202a-39: skud pa brgyad kyis ska rags nyid //
T02TD3305E:202a-40: bud med bcu drug shes par bya //
T02TD3305E:202a-41: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i phreng ba can //
T02TD3305E:202a-43: yang na mi'i rgyus pa las byas pa'am /
T02TD3305E:202a-44: skra las byas pa'i tshangs skud do //
T02TD3305E:202a-45: 'dir 'khor lo la sogs pa dang rdo rje'i rgyan rnams ni ji ltar rigs par mi'i rus pa las byas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:202a-46: de la gcig ni spyi bor te /
T02TD3305E:202a-48: thod pa'i dum bu so lnga bar //
T02TD3305E:202a-49: byas pa'i cod pan 'dzin par byed //
T02TD3305E:202b-1: dpa' bo'i spyod pa'i brtul zhugs nyid la /
T02TD3305E:202b-2: rgyal bu gzhon nu'i brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa dang /
T02TD3305E:202b-3: rdo rje thod pa'i spyod pa'i brtul zhugs zhes kyang dpal sambu ta'i rgyud du gsungs so //
T02TD3305E:202b-4: de'i rjes su phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa rtag tu mchod pa bya'o zhes pa spyod pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:202b-6: // / de nas mchog sbyin bla ma yis //
T02TD3305E:202b-7: phyag rgya yang dag lung bstan bya //
T02TD3305E:202b-8: de nyid de bzhin gshegs gyur nas //
T02TD3305E:202b-9: slob ma rdo rje 'dzin bdag nyid //
T02TD3305E:202b-10: g-yon pas chos gos 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD3305E:202b-11: g-yas pas mchog sbyin phyag ldan pas /
T02TD3305E:202b-12: de bzhin gshegs kun lhan gcig tu //
T02TD3305E:202b-13: tshigs bcad 'di nyid brjod par bya //
T02TD3305E:202b-14: srid pa'i ngan 'gro las bton pas //
T02TD3305E:202b-15: srid mtha' shin tu grub bya'i phyir //
T02TD3305E:202b-16: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD3305E:202b-17: bdag gis khyod 'dri lung bstan bgyi //
T02TD3305E:202b-18: kye'i che ge mo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa siddhya sa ma ya stvam bhu rbhya wa sva:zhes pa'i sngags brjod cing slob ma lung bstan par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:202b-19: gang yang 'di ltar bstan pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbyang gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par mdzad do zhes pa lung bstan pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:202b-21: // / rig ma dang rdo rje dang spyod pa'i brtul zhugs dang /
T02TD3305E:202b-22: lung bstan pa 'di rnams la rgyud la sogs pa kha cig tu ni dbang bskur pa nyid kyi tha snyad byas so //
T02TD3305E:202b-23: de'i rjes su slob ma rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs bsam gtan gyi mdun /
T02TD3305E:202b-24: 'khor lo rin chen de bzhin du //
T02TD3305E:202b-25: padma dang ni rdo rje ste //
T02TD3305E:202b-26: rjes su gnang ba de rnams sbyin //
T02TD3305E:202b-27: tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams sbyin //
T02TD3305E:202b-28: sems can kun la phan don du //
T02TD3305E:202b-29: sems can kun la thams cad nas //
T02TD3305E:202b-30: ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul ba yi //
T02TD3305E:202b-31: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD3305E:202b-32: dz'a ya dz'a ya sarba ta th'a ga ta aa dhi pa ti pra wa rta ya dharma tsakram sems can kun la phan don du //
T02TD3305E:202b-33: ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul ba yi //
T02TD3305E:202b-34: sangs rgyas rin chen rab tu ston //
T02TD3305E:202b-35: aom badzra ratna dharma bi shuddha dzny'a na aa bhi zhe ka p'a ta aom aom aom //
T02TD3305E:202b-36: sems can kun la phan don du //
T02TD3305E:202b-37: 'jig rten kun la thams cad nas //
T02TD3305E:202b-38: ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul ba yi //
T02TD3305E:202b-39: 'dod chags dag pa rab tu ston //
T02TD3305E:203a-0: aom badzra dharm'a bi shuddha dzny'a na r'a ga padma @203a * //
T02TD3305E:203a-1: dal sv'a bh'a wa badzri a'a:/
T02TD3305E:203a-2: sems can kun la phan don du //
T02TD3305E:203a-3: 'jig rten kun la thams cad nas //
T02TD3305E:203a-4: ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul ba yi //
T02TD3305E:203a-5: rdo rje'i mchod pa rab tu bskor //
T02TD3305E:203a-6: badzra karma bi shuddha dzny'a na sarba p'u dza sv'a bh'a wa a'a:tha /
T02TD3305E:203a-7: slar yang khyad par gyi rjes su gnang ba sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:203a-8: aom badzra bha sha ram zhes brjod cing aa yig las skyes pa'i dung dang /
T02TD3305E:203a-9: g-yon par dbyangs tha ma las skyes pa'i dril bu dbyangs tha ma brjod cing byin la /
T02TD3305E:203a-10: slob ma dril bu 'khrol du gzhug cing /
T02TD3305E:203a-11: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD3305E:203a-12: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02TD3305E:203a-13: nam mkha' mnyam par sbyor ba yis //
T02TD3305E:203a-14: kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal //
T02TD3305E:203a-15: deng nas brtsams te dang bcas pa'i //
T02TD3305E:203a-16: sems ni bskyed pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD3305E:203a-17: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD3305E:203a-18: chos kyi dung ni bla med pa //
T02TD3305E:203a-19: kun nas yongs su gang bar gyis //
T02TD3305E:203a-22: rnam pa sna tshogs las byas pa'i //
T02TD3305E:203a-23: rin chen bdun ni gtad par bya //
T02TD3305E:203a-24: gri gug dang ni kha tv'am ga / bgrang phreng glegs bam sa bor //
T02TD3305E:203a-25: gyo mo rnal 'byor dbyug pa dang //
T02TD3305E:203a-27: padma'i lag pas lham dang ni //
T02TD3305E:203a-28: rnal 'byor pa yi sgom thag rnams //
T02TD3305E:203a-29: legs par dga' ba'i bsam pa yis //
T02TD3305E:203a-30: sngags chen de yis sbyin par bya //
T02TD3305E:203a-31: the tshom med pa'i bsam pa yis //
T02TD3305E:203a-32: khyod 'dir blo gros ngan mi bya /
T02TD3305E:203a-33: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul mchog ni //
T02TD3305E:203a-34: mnyam med rang gis rang gsal bya //
T02TD3305E:203a-35: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la //
T02TD3305E:203a-36: phan btags byas pa gzo ba yin //
T02TD3305E:203a-37: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang //
T02TD3305E:203a-38: khyad la rtag tu kun srung mdzad //
T02TD3305E:203a-39: shes rab las kyi rang bzhin bdag / yid bzhin nor bu ltar mtho bas //
T02TD3305E:203a-40: skye med dogs dang bral ba yis //
T02TD3305E:203a-41: de ltar sems can don gyis shig / ces brjod do //
T02TD3305E:203a-43: gtso bos ji ltar bka' bsgo ba //
T02TD3305E:203a-44: de bzhin du ni bdag gis bgyi//
T02TD3305E:203a-45: zhes brjod par bya ste rjes su gnang ba sbyin pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:203a-48: spyi bo ru ni gdugs bzung nas //
T02TD3305E:203a-49: skor ba byed du bcug nas ni //
T02TD3305E:203a-50: dkyil 'khor sgor ni thal sbyor ba //
T02TD3305E:203a-51: gdugs pa bcas dan bcing 'di brjod bya //
T02TD3305E:203a-52: rgyud rnams 'dzin par gyur pa yi /
T02TD3305E:203b-0: slob ma 'di ni phul ba @203b lags //
T02TD3305E:203b-1: zhes brjod pas de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug la gsol ba btab la /
T02TD3305E:203b-2: gdugs gzhan du gzhag nas slob ma'i snying la 'bab pa'i tshig brjod par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:203b-3: da ni khyed rnams dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD3305E:203b-4: slob dpon sngags dang rgyud 'dzin par //
T02TD3305E:203b-5: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang//
T02TD3305E:203b-6: lha rnams kyis kyang dgongs par 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:203b-7: sems can rnams la brtse don du //
T02TD3305E:203b-8: khyed kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin //
T02TD3305E:203b-9: rab tu 'bad pas bri bar bya //
T02TD3305E:203b-10: sgrub pa po rnams sngags la sbyor //
T02TD3305E:203b-11: mchog tu gsang ba dam pa yi //
T02TD3305E:203b-12: dkyil 'khor mthong bzhin rab zhugs pas //
T02TD3305E:203b-13: sdig pa kun las rnam par grol //
T02TD3305E:203b-14: de ring khyod rnams bde bar gnas //
T02TD3305E:203b-15: bde chen thog pa 'di la ni //
T02TD3305E:203b-16: phyin chad 'chi ba yod med de //
T02TD3305E:203b-17: srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das //
T02TD3305E:203b-18: srid pa shin tu mtha' grub po //
T02TD3305E:203b-19: sangs rgyas rdo rje can kun gyis //
T02TD3305E:203b-20: de ring tshe ldan dpang bskur te //
T02TD3305E:203b-21: khams gsum gyi ni rgyal srid che //
T02TD3305E:203b-22: rje bo nyid du khyod nges so //
T02TD3305E:203b-23: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig / khams gsum na ni gzhan med de //
T02TD3305E:203b-24: de bas 'dod la chags bral nyid //
T02TD3305E:203b-25: khyod kyis nam yang mi bya'o //
T02TD3305E:203b-26: 'dod pa kun la spyod pas khyod //
T02TD3305E:203b-27: gang la 'jigs pa med par gyis //
T02TD3305E:203b-28: sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga bza' bya //
T02TD3305E:203b-29: de las gzhan yang dam tshig bsrung //
T02TD3305E:203b-30: srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing //
T02TD3305E:203b-31: bud med rin chen spang mi bya //
T02TD3305E:203b-32: slob dpon spang bar mi bya ste //
T02TD3305E:203b-33: sdom pa las ni 'da' mi bya //
T02TD3305E:203b-34: shes rab thabs kyi bsam pa yis //
T02TD3305E:203b-35: mi bya cung zad yod ma yin //
T02TD3305E:203b-36: ma 'jigs khyod la sdig pa med //
T02TD3305E:203b-37: rdo rje sems dpa'i gsung ji bzhin //
T02TD3305E:203b-39: dbugs dbyung ba sbyin pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:203b-41: // / dbyugs dbyung sbyin nas slob ma la //
T02TD3305E:203b-42: bla mas dam tshig spyod rigs bya //
T02TD3305E:203b-43: rigs lnga las ni yang dag byung //
T02TD3305E:203b-44: dam tshig lnga ni mnyan par gyis //
T02TD3305E:203b-45: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD3305E:203b-46: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song //
T02TD3305E:203b-47: 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dge ba'i //
T02TD3305E:203b-48: dam tshig sdom pa yin par 'dod //
T02TD3305E:203b-49: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang //
T02TD3305E:203b-50: blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar bya //
T02TD3305E:203b-51: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
T02TD3305E:203b-52: shes rab dril bu zhes byar brjod //
T02TD3305E:203b-53: slob dpon brnyas par mi bya ste //
T02TD3305E:204a-0: @204a * // bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
T02TD3305E:204a-1: 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD3305E:204a-2: dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs //
T02TD3305E:204a-3: rin chen rigs la de bzhin du //
T02TD3305E:204a-4: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02TD3305E:204a-5: zang zing chos dang mi 'jigs byams //
T02TD3305E:204a-6: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin //
T02TD3305E:204a-7: phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum /
T02TD3305E:204a-8: dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya //
T02TD3305E:204a-10: dam tshig sdom pa mchog yin no //
T02TD3305E:204a-11: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD3305E:204a-12: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD3305E:204a-13: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya //
T02TD3305E:204a-14: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyis //
T02TD3305E:204a-15: 'di las gzhan du'ang bcu bzhi ni //
T02TD3305E:204a-16: rdo rje'i thag la pham par bshad //
T02TD3305E:204a-17: nyin lan gsum dang mtshan lan gsum //
T02TD3305E:204a-18: nyin re zhing ni bzlas par bya //
T02TD3305E:204a-19: bshes gnyen rdo rje'i spun zla dang //
T02TD3305E:204a-20: rnal 'byor ma rnams bsnyen bkur bya //
T02TD3305E:204a-21: spang bar mi bya dor mi bya //
T02TD3305E:204a-22: ji ltar nus bzhin yang dag spyad //
T02TD3305E:204a-23: theg pa dman pa 'dod mi bya //
T02TD3305E:204a-24: sems can don la rgyab phyogs min //
T02TD3305E:204a-25: 'khor ba yongs su mi spong zhing //
T02TD3305E:204a-26: mya ngan 'das la rtag dga' min //
T02TD3305E:204a-27: lha rnams dang ni gsang ba pa //
T02TD3305E:204a-28: khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing //
T02TD3305E:204a-29: phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang //
T02TD3305E:204a-31: khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya //
T02TD3305E:204a-32: ma byin par yang mo blang ngo //
T02TD3305E:204a-33: 'dod pa log par mi spyad cing //
T02TD3305E:204a-34: brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o //
T02TD3305E:204a-35: sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs pa //
T02TD3305E:204a-36: bya ba ma yin pa thams cad spangs //
T02TD3305E:204a-37: dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing //
T02TD3305E:204a-38: rnal 'byor ma kun bsnyen bkur bya //
T02TD3305E:204a-39: lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang //
T02TD3305E:204a-40: ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang //
T02TD3305E:204a-41: yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni //
T02TD3305E:204a-42: ci nus par ni rjes su skyongs //
T02TD3305E:204a-43: 'di dag dam tshig yin par gsungs //
T02TD3305E:204a-44: da ni khyod kyis bsrung bar bya //
T02TD3305E:204a-45: de bzhin des kyang brjod par bya //
T02TD3305E:204a-46: slob dpon bdag nyid chen po ste /
T02TD3305E:204a-47: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa //
T02TD3305E:204a-48: de bzhin du ni bdag gis bgyi //
T02TD3305E:204a-49: de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis //
T02TD3305E:204a-50: rang gi dam tshig mi zad pa de ster snod du gyis //
T02TD3305E:204a-51: 'gro ba bde ba nyung las rdo rje sems dpa' dang //
T02TD3305E:204a-52: mtshungs pa'i rtag pa nyid du phyin par 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:204b-0: @204b gzhan yang gang dag cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par dbang bskur ba la dge ba nyid kyi phyir /
T02TD3305E:204b-1: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sdug pa'i bud na 'dra bar thugs dang bas gsang sngags par dgongs par mdzad pa 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid yin no zhes so //
T02TD3305E:204b-2: dam tshig bsgrag pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:204b-4: // / de ltar mngon par dbang bskur ba thob cing dbugs phyung bas dga' ba'i slob mas kyang /
T02TD3305E:204b-5: de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes pa dang /
T02TD3305E:204b-6: deng bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD3305E:204b-7: bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD3305E:204b-8: de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02TD3305E:204b-9: sangs rgyas sras su dang bdag gyur //
T02TD3305E:204b-11: de nas rjes su mthun pa'i yin //
T02TD3305E:204b-12: slob ma las ni blang bya ste //
T02TD3305E:204b-13: des kyang dkyil 'khor de nyid ni /
T02TD3305E:204b-14: mngon du byas nas slar yang dbul //
T02TD3305E:204b-15: rgyal srid sa bzhi chung ma dga' ba'i bu dang bram mo de ni de bzhin bram bzang dang //
T02TD3305E:204b-16: glang po rta dang nor dang so ba gser dang shing rta gos dang mtshon cha de bzhin du //
T02TD3305E:204b-17: phun tshogs ma he rnams dang khyim sogs mchog de rnams dang dam pa rnams kyang bsten pa ste //
T02TD3305E:204b-18: bdag nyid kyang ni nges par shes bya gzhan ci'ang slob ma rnams kyis rig pa'i bla ma la'o //
T02TD3305E:204b-19: de ma byas na bsod nams ci //
T02TD3305E:204b-20: smyur gnas dang ni dka' thub gang //
T02TD3305E:204b-21: bla na med mdzad slob dpon ni //
T02TD3305E:204b-22: rdo rje sems dpa' mchod par bya //
T02TD3305E:204b-23: de la phul bas sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD3305E:204b-24: kun la rtag tu phul bar 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:204b-25: de la byin bas bsod nams tshogs //
T02TD3305E:204b-26: tshogs las dngos grub bla na med //
T02TD3305E:204b-27: mdor na de 'dra'i bya ba rnams //
T02TD3305E:204b-28: bla ma dam pa mnyes bzhin bya //
T02TD3305E:204b-29: bla ma mnyes na dngos grub las //
T02TD3305E:204b-30: gzhan mon zhes ni thub pas gsungs //
T02TD3305E:204b-32: da ni dbang gi dag pa bshad de //
T02TD3305E:204b-33: 'dir me tog lhung bas nye bar mtshon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa res par gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD3305E:204b-34: mgo bo'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'am //
T02TD3305E:204b-35: ma rig pa'i dri ma 'khrud par nus pa nyid du bsgrub pa'i phyir chu'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD3305E:204b-36: rgyas 'debs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus bya ba bskyed pa dang /
T02TD3305E:205a-0: gtsug tor bskyed par nus pa nyid kyi chen du cod pan gyi @205a * //
T02TD3305E:205a-2: nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i dgra rtsa ba nas 'don pa nyid kyi phyir dpa' bo'i dar dbyangs 'ching ba ni cod pan gyi dbang gi 'khor yin te /
T02TD3305E:205a-3: kha cig tu ni dbang bskur ba tha dad par brjod do //
T02TD3305E:205a-4: dbyer med pa'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur bar nus pa nyid du bsgrub pa'i phyir rdo rje'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD3305E:205a-5: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa bla na med pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'i mnga' bdag chos 'byung rtogs par bya ba'i ched du chos 'byung mtshon par byed pa dril bu sgra dang bcas pas mngon par dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD3305E:205a-6: bdag po'i ched du mngon par dbang bskur ba ni bdag po'i dbang du yang brjod do //
T02TD3305E:205a-7: 'byung bar 'gyur ba na thub pa'i dbang po'i go 'phang gi ming du 'os pa'i sa bon bsgrub pa'i ched du ming gi mngon par dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD3305E:205a-8: 'di nas brtsams te rnam par dag pa zung 'jug gi byang chub rtogs par bya ba'i ched du brtson par gyis shig ces nges par bya bar dgongs nas de'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'dzin pa la sbyor ba ni rdo rje'i dam tshig go //
T02TD3305E:205a-9: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ston pa'i nges pa ster ba'i de bzhin nyid rtogs pa la sbyar ba'i ched du sgra dang bcas pa'i dril bu'i dam tshig go / shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin shin tu brtan par nus pa nyid du bsgrub pa'i phyir phyag rgya'i dam tshig go //
T02TD3305E:205a-10: de nyid kyi phyir mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur las /
T02TD3305E:205a-11: dam tshig gnyis kyi 'khor can phyag rgya'i dam tshig kho na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbang du gsungs so //
T02TD3305E:205a-12: rgyud gzhan du ni dam tshig gsum slob dpon gyi dbang gi don du gsungs te /
T02TD3305E:205a-13: de ltar yang sngar shes rab bcu drug ces pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD3305E:205a-14: dri ma 'khrud par nus pa nyid ni dam tshig gsum gyi rnam par gzhag ba gnyi ga la mi 'gal lo //
T02TD3305E:205a-15: ji ltar sa bcu pa la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mngon par dbang bskur ba de bzhin du /
T02TD3305E:205b-0: dam tshig gsum dang bcas pa 'di yang de rnams dang bla mas dpag tu @205b med pa'i sems can gyi phung po la gzhal du med pa'i chas ston pa la sogs pa'i slob dpon du bya ba'i ched du khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal srid la dbang bas na /
T02TD3305E:205b-1: slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba ni phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang 'dra bas na phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang ste phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyi sa bon nyid kyang bskrun par byed pa'o //
T02TD3305E:205b-2: de'i phyir de la ltos nas phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i ched du dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD3305E:205b-3: phyir mi ldog par bye dpa'i dbang bskur ba ni /
T02TD3305E:205b-4: phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa'i dbang dang phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang du brjod do //
T02TD3305E:205b-6: rdo rje gsang ba ye shes kyis //
T02TD3305E:205b-7: slob dpon zhes bya gsum du 'dod //
T02TD3305E:205b-8: ces pa'i lugs ni blo gros ngan pa rnams kho na'i yin no //
T02TD3305E:205b-9: 'di dag la sogs pas ni nyan thos kyi dam tshig gis rtse ba spang bar bya'o zhes pa'i nges pa'i ched du /
T02TD3305E:205b-10: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pas rdo rje ldan cig rab tu sbyor bas rtse bar bya ba'i don du gang gis me tog 'thor ba'o //
T02TD3305E:205b-11: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pas rtag tu rang gi dam tshig la mchod par bya'o zhes pa ni /
T02TD3305E:205b-13: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos yang dag par brjod pa'i don du aom gyi yi ge dang sv'a'i yi ge klog pa'o //
T02TD3305E:205b-14: sangs rgyas kyi gar rab tu bskor zhing gar gyi rjes su chags pas skye bo rnams gdul ba'i ched du ting ting shags 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:205b-15: sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'jug pa'i don du spos kyi kun du bskyod pa'o //
T02TD3305E:205b-16: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis yang dag par 'byor zhing //
T02TD3305E:205b-17: mtshan sum cu so gnyis dang dpe byad brgyad cus rnam par mdzes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thob pa'i ched du me tog nges par 'grems pa'o //
T02TD3305E:205b-18: ma rig pa'i mun par mun pa'i sems can rnams ye shes kyi sgron mes yang dag par snang bar bya ba'i ched du snang gsal dbul ba'o //
T02TD3305E:205b-19: 'byung bar 'gyur ba na thub pa'i dbang po'i sems dang tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i byed du dril bu dbul ba'o //
T02TD3305E:205b-20: bgegs med pa nyid dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi sa bon dgod pa dang /
T02TD3305E:206a-1: kyis dngos grub kyi zhing dag par bya ba'i ched du sngags brjod pa'o //
T02TD3305E:206a-2: mi shes pa'i rab rib bsal nas lha'i mig mngon par shes pa bskyed pa'i ched du mig sman no //
T02TD3305E:206a-3: de bzhin du yang gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar sna tshogs par lta ba 'du bya ba'i ched du me long gi dbang ngo //
T02TD3305E:206a-4: bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal nas /
T02TD3305E:206a-5: shin tu pha pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi 'ben la sleb pa'i sa bon dgod pa'i ched du mda' 'phang ba'o //
T02TD3305E:206a-6: dad pa dang shes rab kyi zhing du bya ba'i don dang /
T02TD3305E:206a-7: dam tshig bsrung ba'i don dang /
T02TD3305E:206a-8: ngag dag pa'i don du gsang ba'i mngon par dbang bskur pa'o //
T02TD3305E:206a-9: phul du phyin pa'i ye shes 'di la yod pas shes rab ni phyi rol gyi gzhon nu ma yin la /
T02TD3305E:206a-10: de las ye shes ni sems rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba ste /
T02TD3305E:206a-11: rnam par dag pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ni shes rab ye shes kyi mngon par dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD3305E:206a-12: ye shes de nyid dri ma dang bral zhing yongs su dag par rtogs pa ni bzhi pa'i mngon par dbang bskur pa'o //
T02TD3305E:206a-13: 'di dag ni bde ba chen po'i ros yid 'khrud par byed pa'i phyir na dbang ngo //
T02TD3305E:206a-14: 'di dang 'brel ba kho nar shes rab nyid zag pa med pa'i bde ba dam pa 'phel zhing mngon sum du byed pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD3305E:206a-15: las dang po la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su yang spang bar mi bya'o zhes pa ni rig ma'i brtul zhugs so //
T02TD3305E:206a-16: gang tshe rnam par mi rtog pas //
T02TD3305E:206a-17: las kun thabs dang bcas par spyod //
T02TD3305E:206a-18: rnam par mi rtog sgom pa ni //
T02TD3305E:206a-19: brtul zhugs rnams kyi bla ma'i bla //
T02TD3305E:206a-20: zhes sogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas gsungs pa'i phyir brtul zhugs can gyis ci bya /
T02TD3305E:206a-21: des na ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi byang chub kyi sems kyi brtul zhugs kho na la sbyin du sbyor ba'i phyir rdo rje'i brtul zhugs so //
T02TD3305E:206a-22: spyod pa dang bral na yang byang chub kyi sems mi rtog go zhes bslab pa'i don du spyod pa'i brtul zhugs te de ni rnam pa gsum mo //
T02TD3305E:206a-23: de la dang po nang gi bdag nyid kyi phyag rgya gsum dang sbyor ba ni mchog ste /
T02TD3305E:206a-25: kha tv'am ga ni lha yi sku //
T02TD3305E:206a-26: cang te'u shes rab dang ni rtags //
T02TD3305E:206a-28: sngags ni thod pa'i btung ba'o //
T02TD3305E:206b-0: lha'i sku dang gzhom du med pa'i gtum mo sgra tsam dang gnyis su med pa'i @206b bde ba chen po nyams su myong pa'i rten ni kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems te /
T02TD3305E:206b-1: de ltar gsum ni mtshon par byed pa'o //
T02TD3305E:206b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes la sogs pa bskyed pa la sbyor ba lhur byed pa ste rnal 'byor ma dang spyod pa'i rtul zhugs so //
T02TD3305E:206b-4: gsum pa ni lta stangs bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs pa'i nus pa thob par gyur pa na sems can gyi don sgrub pa lhur pa ste /
T02TD3305E:206b-5: 'jig rten las phyir rol pa'i rnal 'byor pa'am rnam 'byor ma nang gi bdag nyid kyi rgyan ma lus pa'i don gyi mthu mchog tu byed pa stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba la nges par sbyor ba'o //
T02TD3305E:206b-6: de ltar yang rnal 'byor ma kun du spyod pa'i rgyud las /
T02TD3305E:206b-7: dang po mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD3305E:206b-8: 'bad de nus pa bskyed par bya //
T02TD3305E:206b-9: nus pa bskyed pa'i rjes la ni //
T02TD3305E:206b-10: brtul zhugs spyod pa yid 'ong ba //
T02TD3305E:206b-11: rigs lnga mnyam par kun spyod pa //
T02TD3305E:206b-12: rigs gcig tu ni yang dag brtag / mi rtog sems gcig bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD3305E:206b-13: 'dod pa lnga la spyad par bya //
T02TD3305E:206b-14: de ltar dpal ldan he ru ka'i //
T02TD3305E:206b-15: ye shes bsam pa kun rdzogs mdzad //
T02TD3305E:206b-16: shes rab che ldan de yi ni //
T02TD3305E:206b-17: gnyis med ye shes brtul zhugs bzang //
T02TD3305E:206b-18: spyod pa'i brtul zhugs la zhugs pa'i //
T02TD3305E:206b-19: rnal 'byor rab nges shes par bya //
T02TD3305E:206b-21: 'byung bar 'gyur ba na thub pa'i dbang po'i go 'phang du 'os pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang phyug thob pa'i ched du glegs bam dang thod lo kor dang sam bor 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:206b-22: rgyal srid la sogs pa'i bde ba la ltos pa med par bya ba'i ched du bsod snyoms la brten par gyur pa'o //
T02TD3305E:206b-23: mi chod pa'i bsam gtan dang bzlas pa bya ba'i ched du gyo mo'i snod dang rnal 'byor ma'i dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:206b-24: ma rig pa thams cad gcad par bya ba'i ched du gri gug 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3305E:206b-25: 'di dag thams cad kyang spyod pa'i brtul zhugs nyid kyi 'khor yin no //
T02TD3305E:206b-26: khams gsum dang dbyer med pa'i chos nyid rtogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa 'di khyod yin no zhes gzengs bstod pa'i don du lung bstan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:207a-0: de ltar yang bhur zhes pa steng gi 'jig @207a * //
T02TD3305E:207a-2: bhu wa zhes pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i sa 'og go //
T02TD3305E:207a-3: sv'a: zhes pa ni mtho ris te 'du shes med min skye mched kyi mthar thug pa'o //
T02TD3305E:207a-4: de gsum char yang khyod yin te /
T02TD3305E:207a-5: gang gi phyir de rnams kyi rang bzhin te de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig ste rab tu dga' ba'i sa la sogs pa rim gyis rtogs par nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa ni /
T02TD3305E:207a-6: sa ma ya stvam bhu rghu wa sva: zhes pa 'di'i don to //
T02TD3305E:207a-7: cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du dngos grub bsgrubs te chos bstan pa la sogs pa rnams kyis sems can gyi don gyis shig ces pa ni rjes su gnang ba'o //
T02TD3305E:207a-8: khyod kyis 'dod pa rnams la nye bar longs spyod kyang sgrib pa thams cad las nges par grol pa'i sangs rgyas nyid de rang ngo zhes dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pa byas pas rgyas par 'os pa la mngon par sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba'i ched du dbugs dbyung ba'o //
T02TD3305E:207a-9: phyi dang gsang ba dang de kho nyid kyi dam tshig gsum bsrung ba'i don du dam tshig bsgrag pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD3305E:207a-10: rdo rje'i brtul zhugs la sogs pa lnga po 'di rnams kyang slob dpon gyi dbang gi rjes dang /
T02TD3305E:207a-11: rig pa'i dbang gi rjes la de dang de tsam gyis tshim pa rnams la shes par bya'o zhes pa ni kha cig tu'o //
T02TD3305E:207a-12: sngags dang mig sman dang me long dang mda' 'phang pa rnams ni rig pa'i dbang gi rjes la'o //
T02TD3305E:207a-13: rig ma'i brtul zhugs ni shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i rjes la yang kha cig tu'o //
T02TD3305E:207a-14: kha cig tu ni slar yang sngags la sogs pa dang spyod pa'i brtul zhugs dang /
T02TD3305E:207a-15: spyir rjes su gnang ba dang dam tshig gsum ni skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la'ang ma bshad de /
T02TD3305E:207a-16: ji ltar rigs par dbang gzhan rnams su de dang de'i don yod pa rnams la dgongs pas so //
T02TD3305E:207a-17: kha cig rjes su gnang ba dang dbugs dbyung ba dag gi phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang du bsdus te /
T02TD3305E:207a-18: 'dir ni thams cad tha dad bu brjod do //
T02TD3305E:207a-19: gang yang mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje'i gur las /
T02TD3305E:207a-20: dang po chu yi dbang yin te //
T02TD3305E:207a-21: gnyis pa cod ban gyi ni dbang //
T02TD3305E:207a-22: gsum pa rdo rje'i dbang yin te //
T02TD3305E:207a-23: bzhi pa rang gi bdag po yin //
T02TD3305E:207a-24: lnga ba ming gi dbang yin te //
T02TD3305E:207a-25: drug pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang //
T02TD3305E:207a-26: bum pa'i dbang ni bdun pa ste //
T02TD3305E:207b-0: brgyad pa @207b gsang ba'i dbang yin no //
T02TD3305E:207b-1: dgu pa shes rab dbang bskur te //
T02TD3305E:207b-2: de nyid rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD3305E:207b-3: kun du rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin //
T02TD3305E:207b-4: rang nyid ston pas lung ston te //
T02TD3305E:207b-6: zhes gsungs shing 'di nyid brtag pa'i rgyal po gnyis par yang //
T02TD3305E:207b-7: slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang //
T02TD3305E:207b-8: bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:207b-10: de la chu dang cod pa na dang rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming dang slob dpon gyi dbyer pa drug ni bum pa'i dbang ste /
T02TD3305E:207b-11: thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang spyan ma la sogs pa'i rim pa rnams kyis bum pas mngon par dbang bskur ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD3305E:207b-12: slob dpon gyi dbang ni mchog tu nye bar blang bar bya ba nyid kyis phul du byung ba dang bcas par dbang bskur pa'i phyir /
T02TD3305E:207b-13: bum pa'i dbang ni bdun ba ste //
T02TD3305E:207b-15: slob dpon gyi dbang de 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pas chu'i dbang la sogs pa lnga yang slob dpon gyi dbang du brjod de /
T02TD3305E:207b-16: des na thams cad la 'gal ba med do zhes pa 'di ni gzhan dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:207b-18: // / rang nyid kyang dam tshig nyams na 'di lta bu'i dbang bskur ba nyid ji ltar slob dpon 'jug pa'i cho gar gzung zhing bshad pa de bzhin du blang bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:207b-19: 'on kyang gal te bla ma dam pa dang shin tu ring ba dang lam bgrod dka' ba la sogs pa'i nye bar 'tsho bas bgrod mi nus pa'i phyogs na gnas pa ste gzhan du ma yin no //
T02TD3305E:207b-20: rtag tu yi dam byed pa ni shes rab dang thabs ro gcig par rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor gyi yid kyis rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug las chu'i dbang la sogs pa dang gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes dang bzhi pa'i mthar thug pa rnams dang dbugs dbyung ba'i mthar thug pa blang bar bya'o zhes pa rang dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:207b-22: // / rdo rje sems dpa'i sdom pa dang ldan pa 'di'i yang ltung ba ni rigs rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD3305E:207b-23: rtsa ba'i ltung ba dang spom po'i ltung ba'o //
T02TD3305E:207b-25: bla ma dam pa'i thugs dkrugs pa //
T02TD3305E:207b-26: rtsa ba'i ltung ba dang por gsungs //
T02TD3305E:207b-27: bde gshegs bka' las 'das pa ni //
T02TD3305E:207b-28: ltung ba gnyis par brjod pa yin //
T02TD3305E:207b-29: rdo rje spun la khros pa yis //
T02TD3305E:208a-2: sems can rnams la byams pa spong //
T02TD3305E:208a-3: bzhi pa yin par rgyal bas gsungs //
T02TD3305E:208a-4: chos kyi rtsa ba byang chub sems //
T02TD3305E:208a-5: de spong ba ni lnga pa ste //
T02TD3305E:208a-6: rang dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha'i //
T02TD3305E:208a-7: chos la smod pa drug pa yin //
T02TD3305E:208a-8: yongs su ma smin sems can la //
T02TD3305E:208a-9: gsang ba sgrogs pa bdun pa ste //
T02TD3305E:208a-10: phung po lnga bdag sangs rgyas nyid //
T02TD3305E:208a-11: de la smod pa brgyad pa'o //
T02TD3305E:208a-12: rang bzhin dag pa'i chos rnams la //
T02TD3305E:208a-13: som nyi za ba dgu pa ste //
T02TD3305E:208a-14: gdug la rtag tu byams ldan par //
T02TD3305E:208a-15: byed pa de ni bcu pa'o //
T02TD3305E:208a-16: thog mtha' bral ba'i chos rnams la //
T02TD3305E:208a-17: der rtog pa ni bcu gcig pa //
T02TD3305E:208a-18: sems can dad dang ldan pa yi //
T02TD3305E:208a-19: sems sun 'byin pa bcu gnyis pa //
T02TD3305E:208a-20: dam tshig rdzas ni ji bzhin rnyed //
T02TD3305E:208a-21: mi bsten pa ni bcu gsum pa //
T02TD3305E:208a-22: shes rab rang bzhin bud med la //
T02TD3305E:208a-23: smod par byed pa bcu bzhi pa //
T02TD3305E:208a-24: zhes pa ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba'o //
T02TD3305E:208a-26: rnal 'byor pa gang stobs kyis gtso //
T02TD3305E:208a-27: sbom po'i ltung ba dang por bshad //
T02TD3305E:208a-28: de la mtho btsams pa yang ngo //
T02TD3305E:208a-29: rgyud las gsungs pa'i rjes 'brangs nas //
T02TD3305E:208a-30: byin rlabs med pa'i bdud rtsi yang //
T02TD3305E:208a-31: de yi sbom po'i ltung pa ni //
T02TD3305E:208a-32: gnyis pa rab tu skye bar byed //
T02TD3305E:208a-33: tshogs kyi 'khor lor rtsod pa dang //
T02TD3305E:208a-34: dam tshig la ni dmod pa dag / rnal 'byor pa de'i sbom po yi //
T02TD3305E:208a-35: ltung ba gsum par bshad pa yin //
T02TD3305E:208a-36: gang cho gsang ba'i chos mthong la //
T02TD3305E:208a-37: g-yo sgyu'i blo yis mi sbed par //
T02TD3305E:208a-38: rab tu gsal bar bya na de'i //
T02TD3305E:208a-39: sbom po'i ltung ba bzhi par 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:208a-40: gang zhig dad pa'i sems can ni //
T02TD3305E:208a-41: gsang ba'i chos la dga' ba yi //
T02TD3305E:208a-42: phyin ci log ni 'chad byed pa //
T02TD3305E:208a-43: sbom po'i ltung ba lnga par 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:208a-44: nyan thos theg pa dman pa rnams //
T02TD3305E:208a-45: zhag bdun lhan cig gnas pa dang //
T02TD3305E:208a-46: de la sbom po'i ltung ba ni //
T02TD3305E:208a-47: shin tu lci ba drug pa skye //
T02TD3305E:208a-48: rnal 'byor nges par mi shes par //
T02TD3305E:208a-49: rnal 'byor mngon pa'i nga rgyal sems //
T02TD3305E:208a-50: de yi sbom po'i ltung ba ni //
T02TD3305E:208a-51: bdun par 'gyur bar the tshom med //
T02TD3305E:208a-52: snod du gyur pa'i sems can gang //
T02TD3305E:208a-53: phyi yi chos la dga' ba la //
T02TD3305E:208a-54: gsang pa'i chos rnams yang dag 'chad //
T02TD3305E:208a-55: de yi sbom po'i ltung ba ni //
T02TD3305E:208a-56: brgyad pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD3305E:208b-0: zhes pa ni sbom @208b po'i ltung ba'o //
T02TD3305E:208b-1: de'i phyir ltung ba gnyis kyis gzung bas dam tshig med na ji ltar nus pa'i ston mo sbyin pa sngon du 'gro ba'i 'bul ba byas nas bla ma dam pa'i ma dun du sdig pa bshags pa dang sngar gyi gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa brtsams te sngar bzhin du rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sngom pa gzung bar bya'o zhes pa /
T02TD3305E:208b-2: gdams pa dang bcas shing 'khor dang bcas pa'i dbang gi cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:208b-4: // /'dir zhi ba la sogs pa'i don du sbyin sreg bya'o zhes sngar gsungs te /
T02TD3305E:208b-6: dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang bral ba'i //
T02TD3305E:208b-7: rab gnas 'dir ni bstan pa med //
T02TD3305E:208b-8: de'i phyir slob mar phan 'dod pas //
T02TD3305E:208b-9: sbyin sreg cho ga yang dag bya //
T02TD3305E:208b-10: sems can dbye bas mtha' yas te //
T02TD3305E:208b-11: rigs kyi dbye bas rnam pa lnga //
T02TD3305E:208b-12: las kyi dbye bas rnam pa bzhi //
T02TD3305E:208b-13: thab khung zhes bya'i mtshan nyid 'di //
T02TD3305E:208b-14: rnam mang brjod pa yongs sngangs nas //
T02TD3305E:208b-15: de ni bdag gis legs bsdus te //
T02TD3305E:208b-16: zhi ba la sogs rab dbye bas//
T02TD3305E:208b-17: thab khung mtshan nyid brjod par bya //
T02TD3305E:208b-18: zhi ba'i thab khung zlum pa ste //
T02TD3305E:208b-20: dbus su chu skyes 'dab brgyad dang //
T02TD3305E:208b-21: sor brgyad pa yi 'khor lo dgod //
T02TD3305E:208b-22: rgyar ni kun nas khru gang ba //
T02TD3305E:208b-23: sor bzhi yang dag spangs ba'o //
T02TD3305E:208b-24: kha khyer la ni sor bzhi ste //
T02TD3305E:208b-25: rgya ni dpangs kyi tshad yin no //
T02TD3305E:208b-26: rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi 'am //
T02TD3305E:208b-27: gang yang zur brgyad khru do pa /
T02TD3305E:208b-28: kun nas sor brgyad spangs par te //
T02TD3305E:208b-29: dbus su chu skyes 'dab brgyad la //
T02TD3305E:208b-30: sor drug pa yi rin po che //
T02TD3305E:208b-31: rgyar ni dpangs kyi tshad ldan pa'i //
T02TD3305E:208b-32: sor mo brgyad pa'i kha khyer gyis //
T02TD3305E:208b-34: dbang la zhi rgyas thab de bzhin //
T02TD3305E:208b-35: cung zad kha ni rgyas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:208b-36: stegs bu la sogs zhi ba yi //
T02TD3305E:208b-37: thab khung bzhin du bshad par bya //
T02TD3305E:208b-38: dgug pa la yang de bzhin 'dod //
T02TD3305E:208b-39: padma'i dbus su dbang la ni //
T02TD3305E:208b-40: bha ga lta bu 'dod pa ste //
T02TD3305E:208b-41: dgug pa'i dbus su lcags kyu dgod //
T02TD3305E:208b-42: rdo rje rtse gcig rnam pa can //
T02TD3305E:208b-43: mngon spyod la ni brjod par bya //
T02TD3305E:208b-44: rtsub cing gseg ma'i sa gzhi'i char //
T02TD3305E:208b-45: thab khung gru gsum rgya la ni //
T02TD3305E:208b-46: sor mo nyi shu ba yi tshad //
T02TD3305E:208b-47: sor mo gsum ni spangs pa ste //
T02TD3305E:208b-48: rgya dang dpangs ni tshad mnyam pa //
T02TD3305E:209a-1: rol kha phyir gzhol gyur ba'i //
T02TD3305E:209a-2: kha khyer sor mo gsum pa'o //
T02TD3305E:209a-3: mthil dbus rtse gsum la gnas pa'i //
T02TD3305E:209a-4: rdo rje rnon po sor brgyad pa'i //
T02TD3305E:209a-5: rtse mo byang du phyogs pa ste //
T02TD3305E:209a-6: ro bsregs thal ba rnga mo'i brun //
T02TD3305E:209a-7: me tog dri ngan la sogs gtor //
T02TD3305E:209a-8: las kun pa yi thab khung ni //
T02TD3305E:209a-9: zhi ba'i thab dang mnyam pa ste //
T02TD3305E:209a-11: kha khyer rdo rje phreng bas bskor //
T02TD3305E:209a-12: dbus su mnyam par gnas pa ni //
T02TD3305E:209a-13: rdo rje rin chen chu skyes dang //
T02TD3305E:209a-14: sna tshogs rdo rje yongs bskor dag //
T02TD3305E:209a-16: zhi dang dbang gi thab ni shar //
T02TD3305E:209a-17: rgyas ba byang gi phyogs su ste //
T02TD3305E:209a-18: lho phyogs su ni dgug pa bshad //
T02TD3305E:209a-19: gshin rje'i phyogs su mngon spyod do //
T02TD3305E:209a-20: zhi dang rgyas dang de bzhin du //
T02TD3305E:209a-21: dbang dang mngon spyod thab kyi sar //
T02TD3305E:209a-22: byug pa 'jim pa me tog dri //
T02TD3305E:209a-23: dkar ser dmar po nag po'o //
T02TD3305E:209a-24: rgya yi cha yi tshad gang yin //
T02TD3305E:209a-25: da yi phyed na zabs su 'dod //
T02TD3305E:209a-26: rang rang thab dbyibs kha khyer te //
T02TD3305E:209a-27: sa sogs ma lus dbang bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:209a-28: las kyi dbye bas thab rnams la //
T02TD3305E:209a-29: rdul tshon rang bzhin dgram par bya //
T02TD3305E:209a-30: slob dpon la yang de dang de'i //
T02TD3305E:209a-31: yol ba la gnas dus ldan 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:209a-32: zhes pa thab khung gi cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:209a-34: // / dgang gzar gser dang zangs las byas //
T02TD3305E:209a-35: de bzhin ni ma pa'i rang bzhin bstan //
T02TD3305E:209a-36: mchod sbyin shing las byas pa'ang rung //
T02TD3305E:209a-37: de dag gi yang yu ba ni //
T02TD3305E:209a-38: sor mi nyi shu rtsa bzhi ba'i //
T02TD3305E:209a-39: tshad can zlum por 'dod pa ste //
T02TD3305E:209a-40: rdo rje la sogs khu tshur gyis //
T02TD3305E:209a-41: gzung du rung zhing sgom pa nyid //
T02TD3305E:209a-42: yu ba'i rtse mor 'dab ma ni //
T02TD3305E:209a-43: sor bzhi ba ste gru bzhi'o //
T02TD3305E:209a-44: zabs su sor gnyis gru bzhi yang //
T02TD3305E:209a-45: dbus su rdo rjes mtshan pa nyid //
T02TD3305E:209a-46: gdang gzar rtse mor bug pa ni //
T02TD3305E:209a-47: sor gang tsam du rab bstan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:209a-48: chu skyes 'dab la sor bzhi pa'i //
T02TD3305E:209a-49: dbus su rtse gsum dgod par bya //
T02TD3305E:209a-50: yu pa'i rtsa bar sor drug pa'i //
T02TD3305E:209a-51: rdo rje rin chen gyis mtshan 'dod //
T02TD3305E:209a-52: blugs gzar yu ba dag gzar bzhin //
T02TD3305E:209a-53: rtsa bar rdo rje'i byug pa nyid //
T02TD3305E:209a-54: blugs gzar kun du khru gang tsam //
T02TD3305E:209a-55: rtse mor kun nas sor gnyis pa'i //
T02TD3305E:209a-56: chu skyes 'dab ma'i rnam pa ste //
T02TD3305E:209b-0: dbus su rdo rje dgod @209b par bya //
T02TD3305E:209b-1: dgang gzar blugs gzar mid gyur na //
T02TD3305E:209b-2: sor mo lnga dang gsum po yang //
T02TD3305E:209b-3: rab tu sbyar ba dag gis ni //
T02TD3305E:209b-4: bde legs rdzogs par gzhan dag gsungs //
T02TD3305E:209b-5: zhes ba dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyi cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:209b-7: // / aa shv'a dhta dad pla ksha sogs //
T02TD3305E:209b-8: 'o ma can shing lo mar bcas //
T02TD3305E:209b-9: rtse mo mnyam bcad mtho gang tsam //
T02TD3305E:209b-10: rlan bcas rma med rtse mo dag /'o ma sprang ci mar la bsnyugs //
T02TD3305E:209b-11: rtse gcig dkar po'i dri yis bran //
T02TD3305E:209b-12: zung dag mnyam par gyur pa yi //
T02TD3305E:209b-13: yam shing rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD3305E:209b-14: chags pa gas pa phra dang sbom //
T02TD3305E:209b-15: rtse mo nyams dang rtse gnyis pa //
T02TD3305E:209b-16: skam po sgur po mi 'dod par //
T02TD3305E:209b-17: shes bya bsreg bya gzhan bshad bya //
T02TD3305E:209b-18: zho dang 'o ma zas mchog dang //
T02TD3305E:209b-20: ku sha tsu ta'i 'dab ma dang //
T02TD3305E:209b-21: me tog dkar po'i ge sar dang //
T02TD3305E:209b-22: tsandan pri yang ku dang ni //
T02TD3305E:209b-23: me tog thang chu'i sreg rdzas gsungs //
T02TD3305E:209b-24: ji ltar rnyed pas sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD3305E:209b-25: sbrang dang mar bsres zhi ba la'o //
T02TD3305E:209b-26: rgyas par ya shing de rnams nyid //
T02TD3305E:209b-27: tshad ni gang zhig khru gang ste //
T02TD3305E:209b-28: 'o ma zho dang mar bsres pa //
T02TD3305E:209b-29: lag gzungs ser po dri yis bran //
T02TD3305E:209b-30: zas mchog gong bu zho zan dang //
T02TD3305E:209b-31: ka rni ka ra ti la chen po //
T02TD3305E:209b-34: de bzhin n'a ga ge sar dang //
T02TD3305E:209b-35: me tog brgya pa lhan cig tu //
T02TD3305E:209b-36: kun nas mngar gsum bsres pa yi //
T02TD3305E:209b-37: sreg rdzas rgyas la ji bzhin 'dod //
T02TD3305E:209b-38: rtsam ba ka dang aa sho ka //
T02TD3305E:209b-39: ba ku la dang pri yang ku //
T02TD3305E:209b-40: la gu tsa dad aa mra sogs //
T02TD3305E:209b-41: sor lnga'i n'a ga ge sar gyi //
T02TD3305E:209b-42: gser rnams dan dmar po yi //
T02TD3305E:209b-43: 'bras bu rnams dang me tog gi / sreg rdzas rnams ni dbang la'o //
T02TD3305E:209b-44: dgug pa la yang de bzhin nyid //
T02TD3305E:209b-45: 'on kyang tsher ldan lcags kyu'i dbyibs //
T02TD3305E:209b-46: las kun pa la 'dab ldan pa'i //
T02TD3305E:209b-47: au du mba'a ra b'a la sha /
T02TD3305E:209b-48: p'a ksha aa shva dtha seng ldeng //
T02TD3305E:209b-49: sa m'a aa ba marga dang /
T02TD3305E:209b-50: aa karka ka shma aa mra //
T02TD3305E:209b-51: bee kam ka ta nya gro dha //
T02TD3305E:209b-52: gsar ba'i yam shing 'di rnams gzung //
T02TD3305E:209b-53: mdzub gang rtse gcig sbyin sreg 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:209b-54: mngon spyod la ni yungs kar dang //
T02TD3305E:209b-55: tsha ba'i til mar khrag dang ni //
T02TD3305E:209b-56: ni ma pa'i 'dab ma ke che dang //
T02TD3305E:209b-57: rnga mo la sogs brun rnams dang //
T02TD3305E:210a-2: skra dang tsher ma khva sogs kyi //
T02TD3305E:210a-3: gshog pa rus pa rkang ba'i rdul //
T02TD3305E:210a-4: sha chen tshil bu la sogs pa'i //
T02TD3305E:210a-5: rdzas 'di rnams dang dgra yi lus //
T02TD3305E:210a-6: byas nas dum bur bcad pa la //
T02TD3305E:210a-7: re re dug dang khrag lan tshva //
T02TD3305E:210a-8: mngon par bsreg pa'i sreg rdzas 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:210a-9: gang zhig zhi dang rgyas pa'i rdzas //
T02TD3305E:210a-10: gang yin bdag nyid bza' ba yang //
T02TD3305E:210a-11: mar dang bsres pa'i gu gul dang //
T02TD3305E:210a-12: sbos skar de kun rtag tu sbyar //
T02TD3305E:210a-13: sv'a h'a'i bdag nyid sngags kyis ni //
T02TD3305E:210a-14: dbye bas sbyin sreg mang du bya //
T02TD3305E:210a-15: dri dang me tog nyer spyod rnams //
T02TD3305E:210a-16: las kyi sbyor bas bya ba nyid //
T02TD3305E:210a-17: ces pa sreg rdzas kyi cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:210a-19: // / zhi pa'i bud shing thab khung las //
T02TD3305E:210a-20: cung zad thung ba'i mchod sbyin shing //
T02TD3305E:210a-21: 'brog dgon pa lang lci bdag / srog chags med pa lhan cig 'dod //
T02TD3305E:210a-22: rgyas pa'i bud shing 'brog dgon pa'i //
T02TD3305E:210a-23: ba lang lci ba ma gtogs pa //
T02TD3305E:210a-24: ji skad gsungs bzhin bstan pa ste /
T02TD3305E:210a-25: rang gi thab mnyam 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD3305E:210a-26: dbang la ni ma pa skyur ba'i shing /
T02TD3305E:210a-27: me tog ldan pa'i bud shing ste //
T02TD3305E:210a-28: dgug par tsher ma can zhes bya //
T02TD3305E:210a-29: mngon spyod la ni skam po dang //
T02TD3305E:210a-30: tsha ba tsher ldan dri dan dang //
T02TD3305E:210a-31: de bzhin dur khrod skyes pa'i shing //
T02TD3305E:210a-32: bod bu rnga mo la sogs spangs //
T02TD3305E:210a-33: las kun la yang de rnams kun //
T02TD3305E:210a-34: zhes pa bud shing gi cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:210a-36: // / zhi bar dkar po'i tshes gcig nas //
T02TD3305E:210a-37: brtsams te dkar po'i gos sogs can //
T02TD3305E:210a-38: srod la shar du kha bltas nas //
T02TD3305E:210a-39: stan bzang padma'i gdan gyis 'dug / las dang rjes mthun bsam gtan bsgrub //
T02TD3305E:210a-40: byams dang snying rje dang ldan pas /
T02TD3305E:210a-41: las dang mthun pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD3305E:210a-42: zhi ba'i yid kyis yang dag sbyang //
T02TD3305E:210a-43: rgyas par zla ba gang ba nas //
T02TD3305E:210a-44: brtsams te ser po'i gos sogs can //
T02TD3305E:210a-45: snga dro shar du kha bltas nas //
T02TD3305E:210a-46: bzang po'i 'dug stangs kyis gnas brtsams //
T02TD3305E:210a-47: dbang la dmar po'i gos sogs can//
T02TD3305E:210a-48: nub tu kha bltas mthon po yi /
T02TD3305E:210a-49: gdan la rdo rje'i skyil krung gnas //
T02TD3305E:210a-50: bde zhin dga' bas bya bar gsungs //
T02TD3305E:210a-51: dgug pa la ni thams cad mtshungs //
T02TD3305E:210a-53: lhan rnams mnyes par byed pa la'ang //
T02TD3305E:210a-54: nub tu ba ltas yang dag spyad //
T02TD3305E:210b-0: mngon spyod sngon @210b po'i gos sogs sam //
T02TD3305E:210b-1: gang yang khro zhing khrag ldan gos //
T02TD3305E:210b-2: kha ni gshin rjer bltas te 'dug / sra ba'i stan nam rtsub mo'i sa //
T02TD3305E:210b-3: bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyas brang la ni //
T02TD3305E:210b-4: brtan par kun nas gnas pa 'am //
T02TD3305E:210b-5: yang na stan ni med par yang //
T02TD3305E:210b-6: rkang bas rkang ba mnan te bsdad //
T02TD3305E:210b-7: nag po yi ni tshes gcig gi //
T02TD3305E:210b-8: nyi ma gung ngam mtshan phyed la //
T02TD3305E:210b-9: so rnams 'cha' zhing smin ma dag /
T02TD3305E:210b-10: khro gnyer bsdus te sbyang par bya //
T02TD3305E:210b-11: rengs dang rmongs pa dbang ldan blta //
T02TD3305E:210b-12: de bzhin rdo rje skyil krung ste //
T02TD3305E:210b-13: poo shat sngags kyi mthar ldan pas //
T02TD3305E:210b-14: thab khung gru bzhir byas pa la //
T02TD3305E:210b-15: ser dang dkar ba'i rgyan gyis spras //
T02TD3305E:210b-16: rgyas mtshungs chogs gang dag gnas //
T02TD3305E:210b-17: bskrad la de bzhin mer phyogs te //
T02TD3305E:210b-18: rnga mo la sogs sngags kyis byug / dkar gnag gis brgyan dug gis bri //
T02TD3305E:210b-19: rdzas dang sngags ni 'di dag ste //
T02TD3305E:210b-20: khva ta la sogs gshog pa mchog / spel tshig dang ni yang dag ldan //
T02TD3305E:210b-21: 'dir ni khva sogs gshog pa dang //
T02TD3305E:210b-22: che ge mo au tstsha ta ya //
T02TD3305E:210b-23: h'um phat ces pa'i sngags rnams ni //
T02TD3305E:210b-24: bris pa dag dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:210b-25: dbye ba de bzhin bden bral du //
T02TD3305E:210b-26: phyogs der rkang pa bzlog pas 'dug / ser po nag pos rnam par brgyan //
T02TD3305E:210b-27: tsha ba'i til mar dug gis bri //
T02TD3305E:210b-28: thams cad du phyogs dang phyogs bral gang du kha bltas pa'i thad ka'i phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas pas so //
T02TD3305E:210b-29: yang don dam par phyogs ran rgyud pa ma yin pa'i phyir ji lta ba bzhin du nges par gnas pa de'i nga rgyal chen po'i yid kyis ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas de kho na bzhin thams cad bya'o //
T02TD3305E:210b-30: gser dngul rdo dang zangs dang shing //
T02TD3305E:210b-31: sas byas nya phyis dung dang ni /
T02TD3305E:210b-32: 'dab ma'i kyong bu zhabs bsil dang //
T02TD3305E:210b-33: bsang gtor zhal ba sil mchod yon snod //
T02TD3305E:210b-34: zhi bar der gnas 'o ma dang //
T02TD3305E:210b-35: dkar po'i dri sogs 'dus byas te //
T02TD3305E:210b-36: sngags rig bdag nyid sngags pa yis //
T02TD3305E:210b-37: chu la sv'a h'a'i mtha' can bzlas //
T02TD3305E:210b-38: rgyas par der ni til zho bsre //
T02TD3305E:210b-39: ser po'i dri sogs 'dus byas te //
T02TD3305E:210b-40: chu la aom yig mtha' can te //
T02TD3305E:210b-41: rang gi sngags kyi bzlas pa bya //
T02TD3305E:210b-42: dbang la dmar po'i dri la sogs //
T02TD3305E:210b-43: 'dus bya chu la ho: yig gi /
T02TD3305E:210b-44: mtha' can sngags kyi bzlas pa bya //
T02TD3305E:211a-2: mngon spyod la ni khrag dang bcas //
T02TD3305E:211a-3: ba lang chu dang ko ta ba //
T02TD3305E:211a-4: nag dang ngan pa'i dri sogs ldan //
T02TD3305E:211a-5: chu la phat mtha'i sngags bzlas bya //
T02TD3305E:211a-6: kun du dri dang me tog dang //
T02TD3305E:211a-7: ku sha 'bras yos ti la dang ldan //
T02TD3305E:211a-8: las dang rjes mthun chu la ni //
T02TD3305E:211a-9: ji ltar rnyed pa rab tu gzhug / mchod yon snod dang de bzhin du //
T02TD3305E:211a-10: las kun pa yi chu yi snod //
T02TD3305E:211a-11: las kun pa yi chu sngags ni //
T02TD3305E:211a-12: rang gi sngags kyis bsngags par bya //
T02TD3305E:211a-13: padma'i snod gnyis g-yon logs su //
T02TD3305E:211a-14: rnam par bkod par gyur pa'i chu //
T02TD3305E:211a-15: lag pa g-yas pas bzung ba yis //
T02TD3305E:211a-16: yam shing sogs la bsang gtor bya //
T02TD3305E:211a-17: bsreg par bya ba'i rdzas rnams gzhan //
T02TD3305E:211a-18: rang gi g-yas su gzhag bya ste //
T02TD3305E:211a-19: bsad dang bskrad dang dgug pa la //
T02TD3305E:211a-20: bsang gtor dgod pa bzlog ste bya //
T02TD3305E:211a-21: zhi bar 'o ma can gyi shing //
T02TD3305E:211a-22: gtsubs pa'am gang yang dgon pa'i me //
T02TD3305E:211a-23: rgyas par nags chen tshig pa'am //
T02TD3305E:211a-24: rgyal po la sogs khyim byung ste //
T02TD3305E:211a-25: dbang la smad 'tshong rje'u rigs khyim //
T02TD3305E:211a-26: dgug par gar mkhan 'gron sogs las //
T02TD3305E:211a-27: drag por ro bsregs rus pa'am rdo //
T02TD3305E:211a-28: gdol ba'i khyim nas byung ba'i me //
T02TD3305E:211a-29: drag po'i dgug par yang 'di nyid //
T02TD3305E:211a-30: ji bzhin rang rang las kun la'o //
T02TD3305E:211a-31: zhes pa me'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:211a-33: // / de nas me rnams blang bya ste//
T02TD3305E:211a-34: gtsang ma'i snod du yang dag gzhag / gtor ma sbyin zhing bsrung ba bya //
T02TD3305E:211a-35: sngon du dril bu dkrol ba nyid //
T02TD3305E:211a-36: bgegs mthar byed pa'i sngags dang ni //
T02TD3305E:211a-37: de nas slar yang yi ge gsum //
T02TD3305E:211a-38: mchod yon zhabs bsil la sogs dbul //
T02TD3305E:211a-39: de dag dang ni bzlas pa'i chu //
T02TD3305E:211a-40: ku sha'i rtse mos bzung ba yis //
T02TD3305E:211a-41: lan gsum g-yas skor gtor bar bya //
T02TD3305E:211a-42: mngon spyod la ni g-yon pa yis //
T02TD3305E:211a-43: mchod yon la sogs thams cad bya //
T02TD3305E:211a-44: skam po'i rtsva dang lhan cig me //
T02TD3305E:211a-45: thab khung du ni rab tu gzhug / aom dzva la dzva la h'um brjod de //
T02TD3305E:211a-46: rlung yab las byung rlung dang ni //
T02TD3305E:211a-47: rigs kyi snying po bdun bzlas pa'i //
T02TD3305E:211a-48: blugs gzar gnas pa'i mar gyis sbar //
T02TD3305E:211a-49: de yis yang dag 'bar ba'i mer //
T02TD3305E:211a-50: gsang la tsha ba'i til mar ro //
T02TD3305E:211a-51: ku sha gsar pa ma grugs pa //
T02TD3305E:211a-52: ljang gu ba lang rna ba tsam //
T02TD3305E:211a-53: aom badzra satva a'a: zhes pa //
T02TD3305E:211a-54: sngags kyis yongs su bzlas pa rnams//
T02TD3305E:211b-0: @211b sgrub pos dang por ku sha gnyis //
T02TD3305E:211b-1: g-yon nas so sor kha khyer la //
T02TD3305E:211b-2: rtse mo shar du bstan pa dang //
T02TD3305E:211b-3: gshin rjer phyogs dang nub tu bstan //
T02TD3305E:211b-4: rtse mo byang dang de nas shar //
T02TD3305E:211b-5: thab la ku shas g-yogs par bya //
T02TD3305E:211b-6: rgyas dang dbang dang mngon spyod kyi //
T02TD3305E:211b-7: thab la rim pa ji bzhin du //
T02TD3305E:211b-8: rtse mo byang dang rtse mo nub //
T02TD3305E:211b-9: rtse mo lho ru de bzhin nyid //
T02TD3305E:211b-10: dang por ku sha gnyis g-yon nas //
T02TD3305E:211b-11: de ltar kha khyer la yang dgod //
T02TD3305E:211b-12: 'dir yang sgrub pa po gang du mngon par phyogs pa de la ltos nas shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi tha snyad byas te /
T02TD3305E:211b-13: don dam par na phyogs dngos por med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD3305E:211b-15: sngags rig rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i //
T02TD3305E:211b-16: sa bon las ni thab khung bskyed //
T02TD3305E:211b-17: me rnams 'bar ba shes gyur nas //
T02TD3305E:211b-18: de dbus bdag med bsgom par bya //
T02TD3305E:211b-19: de nas ram yig las skyes pa'i //
T02TD3305E:211b-20: gru gsum me ni bskyed pa'i dbus //
T02TD3305E:211b-21: padma nyi ma la gnas pa'i //
T02TD3305E:211b-22: ram yig sa bon las byung ba'i //
T02TD3305E:211b-23: bong thung lto ba 'phyang sha rgyas //
T02TD3305E:211b-24: zhal gsum phyag drug 'bar ba ste //
T02TD3305E:211b-25: spyan gsum ral pa'i cod pan can //
T02TD3305E:211b-26: smar mchod phyir thogs dang ldan //
T02TD3305E:211b-27: las dang rjes mthun sku mdog dang //
T02TD3305E:211b-28: gos dang rgyan rnams dag gis brgyan //
T02TD3305E:211b-29: dang po'i phyag gnyis rol pa yis //
T02TD3305E:211b-31: g-yon na dbyug pa spyi blugs te //
T02TD3305E:211b-32: g-yas na bgrang phreng mi 'jigs sbyin //
T02TD3305E:211b-33: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang rgyas 'debs kyi dbang po dang yang dag par ldan pa me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i sa bon ram de nyid dang snying gar me lha rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD3305E:211b-34: dam tshig sems dpa'i snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi lcags kyus nam mkhar dam tshig sems dpa' dang 'dra ba'i me lha ye shes sems dpa' me'i mtshams nas byon pa drang srong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba rtsa ba'i zhal ni sku mdog dang mthun pa ste /
T02TD3305E:211b-35: de nyid dkar po yin na g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal nag po dang dmar po dag dang /
T02TD3305E:211b-36: ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu nyid la ni sngon po dang dkar po dag dang /
T02TD3305E:212a-0: sngon po nyid la ni dkar po dang dmar po dag rnam par bltas nas g-yas pa'i mthe bo mi 'jigs pas bskyod pa dang sngags 'dis @212a * //
T02TD3305E:212a-2: aom ae hye hi mah'a bh'u ta de ba ri shi dvi dza sa ta ma /
T02TD3305E:212a-4: ma h'a ra aa smin sanni hi tva bha wa /
T02TD3305E:212a-5: zhes pas spyan drangs pa de dang lhan cig 'ongs pa'i bgegs gshin rje gshed la sogs pas bskrad nas de nyid dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD3305E:212a-6: zhes brjod pas rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:212a-7: de nas aom a'a: h'um aargham pra t'i tstsha h'um zhes pa 'dis mchod yon dbul zhing aargham gyi sgra'i gnas su p'a tyam zhes pa la sogs pa bcug pas zhabs bsil dang zhal bsil dang bsang gtor rnams kyang phul nas las dang rjes su mthun pa'i me tog la sogs pa rnams dang gsang ba'i mchod pas kyang mchod par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:212a-8: de la 'di'i mchod yon la sogs pa'i rim pa ni /
T02TD3305E:212a-9: ku sha yi ni chun po yis //
T02TD3305E:212a-10: dang po'i snod du bsang gtor gsum //
T02TD3305E:212a-11: kun du bzlas byas chu yis ni //
T02TD3305E:212a-12: de nyid du ni zhabs bsil dbul //
T02TD3305E:212a-13: khu tshur 'og tu phyogs pa yi //
T02TD3305E:212a-14: mdzub mos me tog gzung byas nas //
T02TD3305E:212a-15: mthe chung ming med gung mo dang //
T02TD3305E:212a-16: mdzub mo rim gyis bkrol bas so //
T02TD3305E:212a-17: gnyis pa dung gi mchod yon te //
T02TD3305E:212a-18: gnyis pa nyid du so sor dbul //
T02TD3305E:212a-19: rdo rje snyim pa phye bas so //
T02TD3305E:212a-20: gsum par zhal bsil dbul bya ste //
T02TD3305E:212a-21: khu tshur mdzub mo mthe bong gi //
T02TD3305E:212a-22: skam pas gzung ba'i me tog rnams //
T02TD3305E:212a-23: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan snga ru //
T02TD3305E:212a-24: sor mo rim gyis lan gsum bskor //
T02TD3305E:212a-25: mdzub mo gung mo ming med dang //
T02TD3305E:212a-26: mthe chung rnams ni bkrol bas so //
T02TD3305E:212a-27: zhes pa ni man ngag go //
T02TD3305E:212a-29: aom badzra aa na la ma h'a bh'u ta dzva la ya sarba bhasmi ku ru sarba dusht'a na h'um phat dri shya dza: h'um sa ma ya stvam sa ma yo& ham zhes pa gsum gyis dam tshig bsgrag par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:212a-31: dril bu yongs gyur dgang gzar te //
T02TD3305E:212a-32: blugs gzar rdo rje las byung 'dod //
T02TD3305E:212a-33: ces bsams gsang sngags rig pa yis //
T02TD3305E:212a-34: rim pa 'dis ni sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD3305E:212a-35: lag pa g-yon pa gan rkyal du //
T02TD3305E:212a-36: mar gyis gang ba'i dgang gzar gzung //
T02TD3305E:212a-37: g-yas pa'i khu tshur kha sbub kyis //
T02TD3305E:212a-38: blugs gzar gan rgyal mar gyis dgang //
T02TD3305E:212a-39: kun nas dgang gzar la gnas pa //
T02TD3305E:212b-0: byang chub mchog gis de @212b dag gzung //
T02TD3305E:212b-1: lag pa pus mo'i nang byas nas //
T02TD3305E:212b-2: ting 'dzin mchog ni bsam bya ste //
T02TD3305E:212b-3: slar yang rdo rje me lha'i khar //
T02TD3305E:212b-4: lce la h'um yig dgod par bya //
T02TD3305E:212b-5: dgang gzar g-yas skor byas nas ni /
T02TD3305E:212b-6: sreg blugs rdzogs par dbul bar bya //
T02TD3305E:212b-7: de la sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02TD3305E:212b-8: aom aagna ye di py'a di pya aa bi sha aa bi sha ma h'a shri ye ha bya ka bya b'a h'a na ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:212b-9: zhes pas sbyin bdag nus pa'i dbang gis sreg blugs rdzogs pa gsum mam bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:212b-11: zhes pa ni mar gyi sreg blugs kyi sngags so //
T02TD3305E:212b-12: zhi rgyas la sogs sngags rnams la //
T02TD3305E:212b-13: byang chub mchog dang nor bu dang //
T02TD3305E:212b-14: padma khro bo'i khu tshur bzhis //
T02TD3305E:212b-15: dgang gzar blugs gzer gzung ba bstan //
T02TD3305E:212b-16: mngon spyod tsha ba'i til mar dang //
T02TD3305E:212b-17: dug dang bcas pas sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD3305E:212b-18: khro bo yi ni g-yon skor te //
T02TD3305E:212b-19: lag pa pus mo'i phyi nas so //
T02TD3305E:212b-21: mar gang bu ga cung zad gnas //
T02TD3305E:212b-22: ku sha'i rtse mo las 'dzag pa //
T02TD3305E:212b-23: thab kyi steng der dgod par bya //
T02TD3305E:212b-24: ye shes kyi ni rgyun rab tu //
T02TD3305E:212b-25: thab khung lte bar 'bab par bya //
T02TD3305E:212b-26: drag por tsha ba'i til mar dang //
T02TD3305E:212b-28: dgang gzar blugs gzar gyi khal yi ge gsum dgod par bya zhing rang gi lha'i sa bon las byung ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:212b-29: zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang du bya ba dang dbang du byas pa'i dgug pa rnams la sv'a h'a dang aom dang ho: dang dza: ste drag po la ni h'um h'um phat ces pa sngags kyi mthar brjod par bya zhing /
T02TD3305E:212b-30: zhal cung zad gdangs pa dang drag po dang drag po'i dgug pa ni zhal shin tu gdangs pa'o //
T02TD3305E:212b-31: de nas 'bar ba'i mtshan ma ni //
T02TD3305E:212b-32: bgegs dang bral ba mtshon bya ste //
