T02TD3305E:244b-13: 'degs pa de yi snying po nyid //
T02TD3305E:244b-14: cung zad stong par lha gnas gcig //
T02TD3305E:244b-15: 'khor sar khang chung gcig pa gang //
T02TD3305E:244b-16: de yang de bzhin slar yang ngo //
T02TD3305E:244b-18: khang chung bgrod pa'i skabs dang ldan //
T02TD3305E:244b-19: khang pa'i ngos gnyis dag tu yang //
T02TD3305E:244b-20: khang chung nang ni rdzogs pa can //
T02TD3305E:244b-21: phyogs bzhir khang chung rnams kyis kyang //
T02TD3305E:244b-22: de ni rnam par mdzes pa'o //
T02TD3305E:244b-23: gang zhig 'degs pa gcig bcas pa'i //
T02TD3305E:244b-24: snying po der ni lha gnas bzhi //
T02TD3305E:244b-25: shin tu chen por grags pa ni //
T02TD3305E:244b-26: khang chung gnyis gnyis ldan par bya //
T02TD3305E:244b-27: nang gi 'khor sa dang bcas pa'i //
T02TD3305E:244b-28: so sor sgo ni phyogs phyogs su //
T02TD3305E:244b-29: de bar khang chung dang 'degs pas //
T02TD3305E:244b-30: mnyam par 'khor bas shin tu mdzes //
T02TD3305E:244b-31: 'khor sa lam gyi rtsig pa rnams //
T02TD3305E:244b-32: lhan cig bar ma dag tu bya //
T02TD3305E:244b-33: 'dir ni de nyid snying po'i steng //
T02TD3305E:244b-34: dri yi gtsang khang brtan pa che //
T02TD3305E:244b-35: khang pa brtsegs ma'am de las gzhan //
T02TD3305E:244b-36: thams cad shin tu brtan par bya //
T02TD3305E:244b-38: khang chung ngos su rtsig pa ste //
T02TD3305E:244b-39: 'degs pa'i rtsig pa mnyam par bya //
T02TD3305E:244b-40: las dang gnas la 'jug pas so //
T02TD3305E:244b-41: 'khor sa rnams dang khang chung rnams //
T02TD3305E:244b-42: mtho dman rjes su mthun pa dag //
T02TD3305E:244b-43: 'dir ni ji ltar rigs par bya //
T02TD3305E:244b-44: las rnams shes pa'i bzo bos so //
T02TD3305E:244b-45: brtan pa'i don du 'degs pa dang //
T02TD3305E:244b-46: rmang la sogs pa'i las la yang //
T02TD3305E:244b-47: rtsig pa'i cha yi rkang pa yi //
T02TD3305E:244b-49: 'degs pa'i dpangs ni rnam gzung ba //
T02TD3305E:244b-50: 'degs pa'i rgya yi tshad yin te //
T02TD3305E:244b-51: cha gnyis slar yang steng du ni //
T02TD3305E:245a-0: chung bar bzo bo yang dag @245a * //
T02TD3305E:245a-2: rdo ba'i las ni gnas don du //
T02TD3305E:245a-3: gnyis kyi cha yis gzhan dag slar //
T02TD3305E:245a-4: de ni mthong bar 'dod pa ste //
T02TD3305E:245a-6: dri gtsang khang de'i steng du yang //
T02TD3305E:245a-8: ji lta'i cha yi khang brtsegs ni //
T02TD3305E:245a-9: sngar bshad pa yang bstan pa'o //
T02TD3305E:245a-10: de lha'i rim pa bdag gis byas //
T02TD3305E:245a-11: mdzes pa rnam dpyod ji lta'i rim //
T02TD3305E:245a-12: 'degs pa'i steng du gri gtsang khang //
T02TD3305E:245a-13: lha yi khyad par gyis de brjod //
T02TD3305E:245a-14: steng du bdun gyi cha shas rnams //
T02TD3305E:245a-15: rnam brgyad cha ste slar yang gang //
T02TD3305E:245a-16: bco brgyad steng gi rgya yin te //
T02TD3305E:245a-17: de yang bzhi bzhi'i cha shas can //
T02TD3305E:245a-18: phyi rol rnams su cha shas bzhi //
T02TD3305E:245a-19: re re'ang bdun pa brgyad pa ste //
T02TD3305E:245a-20: de dag cha shas rab bskor ba //
T02TD3305E:245a-21: ngos gnyis ri mo mdzes don du'o //
T02TD3305E:245a-22: bzhi yi cha shas ngos gnyis dang //
T02TD3305E:245a-23: rab mtho gang gi dbus su gnas //
T02TD3305E:245a-24: de rnams cha bcus phung por 'dod //
T02TD3305E:245a-25: b'a rendra yi bzo bo'i lugs //
T02TD3305E:245a-26: dri gtsang khang sogs sprul pa la //
T02TD3305E:245a-27: ngos gnyis der yang bzo bo yis //
T02TD3305E:245a-28: cha shas dgu pa'i rgyar ldan pa'i //
T02TD3305E:245a-29: dri gtsang khang yang nges par 'jug / sngar gsungs rjes su rim pa la'ang //
T02TD3305E:245a-30: gnyis gnyis cha ni rab 'jug ste //
T02TD3305E:245a-31: dbus su gnas pa'i lnga yi cha //
T02TD3305E:245a-32: 'di ni phung por rab tu grags //
T02TD3305E:245a-33: gzhan yang cha lnga'i cha shas rnams //
T02TD3305E:245a-34: der bya dpangs su gnyis slar yang //
T02TD3305E:245a-35: gsum gyi cha 'dir phung po dang //
T02TD3305E:245a-36: dpung par bzo bo rnams kyis 'dod //
T02TD3305E:245a-37: rab 'jug lnga par thig la thig / bzung nas gzhan yang gsum pa dang //
T02TD3305E:245a-38: gnyis par 'og gi zur dag ste //
T02TD3305E:245a-39: dri gtsang mar me'i rtse mo mtshungs //
T02TD3305E:245a-40: gal te rnam gsum zhes bshad rnams //
T02TD3305E:245a-41: dbye ba med de lta ba na'o //
T02TD3305E:245a-42: dbye ba med pa gang du 'byed //
T02TD3305E:245a-43: blo ldan mi 'gyur zhes mthong ngo //
T02TD3305E:245a-44: dri yi gtsang khang gsum gyi cha //
T02TD3305E:245a-45: steng du rab 'jug shes bya ste //
T02TD3305E:245a-46: rtsa bar yang ni rab 'jug dang //
T02TD3305E:245a-47: nas kyi snying po'ang mi 'dod do //
T02TD3305E:245a-48: zlum po'i dri gtsang khang gi las //
T02TD3305E:245a-49: yang na gru bzhi'i las can te //
T02TD3305E:245a-50: phung po'i rjes mthun dag pa nyid//
T02TD3305E:245a-51: gang zhig da ni cha rnams dbye //
T02TD3305E:245a-52: cha shas brgyad kyis yan lag brgyad //
T02TD3305E:245a-53: ji ltar mthong ba'i las rnams kyis //
T02TD3305E:245a-54: cha shas bcu gnyis par yang 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:245a-55: dri yi gtsang khang lhag par yang //
T02TD3305E:245a-56: ji snyed sum cu rtsa drug pa'i //
T02TD3305E:245a-57: shin tu zlum po'i gzugs can bya //
T02TD3305E:245a-58: gang yang dri yi gtsang khang 'di //
T02TD3305E:245b-0: gru bzhi pa yang @245b blta bar bya //
T02TD3305E:245b-1: de lta'i gzugs rnams mngon 'dod pas //
T02TD3305E:245b-2: de snyed cha shas rnams kyang bya //
T02TD3305E:245b-3: lha yi rigs las rnam sprul pa'i //
T02TD3305E:245b-4: rim pa nyid de gzhan du min //
T02TD3305E:245b-5: bar bar la sogs snam bu rnams //
T02TD3305E:245b-6: dri gtsang khang sogs lus la ni //
T02TD3305E:245b-7: 'phel ba dang ni thung ba yang //
T02TD3305E:245b-8: rkang pa ji ltar mdzes par bya //
T02TD3305E:245b-9: snam bu gzhung shing sogs pa rnams //
T02TD3305E:245b-10: nye bar bstan pa ji bzhin bya //
T02TD3305E:245b-11: gzhan dang gzhan gyi las rnams kyang //
T02TD3305E:245b-12: ji lta ji ltar bzhin du bya //
T02TD3305E:245b-13: mgrin pa'i dpangs cha rkang pas dman //
T02TD3305E:245b-14: gzhan yang chung sogs grags rnams la //
T02TD3305E:245b-15: yongs su rdzogs pa'i cha nyid kyis //
T02TD3305E:245b-17: phung por byas pa de nas lnga'i //
T02TD3305E:245b-18: cha 'di rnams kyi nang la gsum//
T02TD3305E:245b-19: de ni mgrin pa'i zlum la bya //
T02TD3305E:245b-20: mgrin pa nye ba'i mthar gnas pa'o //
T02TD3305E:245b-23: phung po cha yis phyed kyi cha //
T02TD3305E:245b-24: sngon gyi bzo bo rnams kyi lugs //
T02TD3305E:245b-25: chen po yi ni phyed kyi chas //
T02TD3305E:245b-26: mgrin pa'i dpangs dag lhag pa min //
T02TD3305E:245b-27: rkang pas dman pa'am gzhan yang phyed //
T02TD3305E:245b-28: spyi bo yi na dpangs la 'dod //
T02TD3305E:245b-29: spyi bor gang zhig 'chi med gnas / skyu ru ra gnas lta bur 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:245b-30: rgya dang phung po'i tshad kyis ni //
T02TD3305E:245b-31: cung zad de ni lhag pa yang //
T02TD3305E:245b-32: spyi bo'i gsum gyi cha yis ni //
T02TD3305E:245b-33: steng gi spyi bor 'dod pa yin //
T02TD3305E:245b-34: dpangs 'dir ji ltar mdzes pa ste //
T02TD3305E:245b-35: mtho dang dma' ba de bzhin no //
T02TD3305E:245b-36: mchod rten rgya ni gcig gis dman //
T02TD3305E:245b-37: mchod rten dpangs ni gnyis kyi cha //
T02TD3305E:245b-39: mchod rten spyi bo'i steng du'o //
T02TD3305E:245b-40: mgrin mtha' ji srid re re zhing //
T02TD3305E:245b-41: bya ste de yi steng du'o //
T02TD3305E:245b-42: brtan pa'i gdugs dang snam bur bcas //
T02TD3305E:245b-43: gdugs la dril bu me long ngo //
T02TD3305E:245b-44: zhes pa dri'i gtsang khang la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:245b-47: der ni lnga yi cha ldan bya //
T02TD3305E:245b-48: 'dir gang gsum gyi cha ldan pa //
T02TD3305E:245b-49: de yi dpangs can khang brtsegs so //
T02TD3305E:245b-51: de bzhin du yang khang brtsegs 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:245b-52: legs par dpangs su gnas pa 'dir //
T02TD3305E:245b-53: mthong ba'ang gzhan dang ldan par 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:245b-54: sngar bzhin phung po rnam gnas pas //
T02TD3305E:245b-55: 'dir yang brtsegs mar rnam gnas nyid //
T02TD3305E:245b-56: gzhan dang gzhan gyi las rnams ni //
T02TD3305E:245b-57: shes pa rnams kyis mdzes par bya //
T02TD3305E:245b-58: khang brtsegs nyid ni ring ba dang //
T02TD3305E:245b-60: gang du mgrin sogs rnam dbye ba //
T02TD3305E:245b-61: des slar 'dir yang snga ma bzhin //
T02TD3305E:245b-62: zhes pa khang pa brtsegs ma'i cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:246a-0: // / @246a * // gsum gyi lha rnams gnas pa'i phyir //
T02TD3305E:246a-1: rgya phubs 'ga' yang blta bya ste //
T02TD3305E:246a-3: nye bar bstan pa ji bzhin bya //
T02TD3305E:246a-4: lnga yi cha'am drug gi cha //
T02TD3305E:246a-5: rgya phubs yang dag gnas par 'dod //
T02TD3305E:246a-6: 'degs pa'i cha dad mnyam pa'i dpangs //
T02TD3305E:246a-8: rgya phubs dbus kyi lus la ni //
T02TD3305E:246a-9: d'a bi da ba dum bu gnyis //
T02TD3305E:246a-10: dum bu gcig pa'i rgya phubs ni //
T02TD3305E:246a-11: b'a rendra dang goo da'i lugs //
T02TD3305E:246a-12: rgyab kyi rtse mo yang dag bsdus //
T02TD3305E:246a-13: ngos rnams rnam rgyas mkhas pa yis //
T02TD3305E:246a-14: dbus su gzhung shing snam bu rnams //
T02TD3305E:246a-15: mthong na mdzes par 'gyur ba bya //
T02TD3305E:246a-16: rnga zlum mtshungs pa dbus kyi steng //
T02TD3305E:246a-17: ngos gnyis gzhung shing mtho ba ste //
T02TD3305E:246a-18: d'a bi da ba gzhung phyed kyis //
T02TD3305E:246a-19: bum pa seng ge rab mdzes 'dod //
T02TD3305E:246a-20: b'a rendra ba'i rgya phubs kyi //
T02TD3305E:246a-21: las ni yul rnams kun du mthong //
T02TD3305E:246a-22: d'a bi da ba'i rgya phubs ni //
T02TD3305E:246a-23: gang du cha shas sogs la mthong //
T02TD3305E:246a-24: slar yang khang bzangs chen po gzhan yang ste //
T02TD3305E:246a-25: ri rab manda ra dang phun tshogs mthar //
T02TD3305E:246a-26: gnas khang bgrod pa'i khang brtsegs bzang po dang//
T02TD3305E:246a-27: glang po seng ge ngang pa bu ldan mkha' lding rig byed gnas rnams la ni rgya phubs bshad //
T02TD3305E:246a-28: rig byed zhal gyi nyis 'gyur zhal rnams dang ni rgyal po'i khang pa rnams la'ang de nyid de //
T02TD3305E:246a-29: zlum po nyid dang drug dang bzhi yis dbye bas rgyan la'ang ji bzhin 'jug pa shes par bya //
T02TD3305E:246a-30: shes nas bzang po shin tu bzang po dga' ba padma bzang po gsum dang lnga pa dang //
T02TD3305E:246a-31: dpal be'u phyed dang dum bu med cing bya ba ldan ba de ni 'phel ldan bdag nyid de /
T02TD3305E:246a-32: khyim gang rgyal po'i bde ba ldan pa bshad cing gzhan yang khang pa brtsegs ma rnams la'ang dran //
T02TD3305E:246a-33: bum pa'i steng du zla ba dra go rnams kyi go yu'i shing las phun tshogs 'jug pa nyid //
T02TD3305E:246a-34: 'di dag dbye bzhis brgyan pa rnams dang de la sogs pa rnams ni grong khyer te /
T02TD3305E:246a-35: l'a d'a ksha dang de nas par da ka rab gsal zhes bya de bzhin d'a bi da //
T02TD3305E:246a-36: bsam pa'i dbang gis chung du'i gnas dang chen po'ang sems can rnams la rnam par bstan //
T02TD3305E:246a-37: ma bshad pa rnams thos las rnam par rgyas pa'ang cho ga shes pa rnams kyis de bzhin bya //
T02TD3305E:246a-38: gtsug lag khang rnams dang ni rkang pa'i dbye bas ming rnams shes par bya ba ste //
T02TD3305E:246a-39: rgya'i gnas kyi steng du ni mi bya'o zhes pa rgya phubs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:246a-41: // / bsam gtan don dam lha rnams kyi //
T02TD3305E:246a-42: khang pa la ni thog gcig ste //
T02TD3305E:246a-43: sangs rgyas gnas pa'i don du yang //
T02TD3305E:246b-0: sangs rgyas bzhi yi gdan @246b rim bzhin //
T02TD3305E:246b-1: gnas pa 'am dga' ba bstan pa yi //
T02TD3305E:246b-2: rtag tu rnal 'byor rgyal po yis //
T02TD3305E:246b-3: yid sogs dang mthun khang pa nyid //
T02TD3305E:246b-4: bsam gtan la sogs bsgrub phyir bya //
T02TD3305E:246b-5: dkyil 'khor lta bu cha bzhi pa'i //
T02TD3305E:246b-6: khang pa brtsegs pa yang bya ste //
T02TD3305E:246b-7: khang brtsegs la ni khang chung 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:246b-8: de ni rta babs dang bcas bya //
T02TD3305E:246b-9: ji snyeng pa la ka ba'i cha //
T02TD3305E:246b-10: slar yang rnam par gnas gyur pa //
T02TD3305E:246b-11: de snyed 'dun khang steng gi dpangs //
T02TD3305E:246b-12: nyung ba min pa gzhan yang 'dod //
T02TD3305E:246b-13: khang pa brtsegs ma la sogs cha //
T02TD3305E:246b-14: de rnams sngar bzhin rab tu grags //
T02TD3305E:246b-15: slar yang brjod par 'gyur ba rnams //
T02TD3305E:246b-16: 'dir ni de rnams bya ba ste //
T02TD3305E:246b-17: de dag steng du mgrin pa dang //
T02TD3305E:246b-18: dri med snying po mdzes pa ste /
T02TD3305E:246b-19: khang brtsegs la 'dod mchod rten dang //
T02TD3305E:246b-20: 'dun khang la yang slar de nyid //
T02TD3305E:246b-21: gtsug lag khang dang tshogs khang ngam //
T02TD3305E:246b-22: de bzhin khang pa gzhan la yang //
T02TD3305E:246b-23: dra go rnams ni mi 'gal bar //
T02TD3305E:246b-24: bya ste de las gzhan du min //
T02TD3305E:246b-25: gzugs rnams ji lta ba yi gnas //
T02TD3305E:246b-26: mchog gi las kyi grogs po yis //
T02TD3305E:246b-27: bya ste slar yang khang pa nyid //
T02TD3305E:246b-29: khang pa bzhi dang bsam gtan gyi khang pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:246b-31: // / da ni rdo rje slob dpon rnams kyis yongs su 'das pa tha ma dga' bar byed pa'i cho ga brjod par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:246b-32: gzhan don la dgyes shi ba 'tsho mdzad ma //
T02TD3305E:246b-33: spyan mar grags pa'i lha mo phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD3305E:246b-34: shi ba yang dag 'tsho byed sbyor ba yi //
T02TD3305E:246b-35: shi ba bde 'gror nges sbyor bshad par bya //
T02TD3305E:246b-36: shi ba'i khang pa shin tu dben par ni //
T02TD3305E:246b-37: nyer spyod kun dang ldan pas rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD3305E:246b-38: me tog dkar po'i phreng bas gtsug tor bcings //
T02TD3305E:246b-39: zhi zhing dkar po'i dri yis rnam par byugs //
T02TD3305E:246b-40: dkar po'i gos dang rgyan ldan shar du zhal//
T02TD3305E:246b-41: bltas pa'am yang na de ru mos pa yis //
T02TD3305E:246b-42: rdo rje dang ni rdo rje dril bu gzung //
T02TD3305E:246b-43: 'jam zhing yangs pa mtho ba'i stan la 'dug / tsandan dkar po la sogs dri rnams dang //
T02TD3305E:246b-44: bdud rtsi lnga sbyar chu yis mdun du ni //
T02TD3305E:246b-45: mandala nye bar byugs te dkar po yi //
T02TD3305E:246b-46: me tog rnams kyis nye bar mdzes pa bya //
T02TD3305E:246b-47: aargha la sogs rang gi sngags rnams na //
T02TD3305E:246b-48: sv'a h'a'i mtha' can legs bzlas bskul tshig dang //
T02TD3305E:246b-49: snying ga'i zla bar rang gi sa bon rnams //
T02TD3305E:246b-50: bltas nas gnas la sogs pa bsrung bar bya //
T02TD3305E:246b-51: de la gnas bdag rnal 'byor bsrung ba'i sngags //
T02TD3305E:247a-0: cho ga bzhin du bsgrub shes @247a * //
T02TD3305E:247a-2: spyan ma'i rnal 'byor rab tu rnam bsgrubs nas //
T02TD3305E:247a-3: snying ga'i sa bon rtse las legs grub 'dod //
T02TD3305E:247a-4: 'khor los mtshan ba'i lcags kyu spro bar bya //
T02TD3305E:247a-5: de yis 'jig rten pha rol song ba'i sems //
T02TD3305E:247a-6: shin tu dmar zhing gsal ba dgug bya ste //
T02TD3305E:247a-7: chos kyi sgo yi gzugs sam yang na ni //
T02TD3305E:247a-8: rlung med mi g-yo'i mar me lta bu yis //
T02TD3305E:247a-9: shi bde yi shes pa 'ongs nas ni //
T02TD3305E:247a-10: spyi bo nas ni snying gar gzhug par bya //
T02TD3305E:247a-11: de rjes de ni shes par ldan pa yis //
T02TD3305E:247a-12: yang dag langs nas 'dug bar blta bar bya //
T02TD3305E:247a-13: de yi snying gar mo ha ra ti zhes //
T02TD3305E:247a-14: bkod nas de yi 'od zer phreng 'bar bas //
T02TD3305E:247a-15: de yi lus ni stong par byas nas su //
T02TD3305E:247a-16: lhag ma rnam par rig byed tsam du blta //
T02TD3305E:247a-17: de yi rjes su mo ha ra ti zhes //
T02TD3305E:247a-18: rab brjod de ni spyan ma'i gzugs su bsam //
T02TD3305E:247a-19: de yi mig dang lus la sogs pa rnams //
T02TD3305E:247a-20: thams cad du ni byin gyis brlab par bya //
T02TD3305E:247a-21: snying po ye shes lha yi thugs ka yi //
T02TD3305E:247a-22: zla ba la gnas rtsa sngags 'od zer dang //
T02TD3305E:247a-23: lha mo'i sprin gyi bdud rtsi'i 'od can gyi //
T02TD3305E:247a-24: ro ldan bum ba rnams kyis dbang bskur bya //
T02TD3305E:247a-25: rang gi lus las nges par spros nas ni //
T02TD3305E:247a-26: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor khyab par 'phros pa yi //
T02TD3305E:247a-27: 'od zer gong bur gyur ba'i tshogs rnams kyis //
T02TD3305E:247a-28: de rjes spyan ma'i sprin gyis dbang bskur bya //
T02TD3305E:247a-29: de yi sngags bzlas chu yis gang ba yi //
T02TD3305E:247a-30: bum pa yis kyang de bzhin dbang bskur bya //
T02TD3305E:247a-31: mgo bo la ni cod pan sbyin bya ste //
T02TD3305E:247a-32: lag pa dag la rdo rje dril bu yang //
T02TD3305E:247a-33: rdo rje'i sngags pas ku sha'i rtse mo la //
T02TD3305E:247a-34: rdo rje rtse gcig rnon bo rnam bsgoms nas //
T02TD3305E:247a-35: de ni me dang mtshungs par bsam par bya //
T02TD3305E:247a-36: de rjes mnyam gzhag sems kyis de yi ni //
T02TD3305E:247a-37: snying gar bkod pa'i shes pa rnam 'phro ba //
T02TD3305E:247a-38: yang dag bskul nas 'bar bar gyur pa rnams //
T02TD3305E:247a-39: rdo rje'i rtse nas rlung gis bskyod par bya //
T02TD3305E:247a-40: me yi 'od zer rnams kyis reg pa yis //
T02TD3305E:247a-41: de ni dngul chu bzhin du 'bar bar bsam //
T02TD3305E:247a-42: steng gi lam nas rnam par dgrol ba'am //
T02TD3305E:247a-43: yang na rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing du'o //
T02TD3305E:247a-44: gal te shes pa lam gzhan nas thon na //
T02TD3305E:247a-45: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho ru ni ltung bar 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:247a-46: de yi phyir na steng gi lam nas su //
T02TD3305E:247a-47: de ni nges par 'pho ba bya ba yin //
T02TD3305E:247a-48: spyi bo nas ni gzugs med 'gro ba ste //
T02TD3305E:247a-49: mdzod spu nas ni gzugs kyi khams su grags //
T02TD3305E:247a-50: mig dag las ni mi yi 'gro ba nyid //
T02TD3305E:247a-51: rna ba dag nas grub pa'i lha ru 'gro //
T02TD3305E:247a-52: sna bug dag nas gnod sbyin nyid du ste //
T02TD3305E:247a-53: kha nas dri za nyid du nges par 'gro //
T02TD3305E:247a-54: lte ba nas ni 'dod pa'i lta ru ste//
T02TD3305E:247b-0: @247b khu ba'i lam nas yi dag sa 'gro bar ro //
T02TD3305E:247b-1: chu yi lam nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas te //
T02TD3305E:247b-2: bshang ba'i lam nas dmyal ba'i 'gro ba ru //
T02TD3305E:247b-3: nges bar 'gro bar shes bya de yi phyir //
T02TD3305E:247b-4: lam de dag ni rnam par spang bar bya //
T02TD3305E:247b-5: de nas thar pa'i grong khyer du gzhug ba'i phyir mdun du zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gsungs pa las yongs su rdzogs pa'i cho ga 'am rdzas gcig pa'i sbyin sreg gi phyogs gsungs pa'i phyir sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD3305E:247b-6: de la ji srid de'i rus pa ma 'ongs pa de srid du de'i gos la de'i ming smos pa sngon du 'gro bas bya zhing /
T02TD3305E:247b-7: 'ongs nas ni de'i rus pa dang gos la yang bya ste nyin zhag brgyad ji srid par ro //
T02TD3305E:247b-8: yang na lho yi phyogs kyi cha la ni //
T02TD3305E:247b-9: khru gang tsam gyi stegs bu gru bzhi bya //
T02TD3305E:247b-10: ba yi lci ba sar ma lhung bas byug / ba yi rnam lnga mnyam bas mngon par gtor //
T02TD3305E:247b-11: der yang dkyil 'khor ma la ya yi ni //
T02TD3305E:247b-12: tsandan dkar pos byugs shing me tog gis //
T02TD3305E:247b-13: mdzes byas de steng bu ma pa rnam par dgod //
T02TD3305E:247b-14: mtshan nyid dang ldan sman dang yal gang dang //
T02TD3305E:247b-15: nor bu dri bzangs 'bru lnga rnams dang ldan //
T02TD3305E:247b-16: gdugs dang ba dan rnams kyis nye bar mdzes //
T02TD3305E:247b-17: mgrin par sngon po'i gos kyis rnam par dkris //
T02TD3305E:247b-18: nye bar spyod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD3305E:247b-19: ku sha'i gdan la yang dag gzhag bya ste //
T02TD3305E:247b-20: rgya chen rigs bdag rang gi mtshan mas mtshan //
T02TD3305E:247b-21: yi ge gsum ldan rtsa ba'i sa bon gyis //
T02TD3305E:247b-22: de ni lhag par gnas par bya ba yin //
T02TD3305E:247b-23: sngags pas yang na khrus kyi sngags rnams ni //
T02TD3305E:247b-24: lan grangs brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas pas so //
T02TD3305E:247b-25: de nas mdun du dkar po'i rdul tshon gyis //
T02TD3305E:247b-26: lte bar bcas shing mu khyud 'bar bar bcas //
T02TD3305E:247b-27: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bris nas me tog ni //
T02TD3305E:247b-28: dkar po mdzes pas rnam par spras byas nas //
T02TD3305E:247b-29: de yi steng du bum pa stong pa yi //
T02TD3305E:247b-30: steng du bug pa dang bcas kham skyogs gzhag / de rjes de yi rus bu kham skyogs der //
T02TD3305E:247b-31: lhag ma med par yang dag dgod bar bya //
T02TD3305E:247b-32: ting 'dzin gsum dang rnam par ldan pa yi //
T02TD3305E:247b-33: de yi phyir bzlog cho ga yang dag bya //
T02TD3305E:247b-34: yungs kar me tog snyoms bar ldan pa rnams //
T02TD3305E:247b-35: rim pa bzhin du gsang sngags rab brjod pas //
T02TD3305E:247b-36: de yi rus pa'am yang na gos dag gam //
T02TD3305E:247b-37: de yi ming la yang dag bsnun par bya //
T02TD3305E:247b-38: de nas sngags kyi tshig tu 'gyur ba ni //
T02TD3305E:247b-39: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:247b-40: aom sarba p'a pam bi sho dha na badzra h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:247b-41: aom sarba karma a'a ba ra na bha smi ku ru h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:247b-42: aom bhr'um bi n'a sha ya a'a ba ra n'a ni dzum h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:247b-43: aom dhr'um bi sho dha ya a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:248a-1: a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:248a-2: aom dzva la dzva la dha dha ka ha na ha na a'a bar n'a ni h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:248a-3: aom srum sar sa ra bra sa ra pra sa ra a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:248a-4: aom h'um ha ra ha ra sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:248a-5: aom h'um sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:248a-6: aom sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni bi spo ta ya h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:248a-7: aom pri ta pri ta sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:248a-8: aom tr'a ta tr'a ta sarba a'a ba ran'a ni h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:248a-9: aom tshindha tshinda sarba a'a bar n'a ni h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:248a-10: aom da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga te he tu na h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:248a-11: aom pa tsa pa tsa sarba phre ta ga te he tun h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:248a-12: aom ma tha ma tha sarba ti rya ka ga ti he tun h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:248a-13: ces pa ni rus pa la sogs pa la bsnun pa'i sngags so //
T02TD3305E:248a-14: de nas lhag par gnas pa byas pa'i chus de'i rus pa la sogs bkru bar bya ste sngags rnams brjod bzhin pas so //
T02TD3305E:248a-16: aom na mo bha ga wa te /
T02TD3305E:248a-17: sarba du rga ti pa ri sho dha ni r'a dz'a ya /
T02TD3305E:248a-18: ta th'a ga t'a ya aarha te samyksam buddh'a ya /
T02TD3305E:248a-20: aom sho dha ne shodha ne /
T02TD3305E:248a-21: sarba b'a pam bi shodha ne shuddhe ne shuddhe bi shuddhe sarba karma a'a ba ra na bi sho dha ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:248a-22: zhes pa ni rus pa la sogs pa bkur ba'i sbags so //
T02TD3305E:248a-23: de nas me tog gtor zhing sngags bzlas pas lam yang dag par bstan par bya ste /
T02TD3305E:248a-25: aom ratne ratne ratna sambha we /
T02TD3305E:248a-26: ratna ki ra ne ratna m'a la bi shuddha /
T02TD3305E:248a-27: shodha ya sarba p'a pam h'um phat /
T02TD3305E:248a-29: de nas me tog de rnams chu la gtor zhing lam rnam par sbyang bar bya ste sngags ni /
T02TD3305E:248a-30: aom padme padme padma audbha we su kha ba tim gatstsha ntu sv'a h'a /
T02TD3305E:248a-31: zhes pa ni lam sbyang ba'i sngags so //
T02TD3305E:248a-32: sngags tshig de dang de rnams la //
T02TD3305E:248a-33: bskul ba'i tshig rnams spel bar bya //
T02TD3305E:248a-34: lam sbyang ba yi sngags rnams kyis //
T02TD3305E:248a-35: me tog char ba rab tu dbab //
T02TD3305E:248a-36: bkra shis tshigs bcad 'don pa la //
T02TD3305E:248a-37: mnyam gzhag don du gzhug par bya //
T02TD3305E:248a-38: thun gsum yang na thun gcig la /
T02TD3305E:248a-39: nyi ma so sor de bzhin bya //
T02TD3305E:248a-40: cho ga ji ltar bshad de ltar //
T02TD3305E:248a-41: yang dag mchod cing thams cad bsdu //
T02TD3305E:248a-42: de la bkra shis kyi tshigs su ba cad pa ni /
T02TD3305E:248a-43: bkra shis gang zhig sems can kun la phan par dgyes //
T02TD3305E:248a-44: sangs rgyas skyon bral rnam par dag pa'i blo ldan pa //
T02TD3305E:248a-45: shes rab yan lag 'dus pas mdzes pa bde ba'i bdag / des ni khyed rnams dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog //
T02TD3305E:248a-46: bkra shis gang zhig lha dang lha min mis mchod pa //
T02TD3305E:248a-47: chos ni de yi bstan pa bla na med pa nyid //
T02TD3305E:248a-48: 'jig rten gsum du rab tu gsal zhing bdag med pa //
T02TD3305E:248b-0: des ni khyed rnams dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig rab mchog chos rnams @248b rtag tu 'dzin //
T02TD3305E:248b-1: dam pa'i sar zhugs rgyal ba'i sras po'i tshogs kyi mchog / sems can rnams la phan par mkhas shing shin tu mdzes //
T02TD3305E:248b-2: des ni khyed rnams dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog / ces ba'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa de rnams kyang rus pa 'khrud pa'i dus su 'don nam 'don du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:248b-3: de nas gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags ni //
T02TD3305E:248b-4: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02TD3305E:248b-5: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02TD3305E:248b-6: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02TD3305E:248b-7: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD3305E:248b-9: de nas mtshan mo tshogs kyi 'khor lo byas te thams cad yang dag par bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:248b-10: 'byor pa yod nang na song yongs su spyong ba'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bzhengs te /
T02TD3305E:248b-11: ji ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD3305E:248b-12: slar yang rdo rje slob dpon gyis sbyin bdag las yon blang bar bya ste /
T02TD3305E:248b-13: des kyang 'byor ba dang rjes su mthun par rab tu dbul bar bya zhing /
T02TD3305E:248b-14: bkrus ba'i gos kyang slob dpon nyid la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD3305E:248b-16: shi ba la dmigs gang yin rnams //
T02TD3305E:248b-17: rang gi gnyen gyis slob dpon dbul //
T02TD3305E:248b-18: da ni mtho ris lam chas su //
T02TD3305E:248b-19: de la byin zhes shes par bya //
T02TD3305E:248b-20: gang zhig cung zad zhi don gyis //
T02TD3305E:248b-21: sbyin pa des 'dir nges par ni //
T02TD3305E:248b-22: bde ba can gyi sar 'gro ba //
T02TD3305E:248b-23: zhag bdun snga bar rab sbyin byed //
T02TD3305E:248b-24: de ltar gang yin kun byas te //
T02TD3305E:248b-25: cho gas lus can steng byas na //
T02TD3305E:248b-26: sdig pa thams cad spangs nas ni //
T02TD3305E:248b-27: bde ba can du nges par 'gro //
T02TD3305E:248b-28: de rjes de rus rnam sbyang bya //
T02TD3305E:248b-29: zhib mor rngo bas btags nas ni //
T02TD3305E:248b-30: chu klung shin tu rgya chen la //
T02TD3305E:248b-31: mchod pa byas te dor bar bya //
T02TD3305E:248b-33: mthon po'i rtse mo'i mthar 'dzegs nas //
T02TD3305E:248b-34: shin tu shugs drag rjes mthun pa'i //
T02TD3305E:248b-35: rlung la de ni bskur bar bya //
T02TD3305E:248b-36: shin tu drag po'i las kyi dbang du gyur pa yis //
T02TD3305E:248b-37: gal te bde ster bde ba can du ma song na //
T02TD3305E:248b-38: 'di ni nges par dran pa'i 'gro ba spangs nas su //
T02TD3305E:248b-39: sum cu rtsa gsum pa yi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur //
T02TD3305E:248b-40: zhes pa rdo rje slob dpon rnams kyis 'das pa tha ma dga' bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'o /
T02TD3305E:248b-42: // / de ltar slob dpon rnams kyi bya ba bsdus pa dngos grub chen po'i rgyur ni rab tu 'bad pa las //
T02TD3305E:248b-43: sna tshogs gzhung las 'ongs pa la sogs mang bo'i me tog tshul ni bdud rtsi'i gzugs can te //
T02TD3305E:249a-0: gang zhig byas las skyes pa'i bsod nams rgyal sras rnams kyi chen po'i sa yi @249a * //
T02TD3305E:249a-2: de yis 'jig rten gsum gyi 'jig rten rgyal mchog kun dga' dang ldan khang bzangs rab 'jug shog //
T02TD3305E:249a-3: ces pa slob dpon gyi bya ba kun las btus ba rnam par grags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon chan po pandi ta aa badh'u t'i pa dpal ldan 'gro ba'i me long gis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD3305E:249a-5: // / rdo rje slob dpon rnams la nye bar mkho ba'i tshog mtha' yas pa phyogs gcig tu bsdus pa'i bstan bcos chen po 'di nyid ni /
T02TD3305E:249a-6: dpal ldan bla ma dam pa dharma k'irti shr'i bha dra'i thugs dgongs rnam bar dag pa'i sgo nas /
T02TD3305E:249a-7: bka' lung snyan pas bskul zhing mthun rkyen phun sum tshogs pa bsgrubs pa la brten nas /
T02TD3305E:249a-8: bi kra ma sh'i la'i pandi ta chen po manydzu shr'i dang /
T02TD3305E:249a-9: bod kyi lo ts'a ba blo gros rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
T02TD3305E:249a-11: // / bstan pa rin po che dang 'gro ba mang po la phan pa rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig / dpal dharma k'i rti'i ga sung gi bdud rtsis bskul bar gyur pa las /
T02TD3305E:249a-12: 'jig rten phan par nges par dga' ba'i pandi ta dang ma ti yis //
T02TD3305E:249a-13: cho ga kun las btus ba'i rin chen phung po rnam par gsal byas ba'i //
T02TD3305E:249a-14: dge bas 'jig rten rnams ni bde ba chen po nyid dang ldan gyur cig / phun sum tshogs pa kun nas 'bar zhing grags pa gsal bar ldan pas 'di ni rtag tu gnas gyur cig / nad dang mu ge las grol dgra mi lhag ma med pa'i sa skyong yun ring phyogs rnams srung gyur cig / tshul khrims sogs ldan yon gnas rnams ni gsung rab mdzod rnams kun nas 'phel ba nyid gyur cig / nyi ma zla ba ji bzhin nyid dang mtshan du dpal ldan dharma k'irti dge zhing shis gyur cig / ces pa dag kyang pandi tas mdzad pa'i smon lam bsgyur ba ste ji lta ba bzhin du 'grub par gyur cig / slar yang dpal ldan byang chub rtse mo'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len zhing gsung gi bdud rtsi 'thungs pa dge slong badzra shr'is kyang cung zad bcos shing dag par bgyis so //
T02TD3305E:249a-15: de yis mtshon pa dge tshogs bdud rtsi'i 'od ldan pa //
T02TD3305E:249a-16: dpag yas phan pa de'i 'od dkar brgyad ldan pas //
T02TD3305E:249a-17: lus can snying la gnas pa'i mun bsal zhing //
T02TD3305E:249a-18: thub bstan ku mud bzhad pa'i gnyen gyur cig /
